['Animal Crossing: New Horizons players are selling items on eBay ... - Gamesradar', 'eBay Finds: Bottecchia Equipe SLX vintage bike - Cyclingnews', 'Valorant Closed Beta Accounts Already on Sale on eBay - Future Game Releases', "Can't wait for the new Bronco? This 1992 example for sale on eBay comes close - Autoblog", 'VALORANT accounts are being sold for hundreds of dollars on eBay ... - Dot Esports']
summary:
["Animal Crossing: New Horizons (opens in new tab) already has a thriving online grey market, where sellers are offering items, recipes, and stacks of bells all for real cash.
New Horizons is the most online-friendly Animal Crossing game to date, and certain enterprising players are using those multiplayer features to sell their goods and services.
You could always leave them a bad eBay review and try to get their merchant account sanctioned, though.
It's fine if you run a little online market where you sell your friends Golden Tools for bells.
But if you do it for real money, you've already given Nintendo the right to shut you down.", "Image 1 of 7 This Bottecchia vintage bike – similar to that used by Greg LeMond to win the 1989 Tour de France – is available to buy on eBay (Image credit: physioworks / eBay) The bike features Campagnolo’s distinctive Delta C-Record brake calipers (Image credit: physioworks / eBay) The derailleur is a Campagnolo C-Record model (Image credit: physioworks / eBay) Period-correct Campagnolo C-Record chainset and front derailleur (Image credit: physioworks / eBay) The bike’s beautiful chrome chainstays (Image credit: physioworks / eBay) Campagnolo’s C-Record downtube shifters are present and correct, as is the Columbus SLX tubing badge (Image credit: physioworks / eBay) The bike comes with the slightly more modern Campagnolo Vento wheels, with (Image credit: physioworks / eBay)We've been scouring the web for retro bike deals and found this Bottecchia vintage race bike for sale on eBay.
Check out the bike on eBay here (opens in new tab)While the seller states the bike originates from 1989, we've done a little internet sleuthing and, as far as we can tell, the frame is a Bottecchia Equipe SLX from 1990.
While the bike may have been from the following year to that stated, it shares the same Columbus SLX tubing with Columbus dropouts that LeMond used on his '89 Tour de France road bike.
LeMond's original 1989 Tour-winning bike would have been equipped with Mavic's SSC (Special Service des Courses) components, pro-race spec groupset and wheels.
While his season started slowly, he began to find his form as the 1989 Tour got underway.", 'The same has happened with today’s Valorant closed beta kickoff, the first-person shooter by Riot Games.
Users have managed to get access to the closed beta, and they haven’t hesitated to turn the benefit into profit.
We have also taken a picture of some of the listings, which include very high pricing—apparently, access to Valorant’s closed beta costs somewhere around $70 – $170 on eBay.
What is even more shocking is that people are bidding to get access to the closed beta, which adds an incentive for people (bots) to keep on doing what they’re doing on Twitch.
Now, is Riot Games actually trying to do something to prevent this nonsense?', "With an endless parade of spy photos, it's starting to seem as if the new Ford Bronco is never going to get here.
For those who have grown tired of waiting, this last-generation full-size Bronco up for auction right now on eBay might fit the bill.
Surfaced by Barn Finds, this 1992 Bronco has just 2,002 miles, and is trumpeted by its seller, thebroncoman.com, as the best in the world.
While we can't vouch for that claim, the pictures do show a 28-year-old Ford that looks new inside and out.
The seller says this Bronco has been in a climate-controlled garage since new.", 'That means there’s a new wave of account selling happening on eBay and other second-hand marketplaces.
On eBay alone, there are more than 10 listings for accounts with VALORANT access ranging from $100 to $1,000, with several having active bids.
In article 1.4 of the ToS for all Riot accounts, it’s made blatantly clear that selling an account isn’t allowed.
You can’t sell, transfer or allow any other person to access your account or Login Credentials, or offer to do so.
Those are the three things you agree to once you create your Riot account in regard to the ownership of the account.']

title: ['The 15 Best BYU Items On eBay Right Now - 247Sports', 'The 30 Best Virginia Tech Items on Ebay Right Now - 247Sports', 'eBay finds: Merckx Hour Record replica - Cyclingnews', 'Buyer lists £2 coin found in his car for £1million on eBay - Wales Online', 'Limited Edition Cyberpunk 2077 NVIDIA RTX 2080 Ti Hits eBay - eTeknix']
summary:
["It's been a month since BYU lost to Saint Mary's in the West Coast Conference tournament.
We love to talk about all of the things that help make it easier for you to rep the Y.
You can get lost for hours sifting through the old stuff that people are selling on eBay (and frankly, that's a task that we would highly recommend).
Today, we highlight the 20 coolest BYU things that are on eBay right now.
If you choose to indulge in a BYU purchase and you aren't satisfied with your order, you can't blame us.)", 'If you’re looking to spend this time refreshing your Virginia Tech apparel, home decorations, and collectibles with more...shall we say... unique items, eBay is your friend.
But who wants to spend a few hours scrolling through pages of eBay results to find the good stuff?
I ventured over to eBay.com and typed in “Virginia Tech” in the search bar.
After scrolling through the first 30 pages (if anyone wants to go further, start at page 31), I think I’ve done it.
I’ve found the 30 best Virginia Tech items on eBay right now.', "Image 1 of 5 The Merckx Pista track bike (Image credit: eBay) A look at the front end (Image credit: eBay) The Campagnolo Record hub (Image credit: eBay) The toe strap pedals (Image credit: eBay) The Merckx-emblazoned Campagnolo chainset (Image credit: eBay)We've been scouring the web for retro bike deals and have dug up this Merckx Pista track bike for sale on eBay.
It comes in the famous orange colour of the Hour Record bike, plus a good deal of the same components.
The farme is an Eddy Merckx Pista track frame, with Merckx's name adorning the downtube.
Merckx set a long-standing hour record in October 1972, with his effort atop a traditional, non-aero bike was not bested until 2000.
The original Merckx Hour Record bike is currently on display in a glass case at the Eddy Merckx metro station in south-west Brussels.", 'We have more newslettersSomething went wrong, please try again later.
Invalid email Something went wrong, please try again later.
Keep up to date with the latest stories with our WalesOnline newsletterA hopeful eBay seller has listed a £2 coin he found in his car on eBay for £1million after saying a dealer offered him more than £5,000 for it.
The unnamed seller listed the coin on the site and it attracted a number of watchers.
The 2002 Commonwealth games Northern Ireland £2 coin is thought to be the rarest coin of them all.', 'Announced back in February, following a little bit of teasing, Nvidia confirmed that they were releasing limited edition 2080 Ti graphics cards.
Well, in something that comes as no surprise, one of them has appeared online via eBay.
Nvidia 2080 Ti Cyberpunk 2077 EditionAvailable to bid on now (well, at the time of writing) the graphics card appears to be absolutely brand new.
The owner has even included a picture of the seal to show that they didn’t even bother opening it.
For this price, you could easily buy 3 standard Nvidia 2080 Ti’s.']

title: ['Sneaker Seller Made $1.5 Million on eBay, Avoids StockX and GOAT - Business Insider', 'Valorant key eBay sellers and buyers are getting account banned by Riot - Shacknews']
summary:
["AdvertisementChris Holbrook, or Sneaker Jesus, is the top sneaker seller on eBay.
The 33-year-old, who did over $1.5 million in sales in 2019, made 90% of his sales on eBay.
Here's why the reseller says he stays away from platforms like StockX and GOAT and instead focuses on eBay to grow his business.
And there are more than 1 million sneaker listings on eBay every day, on average.
Newer resale platforms like StockX, GOAT, and Stadium Goods have become popular in the last decade and many resellers are finding success turning tremendous profits on those apps.", "Valorant key eBay sellers and buyers are getting account banned by Riot Some shady folks are looking to buy and sell Valorant keys on eBay, but be aware.
Such is the case of the newly popular Valorant key eBay market.
Riot Games knows and they are banning such Riot accounts from the game.
We've banned a pile of VALORANT closed beta account sellers and botters to free up more entitlements.
— VALORANT (@PlayVALORANT) April 9, 2020That is to say, spending the money on a Valorant eBay key probably isn’t worth it."]

title: ['How Zoe Boikou turned an eBay store into a multi-million dollar ... - Girlfriend']
summary:
['Born in Greece, Zoe moved to Germany with her family at a young age to escape a domestic violence situation.
"Through our family, we experienced domestic abuse from my dad, me and my sister and my mother," Zoe tells hosts Jacqui and Alana.
From a young age, Zoe remembers wanting to make something of herself, to support her family.
In her teens, Zoe noticed a gap in the market for high-quality brushes at an affordable price point.
Fast forward to now, Zoe has expanded ZOEVA into a multi-million dollar beauty empire.']

['eBay names Walmart exec Jamie Iannone CEO - TechCrunch', 'EBay appoints former Walmart executive Iannone as CEO - Reuters', 'eBay Inc. Names Jamie Iannone Chief Executive Officer - PR Newswire', '1950s Dieter Rams Braun PK-G3 radiogram on eBay - Retro To Go']
summary:
['Half a year after Devin Wenig stepped down as CEO, eBay is finally ready to name a permanent replacement.
Following an appointment from the company’s board of directors, Jamie Iannone will step into the role as head of the company, effective April 27.
Most recently, Iannone served as the COO of Walmart’s eCommerce division, having only been appointed the give a few months prior.
Previously, he held a number of high profile executive gigs under the Walmart umbrella, including serving as the CEO of SamsClub.com.
Other jobs include a four year stint at Barnes & Noble’s digital division (including Nook) and eight years as at eBay.', 'April 13 (Reuters) - EBay Inc on Monday appointed former Walmart Inc executive Jamie Iannone as its chief executive officer, effective April 27, sending shares higher.
The appointment comes nearly a month after activist investor Starboard Value said it wanted eBay to appoint an outsider as permanent chief executive, after being lead by an interim CEO for months.
Scott Schenkel, the company’s chief financial officer, has been serving as interim CEO since Devin Wenig stepped down in September, citing differences with the company’s board.
Iannone, who most recently served as chief operating officer of Walmart eCommerce, previously held leadership roles at EBay from 2001 to 2009.
Shares of the e-commerce company were 3.3% higher at $34.95 in morning trade.', 'SAN JOSE, Calif., April 13, 2020 /PRNewswire/ -- eBay Inc. (NASDAQ: EBAY) today announced that the Company's Board of Directors has appointed Jamie Iannone as Chief Executive Officer, effective April 27, 2020.
Most recently Mr. Iannone was Chief Operating Officer of Walmart eCommerce.
Mr. Iannone has over 20 years of experience leading digital pure-play and omnichannel platforms for some of the world's premier consumer-facing companies.
Mr. Iannone previously worked at eBay as a Vice President and other leadership roles from 2001 to 2009.
"I am honored to rejoin eBay as its next Chief Executive Officer," said Mr. Iannone.', 'A 1950s Dieter Rams Braun PK-G3 radiogram on eBay, looking in amazing condition for its age.
This audio system has been restored to this condition and is now being offered for sale on eBay.
This early Dieter Rams classic has been given a complete overhaul.
All defective capacitors and resistors have been replaced, while the chassis was cleaned, individual parts polished, all mechanical parts oiled and all contacts ‘refreshed’.
Any Dieter Rams design is worth talking about as far as I’m concerned, but the mid-20th century audio systems are the designs to have.']

title: ['Ebay names Jamie Iannone chief executive officer - Fibre2fashion.com', "Kerry Katona auctions off winning I'm a Celeb top on eBay for the NHS - SussexWorld", "Dyson's eBay store has vacuum deals up to 40% off today - TechHive", "'Tiger King' Joe Exotic's pink sequin shirt hits eBay for $650 - Page Six", "Carrie Underwood's 'Before He Cheats' Video Car Seat on eBay - Jezebel", "Lady Frankenstein's 'Alien' facehhugger coronavirus mask is hitting ... - Vanyaland"]
summary:
["Ebay , an e-commerce leader, announced that company's board of directors appointed Jamie Iannone as chief executive officer, effective April 27, 2020.
Ebay, an e-commerce leader, announced that company's board of directors appointed Jamie Iannone as chief executive officer, effective April 27, 2020.
Ebay, an e-commerce leader, announced that company's board of directors appointed Jamie Iannone as chief executive officer, effective April 27, 2020.
Ebay, an e-commerce leader, announced that company's board of directors appointed Jamie Iannone as chief executive officer, effective April 27, 2020.
Ebay, an e-commerce leader, announced that company's board of directors appointed Jamie Iannone as chief executive officer, effective April 27, 2020.", 'Kerry Katona’s winning I’m a Celeb top has sold on eBay for £3,200 – and all profits are going to the NHS.
The 39-year-old, who lives in Crowborough, revealed she was auctioning off the top on her Instagram page.
She posted: “So we’re still sorting out the house and going through so many boxes and look what I found.. my t-shirt from when I won the @[email protected] 2004 so gonna auction it off for the @nhs not sure it will get much but it’s better then nothing for them xxxx.”Advertisement Hide AdAdvertisement Hide AdShe added: “Please copy and paste!
I know it’s not much but feel a bit useless sat on my arse doing nothing, so I’ve put up my t-shirt I wore all the way through of @[email protected] in 2004 and was crowned the very first queen of the jungle for auction for the @nhsenglandldn link is in my bio too xxxxx.”Kerry Katona pictured in SussexTwenty-six people bidded for the t-shirt, which has the celebrity’s name engraved on it and the phone number that fans called to vote for her to win on the show back in 2004.
Advertisement Hide AdAdvertisement Hide AdThe eBay listing started at £1,000.', 'Dyson has long been known for its awesome vacuums, and recently its fans and hairstyling products have become favorites as well.
That quality is often reflected in high price tags, but today you can choose from a wide range of on-sale Dyson products, with some deals in Dyson’s eBay outlet store up to 40 percent off.
If you’re looking for a vacuum, you can get a refurbished Dyson Ball Animal+ upright vacuum for $140, down from a $500 list price.
For those tough-to-reach spaces, a refurbished Dyson V10 Animal cordless vacuum is $270, from a $600 list price.
And much-loved in the beauty community, the Dyson Airwrap complete hairstyler is $400, down from $550.', 'Click to email a link to a friend (Opens in new window)Click to share on Twitter (Opens in new window)Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window)Grrreat deal, or total ripoff?
One of “Tiger King” star Joe Exotic‘s signature sequin shirts can now be yours — at a starting bid of $650, that is.
The long-sleeved fuchsia style can be spotted on Exotic in the second episode of Netflix’s smash-hit docuseries.
According to the seller: “It was purchased directly from Jeff Lowe and was left over from when Joe left the Zoo.
This shirt is guaranteed authentic and is a very rare piece.”“Get it while you can, before Carole Baskin does!” the listing concludes, referring to the incarcerated zookeeper’s longtime nemesis.', 'Last night, while battling an increasingly familiar bout of insomnia, I spent about an hour scouring eBay for bootleg country music t-shirts.
After acquiring a really great Shania Twain tee with incorrect tour dates a few years back, unlicensed merch has become something of a petty obsession.
Anyway, in my search for the perfect “Garth Brook” top, I stumbled upon something glorious: the leather car seat from Carrie Underwood’s best song ever, “Before He Cheats,” the very same found in “his pretty little souped-up four-wheel drive” that she “carved” her “name” into, is for sale.
For $12,000 (or $500 a month for two years, which is more than my student loan repayments), this piece of country-pop history could be owned.
It comes with a letter of authenticity stating that this is the actual truck seat from the video and it is Carrie Underwood’s signature.” I believe it.', 'But one artist, Lady Frankenstein, has gotten extra crafty, creating an insane replica of the Facehugger Xenomorph from the Alien film franchise.
“My Facehugger mask is going viral around the world right now!
I’m really flashed!” Lady Frankenstein writes on Facebook, her German filtered through a translation.
Take 20 hours to make another Facehugger mask!
An original Lady Frankenstein Facehugger mask for one / or one of you!']

title: ['eBay find: Fabian Cancellara edition Trek Madone Project One ... - Cyclingnews', 'Starboard ends proxy fight at eBay, withdraws director nominations - Reuters', 'Controversial Tucker convertible shows up on eBay - Motor Authority']
summary:
["Image 1 of 6 Trek Madone Project One Spartacus (Image credit: eBay) The Cancellara-themed decals (Image credit: eBay) Shimano Dura-Ace Di2 throughout (Image credit: eBay) Bontrager Aeolus 3 D3 wheels (Image credit: eBay) The front derailleur (Image credit: eBay) SRM Power Control 7 power meter (Image credit: eBay)We've been scouring the web for bike deals and we've dug up this limited edition 2013 Trek Madone 7 'Spartacus' Project One on eBay.
The bike was raced by Fabian Cancellara during the 2013 season, including at the UCI World Championships in Florence where he finished tenth.
It's one of only 50 frames that was made, so a real collector's item if you're a Cancellara fan.
View the bike on eBay here (opens in new tab)The seller has included a full and detailed list of components in the eBay post, which is more helpful than usual for eBay finds.
During the 2013 season, Cancellara did the Paris-Roubaix-Tour of Flanders double for the second time in his career, albeit not on this bike.", '(Reuters) - Activist investor Starboard on Thursday ended its proxy fight at eBay EBAY.O by withdrawing its four director nominees four days after the ecommerce company named a new chief executive.
FILE PHOTO: The eBay logo is pictured on a screen in this photo illustration in New York, U.S., July 23, 2019.
REUTERS/Brendan McDermid/IllustrationEBay said it plans to name another independent director in the coming months and will consider the people Starboard had suggested as directors.
On Monday, eBay named Jaime Iannone, the chief operating officer of Walmart Inc.’s WMT.N e-commerce division, as its chief executive.
Starboard pressured eBay anew in 2020 after having been given a hand in naming a director in 2019.', "An original Tucker 48 sedan today would easily sell for seven figures, but a one-of-one Tucker convertible?
1948 Tucker convertible - Photo credit: Accelerate Auto Group/eBayNow the convertible, fully restored to a showroom appearance, is listed for sale on eBay with a Buy It Now price of $2.175 million.
1948 Tucker convertible - Photo credit: Accelerate Auto Group/eBayAccelerate Auto has posted on its website a number of documents it claims authenticates the car.
We should point out that the convertible contains many original Tucker parts.
Regardless of whether the convertible is an original Tucker design or not, there's no denying it's a thing of beauty and very likely the only one of its kind in the world."]

title: ['The Most Expensive Joe Burrow Rookie Cards Sold On eBay So Far - 1130 The Tiger', 'eBay Launches Michael Jordan Store Ahead of ‘The Last Dance’ - Yahoo Life', "Woman Mortified After Realising She'd Ordered Sex Toy Using Mum's eBay Account - LADbible", 'eBay Find: A Rare 1990 Ford Mustang Special 7-Up Edition - Yahoo', 'Leicestershire doctor claims she was forced to buy protective equipment from eBay - Leicestershire Live']
summary:
["But the whole football machine isn't slowing down because of the odd circumstances surrounding the NFL Draft.
This year's NFL Draft gem is LSU quarterback Joe Burrow.
We put together a list of the most expensive, traceable, Joe Burrow cards that have sold on eBay.
So these are the most expensive cards with an actual sold price.
Here are the Top 6 Most Expensive Joe Burrow Rookie Cards That Have Sold On eBay:", "As basketball fans eagerly await the premier of “The Last Dance,” a 10-part documentary series on NBA icon Michael Jordan’s final championship season with the Chicago Bulls, eBay is giving watchers at home the chance to buy anything with his name attached to it.
More from Footwear NewsAnd for the sneaker enthusiast, eBay is launching a series of drops every Friday at 12 p.m.
The calendar features today’s pre-release of the Air Jordan 6 “DMP” for $200, the restock of the Air Jordan 1 “Court Purple 2.0” on April 24 for $170, the pre-release of the Air Jordan 5 “Fire Red” for $200 on May 1 and the restock of the Air Jordan 3 “UNC” for $190 on May 8.
The first two episodes of “The Last Dance” will debut back-to-back on Sunday via ESPN starting at 9 p.m.
eBay Announces a One-Day Flash Sale on Sneakers Priced at $200 or MoreThe 10 Best-Selling Basketball Shoes on eBay Ahead of NBA All-Star WeekendBest of Footwear NewsSign up for FN's Newsletter.", 'But 22-year-old Jessica Smith didn't realise her mistake until it was far too late - only being alerted to the fact she'd purchased a sex toy using her mum's eBay account when she received a message... from her mum.
before suggesting it may be time for Jessica to get her own eBay account.
I've just bought a dildo signed into me mum's eBay account."
Advert 10"My friend had recommended checking eBay because she'd bought a sex toy on there before and said it was cheaper.
"I just did it on my phone without thinking I would still be logged into Mum's account.', '⚡️ Read the full article on MotoriousThis special-edition Fox-body Mustang is looking for a new place to call home.
Those who are Mustang savvy, especially with the Fox-body era, can easily point out a Mustang 7-Up car.
This 1990 Ford Mustang LX Convertible 7-Up Edition has 73,000 miles on the clock and is equipped with an automatic transmission.
This 1990 Ford Mustang LX Convertible 7-Up Edition is located in Tampa but can be delivered anywhere in the United States.
Read More Mustang News Here...Boast A 1967 Ford Mustang Super Snake ’Vert Full Of Supercharged Goodness The perfect blend of classic-meets-modern along with 650-horsepower on tap.', '“That’s why I put out an appeal on social media so that we could get some protective equipment.
“I was ordered scrubs and spare clothing from eBay to make sure I, my family and patients were safe".
Local businesses and firms donated facemasks and protective equipment to the surgery, including a firm who provided 3D-printed masks for staff.
She added: “Thanks to the general public, we have plenty of facemasks and other protective equipment but I do wish the Government and Matt Hancock were being more honest about the PPE situation.
A spokesperson from Leicester, Leicestershire and Rutland Clinical Commissioning Groups (LLR CCGs) said: "LLR CCGs recognise concerns relating to the supply of PPE (Personal, Protective Equipment).']

title: ['eBay is no place to sell emergency supplies - The Times', 'Controversial Tucker convertible on eBay is hard to put a price on - Driving']
summary:
['My wife and I ordered an oxygen concentrator on March 17 through eBay for £200, to help if we ever catch Covid-19.
I went onto eBay’s website to complain but it would not acknowledge that I bought the machine through it, so I can’t progress the complaint.
I was going to try to contact the seller in China and distributor in Dublin, but cannot find their numbers or email addresses.
SponsoredThey have misrepresented the product: nowhere does it state that everything is in Chinese.
I spent so much time on this that I am at my wits’ end.', '']

title: ['Nintendo Switch Shortage is Breeding Awful eBay Reseller Scum - CCN.com', 'Top selling Air Jordans on eBay include Space Jam, Royals, Chicago - Business Insider', 'eBay offers supports for Irish SMEs during Covid-19 pandemic - SiliconRepublic.com', 'Reddit, eBay, Bank of America, Deloitte lead way in family leave - AdAge.com', 'Mother gets injunction over toddler image being used on eBay - Independent.ie', 'A 1948 Tucker Convertible Is Available on eBay The Tucker is one of the most legendary cars ever made... - Auto123']
summary:
['', 'From the Chicago 1s to the Bred 11s, these are the best-selling Air Jordan sneakers on eBay in the last 15 yearshttps://www.businessinsider.in/retail/news/from-the-chicago-1s-to-the-bred-11s-these-are-the-best-selling-air-jordan-sneakers-on-ebay-in-the-last-15-years/slidelist/75258496.cms2020-04-20T23:12:36+05:30', 'To help businesses move online, eBay is waiving the price of listings and final value fees until July, and offering webinars on marketing and digital skills.
Today (20 April) eBay launched a new crisis initiative aimed at supporting small Irish businesses through the disruption caused by Covid-19.
The e-commerce platform’s new ‘Up & Running’ programme wants to help Irish SMEs to set up an online sales presence for free.
As part of the programme, businesses can receive support through virtual workshops, training and mentoring to help launch online stores.
To participate in the programme, companies can create a business page here, before completing the eBay Ireland business questionnaire here.', "The List launched the #AskAboutIt campaign in February to commemorate the anniversary of the Family and Medical Leave Act.
As the calendar turned to March, however, and the coronavirus spread around the country, offices began to recommend and then mandate that employees work from home.
Each of the companies Fatherly surveyed were asked 30 questions, such as:How many weeks of paid parental leave does your company provide parents/non-birth parents?
Does your company provide paid family caregiving leave that allows employees to take time to care for a seriously ill, injured or disabled relative or loved one?
Nine out of the 10 Companies That Get Family Leave Right are giant corporations—or belong to large multinationals—and thus have the resources to offer top policies not just because it's the right thing to do but because it's smart business.", 'Girl (16) settles for €145,000 after fall from horse she claimed was spooked by other horse during lesson', "A 1948 Tucker convertible has appeared on the popular online auction site eBay.
Founded by Preston Tucker, the firm launched the Tucker 48 sedan, but only 51 units were built before the businessman went bankrupt due to the federal authorities' crackdown on certain of his business practices.
Tucker 48 convertible, profile Photo: Accelerate AutoThe piece, since fully restored and displaying the look of a showroom model, is now available on eBay for $2,175,000 USD.
Whether the convertible is an original Tucker model or not, it is undeniably a unique item.
Tucker 48 convertible, front Photo: Accelerate AutoTucker 48 convertible, roof up Photo: Hemmings"]

title: ['Is eBay Sending Offers to Your Blocked Buyers? - EcommerceBytes', 'The excellent Canon EOS R mirrorless is AU$700 off on eBay ... - Digital Camera World']
summary:
["eBay allows sellers to send offers to shoppers who are watching one of their items (or who have one of their items in their cart) - it's called Seller Initiated Offer, and it appears to be a popular feature with sellers.
However, eBay doesn't provide sellers with the identity of those shoppers, and according to online-selling guru Don, aka The Auction Professor, when eBay sends seller initiated offers to watchers, it includes even those buyers who are on the seller's blocked buyer list.
Buyers and bidders are unable to communicate with a seller once they've been blocked, but if they receive a Seller Initiated Offer, they can, Don said in the video.
Based on The Auction Professor's description of the problem, it would seem bidders and buyers are able to watch items from sellers who've blocked them.
Changing that could help sellers avoid the kind of problem he encountered with offers to watchers.", "Canon has been drip-feeding us specs of the upcoming EOS R5 (opens in new tab) for a while now, teasing us with how great a video camera the new full-frame flagship is likely going to be.
Compared to what we already know about the forthcoming shooter, the now almost-two-year-old EOS R (opens in new tab) feels quite lacklustre.
Yet the EOS R is a pretty formidable camera, particularly if you're keen on stills rather than video.
(opens in new tab) Canon EOS R (body only) | AU$2,147.85 (opens in new tab) (RRP AU$2,849; save AU$701.15) It's one of the lowest prices you can currently find on this mirrorless marvel in Australia from a major retailer selling via eBay.
Read moreThe best Canon RF lenses (opens in new tab)The best mirrorless cameras in 2020 (opens in new tab)The 50 best camera accessories (opens in new tab)The best memory cards for your camera (opens in new tab)"]

title: ['Long lost Sheffield football trophy worth thousands turns up on eBay - The Star', 'eBay rectifies row with Imagex, Bicester - Oxford Mail', 'Woman transforms door with sticker & people can’t believe the difference... - The Sun', "How Ordering a Meteorite on eBay Inspired Artist Harry Dodge's ... - AnOther Magazine", 'Copy of Rarest Pulped League Of Extraordinary Gentlemen #1 Hits ... - Bleeding Cool News', 'eBay Finds: 1973 Colnago Super Pantografata - Cyclingnews', 'New angles for Ebay - Drapers']
summary:
['The long-lost Sheffield and Hallamshire FA County Cup trophy turned up for sale on eBay earlier this month, priced at an eye-watering £2,900 – but a fraction of its true value.
Advertisement Hide AdAdvertisement Hide AdBarnsley were the last winners of the competition in 1993, with teams choosing to pay opt-out fees rather than take part from then on.
The Sheffield and Hallamshire FA County Cup.
”This is where I played my modest part.”Advertisement Hide AdAdvertisement Hide AdMartin Westby with the Sheffield and Hallamshire FA County Cup.
He said: “To my eye it does not look to have suffered any damage over the years and just needs a good clean to return it to its former glory.”Advertisement Hide AdAdvertisement Hide Ad', "Robert Peckham, from Langford, Bicester, sells photographic equipment at his shop, Imagex, in Pioneer Square, as well as online through eBay.
ALSO READ: Imagex owner says eBay is 'crippling' his businessBut now, after looking back at his case and previous 10-year selling history on the site, eBay has changed its mind.
Mr Peckham said: “On Friday afternoon I had a phone call from a lovely Irish lady named Katie who introduced herself as one of the Customer Service Team at eBay in Ireland.
Mr Peckham added: “So there we are - it’s a result.
With his retail shop in Bicester town centre closed due to the coronavirus, online sales were vital in keeping his business afloat.", 'A SAVVY woman gave her boring white door an incredible makeover using a 3D staircase sticker.
Emma Edwards shared snaps of her hallway, revealing a very plain white door with bits of old tape stuck to it.
⚠️ Read our coronavirus live blog for the latest news & updates3 She revealed her plain white door needed some TLC Credit: DIY on a budget/FacebookRather than repainting it, Emma decided to have a little fun and bought a door sticker of a set of wooden steps.
Her simple makeover has racked up more than 1,000 likes online, as people thought the stairs were a little too realistic.
Meanwhile this woman shared a brilliant hack on how to cut her dog’s nails but it involves spreading peanut butter on her head.', 'Amelia Abraham: How did My Meteorite come about – was there a moment when you decided to write a book, per se?
Harry Dodge: Yes I knew what I was doing [laughs].
I wrote in earnest for about a year, working through notes from 2016 and writing out things synchronously too, in 2017.
Writing the book was, you know, my relationship with language made manifest: joyful, ecstatic.
But books, writing, these things are constructions, missives from an artist to the world, meant for sharing, meant to prompt sociality.', '', "Image 1 of 6 1973 Colnago Super Pantografata in 'Molteni orange' on eBay (Image credit: diggers158 / eBay) The bike’s Campagnolo Nuovo Record brake levers – drilled, with milled Colnago ace-of-clubs logo and pantograph details (Image credit: diggers158 / eBay) The Colnago Super’s special, custom-milled Cinelli stem (Image credit: diggers158 / eBay) Molteni’s Eddy Merckx – on his Colnago Super – leads Roger De Vlaeminck (Brooklyn) at the 1973 Paris-Roubaix (Image credit: Getty Images Sport) The bike’s beautiful 'pantographed' Campagnolo Nuovo Record seatpost (Image credit: diggers158 / eBay) Colnagos don’t get much better than this 1973 Colnago Super Pantografata (Image credit: diggers158 / eBay)Up next in our series of fantastic eBay finds is this superb Campagnolo-equipped Colnago Super Pantografata bike from 1973 adorned in the famous orange colour of five-time Tour de France winner Eddy Merckx's Molteni squad, and used by the team that year.
Merckx and bike-company founder Ernesto Colnago worked closely together on the design of the bikes Merckx used while he was at Molteni.
Perhaps most important of all is the fact that Colnago was actually the head mechanic at the team during that time.
According to a tech piece on Cyclingnews back in 2014 about a 1972 Colnago Super Pantografata, the pantograph-etching work carried out on the frames and the Cinelli and Campagnolo components was all done in-house by Colnago.
For anyone with £6,000 burning a hole in their pocket, it doesn't get much better than this.", 'New angles for Ebay Digital Edition: New angles for Ebay Rob Hattrell, vice-president of Ebay UK, has aspirations for the site best known for selling second-hand goods by auction to become the “online Bicester Village” for fashion retailers and brands.
No online subscription: This article requires a paid-for subscription to read it in full.
If you already have a subscription, please click here to sign in, or see below for how to set up your subscription todayAlready have an account, click here to sign in']

title: ['The Air Jordan 1 High ‘Court Purple’ Is Restocking on eBay Today - Footwear News', "Buying Dora Maar's Diary on eBay and Other Classy Tales From ... - The New York Times", 'eBay Finds: 1990 Greg Lemond TVT 92 carbon-fibre Z team frame - Cyclingnews']
summary:
['The Air Jordan 1 High “Court Purple” didn’t last long when it hit retail this month, but fans will have another chance to buy a pair today.
A limited number of pairs of the coveted sneaker will be restocked on eBay today at 12 p.m.
(Click here for the drop’s landing page when the sneakers hit the site with the $170 price tag.)
The “Court Purple” iteration features a white and purple upper with black on both the Swoosh and Air Jordan branding and on the collar.
Other sneakers that will be listed in the series of drops every Friday through May 15 include the pre-release of the Air Jordan 5 “Fire Red” for $200 on May 1 and the restock of the Air Jordan 3 “UNC” for $190 on May 8.', 'Feeling helpless to ease Pierre’s suffering, Yanis tries to restore a life to his dying son.
Beyond that, we learn very little about either character; the few details on offer do little to deepen our understanding of the men.
FINDING DORA MAARAn Artist, an Address Book, a LifeBy Brigitte BenkemounTranslated by Jody Gladding216 pp.
Benkemoun ordered a vintage Hermès diary for her partner, who was highly particular about his leather preferences; new models didn’t cut it.
Bit by bit, she pieced together clues to the diary’s first owner.', "Image 1 of 6 A 1990 Greg Lemond TVT 92 carbon-fibre Z team frame found on eBay (Image credit: bookmeister2012 / eBay) Z leader Greg Lemond rides into Paris on his TVT 92 bike as the winner of the 1990 Tour de France (Image credit: Bettini Photo) The Greg Lemond-badged TVT 92 shows off its very nicely done black-to-yellow-to-pink paint fade (Image credit: bookmeister2012 / eBay) This decal celebrates some of Lemond’s biggest past victories (Image credit: bookmeister2012 / eBay) Greg Lemond (Z) uses his TVT 92 frame, complete with Scott Drop-In handlebars, at the 1990 Giro d'Italia (Image credit: Bettini Photo) Also 'thrown in' are these Scott Drop-In handlebars and Scott clip-on tri bars, as used by Lemond, and a saddle mounted on a Campagnolo C-Record seatpost (Image credit: bookmeister2012 / eBay)Our latest discovery in the wonderful world of eBay is this 1990 Greg Lemond TVT 92 carbon-fibre racing frame – the same model ridden to victory by Lemond at the 1990 Tour de France.
Take a look at the frame on eBay here (opens in new tab).
And this wonderful eBay find is a fine example of the racing frame that Lemond won that Tour on: a carbon-fibre Greg Lemond TVT 92, painted in his Z team colours, in a size 57cm – with a few extras thrown in, too.
Z leader Greg Lemond rides into Paris on his TVT 92 bike as the winner of the 1990 Tour de France (Image credit: Bettini Photo)For the 1990 Tour, Lemond plumped for a TVT 92 carbon frame, badged as being a model from his own bike company, and in the colours of his new Z team – the French squad managed by Roger Legeay, which later became Gan and then Crédit Agricole.
Take a look at the frame on eBay here (opens in new tab)."]

title: ['Lego toys see 92% spike in sales during coronavirus on eBay ... - news.com.au']
['Forget eBay, Shopify Is a Better Growth Stock - The Motley Fool', 'VR headset makers can’t keep up with demand, so prices are up 50% - GearBrain']
summary:
["E-commerce giant eBay (EBAY 2.82%) has been a solid investment for the past decade, consistently beating the broader markets.
eBay's sales growth is deceleratingeBay's yearly revenue has risen nearly 64% from $6.6 billion in 2011 to $10.8 billion in 2019.
While Amazon (AMZN 1.59%) sells products from others and well as its own products on its platform, eBay does not take ownership of the product.
Shopify depends on growing its merchant base to drive both merchant solutions and subscription revenue growth in the upcoming decade.
Shopify has an expanding addressable market and the long-standing prospects for Shopify remain bright as its growth opportunity appears massive.", 'Read More:Oculus Quest All-in-one VR Gaming Headset – 64GBThe problems for Facebook, which owns the Oculus brand, are numerous.
The $999, PC-tethered Valve Index VR headset is suffering for repeated stock shortages and sell-outs.
Other third-party sellers (also with a $950 markup) have adjusted the product titles to include phrases like "in hand, ships fast" to win sales.
Other third-party sellers are showing similar markups, including eBay, where the 64GB Oculus Quest is available from various sellers for between $540 and $570.
Best VR Headsets for Under $100 by GearBrain www.youtube.comSamsung HMD Odyssey+ Windows Mixed Reality Headset with 2 Wireless Controllers 3.5" Black (XE800ZBA-HC1US)']

title: ['eBay Just Gave Sellers a Reason to Offer Local Pickup - EcommerceBytes', 'Oil Bankruptcies Are Coming: EnergyNet, The EBay Of Oilfields, Is Ready To Profit - Forbes', 'Rare Prints by Pablo Picasso, Andy Warhol & More Hit eBay for ... - HYPEBEAST', 'Mum makes daughter’s drab wendy house look brand new using eBay and IKEA bargains... - The Sun', "Live the '70s dream with this custom Chevy van on eBay - Yahoo News Canada"]
summary:
["Newsflash: eBay is introducing delivery confirmation for Local Pickup.
eBay requires sellers to refund INR claims unless they can provide a tracking number showing the item was delivered.
But eBay is introducing QR codes that will serve as proof of delivery for Local Pickup orders.
I know that local pickup is very popular in those sites, so we're looking to expand to our big seven.
The new feature could help eBay win back sales from sellers who have turned to Facebook Marketplace and mobile selling apps to sell locally rather than open themselves up to the risk involved in using Local Pickup on eBay.", '', 'eBay for Charity is now joining forces with the Help a Life Foundation on a special auction featuring rare works by Pablo Picasso, Andy Warhol, Thomas Hussung, and more.
One of the highlights is Picasso’s Le Musicien de Rue lithograph print that was published in Paris back in 1956.
The work was first published in 1988 by the Belgium-based Galerie Ronny van de Velde.
Visit eBay for Charity’s website to view the lots in the sale.
For more standout releases, take a look at this week’s list of art for your home.', '6 The wendy house now looks new and modern after being paintedRather then spending a fortune on a brand new wendy house for her daughter, one thrifty mum decided to pick one up for £60 on Facebook marketplace and do it up herself using bargain buys.
Posting to the Extreme Couponing and Bargains UK Facebook group, she said: "DIY playhouse transformed for my daughter.
6 the mum had purchased the wendy house second hand from Facebook marketplace Credit: Extreme Couponing and Bargains UK group/FacebookThe transformation proved popular with many mums eager to replicate one of their own.
This bloke transformed his junk-filled shed into a trendy outdoor bar for free using old paint and scrap wood.
Plus Amanda Holden & Rochelle Humes spend £10K on luxury wendy houses for kids – complete with ice cream parlours & balconies.', 'This 1975 Chevrolet G10 panel van is a fitting homage to the era, from the wild flames-over-metal-flake paint job, to the side pipes, to the chrome Cragar wheels.
But most of all, it's the shag-tastic green and purple interior that transports you back in time.
The "Boogie Van" is currently for sale on eBay Motors.
Heart-shaped portal windows, a chromed grille, gold pinstriping, and the airbrushed "Boogie Van" graphics complete the look.
That's a whole lotta green, but then again, you're also getting a whole lotta green.']

title: ['Ebay Q1 reports sales of $2.374B, active buyers up to 174M in wake of COVID-19 - TechCrunch']
summary:
['Analysts on average were expecting $2.38 billion in revenues on earnings per share of $0.72.
Ebay itself was expecting sales of between $2.55 billion and $2.60 billion, with GAAP earnings per diluted share from continuing operations in the range of $0.50 – $0.53 and non-GAAP earnings per diluted share from continuing operations in the range of $0.70 – $0.73.
In other words, eBay missed on sales in terms of analyst average projections, beat their expectations on EPS, and beat both of its own internal targets.
Ebay noted that active buyers are up by 2% and now total 174 million global active buyers.
Meanwhile, Marketplace — the main eBay business, that is — generated $2.1 billion of revenue, down 1%, while Classifieds saw $248 million of revenue, down 3%.']

title: ['eBay Finds: Colnago C35 Ferrari pre-production prototype bike - Cyclingnews', "eBay User Selling 'World's Largest Zakk Wylde Guitar Collection' - Loudwire"]
summary:
['This C35 carbon frame, released in 1989 in collaboration with the famous Italian Formula 1 team Ferrari is certainly no exception.
See the Colnago C35 here on eBay (opens in new tab)According to the seller, this is a pre-production prototype of the C35, and has apparently been relisted due to an "unserious bidder".

If you have any suggestions or leads, please send them to cyclingnews@cyclingnews.com with 'eBay Finds' in the subject line', 'Zakk Wylde has played some of the most distinctive guitars in rock history, and if you're a fan with a significant sum of cash, you could find yourself owning a significant lot of them.

The "Zakk Guitar Gallery" collection originated with an official Gibson dealer in South Korea and features a wealth of Wylde's Gibson Les Paul Bullseye models.

title: ['eBay shows the effects of lockdown on its business - InternetRetailing']
summary:
['eBay this week said it was seeing the effects of lockdown on its business.
“From the start of the quarter through mid-March our underlying business performance was better than our expectations,” said eBay in this week’s first-quarter statement.
The marketplace platforms have also experienced improved acquisition of small business sellers.
The update came as eBay this week reported its first quarter figures, for the three months to March 31.
Image courtesy of eBay UK']

title: ['eBay Finds: Mapei Colnago Dream frameset - Cyclingnews', "Escape To The Country's Jules Hudson lost £1,600 to an eBay scammer - This is Money"]
summary:
["This aluminium Colnago Dream, dressed beautifully in a Mapei team paintjob, will certainly appeal to fans of the Italian marque.
The Dream model dates from the late 1990s, while a later Dream Plus model was 'upgraded' to include a carbon-fibre rear triangle.
Check out the frame on eBay here (opens in new tab)The Dream boasts the same star-shaped top tube as Colnago's pricier carbon models, which became somewhat of a trademark.
Continue to dream about owning a C40 – we'll allow you that – but this Dream will tick a lot of boxes for Mapei and Colnago fans.
If you have any suggestions or leads, please send them to cyclingnews@cyclingnews.com with 'eBay Finds' in the subject line", "TV presenter Jules Hudson says he once lost £1,600 to a scammer on eBay.
My parents are careful with money and I have tried to follow their example and not take too many risks.
Don't get me wrong, I love to switch off and relax – but I do also love going to work.
I think that's what makes this time so frustrating for so many people.
I once bought a quad bike for £1,600 on eBay thinking it was too good to be true – and it was."]

title: ['Savvy mum makes epic outdoor cinema using eBay projector and an old sheet & thousands are keen to copy... - The Sun', 'Mum turns run-down stairs into chic staircase in DIY eBay transformation - Daily Star']
summary:
['A savvy mum has revealed how she made her own epic outdoor cinema using a projector she bought from eBay and an old sheet.
1 A savvy mum has revealed how she made an epic outdoor cinema for her kids during lockdown as a birthday treatIn the incredible photo, the mum has used her shed wall as a backdrop for the cinema and her kids are snuggled on blankets.
She wrote: “A cheep way for a lockdown birthday cinema for everyone who’s is concerned about the phones if you all look closer you can see they are taking pics of them self’s for great memories.
Many people were highly impressed with her outdoor cinema and asked where she got her project from - to which she replied eBay.
Plus, this mum shared the ‘reward shop’ trick she uses to get her daughter to help out with household chores.', "Laura Jayne, a social media administrator, managed to turn her bare stairs into a pretty feature staircase.
(Image: Laura Jayne/Facebook)The mum painted her bare floorboards with white paint before using some affordable carpet treads to create a beautifully modern staircase.
“Then one litre of ‘Chalk White' floor and stair paint, which I found on eBay – it was £24.99 for 2.5 litres.
(Image: Laura Jayne/Facebook)The paint wasn't the only thing the DIY fan picked up on eBay.
(Image: Laura Jayne/Facebook)The DIY fan found the painting fairly easy “as the paint dries pretty fast”."]

title: ['eBay Finds: Silca SuperPista Pegoretti Ciavete final-edition track ... - Cyclingnews', 'Contraceptive pills are being sold on eBay as women struggle to access family planning services - Daily Mail', 'Mum transforms her dingy staircase into a chic space using eBay bargains and it only cost £65... - The Sun', 'Michael Goonan Is Selling His MAFS Wedding Ring On eBay - Nova']
summary:
["Image 1 of 4 A Silca SuperPista Pegoretti Ciavete track pump on eBay (Image credit: colnagocyclingbikescalifornia / eBay) The one-of-a-kind track pump comes new in its box (Image credit: colnagocyclingbikescalifornia / eBay) The beautiful wooden handle on this special Pegoretti-edition Silca track pump (Image credit: colnagocyclingbikescalifornia / eBay) A closer look at the Pegoretti Ciavete paintwork (Image credit: colnagocyclingbikescalifornia / eBay)Are you after an expensive, one-of-a-kind track pump for your garage?
We've found the perfect example on eBay: a Pegoretti Ciavete-version Silca SuperPista Ultimate.
Check out the track pump on eBay here (opens in new tab)Some people get misty-eyed over frame-fitting pumps – a throwback to refined, gentlemanly roadside mechanics, deemed a world away from frenetic mini-pump activity or, heaven forbid, CO2 cartridges.
And they don't get much better than this Pegoretti Ciavete-version Silca SuperPista Ultimate.
This beautiful pump marries a Silca SuperPista Ultimate track pump with a design by famous Italian framebuilder and painter Dario Pegoretti, who passed away in 2018.", "Contraceptive pills are being listed on eBay as women struggle to access family planning services during lockdown - but experts warn buying medication from the online site could lead to unwanted pregnancies.
One anonymous seller from Manchester listed the combined oral contraceptive pill, Femodene, for £22, while another from London listed a non-hormonal copper coil at £28.98.
Likewise, condoms bought on eBay that aren’t from a regulated seller run the risk of being ineffective if they don't meet standards of quality.
The leading contraceptive nurse added how online pharmacies 'provide an excellent service' enabling women to order a six-month supply of the contraceptive pill direct to their front door.
She said: 'This is an important alternative to access via GPs and family planning clinics because it enables women to stay at home.", 'A MUM has revealed how she transformed her tired staircase using bargains from eBay - and it looks absolutely amazing.
Taking to the Facebook group DIY On a Budget mum-of-three Laura Jayne, 37, shared incredible before and after photos.
4 A mum has revealed how she completely transformed her staircase using bargains from eBay Credit: DIY On A Budget UK/FacebookShe explained that she had been forced to make the improvement herself after her landlord refused to.
Captioning her photos she explained: “Unfortunately, my landlord is well known in this area for collecting property and not fixing anything.
Plus this mum makes stunning feature wall in her bathroom using masking tape trick and old paint.', 'Like this song Dislike this song']

title: ['Hacker buys old Tesla parts on eBay, finds them full of user data - Ars Technica', 'Crazy eBay Auction Unloads Lost Treasures From Old Toy Store - Pop Geeks', 'eBay Local Pickup QR Code is on its way for delivery confirmation - QR Code Press']
summary:
['But those benefits require storing heaps of personal information that an amateur researcher found can reveal owners’ most sensitive data.
All 13 of the devices showed that their last location was at a Tesla service center, an indication that they were removed by an authorized Tesla technician.
Tesla service stations remove MCUs for several reasons.
Even then, there’s no guarantee that previously stored data can’t be recovered.
The researcher said the Tesla MCUs keep information in a SQLite database that isn’t deleted until the hard drive blocks that store it are overwritten by new data.', 'We’re talking unopened games for the Atari and Commodore 64, action figures in their packaging, books, tapes and all sorts of lost relics.
Every Child World that ever existed was converted into another business long ago.
There are quite a few 2600, 5200 and even 7800 games in the lot, several Commodore 64 games and even a few programmer manuals.
“Putt Nuts” is an unfortunate name, but perhaps not so bad as “Crack Head.”There are quite a few Flipsiders in this auction.
Finally, if the tags aren’t proof enough, Peter Panda was the Child World mascot, and these products would only be available within the store.', 'Sellers and buyers have a new feature to look forward to in the near future in the form of the eBay Local Pickup QR Code.
The eBay Local Pickup QR Code is meant to provide a method of offering proof of delivery of items collected or picked up in person.
The new eBay Local Pickup QR Code is given to a buyer with a six-digit number to confirm collection.
It is important to note that this feature is made available online when the item’s listing offered local pickup as one of the available options.
The eBay Local Pickup QR Code is automatically triggered when the buyer selects the local collection option when completing their checkout process.']

title: ['Why eBay Stock Was Up 33% in April - Nasdaq', 'eBay Finds: Colnago C50 Krono Rabobank time trial bike - Cyclingnews', 'eBay Advertising hires Telegraph head - BusinessCloud - BusinessCloud', 'When Did It Start? : A Well-Known Auction Site eBay - Vizaca.com']
summary:
["What happenedIt was an eventful month for e-commerce giant eBay (NASDAQ: EBAY).
However, those fears were calmed in April, as eBay and Starboard Value jointly announced an agreement.
So even after eBay's stock gains in April, this technology stock trades around 18 times 2020 earnings.
In Q1, the company completed its $4.1 billion sale of StubHub and coincidentally bought back $4 billion eBay stock.
The Motley Fool recommends eBay and recommends the following options: long January 2021 $18 calls on eBay and short January 2021 $37 calls on eBay.", "Image 1 of 4 A Colnago C50 Krono Rabobank time trial bike on eBay (Image credit: colnago_for_sale / eBay) A Pro cockpit on the C50 Krono helps to ensure that you’ll stay aero (Image credit: colnago_for_sale / eBay) Dutch time trial champion Thomas Dekker (Rabobank) en route to eighth place on stage 8 of the 2005 Giro d’Italia (Image credit: Getty Images Sport) The mid-2000s TT bike comes equipped with a 10-speed Shimano Dura-Ace groupset (Image credit: colnago_for_sale / eBay)This rare, mid-2000s Colnago C50 Krono time trial bike – as provided to the Dutch Rabobank squad – has been shown the light of day on eBay, and is the latest 'find' here at Cyclingnews to make us prick up our ears and rattle our piggybank.
And this C50 Krono is certainly pretty special.
Colnago has always been most well-known for its impeccably made road bikes but when supplying Rabobank with bikes – from 1996-2008 – the company needed to make some time trial frames available, too, and the Krono is one of them.
See the Colnago time trial bike here (opens in new tab)We're constantly on the lookout for unique and rare cycling relics on eBay.
If you have any suggestions or leads, please send them to cyclingnews@cyclingnews.com with 'eBay Finds' in the subject line", 'Posted on May 6, 2020 by staffeBay Advertising hires Telegraph head', 'eBay is one of the most recognized and most used online auction websites all around the world.
Presently, the validity of eBay appears endless because it has become the part of daily purchasing for many people.
In order to know more about this famous site we need to dive into its history first, when did eBay start?And why did it need to be started?
In September 1995, eBay was just a little idea, but soon it started flourishing, developing, with the assistance of some friends, became an international success.
The basic layout and business classification of eBay was to encourage and provide a site where people want to sell something could list their products for sale.']

title: ['New eBay Fees Will Include Commission on Sales Tax - EcommerceBytes', "eBay's Seen A 200% Spike In Silver Chain Sales Thanks To Connell ... - Pedestrian.TV", 'Ball & Chain $52 on eBay Over Scott Lobdell/Dwayne Johnson ... - Bleeding Cool News']
summary:
['Instead of paying a Final Value Fee (commission) on price-plus-shipping and a payment processing fee on the total transaction amount (including sales tax), sellers will pay a single percentage fee on the *total* transaction amount.
In other words, eBay is combining its commission fee and payment processing fee into one percentage based on product category.
That means sellers will pay a commission on sales tax that eBay must collect on behalf of states that charge it.
The changes will impact sellers enrolled in Managed Payments, which will include many more sellers by the end of July.
"Our goal with the changes was to simplify (single fee), reduce billing complexity (send you net fees) and reduce seller fees where possible.', 'Connell Waldron and his wildly popular chain in Stan’s Normal People have caused silver chain sales to bloody skyrocket on eBay since airing.
New stats from eBay showed a 209% increase in silver curb chains purchases on April 29, 2 days after the show aired.
Additionally, the show’s premiere week resulted in a 58% increase in silver chain sales, in comparison to the week prior.
Not bad for a simple curb chain, hey?
Sales of Normal People copies have also increased by 356% on eBay, proving that we all simply can’t get enough of the all the horniness.', '']

title: ['eBay Ties Payment Fees to Commissions in New Fee Structure - EcommerceBytes']
summary:
['eBay will institute a new fee structure on July 20, 2020 in which it will merge payment processing fees into final value (commission) fees.
Under the new fee structure, instead of paying a Final Value Fee (commission) on price-plus-shipping and a payment processing fee on the total transaction amount (including sales tax), sellers will pay a single percentage fee on the total transaction amount, including sales tax.
Keep in mind that the sales tax eBay collects varies widely by state, with some locales charging buyers close to 10% of the selling price.
Penalty Fees under the New eBay Fee StructureIn 2018, eBay implemented “penalty fees” for sellers who fall below certain performance standards.
NOTE: New Fee Structure Is Different from EtsyIt’s well worth nothing that while Etsy also took over payment processing on its marketplace, the new eBay fee structure is different from how Etsy calculates fees.']

title: ['eBay Adds Features to Terapeak Research Tool - EcommerceBytes', 'How Meg Whitman turned eBay into a multi-billion dollar company - Fox Business', 'Is It Legal for eBay to Charge Commission on Postage and Taxes? - EcommerceBytes', 'eBay Finds: Tom Boonen replica Specialized S-Works Roubaix - Cyclingnews']
summary:
['eBay has added new features to Terapeak and said it is now exclusively available in Seller Hub under the Research tab.
eBay acquired Terapeak in December 2017 and began integrating some features into Seller Hub.
On the page describing how it works, eBay explains, “Terapeak analyzes eBay transactions to provide marketplace intelligence to eBay sellers.
Terapeak accesses sales data, listing formats, the average sold item pricing, shipping costs, and presents information in clear, easy-to-understand statistics, charts, and graphs.
eBay is planning to add additional features to Terapeak.', 'Whitman was also considered for the CEO role at Uber in 2017 after former Uber CEO Travis Kalanick stepped down.
But Whitman is probably best known for her role as the CEO of eBay.
Ticker Security Last Change Change % EBAY EBAY INC. 45.63 +1.25 +2.82%During her tenure, Whitman oversaw a partnership with AOL and several acquisitions including other auction websites, online payment systems, including PayPal, and online phone service Skype -- though that didn’t do as well as hoped.
“That is just going to happen.”In 2001, Whitman told Fast Company that her strategy with eBay was to first focus on what the company was doing well.
Ticker Security Last Change Change % HPQ HP INC. 30.13 +0.73 +2.48%According to Forbes, she is worth $4.5 billion.', "Dear Ina,I wholeheartedly agree with Susan's questioning of the legality of eBay charging a final value fee on postage, which is a service that they don't provide.
eBay charges 10.9% of the total sale amount of a transaction, which includes postage.
This means that just for postage alone, I'm charged AU$2.61 in my final value fees for a 500g satchel and AU$4.03 in my final value fees for a 1kg satchel.
Unless I am prepared to lose this this amount in the transaction, I need to add this cost on to the cost of postage for the buyer.
If I'm reading the latest information correctly sellers are also going to be charged commission on this!", "We'll need to see it to believe it, but certainly the four-time Paris-Roubaix winner has been missed since retiring immediately after the 2017 Roubaix, where he finished 13th.
This is a replica of the special, custom-painted Specialized S-Works Roubaix bike used by Boonen in his last race as a professional – albeit different in a few ways, including being a disc-brake version, rather than the rim-brake version the Belgian used.
Expectations were therefore high for his final race, with Boonen having won Roubaix in 2005, 2008, 2009 and 2012.
The carbon-framed bike also features Specialized's CG-R seatpost – although Boonen plumped for a standard post for both Flanders and Roubaix.
The bike comes with SRAM's Red eTap electronic groupset, while Boonen used Shimano Dura-Ace Di2 componentry for his final outings."]

summary:
["After trawling eBay for some of the best jerseys available from the 1990s, we've gone back for another retro kit fix, this time from the 2000s.
As with the 1990s, the 2000s saw some of cycling's great excesses, and that applied to the kits, as well.
Check out the Bianchi jersey on eBay here (opens in new tab)(Image credit: Supplied)iBanestoAfter Miguel Indurain hung up his wheels in 1996, Banesto rather understandably struggled to replace him.
Check out the Domina Vacanze jersey on eBay here (opens in new tab)We're constantly on the lookout for unique and rare cycling relics on eBay.
If you have any suggestions or leads, please send them to cyclingnews@cyclingnews.com with 'eBay Finds' in the subject line.", "If you're in the market for an ultra-low-mileage Porsche but don't want to drop six figures on a rare 911, you're in luck.
This immaculate 944 S2 has just popped up for sale on eBay, showing an absurd 1974 miles on the odometer.
According to the seller's description, this 1990 944 S2 was originally owned by a doctor in Connecticut, who drove it sparingly until 1993, when it was last registered.
This particular 944 is well optioned, with cruise control, air conditioning, an alarm system, ABS, a sunroof, and electronically adjustable seats.
All 944 S2s got the body from the 944 Turbo and a 3.0-liter inline-four, sending 208 horsepower to the rear wheels via a five-speed manual transaxle.", 'Nintendo World Championships 1990 NES cartridge appears in $130,000 eBay auction How much would you pay for a perfectly preserved piece of gaming nostalgia?
One eBay seller is going for a massive score with an NES Nintendo World Championships cartridge.
The Nintendo World Championships events were pretty legendary.
A perfect condition Nintendo World Championships 1990 cartridge has been spotted on Ebay for $130,000.
The Nintendo World Championships were far from the first to do it, but they represent one of the earliest known legitimate forms of esports.', 'Welcome to Deals of Note, where Gear Patrol captures all the best deals of the day.
You can also follow all our deal posts in the Deals section.

title: ["eBay Finds: Wim Van Huffel's Eddy Merckx Team SC bike - Cyclingnews", 'Autographed Michael Jordan rookie trading card fetches record $125,000 in eBay sale - KIRO Seattle']
summary:
["Here for sale is his 2002 Eddy Merckx Vlaanderen team bike.
See Van Huffel's bike on eBay here (opens in new tab)In the mid-2000s – particularly after that excellent 2005 Giro performance – Van Huffel was being touted as Belgian's next Grand Tour Big Thing.
This lightweight Easton scandium aluminium frame comes complete with all its original components, as ridden by Van Huffel during the 2002 season.
The groupset is Campagnolo's perfectly good Chorus line – although we were initially a little unsure whether Van Huffel and his pro teammates would have used that rather than Campag's top-of-the-range Record componentry.
If you have any suggestions or leads, please send them to cyclingnews@cyclingnews.com with 'eBay Finds' in the subject line", 'Jordan’s 1986-87 Fleer rookie basketball card remains one of the most coveted cards over the past 40 years.
>> Read more trending newsCombine a pristine Jordan autograph signed on that rookie card, and the cha-ching can be heard worldwide.

JUST IN: New record for a Michael Jordan Fleer rookie card just set, a buyer paid $125,000 for this signed version in a @RickProbstein auction on eBay.

title: ['Walmart Marketplace Is Outperforming Amazon, eBay - Marketplace Pulse', 'Paul Walker Collection BMW E30 M3 Allegedly Listed for $150000 ... - BMWBLOG', "Someone Is Selling A Bug's Life Fleshlight On eBay - LADbible", 'Ultra-Rare 427-Powered 1969 COPO Camaro Listed On Ebay - HotCars', 'A Vintage Hermès Address Book Bought on eBay Listed the Home Addresses of Dozens of Art Historical Legends. It Turned Out to Be Dora Maar’s - artnet News', 'Tesla: Car Computers Sold On eBay With Personal Data Were Stolen - InsideEVs']
summary:
['Sales on Walmart marketplace increased more than on its main rivals Amazon and eBay.
“We’ve been near Black Friday order volumes daily across Walmart Marketplace - around a 3x increase from normal,” said Michael Krakaris, Co-Founder of Deliverr.
“This is driven not only by existing selection moving faster than before but also from new top sellers rapidly joining the ecosystem.” Deliverr handles fulfillment for thousands of Walmart marketplace sellers.
Walmart marketplace, which, unlike comparable marketplaces, requires approval to join as a seller, added 50% more sellers in the past thirty days than the average month, according to Marketplace Pulse research.
While no marketplace is seeing explosive growth driven by FBA struggles that caused a panic among Amazon-only sellers, Walmart is continuing to accelerate.', 'Paul Walker managed to find his way into the hearts of a large number of car guys over the years.
And I’m not talking about your run of the mill E36 328i models either, but rare, truly rare models that collectors simply dream of.
He had a BMW E36 M3 Lightweight, one of the rarest models ever made by the Bavarians among others, including two BMW E30 M3s.
The other E30 M3 Paul Walker had was a 1998 though, so things are getting a bit confusing now.
However, even without his name on the deed, this E30 M3 might well be worth the $149,980 it is asking for.', 'Well, get ready for some of your happy memories to be ruined forever, as we reveal that someone has created a Fleshlight based on the caterpillar from 1998 animated film, A Bug's Life.
Advert 10Instagram user @mlazri shared his own promotional video on social media, writing: "This is it, the holy grail, one of four in existence.
1998 A Bug's Life promotional fleshlight, never publicly released only given to a select few high ranking Pixar executives for personal use.
Credit: eBayIn the video, you can see he's painted over an actual Fleshlight with a caterpillar-inspired pattern.
And then when he takes the lid off, you can see he's formed Heimlich's little face out of a silicone mold, and coloured in the cartoon character's features.', '', 'Author Brigitte Benkemoun’s husband bought a vintage Hermès address book on eBay.
Each page begins with a list of carefully written names—always using the same pen—undoubtedly copied from an earlier address book.
With this new resource, I cross-checked the names and addresses in the address book to compare and verify them.
Maybe this wasn’t “a Picasso.” But it was the address book of Dora Maar that I held in my hand!
So the woman who owned this address book had been Picasso’s companion for almost ten years, from 1936 to 1945.', "When he read our investigative report about the data leak caused by old Tesla car computers being sold on eBay, he immediately contacted the automaker.
According to what Tesla told Oliveira, the computers that ended up on eBay were stolen, and Tesla Service Centers do wipe personal data from computers after they're removed from vehicles.
This is what he had do say about the information Oliveira received from Tesla.
If the computers had their data wiped, Mr. Green would not have been able to retrieve the car owners' personal information so quickly.
Did you have any of your Tesla computers replaced recently?"]

title: ['Nottingham student forced to sell items on eBay to pay accommodation rent - Nottinghamshire Live', 'eBay Finds: Dario Pegoretti Luigino frame - Cyclingnews', 'He Bought a Tank on eBay, Found More than a Bargain - Fresh Edits']
summary:
['Our free email updates are the best way to get headlines direct to your inboxA Nottingham student struggling to pay her final rent instalment resorted to selling her belongings on eBay to pay her fees.
They are adding £20 late fees when there's a pandemic going on and that's every week.
Oak Student Letts said other students in the property have payment plans set up and that they have not begun charging late fees as of yet.
"We have however agreed payment plans with some of the tenants at this property and no late payment fees have been charged.
Where payment plans are agreed and maintained no late payment fees will be charged."', "Image 1 of 5 A Dario Pegoretti Luigino frame on eBay (Image credit: mozzerboymark / eBay) The lugged Luigino model is built in homage to Dario Pegoretti's mentor, Gino Milani (Image credit: mozzerboymark / eBay) A closer look at the Pegoretti Luigino's paintwork (Image credit: mozzerboymark / eBay) The head-badge reassures you, in Italian, that the frame is handmade (Image credit: mozzerboymark / eBay) No doubt about who's behind this frame... (Image credit: mozzerboymark / eBay)This beautiful lugged-steel Dario Pegoretti Luigino frame is likely one for the enthusiast or collector, although it might also be a good place to start a love affair with the Italian framebuilder – if you've got a spare £5k lying around.
We recently featured a Pegoretti-painted track pump among our eBay Finds series, decorated with the Italian frame builder Dario Pegoretti's 'Ciavete', one-of-a-kind paint option.
Find the Pegoretti frameset on eBay here (opens in new tab)It makes this lugged-steel Pegoretti Luigino frame look like a snap at £4,495 (approx.
But 'money talks', as they say, so they may be able to be persuaded…We're constantly on the lookout for unique and rare cycling relics on eBay.
If you have any suggestions or leads, please send them to cyclingnews@cyclingnews.com with 'eBay Finds' in the subject line", 'After customers pass their license test, they’re able to buy a tank from Nick – of which there’s a wide variety available.
So, that’s one way to buy a tank, if you’re interested – just go to Nick’s farm in Helmdon, England, and pass a tank license test.
A Trip to RememberIn fact, Nick had even made headlines for driving his children to school – but it wasn’t just any normal school run.
For the T-54 tank, Nick gave Joe two other armored vehicles.
An Ambiguous and Mysterious HistoryWhen he first purchased the T-54 tank, Nick was told a small amount of information about its origins.']
