['People Are Trying To Sell Baby Formula For $260 On Ebay Amid ... - BabyGaga', 'Israeli sellers ramp up overseas eBay sales - Globes']
summary:
['', 'The number of Israeli sellers on eBay rose by 40% in April compared with March, eBay has told "Globes."
eBay also said that there was a 46% rise in sales of products by Israeli sellers over the same period.
The new Israeli sellers on eBay are small and medium sized businesses, 60% of whom do not have their own website.
In the first four months of 2020, Israeli sellers sold 800,000 'isolation products' ranging from hygiene goods to leisure items.
In addition to domestic sales within Israel, the top four overseas countries for Israel eBay sales are the US, UK, Canada and Germany.']

title: ["'I need this': 'Amazing' eBay item mums are obsessed with - Yahoo Lifestyle Australia", 'Woman who couldn’t afford new patio uses eBay and B&Q bargains to transform her outdoor space... - The Sun']
summary:
['The $20 eBay item is an automatic toothpaste dispenser that reportedly keeps bathroom sinks and surfaces free from the dreaded cling of wayward toothpaste particles.
Anyone with a child of any age knows the potential horror side effects of the manual toothpaste tube.
Well, those who have been through the toothpaste trenches report a saviour has been found, and it is the Ecoco manual toothpaste dispenser, that will set you back just $10 apiece.
Sold in twos on eBay for $20, the item is fully manual with no batteries or power point needed.
“I just got one too!”The manual toothpaste dispensers go for $20 on eBay.', 'But revamping our outdoor space doesn't have to cost a fortune - as one woman has revealed how she totally transformed her tired old patio using eBay and B&Q bargains.
5 The savvy DIY fan transformed her tired patio using eBay and B&Q bargains Credit: FacebookPosting on the Facebook group Extreme Couponing and Bargains UK, the woman explained: "I couldn't afford a new patio so jumped on the stencil bandwagon!"
First, the DIY fan painted her entire patio using Sandtex's dark grey Gravel Masonry paint which she picked up in B&Q for £24.
For more home inspiration, this DIY fan transforms her tired patio tiles using £7 stencil and it looks amazing.
Plus this DIY fan transformed her tired patio tiles using £7 stencil and it looks amazing.']

title: ['How eBay Created a Global Community of Doing Good - TriplePundit', 'Someone Bought A Duke Nukem Prototype For Nintendo DS On eBay - Nintendo Life', '1962 BMW 700S Cabriolet by Baur on eBay - Retro To Go']
summary:
['It’s one thing for a company to pivot rapidly during this crisis, give out grants to nonprofits and small businesses, or create a community for stakeholders to pay it forward.
As with many companies, eBay has donated an eight-figure sum in its efforts to contribute to the global COVID-19 relief effort.
Fast forward almost a quarter century after its founding, and we can see that sense of community still at a strong trajectory.
Many of these small business owners are now paying it forward, whether they were longtime eBay resellers or given a lift through eBay’s latest initiatives.
As such, the Guardian newspaper recently described eBay as enjoying a “lockdown renaissance.” The company’s corporate citizenship streak, however, is unleashed, and in quite a good way.', "If you're anything like us, you may well peruse eBay every so often in the hopes of picking up a cheeky bargain.
However, some lucky gamer has managed to snag a prototype for a previously unknown Duke Nukem game for Nintendo DS.
The game carries the imaginative title 'Duke Nukem DS' (not to be confused with side-scrolling platform shooter Duke Nukem: Critical Mass which did release on the console) and came on a development cartridge.
It appears to have been developed by MachineWorks Northwest, a studio responsible for a number of Duke Nukem mobile games.
After doing some digging, DScapades discovered that the game is in fact a port of a Duke game released for the Tapwave Zodiac, an obscure and largely forgotten mobile console from the early 2000s.", 'When I think BMW I think expensive and pretty dull.
I don’t think of a car like this 1962 BMW 700S Cabriolet by Baur on eBay.
The model dates back to 1959, with this model, a sportier take on the car, appearing a few years later.
The convertible body was made by Karosserie Baur of Stuttgart, with this being one of 2,592 convertibles produced back then.
The one being offered here on eBay was formerly in the showroom of a German dealership when purchased by the owner.']

title: ['Sports Card Investing Targets - 5 Cheap Players To Flip On Ebay - Rotogrinders', 'The Coolest, Weirdest, and Sketchiest Local Stuff on eBay - INDY Week', 'eBay Finds: 1959 Schwinn Jaguar Mark IV Middleweight cruiser bike - Cyclingnews', 'Barry Bonds Rookie Card Guide, Hottest eBay Auctions as Interest ... - Sports Collectors Daily', 'Boy, 15, transforms bedroom for £200 with B&Q and eBay finds - Daily Mail', 'Teen bored in lockdown transforms bedroom using B&M, eBay and Wickes and the result is jaw-dropping - Birmingham Live']
summary:
['Sports Card Investing Targets - 5 Cheap Players To Flip On eBayOver the past few weeks of doing these target articles I’ve mainly targeted higher-priced cards and NFL QBs.
This week I will focus on cheaper players where we can still find value and potentially discover good cards to flip.
I ended up landing the /99 version for the $850 target price so was very happy to win the auction.
We will generally target Panini brands for football as they own exclusive NFL rights for sports cards.
When targeting a Raw card, try to find one with the best centering, corners and edges (and surface if you can tell) as that is a card that might be worth sending in for grading.', '“July,1965 Raleigh-Durham-Chapel Hill, North Carolina souvenir guidebook-OLD ADS!
*runs…*runs…*still running…“The Find Out Book Volume One – Chapel Hill 1934 University of North Carolina”Buy It Now: $14.99That’s better.
My imagination can encompass people who spend hundreds of dollars on old textile-mill stuff and North Carolina Symphony posters.
“Vintage 1959 Lotus Yearbook Peace College Raleigh North Carolina Memory Book”Buy It Now: $19.95I’m generally filtering out all the yearbooks, though I like looking at them.
POLICE INTERCEPTOR RALEIGH NORTH CAROLINA”Buy It Now: $29.99Noooooooope.', "Image 1 of 5 A 1959 Schwinn Jaguar Mark IV Middleweight cruiser bike found for sale on eBay (Image credit: griffy52 / eBay) The model is from 1959, and in great condition (Image credit: griffy52 / eBay) The curvy tubes on this classic 1950s cruiser bike (Image credit: griffy52 / eBay) Ready to ride on your next 'big adventure' (Image credit: griffy52 / eBay) The bike's sprung-leather, Schwinn-branded saddle (Image credit: griffy52 / eBay)Saddle up for your own Pee-Wee's Big Adventure-inspired ride with this beautiful red original 1959 Schwinn Jaguar Mark IV Middleweight cruiser bike that we've found during our latest look for all cycling-things fantastical on eBay.
Schwinn provided bikes to the famous track rider Major Taylor, who was active in the late 1890s and early 1900s, winning the sprint world championships in Montreal, Canada, in 1899.
At one point or another, Schwinn have made virtually every style of bike, and began making cruiser-style bikes similar to this Jaguar as early as the 1930s.
We're constantly on the lookout for unique and rare cycling relics on eBay.
If you have any suggestions or leads, please send them to cyclingnews@cyclingnews.com with 'eBay Finds' in the subject line", '', "The teen glossed his furniture, added lots of bling to his room and even created designer coffee table books.
Pictured, beforeThe teen gave his room a new luxurious feel for just £200 - using buys from the likes of B&M and eBay.
The savvy 15-year-old spent £200 on paint, wallpaper, bling ornaments, clock, photo frames, shelf and accessories to transform his bedroom.
'I spent £200 on the paint, wallpaper, bling ornaments, clock, photo frames, shelf and accessories.
'The rough overall price for the whole transformation (including bling ornaments) came to about £200, and it's entirely worth it.", 'And as this 15-year-old design-whizz proves, people of all ages and experiences can transform their home during lockdown.
Kane glossed his furniture, added lots of bling to his room and even created designer coffee table books.
"I came up with the final design and style as the last design for my room that I did, I just wasn't 100% satisfied with.
“I spent £200 on the paint, wallpaper, bling ornaments, clock, photo frames, shelf and accessories.
"Many of us are sitting at home twiddling our thumbs during lockdown, so what better time to get stuck into a home improvement project?']

title: ['Warning over ‘dodgy’ hair clippers sold on eBay and Amazon that can burn or scald... - The Sun', 'HMRC to crack down on eBay and Gumtree traders with hefty tax bills - inews', 'Terry Fox replica shoe marked up and resold on eBay - CTV News Vancouver', 'Dark Theme Starts Rolling Out To eBay App On Android - Android Headlines']
summary:
['BLOKES desperate for a haircut are risking a close shave after buying ‘dodgy’ clippers on websites including eBay and Amazon.
One man claims his dodgy £16 clippers almost caught fire, despite being branded a ‘Professional Barbers Set’ on eBay.
Robert Chantry-Price, lead officer for product safety at the Trading Standards Institute, has warned men to grow their hair rather than dice with death by using counterfeit clippers.
“Discontinue use immediately you have any concerns.”Meanwhile, the charity Electrical Safety First has analysed 15 separate listings of electrical clippers, hair removal kits and other beauty salon gadget for sale on eBay, Amazon and Wish.
Between March 2019 and March 2020, our filters automatically blocked four million listings from entering the marketplace on product safety grounds.', 'Many people who have been using their time during the lockdown to sell items on sites like eBay and Gumtree could be facing hefty tax bills, according to experts.
She said: “Scrutiny of sites like eBay allows HMRC to see when people are sufficiently active for it to be unlikely that they are just selling personal belongings, and indeed when the types of items being sold indicate that the seller is actually trading.
HMRC can use its IT system, Connect, to check against other information they hold to determine whether income from sales is being reported.
Ms Fernie added: “As time has gone on and additional information sources have been added, Connect has become more and more sophisticated, and many people have no idea what information HMRC can call upon when using the system.
“Even those that are trading ‘legally’ need to be careful and make sure that they report their earnings accurately and keep any relevant paperwork,” said Ms Fernie.', 'VANCOUVER -- Terry Fox's brother says he's not surprised the limited-edition Adidas shoes, themed for the 40th anniversary of Terry Fox's Marathon of Hope, were being marked up and resold on eBay.
One hundred per cent of the proceeds are going to the Terry Fox Foundation and cancer research.
"We just hope that maybe some of the extra money folks are making on reselling the shoes that people would turn around and give it back to Terry Fox Foundation and cancer research."
Michael Rossi, president of Adidas Canada, told CTV News that the commemorative shoe, which had Terry Fox's name printed next to the three stripes, "sold out in minutes."
With COVID-19 drawing a question mark around future events involving large numbers of people, this year's Terry Fox Run will be a virtual event.', 'The dark theme has finally started arriving for the eBay app on Android.
eBay app finally has access to dark theme, but the feature is rolling out in stagesThe company’s executive, Bradford Shellhammer, said that the feature will roll out in stages.
If you’d like to check if the dark theme is available in your eBay app, you’ll need to tap the hamburger menu.
If you see the ‘Theme’ option in the ‘General’ category, you can set the dark theme option.
AdvertisementIt is nice to see that eBay is finally rolling out a dark theme as well.']

title: ['eBay Classifieds Attracts Interest From Axel Springer - PYMNTS.com', 'eBay Finds: Motorola-team-edition Eddy Merckx Corsa Extra frame - Cyclingnews']
summary:
['', "Image 1 of 5 Motorola-team-edition Eddy Merckx Corsa Extra frame found on eBay (Image credit: buzanceen / eBay) This 1990s Corsa Extra looks to still be in great condition (Image credit: buzanceen / eBay) In an ideal world, an Eddy Merckx frame should come from nowhere else (Image credit: buzanceen / eBay) Lance Armstrong was on the Motorola team for four-and-a-half seasons (Image credit: Bettini Photo) The classic Motorola paintjob on this Eddy Merckx Corsa Extra frame (Image credit: buzanceen / eBay)During the early-to-mid-1990s, Motorola was the major English-speaking team taking on the more traditional Belgian, Italian and French set-ups, and the US team was particularly strong in the Classics.
This Eddy Merckx Corsa Extra frame, in Motorola colours, is sure to appeal to aficionados of the period.
And 1994 is around the year – perhaps a little earlier – that we'd peg this steel Eddy Merckx Corsa Extra frame as being from, with no information on its age offered by the seller.
Take a look at the Eddy Merckx frame here on eBay (opens in new tab)For the 1995 and 1996 seasons – and the latter was to be their last – Motorola raced on frames by the Brazilian brand Caloi, although they were still made by Eddy Merckx.
By that point, a number of riders were apparently on titanium frames, badged as an Eddy Merckx or a Caloi, but allegedly built by US brand Litespeed."]

title: ['Former eBay CEO Walks Away with $57 Million Package - EcommerceBytes']
summary:

(Tierney himself will be stepping down from the eBay Board in June where he's served as Director since 2003 and Chairman since 2015.)
The median annual total compensation for eBay employees in 2019 was $130,636.
The ratio of the Schenkel's annual total compensation to the median employee's annual total compensation is 135 to 1.
It's also interesting to note that the median annual total compensation for eBay employees was 9.26% higher in 2019 - $130,636, compared to $119,562 in 2018."]

In June 2018, eBay Korea joined hands with Hyundai Card for Smile Card, becoming the first e-commerce firm to introduce a PLCC.

title: ['eBay users spot the online auction house port-scanning their PCs. Um... is that OK? - The Register']
summary:
['Updated Users visiting eBay have spotted that the website runs port scans against their computer, using the localhost address to inspect what may be running on your machine.
The script is running locally so it is not testing for ports exposed to the internet, but rather for what is running on your local network.
We have only seen it run on Windows, and normally only on the first visit to eBay after some unspecified period.
This may not refer specifically to the technology in the eBay script, but it is obvious that the company is in the business of gathering data for both fraud prevention and digital marketing.
There is also the question of under what circumstances web browsers should allow requests to services running on localhost.']

title: ['How to stop eBay from secretly port-scanning your computer - Komando', "eBay Finds: Signed Peter Sagan 'Hulk' Cannondale jersey - Cyclingnews", 'Adidas face masks resell for $90 on eBay after selling out online - Business Insider', 'Military Hummer Shows Up On eBay For $52,500 - Motor1']
summary:
['You may also like: Robocalls are about to get a lot worse – here’s whyAnd this is why it’s believed eBay is scanning users’ computers.
You may also like: Microsoft warns of massive phishing attack targeting PCsThe good news is there is a workaround for the eBay port scanning.
The way to stop this is to remove JavaScript permissions for eBay.
NOTE: Removing JavaScript permissions for eBay could impact functionality of the site, keeping features like My eBay from working.
There is another option to stop eBay from running a port scan.', "Image 1 of 3 A signed Peter Sagan 'Hulk' Slovakian national champion's jersey on eBay (Image credit: Get2got / eBay) The special-edition jersey has been signed by Peter Sagan (Image credit: Get2got / eBay) Is it a bird?
No – it's an Incredible Hulk-like creature... (Image credit: Get2got / eBay)It's a treasure trove for signed cycling memorabilia, and our latest eBay trawl has unearthed this special-edition, signed Peter Sagan 'Hulk' Cannondale Slovakian national champion's jersey, which was created for him for the 2014 Tour of California, but seemingly never used in competition.
The special-edition jersey has been signed by Peter Sagan (Image credit: Get2got / eBay)Sagan moved on from the Cannondale team after the 2014 season, spending two seasons at Tinkoff before heading on to Bora-Hansgrohe in 2017, where he's remained ever since.
The seller's looking for US$200 (£163) for this very special signed jersey, and is ready to post it to wherever you are in the world.
View the signed Peter Sagan 'Hulk' jersey on eBay (opens in new tab)We're constantly on the lookout for unique and rare cycling relics on eBay.", 'Adidas launched a $16 commercial face mask on its website that sold out in one day.
A three-pack of the masks sold on eBay for $90 — over five times the price of the unit at retail .. Adidas is the first athletic-wear company to release a commercial face mask to the public.
AdvertisementA three-pack of Adidas face masks just sold on eBay for $90, nearly five times the price of the original unit at retail.
Adidas launched a washable face mask on its website on Tuesday, which went for $16 for a three-pack.
The masks sold out in minutes but found a home on eBay almost immediately afterward, where a seller sold a brand new pack for $90.', 'General Motors will attempt to resurrect the spirit of the Hummer in an effort to cash in on that sweet, sweet nostalgia.
However, the off-roader will most likely take the shape of an all-electric truck rather than the boxy SUV bodystyle of its V8 predecessor.
A new ad on eBay lists a military-spec Hummer with just 901 miles on the odometer and interesting extra equipment.
Gallery: Military-spec 2002 Hummer H1 for sale9 PhotosAccording to the seller, it was built in 2002 and has the newer 6.5-liter V8 turbodiesel mated to a four-speed automatic gearbox.
You’ll have to make a $500 deposit via PayPal within 24 hours of the bidding’s end.']

title: ['eBay onboards Clevertize as AOR, readies for major brand relaunch ... - afaqs!', 'Ai Weiwei Is Selling Artful Face Masks to Raise Funds for Covid-19 Relief Efforts - ARTnews', 'Tests find asbestos in make-up palettes sold via Amazon and eBay - GlobalCosmeticsNews', 'Yellow Hulk Pushes IDW Avengers #10 to $46 on eBay But What ... - Bleeding Cool News']
summary:
["eBay’s India business was acquired by another Bengaluru-based e-commerce platform Flipkart in 2017, only to be shut down in August 2018.
Since then, there has been no communication for India from eBay.
It doesn't sell in India currently, but helps Indian sellers reach buyers in over 190 countries where it (eBay) has its operations.
It currently operates in a B2B and C2C cross-border trade model.", 'Ai Weiwei, never one to shy away from getting involved in an activist cause, has turned his efforts toward supporting pandemic-related relief.
In a new initiative launched as a collaboration with eBay, the artist and activist is selling limited-edition protective masks created in his studio in Berlin.
Single masks cost $50, a series of four is valued at $300, and a collection of 20 is priced at $1,500.
The project was curated by Alexandra Munroe, senior curator of Asian art and senior adviser of global arts at the Guggenheim Museum in New York.
The cloth masks in the sale feature silk-screened images designed by Ai, including a middle finger, sunflower seeds, and feishu, a creature in Chinese mythology.', 'Tests undertaken by The Scientific Analytical Institute in Greensboro, North Carolina discovered asbestos-contaminated talc within two eyeshadow palettes being sold via both eBay and Amazon.
THE DETAILS The institute found asbestos fibers in 40 percent of the shades in the Jmkcoz 120 Colors Eyeshadow Palette, as well as asbestos traces in 20 percent of the shades tested in the Beauty Glazed Gorgeous Me Eye Shadow Tray Palette.
The Environmental Working Group (EWG) in Washington, D.C., commissioned the testing as part of a wider assessment on the safety of children’s products and released the results to the public.
“And we call on these companies and online retailers to immediately pull both of these products from their respective websites.”THE WHY?
The latest findings are said to be an example of a growing number of talc-based cosmetics contaminated with asbestos – with the ingestion of the carcinogenic said to cause long-term health problems such as malignant mesothelioma, lung cancer and ovarian cancer.', '']

title: ['Branson woman scammed out of $1000 by fake eBay motors - Branson Tri-Lakes news', 'eBay Finds: 1886 52in Humber penny-farthing - Cyclingnews']
summary:

This penny-farthing 'stopper' will slow you down, although you'll need to be careful... (Image credit: hiwheelbicycle / eBay)We've taken a step back in time for this eBay Find: a genuine, 1886 penny-farthing built by the esteemed Beeston, Nottingham, UK bike-builder, Humber.
The 'high-wheelers' began to appear in the 1870s, and had their heyday in the 1880s, with this being a fantastic example of one built by Humber.

title: ['Victorian car scam: Aussie’s eBay purchase lands her at centre of international crime syndicate - 7NEWS', 'I bought an old address book from eBay – then realised it belonged ... - The Telegraph']
summary:
['Instead, the couple lost $2,000, Kerry’s identity was stolen, and she was placed at the centre of an international crime syndicate.
The car was for her partner but, as Kerry was working fewer hours, she took on the responsibility of emailing the seller.
“I got this whole big con story that they were working in the military,” the 45 year old told 7NEWS.com.au.
Just the beginningThe couple reluctantly accepted the fact they’d lost the money but it was just the beginning of their troubles.
“I lost $2,000 big deal, now I feel sorry for all these other people who think it’s me,” she said.', 'This was probably a painter’s address book.
Each page begins with a list of carefully written names – always using the same pen – undoubtedly copied from an earlier address book.
From address book to Google.
The second name was a woman: painter, photographer, driving force behind the surrealists, close friend of Éluard and Balthus, analysed by Lacan.
It was the address book of Dora Maar that I held in my hand.']

title: ['Wirral man stole PPE to sell at inflated prices on eBay - BBC', '16 Peach Momoko Comics Sold, Raw on eBay for Over $100 Each - Bleeding Cool News', 'Rare Olympic swimming 50p coin sells on eBay for £10,100 – how to check if yours is worth a mint... - The Sun']

['"Most of it took place before people had heard of Covid-19 but it is conceded by the defendant that when Covid-19 came into the common domain he continued offering items for sale on eBay," he added.', '', "A RARE Olympic swimming 50p coin has sold on eBay for a whopping £10,100 - and you could have one at home too.
But remember, there's a difference between a genuine error coin and one that is just imperfect, for example with a design that is not as clear as you'd expect.
And whatever you do, don't be tempted to splash your cash without evidence from the Mint confirming that it's a genuine error.

title: ['eBay and Etsy Contribute to Social Justice Organizations - EcommerceBytes', 'Searches, Sales for Project 2020 Cards on eBay Made Huge Leaps ... - Sports Collectors Daily', 'DC Cancelled Comics Available in Walmart - and eBay - Bleeding Cool News', 'I wore a £28 eBay dress to my budget wedding, my husband’s suit was £25 and our guests had to bring their o... - The Sun', 'Rare 50p coin sells for £10,000 on eBay - and there are hundreds more in circulation - The Mirror']
summary:
['eBay and Etsy are making contributions to social justice organizations, they announced this week joining the many organizations, including brands and retailers, that have been making statements about racial disparity over the past week.
(Update 6/3/2020: Amazon donated $10 million to organizations supporting justice and equity, it announced today.)
Etsy CEO Josh Silverman wrote in a post on the Etsy News blog on Monday, “The past days and weeks have, once again, shone a spotlight on the tremendous injustices in our society.
“We believe that it’s critical to provide support to organizations working tirelessly for criminal justice reform and those that assist Black-led institutions,” Silverman said.
We want you to always be proud to be a part of the eBay community, as we partner with you, and to endeavor to be a force for good.”', '', '', "ALL WHITE ON THE NIGHTA SAVVY couple spent just £3500 on an outdoor wedding with a picnic, food truck and camels - and the bride's dress cost just £28.
7 The happy couple in their budget wedding wear Credit: Katie Goff PhotographySo the lovebirds looked out for bargains and freebies - and Sharron’s wedding dress was an eBay that cost under £30.
They hosted a picnic instead of a wedding breakfast, warning their 60 guests on the invite: if you want a seat then bring a chair.
7 Sharron's dress cost just £28 from eBay Credit: Katie Goff PhotographySharron said: “I think you’ve got to think outside the box a bit.
Having had the big traditional wedding before, Sharron instead wanted something laid-back and chilled - something emulating her ‘gentle giant’ of a husband.", 'In 2011, the Royal Mint launched a new collection of 50p coins to celebrate the London Olympics.
Image: Getty) Getty)Six-hundred is a tiny, tiny amount in the world of coin collecting.
To put this into context, there are around 6.7million Battle of Hastings 50p coins in circulation and 2,179,000 Olympic Triathlon 50p coins out there right now.
Coin Hunter has a new tool that reveals how much your rare 50p coin is really worth on eBay.
Alternatively, see our guides on rare 50p coins and other special denominations, here.']

title: ['eBay Classifieds Will Potentially Convert Prosus Or Adevinta Into An ... - Seeking Alpha', 'eBay Finds: Replica 7-Eleven team-edition Eddy Merckx Corsa ... - Cyclingnews', 'The best deals on home appliances on eBay - Kidspot', 'Rare Olympic swimmer 50p coin sells for over £10k on eBay - Heart']
summary:
["Click to enlargeProsus and Adevinta with similar strategiesIn my analysis, I will exclusively look at Prosus and Adevinta since they are strategic buyers.
Geographical overlap with Prosus Geographical overlap with Adevinta Source: own illustration based on data from ECG and Prosus.
I, therefore, assume that the chances are relatively high that the ECG deal could undergo some adjustments prior to approval.
One consideration: Adevinta has significantly more exposure to Europe's mature markets, which is also reflected in the low FY17-FY19 revenue CAGR (15%) compared to Prosus Classifieds (43%).
A more in-depth analysis is necessary to understand the potential gains from the ECG deal.", "Image 1 of 5 A replica 7-Eleven team-edition Eddy Merckx Corsa Extra bike available on eBay (Image credit: houseofmeaghers / eBay) The special-edition Eddy Merckx Cinelli stem is worth a good price on its own (Image credit: houseofmeaghers / eBay) An Eddy Merckx Cinelli seatpin holds a 2007 Selle Italia Faite saddle in Italian colours -- which just happen to be the same as 7-Eleven's (Image credit: houseofmeaghers / eBay) (Image credit: houseofmeaghers / eBay)(Image credit: houseofmeaghers / eBay)This 'eBay Find' of a replica 7-Eleven team-edition Eddy Merckx bike – made up of a reissued 2007 Corsa Extra frame with a mixture of eight-speed Campagnolo Super Record and Record components – is certainly going to get late 1980s and early 1990s fans of professional cycling salivating.
Not too long ago, we featured among Cyclingnews' eBay Finds a similar Eddy Merckx Corsa Extra frameset – but in Motorola team colours.
During those two seasons on their Eddy Merckx machines, 7-Eleven's victories included Norwegian Dag Otto Lauritzen's overall win at the 1989 Tour de Trump, 1990 stage wins at the Tour de Suisse and Critérium International courtesy of Andy Hampsten and Ron Kiefel, respectively, and, appropriately, the 1989 GP Eddy Merckx time trial, won by Britain's Sean Yates.
According to the seller, this frame is a limited-edition 2007 re-release of the Corsa Extra, and it has been built up with a full Campagnolo groupset, including eight-speed bar-end shifters and an 'Eddy Merckx' pantographed Campagnolo chainset.
If you have any suggestions or leads, please send them to cyclingnews@cyclingnews.com with 'eBay Finds' in the subject line.", '', "Rare Olympic swimmer 50p coin sells for over £10k on eBayThe coin is worth a fortune.
A 50p coin created to mark the Olympics has sold on eBay for a hefty amount - £10,101 - and who knows?
The rare swimming coin is one of the many themed 50ps which were launched for the London 2012 games and there were a fair few about.
Here are how much the rare ones are all worthThe rare 50p coin.
The coin sold on eBay wasn't even in brand new condition, as it shows in pictures that it's covered in scratches."]

title: ['Officials confirm that eBay is not ending sales of coins - Coin World', 'Seller Is Out of Luck when eBay Packages Get Stuck - EcommerceBytes', 'eBay Bike Bargains from Giant, Trek, Cannondale | Cycling deals ... - Road.cc']
summary:
['Officials confirm that eBay is not ending sales of coinsAuction site eBay has not eliminated coins and numismatic memorabilia from items that sellers can offer for sale over the online platform.
Confusion over whether eBay was eliminating sales of coins and other numismatic items for sale at its online selling platform is cleared up by company officials.
The official statement said, “eBay will continue to allow sales of coins, paper money and bullion now and in the future.”Further, “eBay sellers that frequently list in coins, paper money and bullion will not be required to register for managed payments until these categories are compatible.
Coin Forum, questioned why eBay for 2021 was removing coins from the categories of items to be available for sale.
The Collectors Universe discussion thread on the eBay topic is now closed.', 'Dear Ina,I am sure many eBay sellers that sell to overseas countries have the same frustration.
We have been trying to get help from eBay to deal with delays/lost shipping in international shipping due to covid19, with no luck.
Everyday, we are spending 2-3 hours trying to communicate with buyers in Europe and talking/writing to eBay CS.
Now, eBay tells us contact buyers, that eBay paid them,More than half of the packages we send to Europe are/were either held in USPS facilities or in destination countries.
It is only sellers that have to absorb losses - eBay/ PayPal/ USPS, they keep their share, and the seller is the only one who loses.', 'There are some fabulous bike bargains to be found on eBay and we’ve been taking a look at some of the best.
Giant has just announced the 2021 TCR models and there seem to be a few good deals on the older models.
This being a slightly older model means that it is balanced for climbing and fast riding.
You get a full Dura-Ace 7900 mechanical groupset, Bontrager carbon wheels and a really nice Bontrager carbon finishing kit.
The bike features externally routed gear cables which, in a world of integrated front ends, makes life so much easier.']

title: ['Ditching Turbo Lister Is a Sign of eBay Changes Ahead - EcommerceBytes', "Tracking eBay's International Shipping Programs - EcommerceBytes"]
summary:
['3) After July 13th, sellers cannot download data from eBay into Turbo Lister4) eBay will stop updating Turbo Lister, so category IDs will go out of date.
“I am a HUGE Turbo Lister user and really upset this is going away.
“We have decided to focus resources in other areas and felt the best time to deprecate Turbo Lister 2 is now.
One seller said that while eBay notified sellers it would do away with Turbo Lister, the final timing was troublesome.
And let us know if you have ideas about what other changes are ahead for eBay sellers.', 'In addition to offering shipping labels, eBay offers two international shipping programs, and it’s important to understand how each works since they offer very different protections to sellers.
While eBay has worked with shipping carriers to create the eBay international standard delivery shipping service, you’re still responsible for getting the order to the buyer in good shape.
eBay’s Standard International Delivery Service generates a label with two tracking numbers, she said.
The Global Shipping Program (GSP) is a Delivery Duties Paid (DDP) shipping program – buyers pay duties and tax during checkout on eBay via GSP.
eBay’s International Shipping ProgramseBay Global Shipping Program (GSP) – link to more informationeBay Standard International Delivery Service (SEND) – link to more information']

title: ['eBay Finds: original Giro Air Attack helmet - Cyclingnews']
summary:
['Gentes sourced inspiration from the surplus of outdoor industries at work in California, this time using surfboard-inspired fibreglass, to encase his Air Attack helmet design.
The Air Attack proved that aerodynamics and rider comfort were not irreconcilable in a single helmet design.
Should you wish to actually ride your period original Giro Air Attack, it would require new pads.
Perhaps the most telling validation of Giro’s Air Attack as an industrial design icon, is its presence in New York Museum of Modern Art’s permanent collection.
If you wish to own a faultlessly original example of this original Giro icon, this is your chance.']

title: ['eBay Offers Advice on Getting Exposure in Google Shopping - EcommerceBytes', 'Why This British Contraption On Ebay Is The Craziest Jeep Project ... - Jalopnik', 'How to Turn on Dark Mode in the eBay App - Lifehacker']
summary:
['eBay is offering advice to sellers on how to get exposure for their listings in Google Shopping, part of its “Traffic Month” series it’s running this month.
“Unlike on some other platforms, eBay sellers pay nothing extra to appear in Google Shopping.
eBay teamed up with Google to make a video explaining how Google Shopping works and what sellers should be doing to optimize their listings.
He said eBay has been working really closely with Google and makes a huge continual financial investment making sure eBay listings get in front of buyers.
“We actually spend millions of dollars in order for all our listings to show up in Google Shopping,” he said.', 'They’re selling an incomplete project that consists of a Jeep Cherokee XJ front end, a Reliant SS1 chassis, a Mazda Miata motor and transmission, and a hodgepodge of other British car parts that will definitely leave you baffled.
Previous Scimitars had fiberglass bodies mounted to separate frames, whereas the Scimitar SS1, which also had some fiberglass in its body, bolted plastic panels to a space-frame design.
It’s apparently an important feature, as Scimitar SS1 owners online seem to malign the chassis’ propensity for rotting.
AdvertisementOkay, so at this point, we’ve established that this eBay listing is for a Reliant SS1 with a Miata engine and transmission.
Incidentally, it could be outfitted with the same CVH family of engines as the Reliant Scimitar SS1.', 'It’s been a long time coming, but eBay’s mobile app is finally getting a dark mode, meaning s hoppers will be able to track their bids late into the night without frying their retinas.
The d ark mode option is available in eBay’s apps for both Android and iOS users.
How to turn on eBay’s new mobile dark modeYou’ll need to update your eBay app for the new theme options to show up.
Select the visual theme you want to use: Dark forces the app to always use dark mode, while Light will keep the light mode.
Selecting Battery Saver will have the app swap to dark mode whenever the battery saver is turned on, and System Default uses your device’s current theme setting (this is the default option).']

title: ["eBay Finds: Vintage Scott clip-on 'tri' bars - Cyclingnews", 'Ebay Will Have The Last Of Us Part II For $49 And A Decent Nintendo Switch Deal - Press Start Australia', '140 Irish SMEs stay up and running during pandemic period through eBay Ireland initiative - Irish Tech News - Irish Tech News', "eBay's dedicated dark mode is officially rolling out now for Android - 9to5Google"]
summary:
["These, found on eBay, were the second iteration of the Scott clip-on handlebars, and were used by LeMond in the final time trial to win the 1990 Tour.
Those tri bars had become an integral – if only clip-on – part of his race-winning prowess, and he turned up at the 1990 race with plenty of new handlebar-hardware.
Due to the hilly nature of the 45.5km route, LeMond again used his road bike, but with these bars – which may well have been called the Scott Clip-On II – attached to some standard road bars.
See the clip-on bars on eBay here (opens in new tab)The clamps of these Scott Clip-On II bars fit 'old' style 26mm diameter drop handlebars – as opposed to today's more common 31.8mm bars – and the Australia-based seller is asking AU$50 (£27) for them, and is willing to ship to most countries.
If you have any suggestions or leads, please send them to cyclingnews@cyclingnews.com with 'eBay Finds' in the subject line.", 'eBay will have both The Last Of Us Part II as well as Nintendo Switch consoles (with Animal Crossing) for cheaper later this month.
June 15th, you’ll be able to grab The Last Of Us Part II for $49 and on Thursday, June 18th, you’ll be able to grab a Nintendo Switch with Animal Crossing for $449.
You will need to be an eBay Plus member to access both of these deals.
We will provide links once they’re live as they obviously won’t last long.
WE MAY GET A SMALL PERCENTAGE OF THE SALE THROUGH AFFILIATE PARTNERSHIPS', '', 'Dark Mode is our customers’ most requested app feature so far in 2020.
For those with a device running Android 10 (or indeed the Android 11 Developer Previews), the eBay dark mode respects your system theme option.
This will allow you to toggle Dark Theme on and off whenever you please.
To access Dark Theme on Android 10 and above, a user enables Dark Theme across their device under Android display settings.
You should see eBay’s dark mode option rolling out via a server-side update in the US, UK, Germany, and Australia, and it will expand to all other regions in July.']

title: ['eBay Sellers Divided over Coupon for Shipping Supplies - EcommerceBytes', "This bootstrapped startup built an 'eBay for Bitcoins' and is heating ... - YourStory", "eBay Finds: Signed Thor Hushovd 2010 world champion's jersey - Cyclingnews", 'eBay Discloses Which User Data It Shares with Whom - EcommerceBytes']
summary:
['Sellers are once again debating the value of eBay-branded shipping supplies and the value of the coupon eBay gives to Store owners each quarter to put toward purchases of supplies.
While some sellers were grateful for the extra coupon, others were less than enthusiastic.
A reader wrote to EcommerceBytes, "Leave it to eBay to offer an extra $50 shipping supplies coupon only to have it limited on how much you can buy due to the seller having low supplies or out of stock."
And referring to the extra coupon this month, some sellers said quantities of particular products they usually ordered were not available or were on back-order.
The shipping supplies also provide eBay with another advantage: orders arrive on customers' front doors in boxes branded with the company logo, just as Amazon orders do - but in the case of eBay, sellers are the ones paying for the boxes.', 'However, over the last two months, local bitcoin trading, especially on peer-to-peer crypto exchanges, has reached record-breaking volumes.
Bitcoin volumes on Paxful surged to a single-day high of $1.48 million on May 10, according to UsefulTulips, a crypto analytics firm.
For 2020, Paxful’s average monthly user sign-ups have grown by 28 percent, while average trading volumes are up $4.4 million.
It is the best product in the entire fintech space right now.”Paxful claims to have over three million users across the globe.
Not only are more global crypto exchanges entering India now, but VCs are also ramping up their investments in local crypto startups.', "Image 1 of 4 A signed Thor Hushovd 2010 world champion's jersey found on eBay (Image credit: lenferdunord / eBay) It’s a beautiful, clean design that Hushovd wore for three races before the end of the season ahead of his move to Garmin-Cervélo in 2011 (Image credit: lenferdunord / eBay) Cervélo TestTeam's Thor Hushovd poses in his new road race world champion's jersey – the same design as the one for sale here on eBay – and matching Cervélo bike in late 2010 (Image credit: Getty Sport Images) The size large jersey is unworn and still has its tag intact (Image credit: lenferdunord / eBay)We've got another pretty rare, and signed, jersey that we've unearthed on our latest trawl through eBay: a 2010 Cervélo TestTeam road race world champion's jersey, as worn by – and signed by – Thor Hushovd.
A couple of months ago, we featured a similarly rare, and signed – and now sold – Oscar Freire world champion's jersey from 1999.
And everyone dreams of winning while wearing the rainbow jersey.
We're constantly on the lookout for unique and rare cycling relics on eBay.
If you have any suggestions or leads, please send them to cyclingnews@cyclingnews.com with 'eBay Finds' in the subject line.", 'eBay is updating its privacy policy this month.
One of the changes is the addition of a section called "Regional and State Privacy Disclosures" for residents of California, which enacted the California Consumer Privacy Act ("CCPA").
eBay explains the CCPA provides new rights to California consumers, including rights to: access, deletion, opt-out, and non-discrimination - thanks to the new law, eBay describes the type of user data it shares with third-parties and with whom.
What's in it for you:- Additional information about the personal data we collect, the purposes for which we use that data, and how we share and process personal data within the eBay Inc. corporate family and with other businesses and service providers.
On that page, eBay also spells out what type of personal information it shares with third parties, including "service providers" that use the information to perform services for eBay.']

summary:
['', "Jonathan Bachman/Getty ImagesThe Zion Williamson hype is real.
So real, in fact, that an autographed Williamson rookie card has reportedly been sold for $99,800, according to Darren Rovell of the Action Network.
Hopefully, the buyer is willing to pony up the extra $3.85 for shipping.
While that wouldn't put the card in the upper echelon of values—Honus Wagner's 1909-11 T206 is reportedly worth over $3 million—it's a pretty penny to pay for the card of someone with 19 professional games under his belt.
Add it up and you get one expensive trading card."]

title: ["Video FBI investigates ex-eBay employees who 'terrorized' couple - ABC News", 'Ex-eBay Workers Sent Critics Live Roaches and a Mask of a Bloody ... - The New York Times', 'Rock Combo retro eBay gravel bike - Cyclingnews']
summary:
['FBI investigates ex-eBay employees who ‘terrorized’ couple Federal prosecutors said a group of former employees that included five executives has been charged with aggressively cyberstalking a couple outside Boston.', 'BOXBOROUGH, Mass.
— Six eBay employees mounted a cyberstalking campaign — including sending boxes of live cockroaches and a Halloween mask of a bloody pig’s face — against a couple who ran an online e-commerce newsletter, according to charges filed by federal prosecutors on Monday.
Several of the employees drove to the couple’s home to spy on them, he said.
“They were not merely unhappy, they were enraged,” Mr. Lelling said, describing how one former eBay executive told a fellow executive in a text message that he wanted to “crush” the woman in the couple, who live in Natick, Mass., a Boston suburb.
Among them, two former eBay officers — James Baugh, the company’s former senior director of safety and security, and David Harville, the company’s former director of global resiliency — were arrested on Monday morning.', 'Image 1 of 8 Drop bar mountain bike makes a great retro gravel bike (Image credit: eBay) True to its time, the Rock Combo runs cantilever brakes (Image credit: eBay) Saddle is original and features rainbow stripe detailing (Image credit: eBay) Imagined on one side of the Pacific, welded together on the other (Image credit: eBay) Huge metal quick release, keeps the 26.4mm seatpost in place (Image credit: eBay) Narrow cassette links to three rings at the front (Image credit: eBay) Crankset is a Specialized ST-2, rotating on a Shimano hollow spindle (Image credit: eBay) With a frame weight of only 2.2kg and steel tube ride comfort, the Rock Combo could be a tidy retro gravel bike (Image credit: eBay)Few bikes illustrate the Specialized all-terrain heritage, quite like its Rock Combo.
Originally launched as a mountain bike, by contemporary standards, the Rock Combo would qualify for gravel riding duty.
In a world before clutched rear derailleurs, the Rock Combo uses a Suntour XCD 3x drivetrain, linked to a 13-28T cassette.
Giving the Rock Combo credence as a retro gravel bike, are its drop bars, measuring 440mm in width at the tops and 550mm at the ends.
One provenance issue is that its original Specialized Hardpack 26 x 1.5in tyres have been replaced with modern WTB 1.85in slicks.']

title: ['Walmart surpasses eBay in U.S. e-commerce for the first time, Amazon still tops: eMarketer - MarketWatch', 'Forget modernity, just buy your cycling jerseys from eBay - Cyclist', 'Laura Chambers, Former AirBnB, eBay Exec & Mom of 3, Takes the ... - PR Newswire', 'Rare match worn George Best Hibernian shirt listed for sale on eBay - Edinburgh Live']
summary:
['Walmart Inc. has surpassed eBay Inc. in share of U.S. e-commerce sales for the first time, according to May 2020 data provided by eMarketer, though Amazon.com Inc. remains number one by a large margin.
Amazon tops the list with 38.0% of all U.S. e-commerce sales share, followed by Walmart with 5.8% and eBay with 4.5%.
Apple Inc. (3.5%)...', 'Turns out what I needed – and all any cycling fan needs, for that matter – was to buy some retro cycling jerseys from eBay.
The search saw me stumble upon a 1993 team jersey from the Italian team.
‘Genuine original Nalini Polyester Italian Cycling Jersey – Zip neck – Short sleeves – Elasticated hem – Rear pocket.
Then came the bidding war for a 1995 Motorola team jersey, one of the most iconic looks of the modern era.
That plain old piece of modernity or that polyester homage to Rolf Jarmann?', "MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif., June 16, 2020 /PRNewswire/ -- Willow, the creator of the world's first quiet, all-in-one, in-bra wearable breast pump, announces today that Laura Chambers has joined the company as its Chief Executive Officer.
Chambers joins Willow at an exciting time.
About WillowFounded in 2014, Willow forever changed the way women pump with the world's first quiet all-in-one, in-bra wearable breast pump.
The Willow Wearable Breast Pump ditches the long tubes, cords, dangling bottles and loud sucking sounds so moms can pump wherever their day takes them.
PR Contact: JONESWORKS, [email protected]_______________________________1 https://ww2.frost.com/frost-perspectives/femtechtime-digital-revolution-womens-health-market/2 Based on working moms who pump for a year with a traditional pumpSOURCE Willow", 'Join your fellow Hibees and subscribe to the Football Scotland Hibs FC newsletter nowA rare George Best match worn Hibernian shirt has appeared on eBay - with bids starting at £3,800.
The Manchester United icon scored three times in 22 matches for the Easter Road club after joining from American side Fort Lauderdale Strikers.
The eBay listing reads: "The 41 year old shirt itself is in immaculate condition"George Best only wore number 11 in the games he played whilst at Hibs.
Several other match worn retro shirts have also been listed, including a match worn 1985/86 home shirt, listed for £1,099 and a 1993/94 purple away kit, listed for £429.

title: ['Amazon Vs. eBay: A Case Study In Business Models - Seeking Alpha', 'Attention, Bargain Hunters: The ‘eBay’ For Discounted Lost Luggage Just Opened - Forbes', 'Mrs Hinch sends fans wild as she stuns in bargain £10 eBay dress and excitedly makes first B&M trip in... - The Sun', 'eBay Updates Offensive Materials Policy - EcommerceBytes', 'Better Business Bureau warns of new eBay gift card scam - WBRZ', 'Ebay ex-CEO, PR head shared texts about taking down critics: DOJ - Business Insider']
summary:
['On June 4, 2020, eBay (EBAY) released a business update to make investors aware that the quarantine circumstances have caused their business to perform "significantly better than expectations," compared to their earnings report on April 29, 2020.
Third, the average annual earnings growth for the past decade has been 4.4% for EBAY vs. 12.8% for AMZN (ex-AWS).
It's notable that EBAY has shrunk its share count by 35% since 2013 vs. AMZN increasing its by 8%.
The EBAY vs. AMZN comparison may be a case in point for Inker's work.
Therefore, AMZN's e-commerce business model is doomed to low profit margins as they pursue massive totally addressable markets.', '', 'SHE might be famous for her cleaning hacks and lavish grey interiors - but Mrs Hinch also can't resist a fashion bargain.
After sending fans wild with an £8 eBay jumpsuit last week, the social media star has shown off her latest bargain buy - and it's perfect for summer.
7 Mrs Hinch showed off her bargain eBay dress on Instagram yesterday Credit: InstagramPosting on her Instagram stories yesterday, the "cleanfluencer" modelled her new maxi polka dot dress she bought for just £10.99 off eBay.
After being inundated with messages about the pretty, purse-friendly dress, Sophie wrote: "For everyone asking about the sizing, guys it's really stretchy and you can adjust the straps!"
Sharing a photo of her local store, Mrs Hinch joked: "Feel like I'M HOME!"', 'eBay updated its Offensive Materials policy that impacts listings in various categories, including Black Americana.
note: in checking links, the page is now going to an error page): eBay published the following announcement about the Offensive Materials Policy Update on Tuesday ():"We are continuing to evolve our Offensive Materials Policy to specify that certain items are prohibited.
Today we updated our policy on Offensive Materials.
In a thread on the eBay discussion boards titled, "HELP ALL MY LISTINGS WERE REMOVED "Offensive material policy,"" a few sellers said eBay removed all of their listings:redvelvet15 (06-16-2020 10:47:24 AM):did anyone else receive an email today saying listings are removed because of offensive material policy.
You are able to relist anything that does not violate our Offensive Materials policy (more details can be found in the email you received).', 'Better Business Bureau warns of new eBay gift card scamThe Better Business Bureau of South Central Louisiana is alerting residents about a new online scam involving eBay gift cards.
The Bureau issued the warning Tuesday, saying, "A local consumer contacted us saying he was interested in buying a motorhome through eBay.
The person selling the motorhome asked the buyer to send them $1400 in eBay gift cards to cover the shipping.
The Bureau says, "The goal for these scammers is to get the money that you spend on the gift cards.
They will request the numbers on the back of the gift card and then can remove the value on the card.', 'Sources have told Bloomberg that the two executives named in the federal indictment are ex-CEO Devin Wenig and ex-PR chief Steven Wyman.
AdvertisementEBay 's ex-CEO and ex-PR head exchanged text messages about "crushing" company critics before employees allegedly organized a cyberstalking campaign against them, according to Bloomberg.
Later on Executive 1 sent Executive 2 a text saying, "Take her down."
The six former eBay employees, who were on the global intelligence and security teams, have each been charged with conspiracy to commit cyberstalking and conspiracy to tamper with witnesses.
Wenig announced he was stepping down from the CEO position in September 2019, and cited conflict with eBay's board of directors.']

title: ["Devin Wenig, exec linked to eBay scandal, reelected to GM's board - Detroit Free Press", "PR News | Ex-eBay CCO Linked to Cyberstalking Suit - Thu., Jun. 18 ... - O'Dwyer's PR News", 'Inside the criminal harassment case against ex-eBay employees ... - The Business Journals', 'Weidian, “the eBay of China”, emerges as popular platform for ... - World Trademark Review']
summary:
['Wenig, the former CEO of eBay Inc., has been on GM's board since 2018.
He said Wenig learned about the harassing activities when authorities did and his position on GM's board is not related to the criminal harassment case.
“When I look at this, it’s regrettable," Barra said, but added, "Since it didn’t involve any GM business, I don’t have any comment on it now.
U-M's Gordon said GM should be concerned about Wenig's presence on its board because inappropriate communication might reflect questionable character.
Since this did not involve GM business, we will not comment on it publicly now.', 'Steve WymerFormer eBay chief communications officer Steve Wymer is said to be one of six former employees of the company mentioned in a federal indictment surrounding the cyberstalking of a couple who published negative stories about eBay in their e-commerce newsletter, according to a Blooomberg report.
Devin Wenig, eBay’s former president and CEO, is also alleged to be one of those mentioned in the indictment.
Neither Wymer nor Wenig has been charged with a crime, although eBay’s former senior director of safety and security James Baugh and former director of global resiliency David Harville were arrested on June 15.
A statement from eBay said that all six employees mentioned in the indictment were fired last year.
The negative stories about eBay tincluded one that mentioned Wenig’s compensation.', '', 'Weidian, “the eBay of China”, emerges as popular platform for counterfeitersWTR investigates how Chinese online marketplace Weidian works, the types of fake products available, and why it should be on the enforcement radar of all brand owners.']

For more information you can review our Terms of Service and Cookie Policy.', "Image 1 of 2 Mark Cavendish's unrealised 2016 British national champion's jersey (Image credit: grawhea31) A nametag on the inside (Image credit: grawhea31)Now this is something different – how about a national champion's jersey for a rider who didn't actually win the race?
Mark Cavendish finished second to Adam Blythe in Stockton-on-Tees back in 2016, but this jersey was made in anticipation of a victory, and we've come across a rare example of it up for sale on eBay.
And so we come to this jersey, what Cavendish would have been wearing as he took victory at Utah Beach on stage 1 in France.
It's a real collector's item – a rare example of a jersey that a rider never got to wear.

Collectors can catch Hughes regularly on YouTube with his Phil’s Pulls channel where he’s often breaking products.
2020 Topps Archives Baseball is scheduled to come out in August.']

title: ['TrueFacet co-founder lands role as GM of luxury at eBay - WatchPro USA', "eBay Finds: 1984 Tour de France red 'hot-spot sprints' jersey - Cyclingnews", 'Mum uses offcuts found in a skip and bargains on eBay to transform her loft bedroom into study and beauty... - The Sun']
summary:
['', "Image 1 of 3 A 1984 Tour de France red 'hot-spot sprints' jersey on eBay (Image credit: lenferdunord / eBay) The jersey, from 1984, has a small hole on the back, the seller says, which isn’t overly surprising given its age (Image credit: lenferdunord / eBay) The jersey is made by Le Coq Sportif, who have again been making the Tour de France leaders’ jerseys since 2012 (Image credit: lenferdunord / eBay)This Le Coq Sportif-made red jersey – awarded to the winner of the now defunct intermediate sprints classification at the Tour de France – is from the 1984 edition of the race, and about as good as eBay Finds get for collectors of rare vintage jerseys.
A red jersey was awarded between 1984 and 1989 at the Tour de France for the rider who amassed the most points at the intermediate, or 'hot-spot' (points chauds in French), sprints – i.e.
French cycling-clothing brand Le Coq Sportif was the manufacturer of the red jersey from its inception in 1984 – like the example here – until 1988.
It would surely be a popular decision to see the return of the red or combined jersey at the Tour one day, if only temporarily.
If you have any suggestions or leads, please send them to cyclingnews@cyclingnews.com with 'eBay Finds' in the subject line.", 'A MUM has revealed how she turned an unused corner of her loft bedroom into a stunning study and beauty desk using items found in a skip.
Angie Talbot, 45, from Leeds, shared before photos of the “tricky corner” and then revealed the stunning final result.
She shared their DIY success to Facebook, writing: “Hi guys, I just thought I’d share a before and after of a tricky corner of our loft bedroom.
We also shared how a mum made her sons’ an incredible Harry potter bedroom transformation using bargains from eBay.
We also shared how this mum created an incredible indoor Wendy House for her kids for just £40 using B&M and The Range bargains.']

title: ['Sorry, eBay and Uber. You’re Hated. - The New York Times', "Blogger couple were 'sent live spiders' after criticising eBay - Daily Mail", 'Mrs Hinch shows off her latest eBay fashion purchase after successfully tracking down straw summer handbag - OK! magazine', 'Dandy comic strip featuring Wotton is discovered on eBay - Gazette Series']
summary:
['It’s practically an inevitability of the digital world: The middleman eventually becomes a villain.
You might not think of it this way, but middlemen that connect buyers and sellers are everywhere online.
Amazon, Uber, Airbnb, Instacart, Expedia, Care.com, Postmates and the app stores from Apple and Google function the same way, at least in part.
The technology industry loves middlemen companies — the industry calls them two-sided marketplaces.
I’m not exaggerating when I say that this resentment is the root cause of many conflicts in the digital era.', 'Massachusetts US Attorney Andrew Lelling said the purported harassment campaign was spurred because executives at the company were enraged by critical coverage eBay had received on the Steiners’ website.
Fly larvae, spiders, roaches and a self-help book about coping with the loss of a spouse were also received by the couple.
The police department’s discovery prompted a criminal investigation into an alleged harassment campaign said to have been ordered by some within eBay’s executive ranks.
A later text exchange from July 2019 shows a conversation between Wenig and Wymer, after ECommerceBytes published several more negative stories about eBay.
Once the police connected the activity back to eBay, the individuals involved are said to have attempted to cover their tracks.', 'Last week Mrs Hinch showed off her polka dot £10.99 eBay dress to fans.
The cute polka dot summer dress in a stretchy material featured adjustable straps and a very forgiving waistline with a lot of give.
Mrs Hinch is known both for her amazing cleaning hacks and her thrifty buys and has developed quite a following for her brilliant and budget friendly fashion tips too.
(Image: ebay / herry17)Bag, £15.59, eBayTagging the seller via swipe up into her post, Mrs Hinch showed fans that they could purchase the same summery tote from herrry17 on eBay for just £15.59.
Showcasing her bag in the back of the car, whilst wearing her matching eBay dress, Mrs Hinch seemed very pleased in did with her new stylish purchase.', 'The Dandy’s My Home Town feature was a long running series in the comic, which appeared in issues from 1962 to 1970.
Readers could win a page dedicated to the placed they lived, drawn by artist Frank McDiarmid.
Wotton Rugby Club player Olli Boyle, who collects Wotton memorabilia, found the comic on eBay.
“Martin Hodsman, aged 12, won the comic’s competition and Wotton was chosen to be featured.
Lots of people got in touch saying they knew Martin, including members of Martin’s family, who Olli managed to find another copy of the comic for.']

title: ["Cyberstalking Scandal Sends Shockwaves Through eBay's ... - San Jose Inside", 'eBay & Sole Supremacy "Vault Sale" Dates & Info - HYPEBEAST', "Gangsters 'selling drugs on Ebay as tea' and weapons 'listed as camping equipment' - Daily Record"]
summary:
['Nothing for the 34,000 members of Stay at Home Moms Selling on eBay, the 357 members of Bay Area eBay sellers or the 125 million active buyers in the U.S.
But there is plenty of social media chatter among eBay sellers.
He also is host of a private Facebook group for online sellers that has 57,000 followers.
James Baugh, 45, of San Jose, eBay’s former senior director of safety and security, was charged with conspiracy to commit cyberstalking and tampering with witnesses.
David Harville, 48, of New York City, eBay’s former director of global resiliency, was arrested on the same charges.', 'eBay has teamed with well-known reselling outfit Sole Supremacy for a grail-filled “Vault Sale.” Made up of 20 rare sneakers from Jordan Brand and Nike that range from samples to unreleased PEs and exclusive packs, the offerings encompass some of the most lusted-after sneakers on the market today.
There’s even a special game-issued Kobe Bryant Huarache 2K5 PE and an Air Jordan 3 Tinker Oregon PE.
As part of the festivities, eBay and Sole Supremacy are also giving away an Air Jordan 3 “White Oregon” in size 11.
See the full list of shoes and their respective sizes below, and head to eBay now if you’re looking to place a bid.
Dior recently opened the official raffle for its Air Jordan 1 collaborations.', 'Get the latest Scottish crime and courts news sent straight to your inbox with our daily Criminal Record newsletterDrugs are being sold as tea and deadly weapons as camping equipment by gangsters on Ebay, it's been claimed.
A Daily Record investigation found fearsome batons being marketed for use for camping while pepper spray is also available on Ebay.
Since the Record brought the items to the attention of Ebay and the police, the 'outdoor camping self defence stick' and the 'pineapple punch hemp tea' have been taken down.
(Image: Ebay)A source said: "By selling weapons as camping equipment and cannabis as tea it isn't instantly flagged up to police and Ebay itself.
An eBay spokeswoman said: "Illegal weapons and drugs are banned from eBay’s platform.']

title: ['ebay targets cross-border trade with local sellers in India - BestMediaInfo']
summary:
['After Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s call for a self-reliant India, there has been a huge call to use Indian products.
On similar lines, e-commerce platform ebay launched its campaign #LocalToGlobal, which tells Indian MSMEs (Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises) to go global and sell products internationally.
“The objective was to showcase how Indian sellers have been able to gain success on the platform.
Here’s the campaign:The platform that entered India in 2005 has since given small sellers a platform to sell their products.
“A lot of sellers came on to the platform to sell essentials as there was significant demand for those items.']

title: ["EBay's Critics Faced an Extreme Case of an Old Silicon Valley Habit ... - The New York Times"]
summary:
['Last summer, members of eBay’s private security team sent live roaches and a bloody pig mask to the home of a suburban Boston couple who published a niche e-commerce newsletter.
The lurid, 51-page indictment, describing how the employees of a multibillion-dollar company were loosed in what authorities described as an unhinged and illegal effort to intimidate critics, drew national attention to the stunning lengths some tech companies will go when responding to their critics.
Silicon Valley companies have stacked what they often call their “trust and safety” teams with former police officers and national intelligence analysts.
More often than not, their work is well within the law: protecting executives and intellectual property, fending off blackmail attempts and spotting theft.
They conduct background checks on companies that could be acquisition targets and they ensure employees aren’t doing anything illegal.']

title: ['Product Origin Guidelines Will Help eBay, Claims India Head - Inc42 Media', 'eBay Sports Card Sales Have Skyrocketed During COVID-19 - Sports Collectors Daily', "Richest Person In Hawaii: What Is eBay Founder Pierre Omidyar's Net Worth? - International Business Times"]
summary:

eBay India head Vidmay Naini says that the whole debate around will benefit the company as it focuses on exporting India to other countries.
Speaking to Times Of India, Naini said, “We are doing extremely well in Australia, the US, Germany and the UK.
Demand is very high.
We have the opportunity to tap into this', '', '']

title: ['Why companies as diverse as eBay, IKEA and Mars are increasingly supporting US clean energy policies - The Conversation Indonesia', 'Rare Battle of Hastings 50p coin sells for whopping £67k on eBay - Heart', "Mrs Hinch admits to buying 'terrible' knickers on eBay that made her feel 'stuck inside a rubber tyre' - OK! magazine"]
summary:
['Driven by pressure from environmental groups and by the increasingly competitive prices of wind and solar, many companies have pledged to power their operations with clean energy.
Why it mattersPolitically powerful fossil fuel interests have long steered U.S. policy toward carbon-intensive energy and economy.
There’s little evidence of a slowdown in lobbying by fossil fuel interests, so the question is whether corporate lobbying for clean energy will ramp up fast enough to change the course of U.S. climate and energy policy.
Using this database, I aim to identify cases in which stronger public environmental policies can help businesses meet a range of environmental commitments.
I further aim to identify ways to mobilize business advocacy in favor of stronger environmental policies.', "Rare Battle of Hastings 50p coin sells for whopping £67k on eBayThe rare coin is worth thousands so it's worth checking to see if you have one.
A very rare Battle of Hastings 50p coin has sold for an incredible £63,100 on eBay following a fierce bidding war amongst collectors on the website.
Picture: eBayThis particular 50p coin is one of 6,700,000 in circulation (which doesn't even sound that rare?!)
The Battle of Hastings 50p was created back in 2016, to mark a whopping 950 years since the famous battle occurred in 1066 between William the Conquerer and King Harold II.
Although this particular coin is considered very rare, it's definitely not one of the rarest out there.", 'Get daily celeb exclusives and behind the scenes house tours direct to your inboxCleaning sensation and social media star Mrs Hinch’s Instagram account is usually filled with great suggestions for her 3.5 million followers about where to purchase useful products.
The star shared a screenshot of the offending item, writing: “Right I need to share this with you,” alongside a laughing face emoji.
As a result she admits she is no stranger to support underwear, writing: “I’m not a g-string kinda girl if I’m honest!
You’re all amazing xx”One follower wrote: “Someone who finally admits that Bridget Jones’s pants are comfier than cheese strings!
"I’d love to get some tummy flattening knickers but I’m worried I’d be embarrassed in front of my partner!']

title: ['eBay Finds: Specialized S-Works EXOS 99 shoes - Cyclingnews', 'Rare Kew Gardens 50p coin sells on eBay for £150 – how to check if your change is worth a mint... - The Sun', 'Savvy shoppers are selling £14 Lidl trainers on eBay for £450 after they spark new online trend... - The Sun']
summary:
['Image 1 of 2 A pair of limited-edition Specialized S-Works EXOS 99 shoes on eBay (Image credit: filippo_cz / eBay) Only 500 pairs of the shoes were made.
We then took a closer look at both the EXOS 99 and EXOS last year, and reviewed the EXOS in October.
The EXOS 99, as its name suggests, weighs just 99 grams per shoe, while the EXOS comes in at a still featherweight 150g, with the extra weight coming from the retention system and what is apparently a slightly beefier carbon sole.
Last month, Specialized also unveiled their S-Works Vent – a sort of hybrid of the EXOS and their S-Works 7 road shoes.
As the seller reminds us, just 500 pairs of this very special EXOS 99 model available on eBay were made, and the size available here is a European 42.5.', "A RARE Kew Gardens coin has sold on eBay for nearly £150 after a bidding war from collectors.
Most of these coins sell online for anything between £90 and £190, depending on what condition they're in.
What to do if you've got a rare coin FIRSTLY, you need to make sure the coin is legit and not counterfeit.
If you want to sell the coin you’ve found in your spare change on eBay then you need to know the risks.
For more information about what to do if you've found a rare coin, read our guide.", 'PEOPLE are flogging a pair of £14 trainers from Lidl for a whopping £450 online.
The colourful blue, yellow and red shoes feature the Lidl logo and are fetching up to 30 times their original price on selling sites like eBay.
4 Shoppers are selling a pair of colourful £14 Lidl trainers for a staggering €499 (£450) on eBay Credit: LidlThe bold trainers were launched at the budget supermarket chain in April this year overseas, and it seems like they were more popular than anyone could have predicted.
Now news of the Lidl shoes has spread to the UK, people are creating plans on how they can get in on the action.
We shared how Lidl is selling a hammock on a frame for your garden.']

title: ['Fort Huachuca Police body cam footage easily accessible after an ... - Arizona Mirror', 'People are selling £14 Lidl trainers for £450 on eBay in mad rush to bag a pair - The Mirror', 'Katie Price emotionally opens up about horrific Harvey Price trolling on eBay - Daily Star']
summary:
['A security researcher was able to access files on a Axon body-worn camera he purchased from eBay that had video files of Fort Huachuca Military Police officers conducting investigations and filling out paperwork.
KF was then able to extract the un-encrypted files, which were not protected by a password, using a tool called Foremost.
KF shared screenshots of the footage he was able to pull from the cards that appeared to show members of the Fort Huachuca Military Police entering a person’s home and filling out paperwork.
It is unclear what year the footage is from, and a request for comment from the Fort Huachuca Military Police Department was not returned.
It is unclear how the Fort Huachuca body camera ended up on eBay.', "The colourful Lidl shoes sparked huge queues and massed scrambles when they went on sale, social distancing or not, and within hours were being sold online for astonishing markupsPeople are selling £14 Lidl trainers for £450 on eBay in mad rush to bag a pairClever shoppers are cashing in on the wild popularity of Lidl's new £14 trainers, selling them for as much as £450 online.
The blue, yellow and red shoes were launched in stores overseas this April, and proved far more popular than anyone predicted.
Featuring the Lidl logo as part of their design, they are now fetching up to 30 times their original price on sites like eBay.
As the madness intensified one person even listed a pair on Finnish auction site Tori for £5,400.
With news of the Lidl shoes spreading to the UK, people are coming up with cunning plans to get in on the action.", 'Something went wrong, please try again later.

title: ["eBay Finds: Maurizio Fondriest's 1988 Legnano bike - Cyclingnews", 'Ordinary 50p coin sells on eBay for A$113,000 - 9News', "Lidl's £14 trainers are being sold for £450 on eBay as people rush to bag a pair - Edinburgh Live"]
summary:
["Image 1 of 5 Maurizio Fondriest's spare Legnano bike from the 1988 season, available to buy on eBay (Image credit: cicli-berlinetta / eBay) Italy's Maurizio Fondriest wins the 1988 World Championships road race in Ronse, Belgium (Image credit: Bettini Photo) The Legnano name stands proud on the head tube – and it’s got Campagnolo’s Delta brakes, too (Image credit: cicli-berlinetta / eBay) Fondriest’s names is etched on the top tube – not that expertly, it must be said (Image credit: cicli-berlinetta / eBay) Maurizio Fondriest (second left) with Gianni Bugno, Moreno Argentin and Davide Cassani at the 2018 30th anniversary celebrations of Fondriest's 1988 World Championships road race victory in Ronse, Belgium.
His Legnano bike that he won the Worlds on – virtually identical to the one for sale here on eBay – stands alongside one of Fondriest's own, more modern machines (Image credit: Bettini Photo)Found here on eBay is Maurizio Fondriest's spare Legnano bike from the 1988 season – the year when the Italian won the World Championship road race in Ronse, Belgium.
Fondriest in fact only rode professionally on Legnano frames for one season, in 1988, at the Alfa Lum-Legnano team.
Take a closer look at Fondriest's Legnano bike here on eBay (opens in new tab)Neither we nor the Berlin, Germany-based seller are sure of the Legnano model, but what you are getting here is the genuine article, with Fondriest's name etched – not overly expertly, it must be said – on the top tube.
If you have any suggestions or leads, please send them to cyclingnews@cyclingnews.com with 'eBay Finds' in the subject line.", 'A British coin commemorating the Battle of Hastings has sold on eBay for the jaw-dropping price of £65,100 (A$113,000).
The Battle of Hastings 50p piece is one of the most common coins in circulation in the UK.
There are Kew Gardens 50p coins listed on eBay for prices ranging from £4.20 to £150.
The Battle of Hastings coin commemorated the Norman invasion of England in 1066.
The Bayeux Tapestry was not made in Bayeux, and is not a tapestry.', 'Something went wrong, please try again later.
