title: ['How to get the most out of eBay as a seller or buyer - USA TODAY', 'Should eBay Let You Sell Your Account? - EcommerceBytes', 'Iconic Dublin street signs up for sale on eBay - IrishCentral']
summary:
['Try Seller Initiated Offer: EBay recently introduced a feature called Seller Initiated Offer, which can be directed to shoppers who put an item in their watch list or who have an item in their cart.
For instance, if a buyer adds an iPad to their watch list or cart, that’s a clear indication a buyer is interested in an item, and so you as the seller can go into the Seller Hub (Active Listings) to the specific listing and see that people have shown interest.
Timing is key, price your item right: EBay says Sunday is the busiest day for purchases, followed by Saturday and Monday.
As for pricing it, make sure your item is competitively priced as eBay shoppers are comparing your item to others.
A tip is to offer free shipping – even if you must increase the product price a bit, you’ll likely sell it faster.', 'We noticed his recent blog post in which he is working as a broker to sell a third party seller's eBay account ("If a sale is made using Wortfilter, I will receive a commission," he writes).
In 2010, eBay spokesperson Johnna Hoff told us eBay did not allow users to transfer eBay User IDs as a general rule, though she said it made some exceptions in rare cases.
"Your eBay account has value when you develop a strong feedback rating and satisfy your customers.
"Attempting to sell an eBay account may result in buying and selling restrictions as well as account suspension or removal."
Would you consider buying or selling an eBay account if it were allowed?', "A number of original street signs from some of Dublin's most iconic streets are up for sale on eBay.
Signs from Moore Street, Bachelor's Walk, and O'Connell Street are all up for sale on the e-commerce site for a whopping €1,000 ($1125) each.
A total of four signs are up for sale, with two O'Connell Street signs available for purchase.
There are Upper O'Connell Street and Lower O'Connell Street signs available to buy on eBay.
Finally, Bachelors Walk is another street in the vicinity of O'Connell Street and Moore Street that runs along Dublin's quays into O'Connell Street from the River Liffey."]

title: ['Seventh former eBay employee, who was once a police captain, accused of taking part in cyberstalking of Massa - MassLive.com', 'Man Charged with Stealing 2000 New-Car Key Fobs, Selling on eBay - Car and Driver', 'Married woman, 32, tricked lover, 18 with baby scans off eBay - Daily Mail']
summary:
['He was charged in a Massachusetts federal court with conspiracy to commit cyberstalking and conspiracy to tamper with witnesses.
Cooke is accused of conspiring with six other former eBay employees in an alleged cyberstalking campaign against the Natick couple who is the editor and publisher of an online newsletter that covers e-commerce companies including eBay.
Harville and Baugh were charged on June 15, 2020, with conspiracy to commit cyberstalking and conspiracy to tamper with witnesses.
The victims spotted the surveillance, however, and notified the Natick police, who began to investigate,” according to the U.S. Attorney’s Office.
The former eBay employees, aware police were investigating, tried to interfere with the investigation by lying to the police about eBay’s involvement while pretending to offer the company’s assistance with the harassment.', 'After a two-year investigation, a Dearborn, Michigan, man who worked at the rail yard was officially charged on July 6 with stealing and selling nearly 2000 key fobs from new vehicles.
The man made more than $60,000 selling the key fobs on eBay, the feds accuse.
A CSX manager found the first piece to the puzzle: an eBay account by the name of "i_love_12volts" that was selling key fobs like the ones that were being stolen.
F-150 Pickup Keys Spotted on eBayThe investigators contacted Ford's Global Brand Production Group, which had already bought three of the key fobs from this eBay account.
He admitted to using the i_love_12volts eBay account because his had been suspended for selling fake headphones.', "But Dowson was caught out after a £100,000 police probe uncovered her fraud and false baby scans off the internet.
Mr Bastin tried to dump Dowson on February 28, 2016, to which she replied: 'You are taking my baby away from me.'
The fraudster had sent Mrs Bastin doctored pregnancy scans she got from a retailer on eBay.
Mr Bastin meanwhile was arrested and subjected to a 10 hour stay in custody over the false rape claims.
He was further interviewed under caution four times when Dowson later alleged he had been harassing her."]

title: ['eBay Finds: Limited-edition Lance Armstrong Giro Atmos helmet - Cyclingnews', 'eBay slashes a wondrous 44% off the Samsung Galaxy Watch Active 2 - TechRadar', 'eBay Security Concerns Lead to Packing Slip Changes - EcommerceBytes', "eBay set to ban T-shirt predicting Ghislaine Maxwell's murder - Metro.co.uk", 'Hackers Are Finding Footage on Police Body Cams They Bought on ... - VICE']
summary:
["British cycling enthusiasts might even describe him as 'Marmite' – the word coined after the love-it-or-hate-it advertising campaign for the famous yeast-extract bread-spread, and indeed this yellow-and-black Giro Atmos helmet design mimics Marmite's 'corporate colours' perfectly.
Cyclingnews editor Daniel Benson recently wrote this piece about covering Armstrong as part of the website's 25th anniversary this year.
It's a nice-looking helmet, and this Giro Atmos model was great, both in this first design and its later second iteration.
You've perhaps got to really love it to part with AU$900 (US$625 / £500) for this one, though.
If you have any suggestions or leads, please send them to cyclingnews@cyclingnews.com with 'eBay Finds' in the subject line.", "They say a summer body is made in winter, so if you’re looking to shed those Covid kilos, now is the time to get back into it and up your game with the Samsung Galaxy Watch 2 and save an incredible 44%.
The Galaxy Watch Active 2 is the latest addition to Samsung's Tizen watch range - it’s slimmer, lighter, and arguably more comfortable than its predecessor and includes a rotating digital bezel.
This quality smartwatch features a stunning 1.2-inch 360 x 360 display and is smaller when compared to a lot of other smart-wearables out there, making it less clunky and more stylish.
In addition to this, the Samsung Galaxy Watch Active 2 sports top-end fitness features with 39 workout modes, a heart rate and ECG sensor and a health app with stress and sleep monitoring.
Available in black, you can grab the Samsung Galaxy Watch Active 2 through eBay – just use the code P15LIGHT to receive your full discount.", 'An eBay moderator answering the question cited security concerns: "We had to introduce standardized text because the free text box poses the potential for risk to site/account security," he said.
Almost all of the transaction information that would be placed on the packing slip is missing on the packing slip.
When I click "Print packing slip", a small pop-up box comes up showing what the packing slip will look like.
Only the SOLD ITEM DESCRIPTION AND LISTING NUMBER are on the packing slip!
I did not click the hide ship from box and yet it is not on the packing slip as well.', 'eBay is set to ban a T-shirt and badge predicting the murder of suspected pedophile Ghislaine Maxwell in jail (Pictures: eBay)Online auction site eBay is set to ban the sale of a sick T-shirt and badge which jokingly predict the murder of Ghislaine Maxwell behind bars.
A black T-shirt offered by San Jose-based seller Empathy Trading for $20.99 features the alleged child sex abuser’s smiling face with the caption ‘Ghislaine Maxwell didn’t kill herself.’Its seller’s description reads: ‘Get your did Ghislaine Maxwell kill herself Tee here.
We all know what happened to Jeffrey Epstein… Grab yours now!’ The T-shirt’s slogan is a play on ‘Epstein didn’t kill himself’.
That is a popular phrase among conspiracy theorists who refuse to believe a coroner’s ruling that Maxwell’s pedophile ex Jeffrey Epstein hanged himself while being held in a Manhattan jail in August 2019.
Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell are pictured in New York in 2005.', "Curious hackers are buying decommissioned police body cameras online, and some are finding troves of video evidence after successfully extracting data from the devices.
Last week, Twitter user d0tslash found one such cache while searching inside an Axon-branded body camera he bought on eBay.
The device in question appears to be an older version of the Axon Body, which normally transfers video data to a computer after being docked in a proprietary cradle.
It turns out that used body cameras are commonly for sale online, and several other hackers followed up with their own findings.
But that hasn't stopped others from buying up stocks of used cameras to uncover what secrets they hold."]

title: ['A turbo charged thief avoids prison after making £16,000 on Ebay ... - The Northern Echo', 'Tesco, eBay, Matalan and Co-op among companies to urgently ... - Essex Live', 'NortonLifeLock hires former eBay exec Natalie Derse as new CFO ... - The Business Journals', 'Seller Bypasses Bank Sign-in Requirement of eBay Payments - EcommerceBytes', 'Couple build tasteful DIY back garden bar with accessories from eBay and Aldi - Daily Star']
summary:
['Martin Wilson used a friend to sell the reconditioned car parts on Ebay and pocketed the money after stealing them from his employer.
The 36-year-old spent two years sneaking the refurbished parts out of Turbo Active, based on Wynyard Business Park, before selling them on.
Jenny Haigh, prosecuting, said the company boss turned detective and bought one of his stolen turbo chargers before cross-referencing it with his own stock list.
"On recceving the letter, he immediately ordered a stock check and he was made aware 50 turbo chargers had gone missing since January last year."
Miss Haigh said the company estimated the theft cost it £30,000 but some of the stolen goods were recovered by police.', 'For daily updates and all the latest breaking news sent straight to your inbox sign up to our daily newsletterEvery week manufactures recall products from food from supermarket shelves to beauty products bought online- and everything in between.
Over recent weeks Tesco, eBay, Matalan and the Co-op are just a small number of companies that have had products it sells recalled following health and safety fears.
These notices explain to customers why the products are being recalled and tell them what to do if they have bought the products.
Lidl- Baresa Pesto 190g (alla Genovese and Red)Batches affected: All products with best before dates up to and including 10/2022.
Reason for recall: The product contains an insufficient amount of ethanol and propan-2-ol, as a result, it does not kill bacteria or viruses.', '', "Dear Ina,I just discovered that signing up for Managed Payments requires logging into your bank account WHILE inside the eBay site.
I had gotten OK with giving eBay my account and tracking numbers, but this is a big red flag.
I went and got a separate bank account from other than my current bank for Managed Payments.
In sign-up, you click your bank's logo and it takes you to your bank sign-in screen.
If you deselect that sign-in screen, you get another screen pop-up with the OPTION to enter your account and routing numbers MANUALLY without signing into your bank account.", 'Sign up for the Hot Topics newsletter for hot style and sex tipsA couple have spent the last eight weeks of lockdown building an impressive DIY bar in their garden.
Lucy, 37, and Craig Bridges, 39, wanted to revamp their garden for some time.
They decided that they needed an indoor area so they could enjoy the garden no matter the weather.
“The hubby watches his football/ f1 and I can watch my soaps in peace haha!”The project cost the couple a couple of grand – but it seems totally worth it.
(Image: Lucy Bridges)She added: “This is where the idea of the home bar came from.']

title: ["This 1968 Jeep Wagoneer may not be Grand, but it's pretty swell - Autoblog", 'Mum claims £3 eBay Frozen sticker was secret to potty training son, three, after he got terrified of the... - The Sun', 'EBay Adds Security To Its Local Pickup Option With Formal Tracking - Retail TouchPoints']
summary:
["Before it morphed into the wood-sided Jeep Grand Wagoneer and became an SUV icon, Jeep's just-plain Wagoneer had already established itself as a pioneer in the field.
The Wagoneer combined a car-like driving demeanor with genuine off-road capability, setting the template for the modern SUV.
The vehicle made its debut for the '63 model year, and this restored 1968 Wagoneer, for sale right now on eBay Motors, looks to be a sharp example of the breed.
We're digging the white roof and the white steel wheels under factory wheel covers, although the outside mirror should be chrome rather than body color.
Compared to a Grand Wagoneer, these earlier models are mechanically simpler and have a classic '60s style all their own.", 'In fact, mums are raving about a £3 Olaf eBay sticker which urges kids struggling to get to grips with the loo to just "let it go" - trust us, it's genius.
Determined to get him back on track, the mum ordered the purse-friendly buy on eBay - and told her son that she'd had a chat with the film's heroines.
Needless to say, the sticker worked wonders to reassure her son - and now other parents are desperate to bag it too.
My 4 year old has suddenly become terrified the toilet will bite her bum while she's sitting on it."
For more parenting tips, this mum swears by VODKA for getting permanent marker off carpet after her toddler wreaked havoc with some pens.', 'eBay has enhanced its mobile app’s Local Pickup option with more convenient tracking and security features.
The updated Local Pickup feature now secures the transaction with a formal “tracking event,” using the mobile device’s camera application and QR code scan capability to confirm and finalize the transaction.
Upon arrival, the buyer provides the seller with the purchase confirmation and a secure eBay QR code, at which point the seller scans the QR code using the eBay App on their mobile device.
The tracking API then generates an eBay Tracking Number with both date and time stamps and propagates it across eBay selling tools, APIs and buyer delivery experiences.
Additionally, disputes and claims can be handled with the provided tracking data, and any money transacted on eBay is now protected from fraudulent chargebacks.']

title: ['eBay Managed Payments: The Devil Is in the Execution - EcommerceBytes']
summary:
['eBay will manage payments for most sellers in 2020, and all sellers will eventually be required to have eBay manage their payments in order to keep selling on eBay.
During Wednesday’s chat, another eBay seller summarized some of the top concerns that remained about the Managed Payments program.
On its Selling Fees help page, eBay displays the following message: “Managed payments sellers: Beginning July 18, 2020, the new fee structure for managed payments sellers will start to take effect.
That’s probably not what eBay’s former CEO had envisioned when he briefed Wall Street in 2018 about Managed Payments.
“We’re basically going to say your eBay account is now your full end-to-end eBay account for all your activities including payments.']

title: ['When Dartmouth Swimmers Tried to Sell Their Program on EBay - SwimSwam']
summary:
['In 2002, Dartmouth announced the elimination of its swimming & diving teams as well.
One of the first attempts to fundraise to save the program came from sophomore swimmer Jenny Kunkel and her boyfriend at the time Jon Lenihan, who attended Xavier.
Supporters of the program would eventually launch the John C. Glover fund, which was named after former Dartmouth All-American swimmer John C. Glover, who graduated in 1955.
In total, $2 million were raised for that fund, which set up an endowment designed to fund the program for the next 10 years.
This leaves swimming & diving, again, in the school’s bullseye, rehaunting old nightmares from years past.']

title: ['“Good plan, Brian” — Second retired Santa Clara Cop Indicted in eBay Harassment Scheme - The Silicon Valley Voice', "PayPal Stock On A Roll Despite EBay Agreement Ending, Earnings ... - Investor's Business Daily", 'eBay Finds: 1999 Marco Pantani Selle Italia Flite Classic saddle - Cyclingnews', 'Pricey ‘Splash Mountain’ merchandise appears on eBay as Disney World reopens - WFLA']
summary:
['*Cooke was charged last week in the criminal conspiracy, in which six other eBay security executives, including retired SCPD captain Brian Gilbert, were charged in June.
The cards used to send the harassing deliveries were purchased at a Santa Clara Safeway by alleged co-conspirator Veronica Zea, as Santa Clara resident.
Santa Clara Police Chief Patrick Nikolai said in an email that he was “extremely disappointed” by the news about Cooke.
Cooke and Gilbert aren’t the only retired SCPD officers to work in eBay’s corporate security operation.
The news network also alleges that Executive 2 is former eBay Chief Communications Officer Steven Wyman, based on its insider sources.', 'The five-year operating agreement between PayPal Holdings (PYPL) and former parent eBay (EBAY) expires on July 17.
While the event was an overhang on PayPal stock a year ago, the payment processor heads into second-quarter earnings on a roll.
PayPal stock gained roughly 23% after eBay made the announcement in late January 2018 through the end of 2019.
Price Target on PayPal Stock Hiked Ahead Of EarningsIn 2020, though, PayPal stock has soared 65% despite the coronavirus lockdown.
PayPal stock fell 3.9% to close at 171.51 on the stock market today.', "The saddle was made by Selle Italia to celebrate Pantani's 1998 Giro-Tour double – as marked by the yellow and pink stars on the design.
Certainly, Pantani used a previous, starless-but-similar Selle Italia Flite for the 1998 Tour de France, with a slightly different embroidered 'pirate logo'.
Pantani's using an earlier 'Pirate' design on a Selle Italia Flite saddle, similar to the design of the Flite Classic saddle that celebrated his 1998 Giro-Tour double featured here (Image credit: Bettini Photo)The Japan-based seller is asking £242.60 (US$305) for the predominantly yellow saddle, which has red 'scuff guards' on the outer edges of its widest part.
See the saddle on eBay here (opens in new tab)We're constantly on the lookout for unique and rare cycling relics on eBay.
If you have any suggestions or leads, please send them to cyclingnews@cyclingnews.com with 'eBay Finds' in the subject line.", '(WFLA) – With Walt Disney World reopening for the first time in months and the recent news “Splash Mountain” will be transformed, merchandise from the ride is beginning to sell for high amounts on eBay.
Magic Kingdom, the park that houses Splash Mountain, reopened to the general public Saturday, with castmember and annual pass previews happening the days before.
In a search of eBay, 8 On Your Side found numerous pieces of Splash Mountain merchandise selling for higher than usual prices, some in bulk.
Further listings include Splash Mountain tumblers selling between $60 and $80 and an adult t-shirt for $95.
LATEST DISNEY WORLD NEWS‘We are finally back’: What you need to know as Disney World reopensDisney World changing ‘Star Wars: Rise of the Resistance’ virtual queueDisney World resuming 2020 park ticket sales, hotel bookings']

title: ['Got items to sell on eBay, Craigslist, or Facebook Marketplace? Read this first. - WFMYNews2.com', "Here's your chance to own a Subaru Impreza WRX stunt car from 'Baby Driver' - Autoblog"]
summary:
["For example, a friend of mine put this Cabella's hunting jacket on eBay.
The idea was, the buyer wanted to send the jacket and this gift card to a friend, but for some reason couldn’t buy it himself.
The seller would make $50 extra by buying this gift card and showing the number as proof.
“I've never gone into any store and saw a gallon of milk for $2 and said, ‘here's an extra $50 for you to buy me a gift card with’.
“If someone overpays you on any marketplace, eBay or Craigslist, it's a big red flag.”The National Consumers League sees this kind of thing all the time.", 'Fans of the the 2017 movie "Baby Driver," pay attention, because you have another chance at owning one of the 2006 Subaru Impreza WRXs used for the film's big opening chase scene.
The shop removed the 2.0-liter flat-four and installed a 300-horsepower, 2.5-liter engine sourced from a WRX STI.
Inside, this Impreza WRX received an instrument cluster and other bits and pieces pulled out of the STI parts bin.
In 2017, another WRX used in the movie traded hands for $69,100 after receiving 71 bids.
For context, a 2006 WRX STI with reasonable mileage and no modifications is worth about $20,000.']

title: ['eBay Gives Sellers More Free Listings - EcommerceBytes', "eBay Finds: Vintage 'pantographed' Campagnolo, Cinelli and ITM ... - Cyclingnews", "EBay launches 'Australian Made' section as consumers flock to ... - SmartCompany", 'Notes: COVID vs Shows; eBay Sales; Robitaille Collection Auction ... - Sports Collectors Daily', '‘Calculated’ woman ripped off eBay customers, landlords - Daily Telegraph']
summary:
["The number of total free listings per month vary depending on a seller's Store subscription status and whether or not they are enrolled in eBay Managed Payments.
A seller with no eBay Store subscription currently receives 50 free auction or fixed-price listings.
Basic Stores will get an additional 100 fixed-price listings; Starter Stores will receive an additional 150 listings, to 250 auction or fixed-price listings.
Why aren't you changing the monthly zero insertion fee listings for auction listings in select categories?
Auction listing is a premium listing format and we are not changing monthly zero insertion fee auction listings.", "Image 1 of 5 Some vintage 'pantographed' Campagnolo, Cinelli and ITM components available on eBay (Image credit: tonysarroni / eBay) The beautifully pantographed Campagnolo Record brake levers are truly stunning (Image credit: tonysarroni / eBay) These Campagnolo Record brake calipers feature Italian tricolore detailing (Image credit: tonysarroni / eBay) This rather special ITM Goccia quill stem features the Colnago 'clubs' logo (Image credit: tonysarroni / eBay) The Italian tricolore detail continues on the Campagnolo seatpost’s fluting (Image credit: tonysarroni / eBay)We've found this little lot on our latest trawl of eBay: a vintage groupset, with pantograph-etching details, made up mainly of Campagnolo kit, with a little Cinelli and ITM thrown in there, too.
According to this Cyclingnews tech piece from 2014 about a 1972 Colnago Super Pantografata bike, the pantograph-etching work carried out on those frames and their matching Cinelli and Campagnolo components was all done in-house by Colnago.
The pièce de résistance – however you say that in Italian – is really the Campag Record brake levers and calipers.
Have a closer look at the vintage components on eBay here (opens in new tab)We're constantly on the lookout for unique and rare cycling relics on eBay.
If you have any suggestions or leads, please send them to cyclingnews@cyclingnews.com with 'eBay Finds' in the subject line.", '“I’m really bullish, we’re going to see more Australian entrepreneurs as a result of COVID,” MacKinnon says.
Since April, eBay has tracked a 57% annual increase in sales from Australian Made brands among its 11 million or so monthly unique visitors.
“There’s been this trend towards local provenance and having some connection to products; COVID and national emergencies tend to increase that desire,” MacKinnon says.
Now, amid growing realisation that locally produced products have significant advantages in times when global supply chains are on the fritz, Australian Made has been making headlines.
“This will drive a permanent shift towards locally produced products,” he says.', '', '']

title: ['News - Foundation of Light']

title: ['I sell on eBay. How do I report sales tax collections? - NJ.com', 'Feds wearing Army uniforms and gear available on eBay - Business Insider']
summary:
['Q. I have a small business and sell exclusively on eBay, which now collects sales tax from the buyers on items sold in a number of states, including New Jersey.
In the past, I always reported my total sales, deducted sales not in New Jersey, and was left with New Jersey sales, on which I then calculated and remitted the sales tax due.
But because eBay is now collecting the New Jersey tax and remitting it directly to the state, how do I show this on the quarterly Sales and Use Tax form?
eBay, as a marketplace facilitator, is required to collect and remit sales tax to New Jersey.
“Accordingly, sales made on eBay by a marketplace seller are not taxable sales with respect to the marketplace seller.”Ritter said you should reduce total sales by the sales facilitated through eBay.', ', , in recent days show protesters being detained and whisked into unmarked cars by what appear to be law-enforcement officers wearing military camouflage.
Kate Brown and Vermont Sen. Bernie Sanders, who described it as "unmarked federal agents ... pulling protesters off the street and jailing them without charge."
Screenshot via EbayAdvertisementOn his social-media accounts, Wolf posted pictures of himself with Homeland Security personnel wearing military fatigues and DHS patches.
AdvertisementBut civil-rights groups are sounding the alarm about federal officers patrolling Portland while in military gear, most of which is available online.
"The actions of the militarized federal officers are flat-out unconstitutional and will not go unanswered."']

title: ['These 7 household items sell surprisingly well on eBay and Facebook Marketplace - CNET', 'Warning for eBay Sellers with PayPal Loans - EcommerceBytes', 'eBay Global Shipping Disappoints Collectibles Buyer - EcommerceBytes']
summary:
["Read on to find out how much these seven surprisingly hot-ticket items are worth when you sell them online.
You can sell used golf balls to LostGolfBalls.com or directly to consumers on eBay.
Turn used crayons into cashBroken, used crayons still have a lot of life left in them.
Used crayons fetch anywhere from $3 to $5 per pound on eBay and even more on Etsy.
There are also several crayon-collecting charities that recycle used crayons into new ones for at-risk children, children's hospitals and the like.", 'Warning: eBay sellers with PayPal Working Capital loans will need to start repaying those loans manually if they are among the sellers who are being forced into eBay Managed Payments this month.
But once a seller is enrolled in eBay Managed Payments, PayPal will no longer be able to see eBay sales even when buyers pay for their purchases using PayPal.
PayPal had raised the issue of loan repayment with eBay sellers in 2018, issuing a stark warning that they would be out of compliance with the terms of their PayPal Working Capital loans if they migrated from PayPal to eBay Managed Payments.
Two years later, as eBay gets ready to migrate many more sellers into the Managed Payments program, PayPal initially appeared to have a solution in mind for sellers with PayPal loans.
PayPal also noted that the PayPal Capital Loans lender, which is WebBank in the US, won’t be able to assess eBay sellers’ loan eligibility based on eBay sales.', 'Dear Ina,Just wanted to report a frustrating experience with eBay's Global Shipping Program.
I have almost all of my listings opted in to eBay's Global Shipping Program.
Tracking showed eBay Global Shipping Center received the package from Indiana to Kentucky on July 8. eBay sat on this package for 9 days, for no apparent reason.
I knew from previous Global Shipping experience that packages tend to sit there for weeks before moving on, but always thought it was because they were "doing something" with them.
Curious to know what happens to the items eBay "confiscates" from GSP.... do they resell or auction lots off locally?']

['Fraudulent eBay seller made £250k from his criminal activity - The Northern Echo', 'EBay says its will ‘move pretty quickly’ on payments transition as PayPal agreement expires - MarketWatch', 'eBay Plans To Grow Managed Payments - PYMNTS.com', "eBay Finds: Hubert Dupont's 2019 Eddy Merckx Stockeu69 bike - Cyclingnews", 'Mum goes viral after transforming garden hut into home cinema with eBay purchases - Edinburgh Live']
summary:
['Thousands of pounds worth of items stolen from lorries and from an electrical goods shop were sold through an eBay account in the name of Malcolm Teasdale’s daughter.
The court was told he was of previous good character and initially bought and sold goods legitimately through the internet.
Jamie Adams, mitigating, told the sentencing hearing that Teasdale led a blame-free “industrious” life until the loss of stock in the fires at the unit.
Judge Jonathan Carroll imposed a two-year prison sentence, suspended for two years, but ordered Teasdale to comply with a six-month, 7pm to 7am home curfew.
Almost 14 months on from the sentencing hearing a proceeds of crime hearing took place at the court, yesterday.', 'EBay Inc. intends to “move pretty quickly” on rolling out its new payments system now that its operating agreement with PayPal Holdings Inc. has officially come to an end.
EBay and PayPal split into two separate companies in July 2015 but maintained a five-year operating agreement through which PayPal would remain the e-commerce giant’s primary payments partner.
The companies announced in January 2018 that they wouldn’t be renewing that agreement upon its expiration, which took place this weekend.', '', "Image 1 of 4 Hubert Dupont's 2019 Eddy Merckx Stockeu69 bike available to buy on eBay (Image credit: paulmilnescycles1978 / eBay) AG2R La Mondiale's Hubert Dupont descends during stage 18 of the 2019 Giro d'Italia (Image credit: Getty Images Sport) The chainset is a Rotor Aldhu, with 170mm cranks and 52- and 36T rings (Image credit: paulmilnescycles1978 / eBay) Look closely, and the name-tag says '2018' on it – but this is definitely a 2019 bike as AG2R were on Factor bikes before last season (Image credit: paulmilnescycles1978 / eBay)For sale here on eBay is a complete bike built around now-retired Frenchman Hubert Dupont's 2019 AG2R La Mondiale team Eddy Merckx Stockeu69 carbon frame.
Vincent Lavenu's AG2R La Mondiale team switched to Eddy Merckx machines from Factor frames at the end of the 2018 season.
But before there's any kind of outcry, consider that both the Ridley and Eddy Merckx brands are owned by the Belgian Cycling Factory group.
As for Dupont, the now 39-year-old Frenchman retired at the end of the 2019 season – and perhaps this was even the last frame he raced on at the Gran Piemonte last October.
AG2R La Mondiale's Hubert Dupont descends on his Eddy Merckx Stockeu69 during stage 18 of the 2019 Giro d'Italia (Image credit: Getty Images Sport)See the bike on eBay here (opens in new tab)We're constantly on the lookout for unique and rare cycling relics on eBay.", 'Something went wrong, please try again later.
Invalid email Something went wrong, please try again later.
From an Edinburgh couple make stunning upcycled garden furniture out of old pallets, to a key worker who transformed her garden using bargain B&M products, we thought we'd seen it all.
But one mum has stunned people after she created the perfect hideout space by transforming an outdoor cabin into their very own home cinema at the end of the garden.
(Image: Jenna Kuzniarski/Facebook)Sharing a series of photos to the Facebook group Extreme Couponing and Bargains UK, Jenna Kuzniarski said: "When we couldn’t go to the cinema we made our own lockdown project...log cabin garden cinema."']

title: ['Adevinta acquires eBay’s Classifieds business unit in $9.2B deal - TechCrunch', 'JobAdder hires ex-EBay GM Martin Herbst as CEO - AIM Group', 'eBay Bans Sale of Certain Pet Meds Citing COVID Policy - EcommerceBytes', "Adevinta to Acquire eBay Classifieds Group to Create the World's ... - PR Newswire", "Adevinta buys eBay's classifieds unit in $9.2 billion deal - Reuters", 'eBay Eyes a $2 Billion Opportunity in Payments Following PayPal Split - Business Insider']
summary:
['Today, eBay announced it had reached a deal to sell off its Classifieds business unit to Adevinta, a Norway-based classified ads publisher majority owned by Norwegian publisher Schibsted.
The deal is valued at $9.2 billion, which includes eBay getting $2.5 billion in cash and 540 million Adevinta shares.
“With the acquisition of eBay Classifieds Group, Adevinta becomes the largest online classifieds company globally, with a unique portfolio of leading marketplace brands.
“This deal is a testament to the growth and potential of the eBay Classifieds business,” said Alessandro Coppo, SVP and GM, eBay Classifieds Group.
As part of Schibsted, will acquire eBay Classifieds’ Danish business once the deal closes.', 'Martin Herbst, the former EBay Asia-Pacific GM, has been appointed CEO of leading Australia-based applicant tracking system (ATS) JobAdder.
Herbst (LinkedIn profile) replaces JobAdder’s outgoing founder and CEO, Brett Iredale, who is leaving the business to spend more time with his family.
“JobAdder is on an exciting growth trajectory and we are thrilled to announce the appointment of Martin Herbst as the new CEO,” Iredale wrote in a LinkedIn post.
As EBay’s Asia-Pacific GM, Herbst led Gumtree Australia’s push into automotive, overseeing its recent acquisition of the former Cox Automotive assets AutoTrader and CarsGuide.
JobAdder, which is 60% owned by recruitment giant Seek, was founded in 2007 and has since grown into a leading ATS in Australia.', 'eBay has banned the sale of certain pet medication citing its policy around potential cures for COVID-19.
The ban applies to products containing Ivermectin on all eBay sites, according to the announcement found on the eBay Australia board.
“Ivermectin is a medication that is commonly found in pet products that are used to treat parasite infestations,” eBay stated.
“Research has been released around the potential use of the drug as a treatment for COVID-19 in humans.”The US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) issued a letter in April warning not to use Ivermectin intended for animals as a treatment for COVID-19 in humans.
You can find eBay’s July 21st policy announcement on the eBay Australia Announcement Board.', '"With the acquisition of eBay Classifieds Group, Adevinta becomes the largest online classifieds company globally, with a unique portfolio of leading marketplace brands.
The management teams of Adevinta and eBay Classifieds Group have a shared set of strategic principles developed through a common history of acquiring and scaling generalist online classifieds platforms and successfully verticalizing them to create value.
"This deal is a testament to the growth and potential of the eBay Classifieds business," said Alessandro Coppo, SVP and GM, eBay Classifieds Group.
About eBay: eBay Inc. (Nasdaq: EBAY) is a global commerce leader including the Marketplace and Classifieds platforms.
About Adevinta: Adevinta is a global online classifieds specialist, operating digital marketplaces in 15 countries.', 'OSLO/LONDON (Reuters) - U.S. firm eBay Inc has agreed to sell its classified ads business to Norway’s Adevinta in a deal worth $9.2 billion, creating the world’s largest classifieds group, the companies said on Tuesday.
REUTERS/Fabrizio BenschUnder the deal, eBay will receive $2.5 billion in cash and 540 million shares of Adevinta, making it the largest shareholder with a 44% stake and 33.3% of the vote, they said.
“Adevinta becomes the largest online classifieds company globally, with a unique portfolio of leading marketplace brands,” Adevinta Chief Executive Rolv Erik Ryssdal said.
Schibsted said the deal meant its stake in Adevinta would fall to about 33% from 59%, but it would have 39.5% of votes.
As part of Adevinta deal, the U.S. firm agreed to sell Schibsted the Danish assets of eBay classifieds group for $330 million, reducing the cash consideration from Adevinta to about $2.17 billion.', 'eBay's VP of global payments, Alyssa Cutright, says that eBay could unlock as much as $2 billion in payments revenue by 2022.
eBay and PayPal's five-year operating agreement just ended, and the online marketplace is eyeing billions in new potential revenue by managing its payments in-house.
PayPal processed all of eBay's payments until 2018, when eBay started testing a small portion of its payments in-house, with processing partner Adyen.
"Payments is so foundational to a commerce experience," Alyssa Cutright, VP of global payments at eBay, told Business Insider.
Those tests allowed eBay to manage payments for over 42,000 sellers, and process $4.7 billion in volumes.']

title: ['Sellers Stuck in eBay Store Levels despite Changes - EcommerceBytes', 'eBay Payments Requires Power of Attorney, Bank Login Info - EcommerceBytes']
summary:
['eBay changed the benefits sellers receive with their eBay Store subscriptions, but it is not allowing sellers to change their Store level if they wish to adapt to the changes.
On July 15, eBay announced it was increasing monthly zero insertion fee listings for most sellers starting August 1st, and noted, "additional monthly zero insertion fee listings sellers will receive are determined by their eBay Store subscription levels."
We've seen other sellers ask if they too could be allowed to change their eBay Store level based on the changes coming to Store subscriptions on Saturday.
During a recent eBay weekly chat , a seller wrote the following:"Will eBay allow sellers to downgrade their store subscription without penalty?
Do you think eBay should allow sellers with annual subscriptions to downgrade their eBay Store based on changes to benefits rolling out August 1st?', 'Some eBay sellers questioned why they were asked to agree to give a third-party company Paywithmybank a limited "Power of Attorney" when registering for eBay Managed Payments.
The issue came up on July 8 on a thread on the eBay seller discussion boards devoted to Payments.
There was also concern expressed about how eBay would handle refunds, with one seller surmising eBay would reach into their bank account for the funds to refund a buyer.
But another seller pointed to a post where an eBay moderator provided the following explanation"Refunds are pulled from funds in "Available for payout."
If, after 21 days, we haven't recovered the full amount from your available for payout funds, the outstanding balance will be added to your invoice."']

title: ['eBay Finds: Tour de France toy-car collection - Cyclingnews', "Man accidentally finds, buys late dad's police car on Ebay - Fox News", 'Chevrolet Tracker Meets Airplane In This Street-Legal eBay Oddity - CarScoops', 'Mrs Hinch shows off her bargain eBay ‘baby essential buys’ for Ronnie and the most expensive is £7... - The Sun', 'Doting mum creates daughter’s dream bedroom using bargains from B&M, eBay and £1 light up unicorn from As... - The Sun']
summary:
["Image 1 of 4 Four toy Tour de France race directors' cars on eBay (Image credit: roadieman2004 / eBay) A closer look at race director Jacques Goddet’s 1966 Peugeot 404 (Image credit: roadieman2004 / eBay) Into the modern age with Jean-Marie Leblanc’s 2003 Alfa Romeo 166 and Christian Prudhomme’s 2006 Skoda Superb (Image credit: roadieman2004 / eBay) Tour de France race director Christian Prudhomme (right) – with five-time Tour winner Bernard Hinault – directs the action from his red Skoda on the final stage of the 2016 Tour de France (Image credit: Jeff Pachoud/AFP via Getty Images)We've found this 2006 collection of four Tour de France race directors' cars on eBay, which is sure to appeal to Tour aficionados young and old.
This collection of just four directors' cars nevertheless tells a large part of the Tour de France's story.
Cars and the Tour de France, of course, go hand in hand – much as many people wished they didn't.
It wasn't only reserved for special occasions like the Tour de France, either, as it was gratefully 'experienced' at the now-defunct Critérium International.
If you have any suggestions or leads, please send them to cyclingnews@cyclingnews.com with 'eBay Finds' in the subject line.", 'A retired policeman has a very special retired cop car to cruise around in after a chance discovery on the Internet.
Greg Barnett was browsing Ebay recently when he came across a 1978 Vauxhall VX90 painted like the patrol cars from his hometown of Durham, U.K., that looked very familiar.
Scrolling through the images, he noticed expense sheets for gas and oil with his father’s name and handwriting on them that were left in the car.
The last time I saw it was in 2008 or 2009,” Barnett told SWNS.
The man told him that he had purchased the non-running car some time ago from a government lot and that he had spent his time in lockdown restoring it to roadworthy condition.', 'If you love planes and Chevy Trackers, today’s your lucky day as someone has inexplicably combined the two.
Currently listed on eBay, this model is billed as a one-off that is part 1999 Chevrolet Tracker and part 2003 Cirrus SR22 airplane.
advertisement scroll to continueThe listing doesn’t say what powers the model, but it does mention a four-cylinder engine.
It’s likely the Tracker’s original 1.6- or 2.0-liter four-cylinder which had outputs 97 hp (72 kW / 98 PS) and 127 hp (95 kW / 129 PS), respectively.
While there’s no word on why this oddity was created, the seller says it’s great for advertising and taking to car shows.', "MRS Hinch has shared her bargain baby essentials that she picked up on eBay for as little as £2.
She added: “I would 100 per cent recommend (these) and use again as and when we have baby Hinch number 2.”Top of her list is a baby caddy costing less than £5 - and in grey of course.
They fit in the caddy and you can chuck them in the washing machine.”The most expensive item was a changing mat which set Sophie back a grand total of £7.
The grey mat has space for nappies, wipes, nappy sacks, as well as a change of baby clothes.
And Mrs Hinch's easy toilet roll hack will make you feel like you're staying in a luxury hotel.", "A CREATIVE mum revealed how she did up her little girl's bedroom as a surprise treat, creating an amazing space on a budget using budget buys from Argos, B&M and eBay.
4 The savvy mum proudly showed off the bedroom makeover on Facebook Credit: Extreme Couponing and Bargains UK group/FacebookTaking to the Facebook group Extreme Couponing and Bargains UK, the mum proudly showed off a video clip and collection of pictures of the finished bedroom.
4 The pink rug was an eBay buy for £16.99 Credit: Extreme Couponing and Bargains UK group/FacebookOther members of the group were quick to congratulate the woman on her savvy interior design skills.
Breaking down where she got each item from, the savvy mum explained she nabbed the pink pillow and colour-changing frame from Argos.
And this mum-to-be transformed a cluttered box room into a ‘dream nursery’ using B&M & IKEA bargains."]

We did not start out as the largest marketplace - eBay was many times our size.
It was only by focusing on supporting sellers and giving them the best tools we could invent that we were able to succeed and eventually surpass eBay.
Bezos will be joined by the CEOs of Google/Alphabet (Sundar Pichai), Facebook (Mark Zuckerberg), and Apple (Tim Cook) in testifying today before the House subcommittee as part of its "Online Platforms and Market Power" hearings.', 'Why did this happen?

title: ['EBay to leave Orchard campus in North San Jose, move employees ... - The Business Journals', "Dr. Anthony Fauci's baseball cards sold out in one day — now they are listed for as much as $9,995 on eBay - CNBC", 'eBay CEO’s early wins have yet to erase Wall Street’s doubts - ETRetail', 'Mum’s 99p eBay ‘trolley key’ hack means she never has to worry about having a £1 coin to do the weekly shop... - The Sun']
summary:
['', 'Throughout the Covid-19 crisis, White House coronavirus advisor Dr. Anthony Fauci has become a household name and the unofficial face of fighting the pandemic.
Fauci, 79, was announced as a "baseball superfan" and wore a Washington Nationals-themed face mask for the pitch.
A total of 51,512 cards were printed for $9.99 each, and the cards sold out in 24 hours, setting a record for the company.
Now, hundreds of people are already reselling individual Fauci cards on eBay.
And many more sellers have the cards available to purchase immediately for $150 to $500.', 'AdvtAdvtJoin the community of 2M+ industry professionals Subscribe to our newsletter to get latest insights & analysis.
Enter Email Download ETRetail App Get Realtime updatesSave your favourite articles Scan to download AppWhen Jamie Iannone last worked at eBay Inc. in 2009, its then-smaller rival Amazon.com Inc . was struggling to survive the Great Recession.
Walmart Inc., a latecomer to e-commerce, is expected to supplant eBay as America’s No.
Iannone wants to use technology to improve the shopping experience and restore eBay to its former glory.
Its growth is slow and steady, and the core business survives even after selling off valuable pieces including PayPal, StubHub and classifieds.', "WE’VE all been stood at the supermarket fumbling around in our bags and pockets, looking for a £1 coin for the trolley.
While you can occasionally get away with shoving everything in a basket, sometimes you need a trolley for the big shop.
She shared a link to 'trolley release tokens' from eBay, which cost just 99p each.
She wrote: “Got these trolley keys from eBay 99p for two when I got them.
And mums are raving about B&M’s side table which looks just like Ikea’s version – but for half the price."]

title: ['eBay Finds: Geraint Thomas Team Ineos Castelli Sanremo 4.0 ... - Cyclingnews', 'eBay and Pro Football Hall of Famer Emmitt Smith Launch PROVA ... - PR Newswire', 'Marketplace melee: Amazon vs eBay vs Shopify – who won in the ... - Retail Week', "'Rare' 50p coin sells for £200 on eBay - and there are 210,000 more out there - The Mirror"]
summary:
["Image 1 of 4 A Team Ineos edition Castelli Sanremo 4.0 Speed Suit that was intended for Geraint Thomas (Image credit: wolverine_cycles / eBay) A size medium for Thomas, and a concealed pocket for his race radio (Image credit: wolverine_cycles / eBay) The Castelli Speed Suit proudly displays the Welsh flag alongside Thomas’ name (Image credit: wolverine_cycles / eBay) The tag’s still on, but you probably won’t want to exchange it (Image credit: wolverine_cycles / eBay)We've found this Team Ineos team-issue Castelli Sanremo 4.0 Speed Suit for sale on eBay, which was once destined for none other than 2018 Tour de France winner Geraint Thomas, as his name and the Welsh flag printed on it testify.
Thomas is the current British time trial champion, and so wears a white skinsuit with red and blue bands for individual time trials.
But for road stages, when he's feeling particularly fast – or wants to be – he'll reach for his Castelli Sanremo 4.0 Speed Suit, like the one pictured here.
Of course, Team Ineos are about to don changed colours for this year's Tour de France, when they become the Ineos Grenadiers to promote their main sponsor's new 4x4 vehicle, but this item has to be a consideration for any serious Team Ineos and/or Geraint Thomas fans out there.
If you have any suggestions or leads, please send them to cyclingnews@cyclingnews.com with 'eBay Finds' in the subject line.", '"By partnering with PROVA Group, eBay is taking collector confidence to a whole new level by ensuring the value and historical information associated with each PROVA-tagged collectible is legit," said Smith.
How PROVA Group authentication worksWhen purchasing a signed jersey or game-used football for their collection, fans want to trust that the item is as expected.
Scan it - After tagging, PROVA Group scans the SmarTag to have associated authentication data stored securely in the cloud.
About PROVA Group, Inc.PROVA Group, Inc. was founded by NFL legend and Pro Football Hall of Famer, Emmitt Smith, a man with first-hand experience with the effects of fraud in the collectibles marketplace.
Connect with PROVA Group, Inc. at www.provagroup.com .', 'And who better to take advantage of rapidly shifting demand towards online than the three titans of ecommerce Amazon, eBay and Shopify?
The biggest name in online retail, Amazon, had no intentions of allowing a “highly unusual quarter” to dampen its long-term growth prospects.
Although growing from a smaller base than eBay and Amazon, a 119% growth rate has led to Shopify outgrowing its closest competitor, eBay.
The etailer’s results also showed that third-party sales increases outpaced those of first-party vendors – presenting opportunities to rival its marketplace competitors.
Retailers will need to become platform-agnostic and look at what benefits a presence on Amazon, eBay and other marketplaces could give them while consumer uncertainty remains rife.', 'That is compared with 22.7million Royal Arms 50p coins minted in 2008 and 7.5million produced with a Girl guiding design in 2010.
According to the Royal Mint, around one in every 300 households in the UK could own a Kew Gardens 50p.
Eventually, the 50p coin sold for 400 times its face value, making the seller a tidy profit.
But even though they never entered into circulation, Kew Gardens 50p coins stamped with the year "2019" have been known to fetch up to £74 on eBay.
See our guide on rare 50p coins and valuable money, here.']

title: ["eBay Find of the Day: 1984 Renault Rodeo, a very '80s take on the European beach car - Autoblog"]
summary:
["One that we didn't know much about is the Renault Rodeo, which we discovered in this eBay listing.
For reference, the Mehari was a very similar open, plastic-bodied beach car, but the Citroen was clearly the more popular car.
Evidence of that comes from the fact Citroen even created a modern, electric version called the e-Mehari a few years ago.
And like any good beach car, it has a bare cabin with no carpet or mudflaps for easy cleaning.
Either way, this seems like it's probably super fun to tool around in, especially at a beach house."]

title: ['eBay Sellers Say Their Listings Are Mysteriously Changing - EcommerceBytes', 'eBay Is Giving Sneakerheads the Chance to Buy Kicks Inspired by P.J. Tucker’s Collection - Yahoo Life', 'eBay Teams Up With NBA Star P.J. Tucker For Sneaker Loft - Apparel News', 'Rare Johnson’s dictionary 50p coin sells on eBay for £2,800 – here’s how to spot one... - The Sun', 'Coles Little Treehouse books on eBay for $250 - Yahoo Lifestyle Australia']
summary:
['Reports are beginning to come in from sellers who say eBay is changing their listings.
And a third seller said when they edited their listings, the changes weren't sticking.
I checked the sale details and found the item sold at $7.50.
Has anyone else reported price changes without authorization?"
Sellers, please let us know if you're seeing any strange changes to your listings to add to these anecdotal reports.', 'Tucker and eBay have teamed up to give a glimpse at the baller’s sneaker loft and hear about how he built his collection using the online marketplace.
Additionally, eBay will give sneakerheads will have the opportunity to shop looks inspired by what Tucker owns.
“I started using eBay in junior high school to search for sneakers and I’ve been on it almost every day since — I love the thrill of the search,” Tucker said in a statement.
Some of the sneakers include the Ben & Jerry’s x Nike SB Dunk Low “Chunky Dunky,” original Air Jordan 1s from 1985, the Kaws x Air Jordan 4, the Air Jordan 11 “Concord” and several others.
However, in his search, he found a shoe that has eluded him for years: an original Air Jordan 1 “Metallic Silver” from 1985.', 'RETAIL eBay Teams Up With NBA Star P.J.
On Aug. 3, it announced Sneaker Loft, an e-pop-up shop that it produced with P.J.
Tucker, who plays for Houston Rockets NBA team, and is celebrated for being a king of sneaker collecting.
The Sneaker Loft will run until Aug. 10 and will feature Tucker talking in a video on his perspectives on all things sneaker.
Tucker epitomizes that passion; we couldn’t miss the opportunity to share with fans an inside-look at his new Sneaker Loft and share this perspective with other collectors on the marketplace,” he said.', 'A RARE Samuel Johnson's dictionary 50p coin has sold on eBay for £2,800 - more than 5,000 times face value.
The 50p coin was listed as "extremely rare" but some experts reckon it might not be as uncommon as the seller makes out.
A rare Battle of Hastings 50p coin sold for £63,000 last month, while an Olympic swimmer error coin fetched £10,100 online.
Coin Hunter has a new tool that reveals how much your rare 50p coin is really worth on eBay.
We've put together a roundup of the rarest and most valuable 50p coins so that you can check your change.', "Coles has once again sent shoppers into a frenzy with the release of yet another instalment in their ‘Little Shop’ series, the Little Treehouse books.
A 'complete set' of Coles Little Treehouse books is on sale for $250 on eBay.
If you’re willing to part with a couple of hundred bucks over on eBay, an (almost) full set of brand new Little Treehouse books — plus the $5 collector’s case — could be yours.
Over on Facebook Marketplace, prices are a little easier on the wallet with unopened Little Treehouse books on sale for $3 each or $84 for all 28.
Story continuesWhen the Little Treehouse books launched last week, Coles was clearly keen to turn a new leaf following earlier backlash over their plastic Little Shop collectables which were widely criticised for adding to plastic pollution and waste."]

title: ['eBay and LendingPoint Team Up to Provide Seller Financing to ... - PR Newswire', 'eBay Finds: 2007 Liquigas team Cannondale Six13 time trial frame - Cyclingnews', 'Mint 1992 Geo Storm GSi With Just 38k Miles Listed For Sale On eBay - GM Authority']

The program with LendingPoint will enable critical funding opportunities for eBay sellers, especially during this time of economic uncertainty."
"We are thrilled to be able to use the data and technology we have built into our platform to help eBay sellers achieve their dreams.
eBay sellers who work with LendingPoint in the pilot program can obtain quick decisions and access to installment loans.
In the future, through this partnership, eBay and LendingPoint aim to expand their offering to provide eBay sellers with more tools to help run their businesses.', "The seller has posted a picture from a magazine of popular Italian rider – albeit now retired – Filippo 'Pippo' Pozzato on such a frame during the prologue of the 2007 Tour de France in London in their listing.
A 2007 Liquigas team-issue Cannondale Six13 time trial bike – like the frame for sale here on eBay – ready for the off ahead of stage 5 of the Tour de Romandie (Image credit: Tim de Waele / Getty Images)Liquigas became Liquigas-Cannondale in 2011, and then Cannondale Pro Cycling in 2013.
For 2015, it merged with Jonathan Vaughters' US Garmin team to become Cannondale-Garmin, and has since morphed into EF Pro Cycling – a team that still rides on Cannondale bikes, keeping the legacy alive from those Italian Liquigas days.

title: ['Rare Olympic swimming 50p sells for £410 on eBay – could you have one in your change?... - The Sun']
summary:
["A RARE Olympic 50p coin has sold on eBay for a whopping £410 - or 820 times its original value.
Nobody knows exactly how many of the error coins, which were minted in 2011, were mistakenly made.
And whatever you do, don't be tempted to splash your cash without evidence from the Mint confirming that it's a genuine error.
In comparison, we spotted regular 50p Olympic swimmers coins - so without the error - selling for anywhere between £1.50 and £10 on eBay.
You may also want to check your change for a rare Peter Rabbit 50p coin after one sold for £621 on eBay."]

title: ['Beric Alleyne of eBay is a 40 Under 40 honoree for 2020 - Silicon ... - The Business Journals', 'Low-Mileage Pontiac Solstice GXP Coupe for Sale - Rare eBay Find - Road & Track', 'The new Micro Machines are pretty tough to find right now - Autoblog']

It's a manual GXP Coupe with low miles in perfect condition, for sale on eBay right now.
The GXP Coupe is the rarest and most desirable version of the Solstice.

title: ['Long-Time Dealer Joe Davis in eBay Spotlight - Sports Collectors Daily', 'Genuine Barn Find 1967 Pontiac GTO Fails To Sell On eBay - Yahoo', 'eBay Finds: Retro Diadora SA 210 Power Drive clipless pedals - Cyclingnews']
summary:

However, this 1967 Pontiac GTO recently posted on eBay apparently is a real barn find.
The eBay listing says this Pontiac was sitting in a barn for 25 years.
That’s a long time but maybe it wasn’t long enough for it to have enough barn find street cred.
See our comprehensive vehicle overview for the 1967 Pontiac GTO including production numbers, performance specs, factory colors, and OEM brochures.', "We're putting these pedals' manufacturing date around the early 1990s, and the £160 price tag still visible on the box made them – and would still make them – a premium product.
The pedals seem to be made from a chunk of aluminium, as do the cleats, which certainly wouldn't make them anywhere close to as light as today's plastic and carbon pedals.
Will they ever try pedals again, though?

I spoke with eBay customer service and was escalated to the managed payments team.
The managed payments team directed me to my orders section where there is a new option in the drop down called "refund".
Like so many things with eBay, I have no problem with managed payments in principle.', "The team became Helvetia-La Suisse in 1989, when Bauer won Swiss one-day race Züri-Metzgete – which would have been popular with his Swiss employers – and the prologue time trial at the Critérium du Dauphiné.

title: ['Activist investor Starboard slashes eBay holding in second quarter ... - Reuters', 'People Are Already Selling iPads on eBay With Fortnite Installed at Insane Prices - Wccftech', "Michael Jordan's '96 Mercedes from The Last Dance listed on eBay could fetch ₹75 lakh - Republic World", 'Second hand iPad 7 with Fortnite pre-installed on eBay for $900 - TweakTown', 'Mum creates awesome mirrored staircase during lockdown using eBay bargains - The Mirror']
summary:
["REUTERS/Fabrizio Bensch/File PhotoBOSTON (Reuters) - Starboard Value said on Friday that it sold nearly three quarters of its stake in eBay Inc EBAY.O during the second quarter when the activist investment firm also ended its proxy fight at the ecommerce company.
At the end of June, Starboard owned 2,090,000 eBay shares, down 73% from the 7,920,000 it owned at the end of the first quarter, according to a regulatory filing the firm made on Friday.
This year’s proxy contest was the second time Starboard had pressured eBay since having won the right to help fill one seat on eBay’s board in early 2019.
Starboard ended its proxy contest at Commvault in June when the two sides agreed to add three newcomers to the company's board.
Starboard launched three campaigns in the first half of 2020 and won 17 board seats during that time, the most of any activist investment firm, data from investment bank Lazard showed.", 'Shortly after Apple removed Fortnite from the App Store, it didn’t take long for iPad owners to put up their devices for sale on eBay.
However, they aren’t abandoning their slates just because Apple removed the game from the App Store, quite the contrary.
These iPads actually have Fortnite installed, which is why they are being sold at ludicrously high prices.
One iPad 7 Owner Has Put the Tablet for Sale With a Whopping $900 Asking PriceOne eBay user alemccra7 has put up the iPad 7 for sale for an unbelievable $900.
It has Fortnite installed on it.', "While Michael Jordan's The Last Dance chronicled his illustrious NBA career with the Chicago Bulls, fans also caught a glimpse of the legend's extensive car collection.
The powertrain of Jordan's car was not modified by Lornser, was came along with the body kit.
Also read | Michael Jordan's security guard John Wozniak reveals incredible stories in The Last Dance: Michael Jordan documentaryEver since the release of Jordan's documentary in April, memorabilia related to the five-time NBA MVP has been selling for record prices.
Also read | Michael Jordan The Last Dance parent guide: Why is Michael Jordan-based docuseries rated TV-MA?
(Image source: Beverly Hills Car Club website)", 'It really went into a dark timeline for Apple, Google, Epic Games, and gamers across the world with a huge battle that culminated in Epic Games suing Apple to "end Apple's dominance over tech markets".
2VIEW GALLERY - 2 IMAGESFortnite was pulled from the App Store in retaliation, and then Google ripped the battle royale juggernaut from its own Play Store.
It all went down in a few hours time, blowing most people away -- and in the middle of it, some people are selling their older-gen iPad with Fortnite pre-installed for huge amounts of money second hand on eBay.
There's someone selling an iPad 7 with Fortnite pre-installed for $900 on eBay right now, which is pretty crazy considering that you can find the iPad 7 for well under $300 when it has been put on sale.
You can even buy a brand new 11-inch iPad Pro for less than this.', 'Samantha Bradley, 35, wanted to make a statement with her bare stairs, so when she spotted mirrored tiles on ebay, she knew they would be perfect.
"During the lockdown, I moved from a refuge back into the home I'd brought my three children up in.
I stumbled across the mirrored tiles on ebay as I love the 'bling’ look.
Image: LatestDeals.co.uk) LatestDeals.co.uk)“I bought the tiles off ebay, stuck these to some old laminate flooring and nailed them to the stairs.
Image: LatestDeals.co.uk) LatestDeals.co.uk)Image: LatestDeals.co.uk) LatestDeals.co.uk)Samantha is delighted with how her project turned out, and has impressed her neighbours with her fabulous staircase.']

title: ["Michael Jordan's Classic Mercedes-Benz Is Being Sold on eBay - Maxim - Maxim", "Michael Jordan's 1996 Mercedes-Benz S600 Lorinser for sale on eBay - Motor Authority", 'Renowned Artists Partner with eBay to Design Bandanas for ... - PR Newswire', 'iPhone pre-installed with Fortnite being sold at eBay for inflated prices - Republic World']
summary:
['Michael Jordan’s Classic Mercedes-Benz Is Being Sold on eBayMJ’s custom 1996 Benz even appears in “The Last Dance.”Forget game-worn jerseys and sneakers—you can now own Michael Jordan’s 1996 Mercedes-Benz S600 Lorinser, seen in The Last Dance.
The custom German coupe was one of the many exotic rides that appear in ESPN’s hit 10-part docuseries recounting the six-time NBA champ’s career.
Car and Driver reports that Lorinser, Mercedes’specialist German tuner, equipped the S600 with custom 18-inch monoblack chrome wheels, a widebody kit and dual exhaust.
Sylvester Stallone’s custom 2019 Cadillac Escalade Stretch Vehicle by Becker Automotive Design is currently on the market for $350,000.
Jordan’s Merc, however is set to be auctioned off by the Beverly Hills Car Club on eBay beginning August 13.', 'A Lorinser-modified 1996 Mercedes-Benz S600 coupe formerly owned by basketball legend Michael Jordan is for sale on eBay by Beverly Hills Car Club.
Jordan owned this car during the height of his career with the Chicago Bulls.
The C140-generation S-Class coupe (and its W140 sedan sibling) introduced smoother styling and more electronics.
A V-12 is expected to live on in the next-generation S-Class sedan, though not in AMG performance guise.
AMG bid farewell to its V-12 S-Class last year.', 'Meet Artists Band TogetherArtists Band Together is a coalition of like-minded citizen advocates dedicated to the principles of democracy.
That is why we are thrilled to be a part of the Artists Band Together initiative.
We are excited to stand with Mijente, Rise and other groups to ensure as many young people as possible use their voice this November!"
- DeJuana Thompson, Woke Vote Founder & Chief BelieverSales of the Artists Band Together artworks will benefit equally Rise, Mijente, and WokeVote.
In 2020, Woke Vote is leading voter registration and protection programs focused on Alabama, Michigan, North Carolina, Pennsylvania, and Wisconsin.', "So, some notorious eBay users are now looking to cash-in big by selling iPhones which come pre-installed with the game.
The iPhones which are pre-installed with Fortnite are now being sold on eBay at inflated prices ranging from $1300 to $10K.
There are numerous listings on the website selling Fortnite iPhones which can really drain someone's wallet.
It looks like eBay will be taking a similar harsh measure to stop people from selling Fortnite iPhones.

title: ['Hundreds of iPhones With Fortnite Installed Flood eBay - MacRumors', 'USPS delays threaten a key backbone of online sales for Amazon, eBay and more - CNBC', 'Man jailed for selling bootleg CDs on Amazon and eBay - Complete Music Update', 'iPhones with Fortnite installed listed on eBay - Sportskeeda', "MICHAEL JORDAN'S FORMER MERCEDES S600 is on auction on eBay and the price is already over $200k - Basketball Network"]
summary:
['Enterprising eBay sellers are hoping people who are desperate to play Fortnite will pay high prices for iPhones with the game installed, and there are currently hundreds of iPhone listings on eBay advertising the Fortnite app as a purchase perk.
Unsurprisingly, few of the iPhones priced at thousands of dollars have bids, as most people don't appear that desperate to play Fortnite on a mobile device at this time.
There's one ‌iPhone‌ 8 with Fortnite installed that has two bids over $4,000, but those are most likely fake bids.
Given the myriad other ways to play Fortnite, most of these eBay sellers likely won't see purchases.
In response to Epic's second lawsuit, Apple said that it has no plans to "make an exception" for ‌Epic Games‌.', 'Postal Service persist.
Still, the Postal Service is largely operating without delays for many Americans nationwide.
He estimates that the Postal Service manages more than 90% of his company's domestic package volume.
Calls to keep Postal Service prices affordable have garnered support from a growing number of e-commerce companies and retailers.
EBay's public policy team has also urged Congress to support a "strong and viable" Postal Service.', 'Man jailed for selling bootleg CDs on Amazon and eBayBy Chris Cooke | Published on Wednesday 19 August 2020In these crazy times in which we live, how about we report on a nice old fashioned slightly reassuring bootleg CD operation?
Although the bootleg CDs were being sold on Amazon and eBay.
Anyway, a man who led a bootleg CD operation selling counterfeit discs via Amazon and eBay has been handed an eighteen month prison sentence after being found guilty of criminal trademark infringement.
The BPI’s Content Protection Team first spotted the bootleg CD operation while monitoring music sales on the Amazon marketplace.
Welcoming the ruling, BPI Content Protection Investigator Chris Sheehan said: “Selling fake CDs is illegal.', "In the wake of Apple banning Epic Games' Fortnite from their App Store some have taken to listing their iPhones on eBay for thousands of dollars in order to cash in on players who want to play Fortnite on an iPhone.
Fortnite currently still works on any Apple product it's still installed on, and will continue to do so until Fortnite receives its next patch.
People Selling iPhone with Fortnite Installed for $10,000 on eBay!
Fortnite for iPhone won't last long either, as the game will stop working as soon as its other versions need to be updated.
Fortnite for iPhone will almost certainly be supported internally until Epic is able to have their product returned to Apple devices.", '']

This Cannondale CAAD12 is a great example of a bike that has been upgraded heavily and looked after properly.
Hunt’s 36 Carbon Wide wheelset is a brilliant choice for this bike, combining low weight for climbing with aero on the flats.
While it was designed as a road bike, it is equally at home on gravel roads, so if you want to add a little spice into your road rides, then this is an excellent bike to do just that.
This one comes with the excellent Sram Red 22 groupset and a Zipp 404 wheelset for a super speedy build.', '', 'One of those people is Chris Acock, from Portland, Dorset, who picked up an old dodgem off eBay for just £30 ($39) and has now transformed it into a fully-functioning mobility scooter.

You can find out all the latest Whites news by visiting our dedicated Leeds United homepage.', "Image 1 of 5 Some retro Adidas Eddy Merckx cycling shoes on eBay (Image credit: pb*bikes / eBay) The tongues boast Eddy Merckx’s face – just like a pair of Adidas Stan Smiths (Image credit: pb*bikes / eBay) Eddy Merckx in the yellow leader’s jersey – and Adidas cycling shoes – en route to his third Tour de France victory in 1971 (Image credit: Getty Images Sport) The shoes would suit a rider with smaller feet: they’re a UK size 6, or European size 39 1/3 (Image credit: pb*bikes / eBay) Those iconic three white stripes really stand out on the black leather (Image credit: pb*bikes / eBay)We'd like a pair of these: some retro Eddy Merckx Adidas cycling shoes from the 1960s or 1970s.
Whichever athleisure brand you prefer, there's little denying that, within cycling, Adidas was given the ideal shop window thanks to arguably the greatest ever cyclist, Eddy Merckx.
Adidas may never manufacture cycling shoes again (although we hope that they will), which makes these all the more valuable and sought-after.
See the Adidas Eddy Merckx shoes on eBay here (opens in new tab)The Portland, USA-based seller is looking for $156.52 (£120) for them, and will post anywhere, but you'll need to be quick, as time is ticking – although eBay items are sometimes relisted if they don't sell.
If you have any suggestions or leads, please send them to cyclingnews@cyclingnews.com with 'eBay Finds' in the subject line.", "Realising this, some have taken to eBay to sell their iPhones with Fortnite installed.

For me, it's worth the wait to find out, rather than spend thousands on eBay to play Fortnite now.", 'And in the wee hours of the morning, many of them can be found doing the same thing: scouring eBay and Etsy.
It may be surprising that the best vintage Gucci loafers are on Etsy, but thank me later.
“I have a pretty good collection of old clothes at this point,” he says.

In the wise words of Levine: “Be true to yourself and your style and look at what you’re buying,” he advises.', '', 'Engineer Chris Acock, 53, bought an old dodgem on eBay for £30, stripped it down and merged it with a mobility scooter.

An unique 50p coin has been flogged for a whopping £400 on eBay after the owner listed it with a 'printing error'.
The Girl Guide fifty pence piece came out in 2010 with a whopping 7.4million going into circulation, so the standard coin isn't really considered especially rare.
The coin's description reads: "Rare 50 Pence Coin - Girls Guidance 2010 - Royal Mint Error Coin."
According to coin experts at Change Checker, this specific style of 50p ranks 57th in a list of rarest 50p pieces.', "Sign up to our free email newsletter for daily roundups of the biggest headlines as well as all the latest breaking newsA 50p coin which was released just 10 years ago in 2010 has sold on eBay for £400 thanks to a printing error.
But the seller listed this coin with an unknown printing error - and it was sold for £400.
A normal version of the Girl Guide 50p can be picked up for around £4.
In 2018, a Girl Guide 50p was listed for £825 on eBay due to an apparent error - with the seller saying the stars had been misshapen in the printing process.
If you think you have a valuable coin, the best thing to do is ask the Royal Mint to check that it's genuine."]

title: ['Online sales of used goods on eBay up 30% during UK lockdown - The Guardian']
summary:
['Online sales of secondhand goods have boomed during the pandemic as the trend for “pre-loved” fashion and homewares took off while high street stores were closed.
Sales of used goods jumped 30% on trading site eBay between March and June this year leading to an overall 10% rise in the first half of 2020 compared with last year.
Sales of secondhand chairs, sofas and TVs shot up by 41%, 30% and 17% respectively on eBay during June and July compared with February and March.
Rival fashion resale site Depop said it has also seen record sales in the UK, US and Australia, signing up 20 new users a minute in July with traffic on its app tripling year on year.
Oxfam said that sales at its online shop were up 111% last week compared with the same week last year.']

title: ["I could prove I had been scammed but eBay wasn't on my side - The Guardian", 'eBay Issues New Mandate for Accepting Returns - EcommerceBytes', "Deals: eBay's New Coupon Takes 25% Off Select Brands Including ... - MacRumors"]
summary:
['I appear to have been scammed after I sold a £450 pair of trainers on eBay about a month ago to a “buyer” in the US.
They then opened a case against me, asking eBay to force me to refund them.
Despite me proving beyond all doubt that the item was sent in perfect condition, eBay gave me four days to provide the buyer with a prepaid returns label.
Again, I sent eBay the evidence that it was but, again, this was ignored.
The brutal truth is, in cases like this, eBay almost always sides with the buyer.', 'Beginning September 14, eBay will automate the returns and refunds processes for sellers actively enrolled in Managed Payments in order to "align the seller experience across the eBay platform."
Automation of returns and refunds saves sellers time, and enables them to process returns faster, eBay said.
Sellers are also discussing the new policy on a special board that only sellers enrolled in Managed Payments can view.
As always, for updates on managed payments, please visit the eBay Seller Center for payments.
Some sellers pointed out that eBay is providing just over 3-weeks' notice after having committed to providing sellers 60-days' notice for such changes.', "eBay this week is celebrating its 25th anniversary with a new coupon that takes 25 percent off 25 brands on the website from eligible sellers.
Brands include Apple, Beats, Dyson, Samsung, Case Mate, HP, and many more.
You can shop on eBay and use the coupon code PARTYFOR25 to get the 25 percent discount.
Some Apple devices with potential for the extra 25 percent savings include AirPods with Wireless Charging Case, Apple TV 4K, Apple Watch, Apple's various cable accessories, official iPhone cases, and more.
Just to reiterate, these Apple products are all being sold by third party resellers on eBay, and vary from new to used condition."]

So I meet all my requirements for the global shipping program and still the money was put on hold from my managed payments account.
