summary:
['', 'Because of the putter’s onset (where the shaft is behind the putter face, the opposite of “offset”).
An onset putter, like this one, is when the shaft of the club is behind the putter face.
(lukekerrdineen)My putting stroke, especially on a putt this short, is usually pretty close to zero, and that remained true initially with the One Stroke.
The Fatal FlawShafting the club through the toe of the putter had the effect of making the putter toe-balanced.
Unlike a face-balanced putter, where the face points to the sky, or a toe-hang putter, a toe balanced putter is when the toe points to the sky when you hold the putter at its balance point.', 'After almost five years with eBay , first as chief marketing officer for North America and then as vp and global CMO, Suzy Deering is leaving the ecommerce platform.
In a statement shared on LinkedIn, Deering called the decision to leave eBay “anything but easy,” but noted that the timing is right for her to pursue other opportunities.
“I made my decision now based on the accomplishments and overall strength of the brand and I’m excited to see eBay accelerate as the company heads into the next 25 years,” Deering wrote.', 'So, how do you buy eBay stocks to profit from the price moves?
eBay (Nasdaq: EBAY ) share price chart – 2019 – 2020Source: IGMarket pundits explaining the price hike have to consider the track record of tech stocks.
In the same way that eBay revolutionised e-commerce, so online brokers have simplified how you buy shares .
There they can buy eBay shares securely with the click of a button.
How do I buy eBay stock?', '// Ebay promotes Murray Lambell to general manager of its UK business// The move comes five months after the appointment of new global CEO Jamie IannoneEbay has promoted the head of its trading team, Murray Lambell, to general manager of its UK business as part of a management reshuffle.
Lambell succeeds Rob Hattrell, who took charge of Ebay Europe following the arrival of new global chief executive Jamie Iannone five months ago.
READ MORE:In his previous role as vice president of UK trading, Lambell was responsible for all of Ebay UK’s business-to-consumer and sales and operations activities.
Prior to the trading role, Lambell held senior positions in business strategy and loyalty and retention for Ebay Europe based in Switzerland.
“I am hugely energised by the opportunities and challenges that inevitably lie ahead, and look forward to steering Ebay UK through an exciting period of change and growth.”Hattrell added: “It is abundantly clear to me that Murray is the natural successor to lead the Ebay UK business.']

title: ['eBay Punishes Sellers for What Are Being Called Ghost Relists - EcommerceBytes']
summary:
['In August, some eBay sellers began reporting they were getting sales for items they didn't have in stock because they had sold the items on eBay years ago.
The apparent "glitch" is more serious than wasted time - eBay punishes sellers with an "out of stock" defect when they are forced to cancel a sale.
A search for "sold item relisted" on eBay's message board brought up three threads from August 2020 where sellers described the problem.
One example cited: "The defect was the direct result of an eBay site issue or an eBay program error."
An eBay seller raised another technical issue during last week's chat: "When I click on a sold item in Sellers Hub I get a vacation hold notice.']

title: ['An Elsa glitter Ooshie is on eBay for a cool $15,000 - Kidspot', 'Limited edition Elsa glitter Ooshie selling on eBay for $15,000 - 7NEWS', 'Aldi, Amazon Marketplace and eBay slammed for selling ‘dangerous’ baby sleeping bags... - The Sun', 'Super Mario 3D All-Stars Already Costs Over $100 on eBay - PCMag', 'The $2.7-Million Aston Martin Victor Has eBay Headlights - CarBuzz', 'The Best UK Charity Shops On Ebay - Bustle']
summary:
['', 'Woolworths released four rare glitter Ooshies - Elsa, Woody, Captain Marvel and the Mandalorian - and now they are in demand.
Would you pay $15,000 for this rare Ooshie?
Credit: eBayThose five-digit figures haven’t had any takers yet, but one glitter Ooshie selling for $5,000 had more than 35 people “watching” on Monday.
So, what’s the big deal with glitter Ooshies?
Coles has a rival promotion called Stikeez, which are little plastic figurines in the shape of food.', 'AMAZON and eBay have been slammed for selling "dangerous" sleeping bags that could cause tots to choke, suffocate or overheat.
Buttons on another sleeping bag sold by a third-party seller on AliExpress could be easily pulled off, posing a choking hazard.
Following the investigation, Amazon, AliExpress and eBay have removed all of the baby sleeping bags that failed its tests from their sites.
Last year, Sainsbury's and Argos recalled a baby sleeping bag over fears it could cause infants to overheat in the night.
We've put together a round up of the best baby sleeping bags of 2020.', "(Image: Nintendo)The excitement surrounding Nintendo's announcement of a classic Mario games collection last week was soon tempered by news it was a limited release.
Now the eBay scalpers are taking full advantage knowing demand is set to far outstrip supply.
Nintendo is releasing Super Mario 64 (N64), Super Mario Sunshine (GameCube), and Super Mario Galaxy (Wii) as a Super Mario 3D All-Stars collection for the Switch on Sept. 18.
You can find a few copies for around the $90, but there's many more that are north of $100.
This collection of Mario games would sell for years to come if Nintendo allowed it to.", 'A scan of eBay has revealed that you can buy the very same headlights used in this perfectly rare exotic for chump change, and it turns out that these lights will fit a large number of other models currently on the road.
The Victor, which sports a price tag of $2.7 million is beyond the reach of the overwhelming majority of human beings on this planet, but apparently its headlights will fit more accessible cars such as the Land Rover Defender, Mini Cooper, and Jeep Wrangler.
The lights are produced by Wipac, a premium automotive lighting company that builds LED exterior lights used in various models around the globe.', "The clothes in the campaign modelled by Cole will be available in Oxfam’s shops, but if you can’t get your hands on those – there are actually loads of charity shops online too.
Here are five charity shops on eBay, where you can give money to good causes while shopping sustainably.
Sense Sense, the charity aiming to help those with complex disabilities and people who are deafblind communicate, has a wonderful eBay shop perfect for clothes and collectables.
British Heart Foundation’s eBay shop is ideal for practical homeware items as well as some tech and jewellery.
Shop Clic Sargent hereRampworx Youth Villiage If sports are more your thing, check out Rampworx's eBay shop."]

title: ['Michael Thomas Rookie Card Picks, Hottest eBay Auctions - Sports Collectors Daily', 'Woolworths Ooshies on Ebay asking $50k – are they for real? - Yahoo News Australia', 'eBay Will Remove Feedback Resulting from Carrier Delays - EcommerceBytes', "People Are Already Flipping Travis Scott McDonald's Burgers on eBay - Exclaim!", 'eBay BrandVoice - Forbes', 'eBay Launches Authentication on All Watches Sold for $2000 or ... - PR Newswire']
summary:
['', 'A popular feature on the site has become Glitter Elsa from the Disney movie Frozen, which is one of four Disney glitter Ooshies that Woolworths said would make customers’ collections “extra special”.
“The glitter Ooshies aren’t rare.
There are equal amounts in circulation along with the 36 Disney+ Ooshies - made just for fun,” an employee wrote in response to several posts on Facebook.
“The Disney+ Ooshies are a Disney Collector’s item and we do not encourage resale of these items,” the spokesperson said.
Several change.org petitions have been established - one called “Woolworths - put a stop to plastic toy promotions” and another, “Woolworths: Stop Disney Ooshies release”.', 'eBay announced on August 31st it was extending its seller protections for performance issues related to shipping carrier delays through the end of September.
On September 8th, it clarified the announcement, adding the following three provisions to the original two:Cases closed without seller resolution defects related to items not received when valid tracking is uploaded.
Item not received Service Metrics will be removed when you upload valid tracking for your shipment.
Negative or Neutral feedback related to item not received claim and late shipment will be removedThe trick, it appears, is for sellers to upload tracking information – and to do so prior to the estimated delivery date.
You can read the full September 8th post on the eBay Announcement Board.', '', '', 'eBay launches “Authenticity Guarantee,” a new post-sale authentication service by independent experts for all watches sold for $2,000.
eBay’s Authenticity Guarantee provides an extra layer of trust and confidence for shoppers browsing the nearly eighty thousand new, pre-owned and vintage watches marked with the Authenticity Guarantee badge on eBay.com/LuxuryWatches.
"Leveraging a team of independent experts, eBay's Authenticity Guarantee checks all watches sold for $2,000 or more in detail, with a multi-point inspection.
Here's an inside-look at the new service:Incredible Selection of Authenticity Guarantee Badged Items: Shop with confidence by browsing luxury watches with the Authenticity Guarantee badge, which denotes the watch's eligibility.
eBay Luxury Watches By the NumberseBay sold over 2 million watches in 2019 with nearly 8 million watches sold over the past three years.']

title: ["eBay Finds: Replica of Luis Ocana's 1973 Tour de France-winning ... - Cyclingnews", 'OfferUp and letgo take on Facebook Marketplace, Craigslist and eBay - Komando', 'eBay Is Expanding Its Management of Payments to France, Italy and ... - PR Newswire', "Amazon, Aldi and eBay slammed for 'dangerous' sleeping bags for babies - Metro.co.uk"]
summary:
["Image 1 of 4 A replica of Luis Ocana's 1973 Tour de France-winning Motobecane-badged Gemini bike on eBay (Image credit: baykal1 / eBay) BIC's Luis Ocaña celebrates his 1973 Tour de France triumph at the Vélodrome de Vincennes in Paris on a bike virtually identical to the one on offer here on eBay (Image credit: Getty Images Sport) The restoration process has ensured that all the paint colours and components are correct (Image credit: baykal1 / eBay) It’s badged as a Motobecane, but underneath it’s a Gemini frame – just like Ocaña’s 1973 Tour bike (Image credit: baykal1 / eBay)Available on eBay here is an absolute beauty: a superb replica of Spanish superstar Luis Ocaña's 1973 Tour de France-winning bike, complete with Campagnolo Record groupset and a Motobecane paintjob covering a genuine Gemini frame.
We highly recommend the read – of course – but it also serves to show the determination of the Spanish rider to outpace the Belgian.
Read the detailed post here (opens in new tab) with a wealth of information about the restoration process and build, about Luis Ocaña's career, and about the Gemini bicycle brand.
We're constantly on the lookout for unique and rare cycling relics on eBay.
If you have any suggestions or leads, please send them to cyclingnews@cyclingnews.com with 'eBay Finds' in the subject line.", 'Have you ever heard of the popular online marketplace apps OfferUp and letgo?
Both OfferUp and letgo gave users the ability to buy and sell stuff, but each app worked a little differently.
After raising over a reported $120 million dollars to acquire competitor letgo, OfferUp announced plans to combine the marketplaces into one but did not mention specifics.
Previously letgo listings were limited to 30 days before expiring, but with OfferUp, listings never expire.
And unlike Facebook Marketplace, OfferUp doesn’t require loads of personal information in order to sell your stuff.', 'SAN JOSE, Calif., Sept. 9, 2020 /PRNewswire/ -- As part of modernizing its marketplace and creating a more streamlined experience for customers, eBay is expanding its management of payments to France, Italy and Spain in the first quarter of 2021.
"As we continue expanding and scaling our management of payments around the world, we're excited to add France, Italy and Spain to our growing roster of countries."
Google Pay will also be available on the eBay site and on the eBay Android App.
By managing payments, eBay is able to deliver a more streamlined experience through the entire purchase and post-order process.. By managing payments, eBay is able to deliver a more streamlined experience through the entire purchase and post-order process.
Buyer Protection: Eligible purchases made in the new payments experience are covered by local buyer protection programs, independent of payment method used.', '12 out of 15 baby sleeping bags failed safety checks (Picture: Amazon/eBay/Aldi)Amazon, Aldi, and eBay are among 12 brands that have failed safety tests for baby sleeping bags sold on their websites.
selected 15 sellers of baby sleeping bags – chosen from those that ranked top on search results.
The consumer watch group found that the sleeping bags sold could cause tots to choke, suffocate, or overheat.
In Aldi’s case, the sleeping bags had a zip that Which?
Following the investigation, Amazon, AliExpress, and eBay had removed all of the baby sleeping bags that failed tests from their sites.']

title: ["Elliott's Cohn steps off eBay board, two newcomers join - Reuters", 'EBay Executive Linked to Alleged Cyberstalk Is Kids Club CEO - Yahoo Finance', 'How Sofia Vergara, Walmart & eBay Are Coming to the Aid of Small Businesses - Yahoo Life']
summary:
['FILE PHOTO: The German headquarters of online marketplace eBay is pictured at Europarc Dreilinden business park south of Berlin in Kleinmachnow, Germany, August 6, 2019.
LinkedIn executive Mohak Shroff and Carol Hayles, a former chief financial officer at CIT Group, are joining the board, eBay said in a statement.
Ebay founder Pierre Omidyar will step back from board responsibilities and become a director emeritus.
His input was extremely helpful with eBay’s operating and portfolio reviews,” board Chairman Paul Pressler said.
It was a pleasure to serve on eBay’s Board for the past year and a half,” Cohn said in a statement.', '(Bloomberg) -- Former EBay Inc. communications chief Steven Wymer, who left the company last year after being linked to an alleged cyberstalking scheme, has a new job: chief executive officer of the Silicon Valley Boys & Girls Club.
Federal prosecutors allege former EBay employees James Baugh and David Harville led the elaborate campaign.
Other former EBay employees were also charged.
Story continuesFollowing the June indictment, EBay said it “terminated all involved employees, including the company’s former chief communications officer, in September 2019.” Wymer held the title and left EBay at that time.
(Updated with statement from Boys & Girls Club in fifth paragraph)For more articles like this, please visit us at bloomberg.comSubscribe now to stay ahead with the most trusted business news source.', 'Since the coronavirus took hold in the United States in the spring, small businesses have been bearing the brunt of the country’s economic woes.
A July study by LendingTree estimated that as many as 40% of small businesses in the nation’s largest cities were in danger of shutting down permanently without a return to normalcy soon.
Which is why actress Sofia Vergara and the microfinancing nonprofit Kiva are raising funds for those particular groups of business owners.
In the meantime, small businesses do have a few options to help them stay afloat.
And Mainvest, an investment platform launched in 2018, offers a Kickstarter-like crowdfunding service to established mom-and-pops, allowing small businesses to rally financial support from their local community.']

title: ['EBay founder Pierre Omidyar steps down from board - Fox Business', 'Pierre Omidyar, founder of eBay, steps down from its board - New York Post', 'Any Watch Priced $2,000 & Up On eBay Will Now Be Physically ... - aBlogtoWatch', 'Grimes Charity Art Drops eBay & Maccarone Gallery - HYPEBEAST', 'eBay Finds: Crédit Lyonnais Tour de France yellow jersey cuddly lion - Cyclingnews', 'Enterprise Greece Teams Up with eBay | GTP Headlines - GTP Headlines', 'Couple turn cheap caravan they bought on eBay into stunning home office for £800 - The Mirror']
summary:
['EBay Inc. founder Pierre Omidyar stepped down from the company’s board as part of a broader overhaul that also has Elliott Management Corp. partner Jesse Cohn leaving the board.
Mr. Cohn, one of billionaire Paul Singer’s top lieutenants at the activist hedge fund, joined eBay’s board last year as part of an agreement with Elliott.
As such, eBay said, he may attend board meetings or board committee meetings when invited by the board or the committee chairman.
The departures aren’t related to any disagreement with the company, eBay said.
HOW MEG WHITMAN TURNED EBAY INTO A MULTI-BILLION DOLLAR COMPANY“Their appointments will add significant experience and expertise at a critical time to support the technology-led reimagination of eBay,” said Paul Pressler, eBay’s board chairman.', 'EBay founder Pierre Omidyar has stepped down from the online auction platform’s board of directors, the company said.
The billionaire tech entrepreneur resigned from the board Tuesday alongside Jesse Cohn of Elliott Management, the activist investment firm that has pushed for changes at eBay in recent years, the company announced Thursday.
“Pierre invented eBay 25 years ago and has been instrumental in helping make the company what it is today,” eBay board chairman Paul Pressler said in a statement.
Elliott Management, where Cohn is an equity partner, had argued that those segments had “distracted” eBay from its core marketplace business.
Omidyar, 53, owns about 4.7 percent of eBay’s stock, tying him the company’s largest individual shareholder, Bloomberg data show.', 'eBay calls this new feature its Authenticity Guarantee service — and it adds a powerful weapon in eBay’s efforts to appeal to those buying and selling watches online.
eBay developed the program with decades-of-experience third-party professional watch service center that perform the physical inspections.
eBay’s Authenticity Guarantee doesn’t cost anything and only adds a modest amount of waiting time to when a buyer expects to receive their eBay watch purchase.
Upon a completed sale, the watch seller is instructed to ship the purchased watch to the third-party authenticator.
The eBay Authenticity Guarantee service is available only for buyers in the United States (for now) transacting on eBay.com (as opposed to local-country versions of eBay).', 'Earlier this summer, Grimes launched her first art exhibition titled “Selling Out” at Maccarone Los Angeles and Gallery Platform.
Originally appearing in a digital exhibition, the works represent a retrospective that spans the last 10 years of Grimes’ interests and imagination, spanning various forms of media like drawing, digital prints, photographs and video.
The three separate drops will feature new fashion designs and exclusive artworks, as well as a coloring book comprised of 16 original drawings by Grimes and an AI-generated poem.
Head to eBay to check out the first art drop from Grimes.
Elsewhere in art, Kenny Scharf has brought a series of new pop surrealist paintings to New York City’s Almine Rech gallery for an exhibition called “Dystopian Painting.”', "French eBay – eBay.fr – in particular looks as though it's the place to go for more lions, and they tend to be a little cheaper there, too.
At some point around 2010, Crédit Lyonnais apparently considered not using the lions anymore, but they eventually saw sense, and the cuddly toys – in French, the 'Lyon' of Lyonnais is pronounced the same as the French word for lion, which is lion – appear to be here to stay.
We have yet to find a 'full-sized' lion for sale – like those given out on the podium – but then, really, who's ever going to sell one of those?
Check out this rather expensive lion in a yellow jersey on eBay here (opens in new tab)We're constantly on the lookout for unique and rare cycling relics on eBay.
If you have any suggestions or leads, please send them to cyclingnews@cyclingnews.com with 'eBay Finds' in the subject line.", '— Main Menu — Home Industry Sectors » - Hospitality - Air Travel - Sea Tourism - - Ferries - Land Transportation - Travel Operators - Marketplace - Technology - MICE - Culture - - Top Archaeological Sites - Gastronomy - More… - - Brief News - - Tourism Education - - Niche Markets - - Laws, Regulations & Policy - - - Greek Laws - - Trade Associations – Gov – Org Covid-19 » - Timeline - Restart - Greek Hotels Reopening - Impact - Measures - Support - Guidance - Solidarity - The Day After - Local Actions - Τουρισμος Investments » - Investment News - Tenders People » - Interviews - Opinions - Business Talk - New faces - Recruitments - Women in Tourism - - 2021 – International Women’s Day - - 2018 – International Women’s Day Destinations » - Athens - Northern Greece Event News » - Events - - Sports - Calendar of events - Awards - - Greek Hospitality Awards - - Tourism Awards 2019 - Travel Exhibitions Specials - - ITB Berlin 2023 Special - - ITB Berlin 2019 Special - - ITB Berlin 2018 Special - - ITB Berlin 2017 Special - - 100% Hotel Show - - Philoxenia 2014 Special - - WTM London 2022 Special - - WTM London 2019 Special - - WTM London 2018 Special - - WTM London 2017 Special Ενημερωση gtp Network » - gtp.gr - GTP Careers in Tourism - Travel Offers - - in English - - in Greek - About gtp - gtp ebook', '"My teenage son wanted more space during the lockdown and decided that he liked my workshop that we'd already had insulated.
"My husband then decided to look at caravan options as they are already insulated and have electrics and plumbing," Clare said.
“We started looking through ebay and won a three berth caravan for £1,100."
“The total cost of the caravan was £1,900, and I absolutely love the workspace now it's so organised and compact.
“The caravan cost £1,100 and the decoration cost £800.']

title: ["EBay founder Pierre Omidyar's philanthropic investment group calls for a new version of capitalism - CNBC", 'Ultra Rare Baby Yoda Ooshie Has Landed On eBay And Currently Listed At $14,400 - LADbible', 'Mum creates Harry Potter bedroom for son using products from eBay ... - Belfast Live', "Woolworths Ultra Rare 'The Child' Disney+ Ooshie is for sale on eBay - 7NEWS"]
summary:
['The philanthropic investment group created by eBay's founder hopes to convince business leaders and policy makers that it's time to redefine capitalism.
Omidyar Network, founded by Pierre Omidyar, is issuing a blueprint that calls on investors to start taking a new and seemingly more progressive approach to understanding capitalism.
Omidyar's wife, Pam, co-founded the Omidyar Network.
Omidyar's group suggests that the economy should reject "any historical justifications for slavery or racism, as well as bigotry in all its forms."
Their third pillar, about counterweights to economic power, calls for pushback against monopolies and the strengthening of grassroots organizations and labor unions.', "Shoppers across Australia are keen to snap up every single one and the competition gets fierce when the supermarket giant releases rare and ultra rare Ooshies.
Credit: eBayGaze in horror as this Baby Yoda aka The Child Ooshie is currently fetching a price tag of more than $14,000.
That's unlike the $50,000 price tag that was given to the glittery Elsa Ooshie from Frozen.
Yes, someone actually reckons a little, plastic toy that you get for free when you spend $30 is worth a small deposit for a home.
A photo of the rumoured ultra rare Ooshies was recently shared on the Ooshies Buy/Swap/Sell Australia Facebook page.", 'Get our ultimate guide on things to do in Belfast with our What's On emailA mum-of-two transformed a bland room into a magical Harry Potter-themed bedroom for her son.
Her son Connor, eight, loves all things Harry Potter so she decided to get to work creating a magical bedroom just for him.
The bedroom comes complete with a Platform 9 3/4 feature wall, Patronus decorations and a wall-mounted broomstick for Quidditch.
"He decided quite quickly that he would like a Harry Potter bedroom so I started planning quite early for that.
“If you want to do something similar at home, check Primark, Amazon and eBay, which have a steady stream of magical memorabilia which translates perfectly into themed Harry Potter bedrooms.”', 'The first Ultra Rare Woolworths Disney+ Ooshie has been spotted for sale on eBay.
The retail giant has launched 100 each of the Ultra Rare Ooshies, and each one has its own official number.
For more Food related news and videos check out Food >>Now, just days after the release, a The Child Ooshie has popped up on eBay.
“Not to be confused with the normal green Yoda, this one is the baby and has felt/fur clothing.”The first Ultra Rare Ooshie is now selling on eBay.
Fans were sent into a frenzy when this first image of the Ultra Rare Ooshies was leaked a few weeks ago.']

title: ['Rare 1921 J.D. Adams crawler motor grader found on eBay - Equipment World', 'Auction for ultra rare Ooshie nears $100k - news.com.au']
summary:
['If you’ve got a special piece of vintage equipment or a model you’d like featured, email Don McLoud at DonMcLoud@randallreily.com.
Kelly Ronningen remembers when he was a young boy and his father came home with a horse-drawn road grader.
His father borrowed the grader from a neighbor to smooth out the driveway to the family farm.
“I said I’d never collect motor graders.” But one day when searching eBay he came across a motorized crawler model he couldn’t resist.
Adams 102 model had been used on a military base in Idaho and later maintained a municipal landing strip.', '']

title: ['Woolworths The Child’ Disney+ Ooshie hits $100k - Kidspot', "Post Office and eBay adopt 'safe spaces' portal for domestic abuse ... - Guernsey Press", 'Hair Raising Experience Prompts Seller to Quit eBay - EcommerceBytes', 'London 2012 Closing Ceremony bus up for sale on eBay - Insidethegames.biz', "PC Gamers Lose It after $700 Graphics Card Resells on eBay for $50k - eBaum's World", 'Famous Sydney Harbour Bridge Olympic Rings Up for Sale on EBay ... - SwimSwam']
summary:
['', 'The Post Office, eBay and the Ministry of Defence are among the first organisations to adopt an online portal offering support to victims of domestic abuse, according to developer Royal Mail Group.
“Online Safe Spaces” is a discreet portal – which can be installed on both internal and external company websites – providing support, advice and contact information to those at risk of or experience domestic abuse.
Royal Mail Group, which launched the portal, said it will now be installed on the official websites for eBay and Post Office – reaching a total audience of 32.1 million.
It will also feature on the internal website for the Ministry of Defence (MoD), where it can be accessed by their 200,000 employees, Royal Mail Group added.
The initiative was developed by senior legal adviser Charlie Ryan, as part of Royal Mail Group’s entry in the Financial Times “Innovative Lawyers – Global Legal Hackathon Challenge”.', "I tested and sold a set of hot rollers last month.
The case was opened as defective item, the reason being that the rollers didn't get 'hot enough to curl her hair'.
I don't know what happened in those three weeks, and I don't know what kind of hair she has, so being gullible and believing that right was right, I called eBay and was told that I had to take the return.
They didn't say the rollers didn't work, yet eBay had their back (after all, they had 4 feedback, against my 10,650 positive).
I don't sell enough any longer to make this worthwhile.", 'A bus used in the Closing Ceremony of the 2012 Olympic Games in London has been put up for sale on the auction site eBay for £2,000 ($2,600/€2,200).
Brand had been accompanied on his journey in the bus by an array of glamorous women as he rode to the centre of the Olympic Stadium while using a megaphone to sing.
Whoever buys the bus will need to do a lot of work on it to get it moving, however.
The London 2012 Closing Ceremony was billed as a celebration of British music and cost £20 million ($26 million/€22 million) to produce.
The Olympic Stadium was turned into a giant representation of the Union Flag, designed by artist Damien Hirst.', "It's true what they say: the bigger your, the bigger your desire is to have a really massive wiener.
Which is why so manyare having a really horrible day today not being able to buy the coveted Nvidia 3080 graphics card after it sold out everywhere in mere seconds.
The card, normally $700, was bought up instantly, mostly by people using bots to click the purchase button before mortals had a chance to get the things in their carts.
The cards are now selling for thousands of dollars on, with some listings going as high as $50,000.
The Nvidia 3080's main attraction is its 10GB of VRAM, a feature that any computer game would struggle to even use fully.", 'The iconic 35-ton set of steel Olympic Rings that adorned the Sydney Bridge during the 2000 Olympic Games are being listed for sale on EBay.
While the number of Olympic Rings paraphernalia produced for each Olympic Games is on scale of “millions,” not all rings are created equally.
These particular rings, which were attached to the Sydney Harbour Bridge, were among the most-photographed and recorded images of the Games, and rank among the most iconic sets of Olympic Rings in the history of the event.
But the current seller of the rings is hoping that nostalgia will at least triple that value to an interested seller.
After struggling to find a bidder in a private sale, hoping that they might go up in one of two new stadiums being built in Sydney, Stavropoulos has turned to the place he originally bought them: EBay.']

title: ['eBay Fees Calculator US - Currency Live']
summary:
["If you sell regularly on eBay you might choose to open an eBay store.
You'll pay a fee to eBay – usually either monthly or annually – and receive different benefits according to the subscription you've selected.
Each store level has a different number of free listings, and different costs for excess listings.
All stores get a certain number of zero insertion fee auction listings according to their subscription category.
For Basic store packages and above, you'll also get an allocation of free fixed price listings."]

title: ['Parents rage as Bluey PJs hit $1,000 on eBay - Courier Mail', 'Reader Seeks List of Brands that Target eBay Sellers - EcommerceBytes', 'EBay activates plan to shift more business to UPS and away from ... - The Washington Post', 'Selling online: how to clear your clutter on eBay and beyond - The Guardian']
summary:
['', 'Dear Ina,I was wondering if this topic ever came up or even answered.
I have been running into vero photo issues on eBay in the past and have changed my listing to try to comply.
When I called eBay, they reinstated me and removed the violation from the account (so they say).
Anyway, my question is, is there a free place that sellers make and add to a list of companies that enforce vero?
I do know eBay has a list but it is never updated even though they would be the most reputable way since they have all the knowledge.', 'Postal Service’s biggest customers, said it is shifting some of its business to private-sector rival United Parcel Service because of reliability issues with the agency.
The company said that by the end of September, eBay sellers will be able to print out discounted UPS shipping labels, at a cost up to 62 percent cheaper than typical UPS rates.
On Friday, a federal judge ordered the Postal Service to halt its operational changes, saying that DeJoy and President Trump are carrying out “a politically motivated attack” on mail delivery.
EBay had been watchful during the Postal Service’s tumultuous months.
Stay tuned for important developments in this area in the coming weeks.”AdvertisementAn eBay spokeswoman declined to comment when asked how many sellers would likely use UPS instead of the Postal Service.', 'Every so often eBay has “sell for £1 max” weekends, which can increase how much you get to keep considerably.
The problem is getting so bad that some sellers have stopped listing high-value items items on eBay – see below.
It is free to list items and you pay a 10% commission on the items you sell.
It is less hassle than selling items on eBay and you are not losing 13% of the sales price in fees.
Seller frustrated by eBay over figurine disputeOne seller who is seriously disillusioned after listing items on eBay is Melanie Easton, from Newport, south Wales.']

title: ['Frustrated gamers are battling Ebay resellers with fake $50000 bids ... - PC Gamer', 'PC Gamers Troll RTX 3080 Scalpers With Fake eBay Listings ... - PCMag UK', 'Millions in military gear vanishes — until eBay post unravels trooper’s plot, feds say - Raleigh News & Observer']
summary:
['', "If you’re desperate to buy Nvidia’s RTX 3080 card on eBay, get ready to encounter some hilarious and nasty trolling.
PC gamers have been circulating fake listings for the card on eBay to protest “scalpers” who bought up Nvidia's RTX 3080 inventory using automated bots during last Thursday’s launch.
The fake listings have been crowding out actual attempts by resellers to hawk the $699 RTX 3080 card for up to $2,000.
Annoyed PC gamers are also review-bombing actual reseller listings for the RTX 3080.
However, Nvidia is indicating it’ll have more units of the RTX 3080 Founders Edition this week.", '']

title: ['eBay Strikes Deal with UPS, Offering Sellers Discounted Shipping - Multichannel Merchant', 'The Nvidia RTX 3080 eBay Debacle Exposed a Scalper Bot Civil War - Gizmodo', '$10k and climbing: Bidding frenzy as Ooshies run out - Courier Mail']
summary:
['eBay has struck a deal with UPS to provide its sellers with discounted shipping, after telling them last month it was aware of service delays with primary carrier the U.S.
The major marketplace said the discounts would be available to all of its sellers by the end of September.
The offer is limited to sellers in the continental United States and also covers UPS Next Day Air Saver and UPS Next Day Air services.
eBay said sellers can access more than 85,000 UPS drop off locations, including UPS stores as well as Michaels and CVS locations, drop boxes and local merchants.
But a simple Google search reveals that USPS delivery delay complaints remain rampant.', 'Now RTX 3080 GPUs are being listed on eBay with bids that exceed $10,000.
They confirmed they did not place that winning $70,000 bid, but they claimed they modified the source code for a free eBay bidding bot and ran that code on 10 spoof accounts.
But we did pinpoint 616 unique usernames with linked feedback scores, or seller ratings, which tells buyers how many people have left reviews of that seller.
Among those 616 unique usernames, a little less than half of these unique bidders had a feedback score of under 10.
Hopefully, both Nvidia and eBay take additional steps to address this issue before the launch of the RTX 3090 and RTX 3070.', '']

title: ['What Happened to FedEx Ground on eBay? - EcommerceBytes']
summary:
['eBay acknowledged a glitch that makes it impossible for sellers to select FedEx Ground when printing shipping labels through its seller portal – and sellers say it’s a costly problem.
“First and most important,” mvls1 wrote, “the new version no longer includes the option to send our packages by FedEx Ground which was available on the previous label version.
“I have been sending feedback with every label I print every day on all our accounts, but still they have not added FedEx ground back as a shipping option,” mvls1 wrote.
During the Wednesday eBay chat session, another seller, gwzcomps, reported an issue with FedEx that they said had been a known issue for the past 4 years.
FedEx Home (which is the residential ground service) delivers 7 days a week in some areas.']

title: ['eBay Most Popular Resale Watch Is Rolex Datejust - HYPEBAE', 'eBay Finds: Campagnolo 1980 commemorative belt buckles - Cyclingnews', 'Brannigans crisps are being sold for £3 a pack on eBay after KP announced it was axing brand - Daily Mail']
summary:
['In the lead-up to the holiday season, eBay has revealed key shopping trends based on data from its watch marketplace.
According to North American sales from August 2019 to August 2020, the Rolex Datejust is the resale platform’s most popular luxury watch style, followed by the Omega Seamaster and the Patek Philippe Nautilus.
eBay also reveals the most expensive watches sold on the website over the past year — first place is the Panerai PAM 21 made with Rolex movements, priced at $125,000 USD.
The most expensive watch ever sold on the platform is the Patek Philippe Grand Complications, which was purchased for a whopping $535,499.99 USD.
In case you missed it, check out our expert’s guide to buying a vintage watch.', "Image 1 of 3 Three Campagnolo commemorative belt buckles from 1980 available on eBay (Image credit: levi-judi / eBay) Things don’t get much more limited edition than these belt buckles, with Tullio Campagnolo’s signature printed on the presentation box (Image credit: levi-judi / eBay) UAE Team Emirates' Tadej Pogacar won the 2020 Tour de France on a Campagnolo-equipped Colnago (Image credit: Bettini Photo)We've featured a few eBay Finds on these pages that are 'for the cyclist who has everything', and this set of three gold- and silver-plated Campagnolo belt buckles certainly fits into that bracket.
It was, however, Campagnolo's first Tour win since 2014, when Vincenzo Nibali – then with Astana – took the title in Paris.
Italian rider Tullio Campagnolo invented the quick-release lever for wheels while racing in freezing weather on the climb of the Croce d'Aune in 1927.
Have a closer look at the Campagnolo belt buckles here (opens in new tab)The buckles are apparently in mint condition, and come in their original presentation box, having never been used.
If you have any suggestions or leads, please send them to cyclingnews@cyclingnews.com with 'eBay Finds' in the subject line.", "Crisp fans are racing to get their hands on the final Brannigans crisps in circulation after KP axed the brand - with some selling online for up to £3 per pack.
Desperate fans are eyeing up one last taste of the snack, with many listing them for sale on online shopping sites like eBay.
One listing selling a five pack for £14.99 is attracting views despite the crisps reaching their sell-by date today.
The decision was announced earlier this week by Slough-based KP Snacks, which also produces nuts and top brands such as McCoy's, Hula Hoops and Space Raiders.
Brannigans crisps from KP, sadly killed off for good in mid 2020 due to declining sales."]

title: ['Cockroaches, porn and a bloody pig mask: How eBay harassed bloggers - CNN']
summary:
['Shocking headlines poured out of newsrooms in June when six former eBay (EBAY) employees and contractors were arrested (and a seventh was arrested in July) for sending a bloody pig mask and cockroaches to a Boston-area couple that operated the tiny publication EcommerceBytes.
‘Take her down’Although EcommerceBytes is a tiny a trade publication aimed at eBay sellers, Wenig hate-read it frequently.
Following Wenig’s “now is the time” tweet, Wymer texted Baugh, “I want her DONE.
The big mistakesIn addition to reenacting “Johnny Be Good” – sending $70 of unwanted pizzas, the cockroaches, the Craigslist ad and everything else – eBay’s security team decided to stalk the bloggers, the Times reported.
And the security team was placed on leave.']

title: ['eBay Launches Third-Annual ‘Vinyl Week’ With Rare Releases, Limited-Edition Merch - Rolling Stone']
summary:
['Another Record Store Day is in the books, but eBay is continuing the festivities — and the limited-edition drops — with their third-annual “Vinyl Week.”Running until October 4, Vinyl Week gives fans a chance to snag rare, trending, and obscure vinyl curated from Record Store Day-pledged stores, exclusively on eBay.com/VinylWeek.
We also spotted vinyl from The Beatles, Prince, Metallica, Johnny Cash, David Bowie and Wu-Tang Clan, to name just a few.
As with all items on eBay, you can choose to place a bid on the items or buy it outright using eBay’s “Buy It Now” feature.
TIDAL Hi-Fi is one of our picks for the best music streaming service online, and this is an exclusive Vinyl Week deal you’ll want to take advantage of.
If you’re looking for merch, eBay has also launched its MusiCares Charity Auction during Vinyl Week.']

title: ['eBay Celebrates Anniversary with "25 Kicks" Custom Sneaker ... - PR Newswire', 'Vashtie Kola, Aleali May and Leading Customizers Help eBay Celebrate 25 Years With Custom Sneaker Auction - Footwear News', 'eBay’s Success Lies In Success Of Its Sellers: Vidmay Naini, Country Manager, India, eBay - BW Businessworld', 'Batman #313 Rockets On eBay After Joker War Zone Tim Fox ... - Bleeding Cool News', 'Bond car used in Skyfall & Spectre is being flogged on eBay for £265,000... - The Sun']
summary:
['Today, the marketplace is celebrating its 25th anniversary by launching the 25 Kicks custom sneaker auction, presented by Vashtie Kola (Va$htie) and Aleali May -- two of the strongest voices in the sneaker culture -- and featuring designs by highly-respected shoe customizers, including Kickstradomis .
eBay launches ‘25 Kicks’ auction alongside some of the biggest names in the industry, releasing a collection of one-of-a-kind pairs inspired by 25 years of sneaker culture.
Each ‘25 Kicks’ shoe was designed by top customizers in the industry and the creations reflect fashion influences from camo and tie dye, to grunge and more.
A Signature Sneaker LineupIn addition to designs by Kickstradomis, this first-of-its-kind release features custom kicks by top customizers Cestlavic , Mache , DeJesus and Sierato .
Our portfolio of brands includes eBay Marketplace and eBay Classifieds Group, operating in 190 markets around the world.', 'To celebrate its 25th anniversary, eBay has launched an auction with 25 custom pairs of sneakers reimagined by some of the most respected names in footwear.
It also includes a silhouette given a pair of Nike Air Force 1s a new look from a trio of sneaker culture standouts: Vashtie Kola, Aleali May and Kickstradomis.
“Sneakers have a rich history on the marketplace, and 25 years of serving the community on eBay is amilestone worthy of a celebration,” eBay North America GM of sneakers Mark Flaa said in a statement.
Lastly, the Nike Air Force 1 reimagined by Kickstradomis, Kola and May is available in a men’s size 11.
“The opportunity to work with Kickstradomis alongside my girl Aleali May, and to be a part of a collection featuring some of the industry’s top customizers has been really exciting.', 'There is a diversity of sellers on eBay who is cashing in on the benefits of retail eCommerce export.
eBay INCBT is committed to fostering the culture of entrepreneurship in India and is working towards bringing India on the global e-commerce retail map.
The overall global e-commerce business ranges around $4 trillion (Global eCommerce sales numbers based on emarketer.com).
Moreover, considering the rapid rise in the number of internet users, evolving shoppers, and increase in the trust in purchases outside domestic e-commerce, retail e-commerce export is flourishing.
The festive season has officially begun and the sellers at eBay INCBT have amped up preparations in full swing.', '', "A BOND car is being sold on eBay for £265,000.
The special edition Land Rover Defender was driven by 007’s field agent Eve, played by Naomie Harris, in the 2012 film Skyfall.
The motors were used by villains from Spectre – the criminal organisation first headed by Blofeld in 1962 movie Dr No.
And when bosses needed a tenth vehicle, they adapted one that had already been used in Skyfall.
“This decision makes '797848' unique as the only Land Rover to have appeared in two consecutive Bond films."]

We spend our time digging through everything on eBay so you can focus on the best that BYU eBay has to offer.

Because it's October and we're heading into Christmas season, we're adding a little bit of Christmas flair with some of the items in version 3.0 of this series.", 'NATIONWIDE — Several major online retailers are reportedly pulling merchandise that references the Proud Boys, a group of self-proclaimed “western chauvinists” that the Southern Poverty Law Center has designated as a hate group.
The president has since told reporters, "I don't know who the Proud Boys are."
On Wednesday, numerous social media users pointed out that Proud Boys merchandise was available on Amazon.

According to a tweet from Sleeping Giants, Teespring has also removed any and all products that support the Proud Boys.', '', 'Sydney Harbour Bridge Olympic Rings put up for sale on eBay for second timeThe iconic 35-ton set of steel Olympic Rings that lit up the Sydney Harbour Bridge during the 2000 Games, which closed 20-years-ago today, have been put up for sale on auction site eBay.
"The power of the 2000 Olympics is undeniable with the fireworks from the Closing Ceremony erupting from the Olympic Rings mounted on the Sydney Harbour Bridge a strong memory for all, both for our country and the world.
The Bridge Rings were one of the iconic sights of Sydney 2000.
The Olympic Rings that adorned Sydney Harbour Bridge during the Games in 2000 are up for sale on eBay ©eBayMichael Payne, the former International Olympic Committee head of marketing, described how they came to fruition in his book, Olympic Turnaround: How the Olympic Games Stepped Back from the Brink of Extinction to Become the World's Best Known Brand.
Knight, I understand that you are considering applying the Olympic Rings to Sydney Harbour Bridge for the Games', said Samaranch, squinting at my handwriting, 'but are not sure if you need the IOC's approval.']

summary:
['A mum who was quoted £5,000 to replace her kitchen units took on the job herself and shelled out just £50 in the process.
She used products from Wilko and eBay to achieve the look.
"I saw an account who used materials from high street shop Wilko, so I messaged her for some hints and tips.
"I was quoted over £5,000 for new units but instead I spent £50 and transformed the kitchen myself.
“Using budget materials such as Wilko furniture paint and eBay cupboard handles gives the kitchen an expensive new look - and all for under £50.”', 'Namdeb on Friday confirmed completion of the sale of the mine to Sperrgebiet Diamond Mining (SDM) Proprietary, which is a subsidiary of the Lewcor Group.
While neither party confirmed the purchase price on Friday, the mine and its associated marine assets initially went on sale as a going concern in 2018.
Lewcor describes itself as a family business comprising mining, plant hire and civil engineering and other smaller operations.
According to Namdeb, it decided to sell the Elizabeth Bay Mine to a new owner that could continue to run the operation economically.
Mining operations originally commenced at the Elizabeth Bay in 1911 and was halted over the years for various reasons.']

The incident occurs as PC gamers everywhere have been trying to obtain the RTX 3080 and 3090 cards.

1 Cool Thing: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3080 Founder's Edition 1 Cool Thing: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3080 Founder's Edition", "Image 1 of 4 A signed Paolo Bettini 2008 world champion's jersey available on eBay (Image credit: lenferdunord / eBay) The jersey has been signed by 2006 and 2007 road race world champion Bettini (Image credit: lenferdunord / eBay) All the 2008 QuickStep-Innergetic team logos are present and correct on this very clean, simple jersey (Image credit: lenferdunord / eBay) QuickStep-Innergetic's Paolo Bettini chats with former world champion Oscar Freire (Rabobank) ahead of stage 1 of the 2008 Tour of California (Image credit: Getty Images Sport)Available here on eBay is a signed 2008 version of Paolo Bettini's road race world champion's jersey - arguably one of the best cycling jerseys a rider can aspire to win.

Once a seller reaches 100 sales, the fees will gradually increase.
A seller will pay a 50% charge for the second 100 sales, and 75% of fees for the third 100 sales.
Murray Lambell, Ebay’s UK general manager, said: “Britain is teeming with would-be entrepreneurs and businesspeople.
We’ve specifically designed this offer for first-time sellers and start-ups – partly to help the growing numbers of unemployed to set up their own businesses and start making money.”AdvertisementAndrew Goodacre, CEO of the British Independent Retailers Association, added: “We have been saying for months that more support is needed to help independent retailers survive this crisis.', 'The large group of "feral" youths have been causing havoc across the sleepy Worcestershire town of Malvern Link for the past several months.

Residents say the group was the same that had previously been banned from Malvern Link Station by police at the weekend.', 'New eBay scheme aims to help start-up businesses Digital Edition: New eBay scheme aims to help start-up businesses Ecommerce marketplace eBay has launched “Pay as you Grow”, a new scheme aimed at start-ups which removes any first-time sellers on the platform.

title: ['Former eBay workers plead guilty to cyberstalking campaign against ... - Reuters', 'Doting boyfriend becomes eBay hit for humorous ads selling girlfriend’s unwanted clothes-Viral News UK - Deadline News', 'ON YOUR SIDE: Tractor scam surfaces on Craigslist, Facebook Marketplace and eBay - KY3', 'Blast from the Past: eBay Auctions in September 1999 - EcommerceBytes', 'DIY fan gives hallway £250 Mrs Hinch-style makeover using eBay and Argos bargains - Daily Star']
summary:
['BOSTON (Reuters) - Two former eBay Inc workers pleaded guilty on Thursday to participating in an extensive cyberstalking campaign against a Massachusetts couple whose online newsletter was viewed by top executives as critical of the e-commerce company.
Popp, eBay’s former senior manager of global intelligence, and Zea, a contractor who worked as an intelligence analyst, pleaded guilty to conspiring to commit cyberstalking and conspiring to tamper with a witness.
Prosecutors said they also sent pornography in the couple’s name to neighbors and conducted covert surveillance, in a bid to terrorize the couple and deter them from criticizing eBay.
The executives included former Chief Executive Devin Wenig, who a person familiar with the matter has said is the “Executive 1” identified in court papers.
Three other former eBay employees are scheduled to plead guilty later this month.', 'A DOTING boyfriend has become an eBay hit for helping his girlfriend sell her unwanted clothes – with hilarious photographs showcasing off her items.
Luke, whose online alias is The Boyfriend Ebayer, posts a picture of himself holding up Louise’s items alongside humorous captions.
Luke’s account “theboyfriendebayer” now has over 1,400 followers and has social media users and has left shoppers in stitches.
Speaking today (THUR) Luke said: “The idea started when after a particularly expensive holiday, Lou asked me to list a load of bits on her eBay account for her.
Spoiler alert, he’s rubbish.”On Ebay Luke’s services have been rated five stars by various users across the E-commerce site.', '(KY3) - If you scroll on Craigslist, Facebook Marketplace or eBay, be aware of this scam.
A woman in Billings thought she found a great deal on a tractor, but it was a big lie.
“It was the kind of tractor he wanted.
If you found an item on Craigslist or Facebook Marketplace and the seller wants you to use the eBay Buyer Protection Program, use caution.
If you’re shopping on eBay check the seller’s history and feedback.', "In 1999, eBay only had auction listings.
In 1999, eBay only hadlistings.
It's also interesting to look at the auction listings eBay found noteworthy in 1999.
(And imagine if eBay held a free listing day for auctions today.)
eBay's free listing day event ran for 24 hours on September 9. eBay typically receives over 400,000 item listings daily.", 'Something went wrong, please try again later.

She told LatestDeals.co.uk : "The idea to transform the hallway had been on my mind a while.']

title: ['eBay Seller Concerned about Security of Banking Information - EcommerceBytes', '2 former eBay employees plead guilty in harassment scheme - KTVU FOX 2 San Francisco', 'Ooshie on eBay for $100K hugely undersold - news.com.au', 'Vintage Ford F-350 Motorhome Time Capsule for Sale on eBay - Road & Track']
summary:
['Dear Ina,I just spoke with managed payments team because my account cannot be verified (like everyone else lol).
Disturbingly the agent reassured me that last week eBay made it possible to see all of our banking information and account info that was previously blacked out for security reasons as promised.
The agent stated that their computer screens were being recorded to help track down bad agents that steal the information!
This is opposite of what eBay has assured us in the past about the safety and security of managed payments system.
The agent stated that it was necessary to help the onboarding of people to the program.', "articleTwo former eBay Inc. employees pleaded guilty Thursday to their roles in a campaign to terrorize a publisher and editor of an online newsletter critical of the company with a scheme that included live spiders and other disturbing deliveries sent to their home.
Stephanie Popp, former senior manager of global intelligence; and Veronica Zea, a former eBay contractor who worked as an intelligence analyst in eBay’s Global Intelligence Center, pleaded guilty to conspiracy to commit cyberstalking and conspiracy to tamper with witnesses.
They are among seven former eBay employees charged in the scheme that involved other anonymous deliveries sent to the couple's home, including a funeral wreath and a bloody pig Halloween mask.
The couple was targeted after their newsletter published an article about a lawsuit filed by eBay accusing Amazon of poaching its sellers, investigators said.
An email seeking comment were sent Friday to an attorney for Zea.", '', "Thinking about pulling off a big road trip before winter kicks in?
It's a 1977 Ford F-350 that was converted into a camper when new, and it's covered just over 24,000 miles since.
According to the seller, this F-350 motorhome was converted by a company called Country Campers in Eugene, Oregon, and has spent its entire life in the Pacific Northwest.
It has everything you need to live on the road: A toilet, a shower, a kitchen area, water storage, and sleeping space for six.
If cruising across the country in a slick vintage motorhome has always been a dream of yours, this might be your best opportunity to make it a reality."]

eBay bills itself as the originator of the sneaker-resale game and actively works to win over more resellers with its platform.
eBay just made another big move to help it dominate the multibillion-dollar sneaker-resale market.

The company made a big move to attract more sneaker sellers in December by eliminating North American seller fees for any sneaker sold at $100 or more.', 'eBay added voice control to its Android app, explaining that Google had approached it as a key partner for voice control, and stating it was one of the first ecommerce companies to integrate with Google for its voice capability.
To achieve this voice control access to our marketplace, we exposed entry points in our application to Google Assistant using an actions.xml file.
Google mapped voice queries based on the contents of our actions.xml.
