eBay Sneakers By the NumbersOn average, there are more than half a million sneaker listings on eBay each day.', "It's a number one spot no retailer wants: eBay gift cards were the brand most often requested by fraudsters during the first nine months of the year, followed by Google Play, Target and iTunes cards.
That news from the Federal Trade Commission (FTC) comes with an urgent reminder: Gift cards are for gifts, not for payments.
Key points to know:Don't ever make a payment or cover a supposed debt with a gift card.
About one in four people who complained about losing money to fraud said they had paid using a gift card or cards.
When eBay became a hot commodity for fraudsters this year, it knocked Google Play gift cards out of the top spot, the FTC says.", 'So when eBay (opens in new tab) and Guitar World sent him $1,000 to go guitar hunting on eBay, he embarked on a shopping spree – and then some.

On eBay, in November 2020, a Key Garden 50p coins sold for £850.", 'The head of eBay’s affiliate marketing program summarized changes the company made to the program in 2020 in a message to members.
Michael Lill, Director of eBay Partner Network (ePN), said despite the challenges of the pandemic, ePN had a busy and successful year.
In May, eBay cut loyalty affiliate rates to zero commissions.
Another change in 2020: eBay gave sellers an incentive for enrolling in the program – as of June 15, sellers enrolled in ePN receive commission-free sales when buyers purchase through the sellers’ affiliate link.
eBay described the benefits in a nutshell: “For US sellers signed up with the eBay Partner Network, you can earn a 100% final value fee credit when you bring a customer to eBay who buys one of your listings within 24 hours.']

title: ['Illegal elephant ivory for sale on eBay disguised as bone, study finds - The Telegraph', "Online auction selling tips for eBay, Delcampe and HipStamp - Linn's Stamp News"]
summary:
['Illegal elephant ivory described as bone is for sale on eBay, a study has found, as researchers say tech giants enable the trade.
Researchers at the University of Kent examined listings of netsuke, intricate sculptures historically worn as part of traditional Japanese clothing such as kimono.
eBay's policies ban ivory from all animals, as well as anything made from a species threatened or endangered, but the scientists said their findings suggested this was not being enforced well enough.
In four cases, the items were explicitly described as "ivory", "tusk", "walrus", or "whale" in the "primary material" section, and none of these listings were taken down.
A worldwide ban on the international trade of ivory came into effect in 1989.', 'Philatelic Foreword by Jay BigalkeIn the Aug. 17, 2020, Philatelic Foreword column, I posed a number of questions to Linn’s readers about selling and buying online at the websites of eBay, Delcampe and HipStamp.
This format provides readers a glimpse into what it was like to receive a bunch of interesting tips and more about online selling on these websites.
Success rateEach year I buy a few hundred lots from online vendors eBay, Delcampe, Hip Stamp and, occasionally, an auction house.
Vendors on Delcampe are notorious for adding PayPal fees that they do not mention in their terms.
Delcampe does not, and Delcampe vendors often include a shipping term that specifically denies their liability for lost shipments.']

title: ['Elephant ivory still being sold on eBay despite 12-year ban - CNN', 'Former police drugs expert sold equipment used to grow cannabis on eBay - Nottinghamshire Live', "In-House Leader for Twitter, eBay and StubHub Joins O'Melveny ... - Law.com", "Currys has a 'secret' clearance outlet on eBay and there's an extra 20% off selected items today - Daily Record", 'Winning on eBay the Perfect Part for These Young Entrepreneurs - E-Commerce Times', 'Is Feedback on eBay Really Still a Thing? - EcommerceBytes', 'Influencer puts up old & mouldy phone case for sale on eBay, receives $1,62,907 bid - Times Now']

In 2008, eBay announced it was introducing a global ban on the sale of ivory starting on January 1, 2009.
He said detecting illegal sales of ivory items can be difficult, as the word “ivory” can be used to describe a color.
But “companies like eBay have the resources and data” that could be mobilized to tackle the illegal wildlife trade, Roberts added.
“If eBay was effectively enforcing its policy… on ivory, these items would have been removed,” researchers said.', 'A former Nottinghamshire Police drugs expert who sold equipment on eBay which is commonly used for growing cannabis has been found guilty of gross misconduct.
Mr Petrovic said Mr Clarke was "quite well respected" and "very knowledgeable in the drugs field".
Mr Petrovic, who represented Mr Clarke, added: "There were issues in his private life that caused him stress and grief and worry.
Mr Clarke was a police officer for nearly 19 years and most of his career was spent at Nottinghamshire Police.
His last role was Force Drugs Expert in the Cannabis Dismantling Team, a position he held for the seven years.', 'A former legal department leader for Twitter Inc., eBay Inc. and StubHub Inc. has moved out of the in-house world to join O’Melveny & Myers as a partner.

He will work in the firm’s Washington, D.C., office while he awaits admission to the California state bar, according to a spokesman for O’Melveny.', "And, on certain items there's a further 20% discount applied at checkout, available today.

As well as clearance items that are outgoing models, the stock includes returns or items in full working order that can't be resold because of, for example, damaged packaging.
It's a great way to pick up a bargain, and while there's an extra 20% off some items it's definitely worth a browse.
Meanwhile on the main Currys PC World website there is an ongoing winter sale, with up to 40% off over 1000 products.", 'Becoming the sixth-largest eBay company in North America was not the plan; it was the side effect,” Zinker told the E-Commerce Times.
eBay Business BasicsDeciding to go into business on eBay.com instead of Amazon.com was another fortuitous decision that panned out well beyond expectations.
After selling on eBay competitively for almost 10 years, the CEO feels he knows every policy thoroughly that eBay has to offer.
The Perfect Part co-founders Adam Zinker (left) and Cory Zinker rest on inventory newly moved into a larger warehouse.
Although he does have great success on eBay, there are only a few sellers on eBay that are like The Perfect Part, he added.', 'A seller had written to the show asking why eBay's feedback team only gave canned responses when he asked to have certain feedback removed from his account.
To that extent, I want to make it clear that the team that is on the feedback team, they are doing their job 100%."
Burke responded by suggesting sellers look at negative feedback as an opportunity to evaluate their business and business processes.
Michaels said eBay data shows that occasionally getting a neutral or even negative feedback has really little impact on the seller's business.
Some marketplaces are eager to make their sellers look good, but on eBay, feedback is a different beast.', 'In other words, it is impossible to sell an old cover.
But when an influencer from Germany jokingly put up her mouldy phone case for sale on eBay, she was gobsmacked by the bids she received.
Bianca Classen, who is an influencer on YouTube with close to 6 million subscribers, was offered a whopping £1,20,000 (Rs 1.19 crore) for her old phone case.
Following the wild bid, Biance shared images of the phone case with her fans.
The 27-year-old went on to reveal that bidding for her old phone case kept going up for eight hours.']

title: ['Nottinghamshire Police officer sold drug-growing equipment on eBay - BBC', '"Don\'t buy sh*t of eBay": Corpse Husband warns fans about fake merchandise - Sportskeeda', 'CDM NY Puts “The Year 2020” For Sale On eBay As Its Holiday ... - PharmaLive', 'Seller Finds Fatal Flaw in New eBay Vacation Mode - EcommerceBytes']
summary:
['Steve Noonan, director of major investigations at the Independent Office for Police Conduct (IOPC), said: "For a police officer to sell such quantities of hydroponic equipment, knowing its potential for criminal use, was clearly inappropriate and a breach of professional standards and even more so in Stuart Clarke's case, given his specialist knowledge and the role he carried out in the anti drugs unit.', 'Corpse Husband on fake merchandiseCorpse Husband, in a recent stream, said that he would be doing a restock of the items in his store.
But, there will be a restock so just don't buy sh*t of eBay, even if it's real," he reminded his followers.
Before Corpse Husband got into Among Us, he was known for his horror story narrations on YouTube.
Corpse Husband mentioned that there were ten times more people on the website than the amount of merchandise.
The merchandise is going to be restocked and will be available on the Corpse Store soon.', 'CDM NY Puts “The Year 2020” For Sale On eBay As Its Holiday Card2020 was a challenging year in more ways than one, and many agencies acknowledged those hardships in holiday cards and video messages.
One agency took a slightly different approach: CDM New York actually created their own eBay page to auction off “The Year 2020” at a starting price of a single penny.
“They replied by asking, ‘Can’t we just sell 2020 on eBay?’ That was the easiest ‘yes’ I’ve ever said.”“That said,” Kristen Gengaro, President of CDM New York added, “getting the tone right was really challenging, and so important to us.
We needed to strike the right balance between humor and humility in both the copy and the ultimate cause.” The Product Description includes a pledge to donate all proceeds from the sale of 2020 to the front-line workers fighting the pandemic.
You can learn more about CDM New York here: www.cdmny.com', 'Dear Ina,eBay's new "time-away" that replaced "vacation" mode does not allow sellers to immediately shut down their stores or listings in case of an emergency.
eBay has, again, "fixed" something that was not broken going from vacation made to the new "time-away" which now only allows sellers to "schedule" time away and does not allow immediate shut-down due to emergency.
When we pressed harder to try and get this rep to file a complaint with his supervisor or an executive, he had no response.
Rep had no response to why this change was made in the middle of a pandemic and why Amazon, Etsy, Discogs, Shopify and Walmart all allow sellers to take immediate time-away in the event of an emergency.
We believe that this is an erroneous, unthought out policy implemented by an executive that has no idea what they're doing.']

title: ['I am hundreds out of pocket after an eBay dispute. What can I do? - This is Money']
summary:
['The buyer got eBay involved, who forced a full refund from my Paypal account.
I reported the buyer, but he is still active on eBay and also won a money claims judgment against the buyer in county court.
You initially sold three new Nintendo SNES mini consoles to a buyer on eBay for £328.54 with eBay taking a seller fee of £42.32 in January 2020.
You refused, sensing some sort of scam, and after many back and forth messages on eBay between the two of you, the buyer took his issue to eBay.
You asked eBay, who told you to send him a prepaid returns label and instructed him to return the items.']

title: ['Disguised as bones, sales of illegal ivory pieces rampant on eBay - CGTN', "Was Nancy Pelosi's Podium Listed on Ebay After Being Stolen from the Capitol? - International Business Times, Singapore Edition", 'EBay Says It Will Pull QAnon Merchandise From Its Site - Forbes', "Was Nancy Pelosi's lectern actually sold on eBay? - Mic"]
summary:
['The sale of illegal ivory pieces continues on the site of e-commerce giant eBay, despite a ban imposed by the company in 2008.
The ivory products on sale were analyzed for Schreger lines, a unique pattern only found on elephant tusk.
The study published in the journal Tropical Conservation Science also delved into eBay's efforts to remove ivory products listed for sale on its platform.
"Companies like eBay have the resources and data that could be mobilized to tackle the challenge of illegal wildlife trade," Roberts added.
The report prompted the company to announce a ban on the sale of wildlife products, including ivory pieces.', 'In the aftermath of the breach, an unknown eBay user reportedly listed the podium for the U.S. House of Representatives speaker, Nancy Pelosi, for auction on the online marketplace.
Trump Supporter Photographed Carrying the 'Podium'The listing was circulated across social media after a viral photo showed one of the rioters carrying off the lectern (not podium) of the House.
It is still unclear if the lectern was in fact sold on eBay, but we can confirm that the listing was legitimate.
An eBay spokesperson confirmed that any such listings of federal property were "being removed and ended."
The seller, basdvic1, is an eBay member since November 2012 and had received several positive reviews.', '', 'But perhaps the defining image of this leisurely, stupid, and largely uninhibited affair came from the grinning, waving man who waltzed out of the House floor with Speaker Nancy Pelosi’s lectern.
Perhaps as a furniture specialist, Johnson was just admiring the Congressional handiwork, or looking to turn a profit.
If the listing photo — a cropped image from Pelosi’s impeachment press conference in 2019 — is any suggestion, the post isn’t close to legitimate.
We’ve reached out to Speaker Pelosi’s office to see if Johnson or someone else at the Capitol actually succeeded in Florida man National Treasure, and will update this post if we hear back.
In any event, it’s another case study in how easily you can dupe a board full of Redditors during a coup.']

title: ['Low-Mileage 1988 Ford Bronco Listed on eBay at No Reserve - autoevolution', "Clothes 'smuggled' out of Yorkshire prisons for sale on Ebay - Yorkshire Live"]
summary:
['SUVThe 1988 model in the photo gallery is one of the finest examples from that year, particularly thanks to the low mileage.
Currently showing just 34,187 miles (55,019 kilometers), the red-and-whiteis offered at no reserve.Listed on eBay by terryss4541970, the four-wheel-drive XLT “has spent most of its life in the Northwest,” according to the seller.
No rust and no accidents also need to be mentioned, along with 30-inch Toyo A/T Open Country tires complemented by 15-inch wheels.
The same can be said about the headliner and carpets, but the driver’s seat does show a little wear and tear on the left bolster.Sitting at $9,700 after 16 bids, chassis number 1FMEU15N8JLA24160 still features the original smog pump and 302-cu in V8.
For the time being, this package is exclusively offered with the 10-speed auto.', "The latest Wakefield news and updates straight to your inboxPairs of trousers, a jumper and a jacket are among some of the Yorkshire prison clothes for sale on Ebay.
Prison issued clothes are handed back to the store for reuse upon an inmate's release.
However, some prisons have allowed inmates to leave in their prison issue clothes if they have nothing else to wear.
However, a quick search of Ebay uncovered several items – ostensibly made or worn in Yorkshire prisons – for sale.
HMP Wakefield officers' trousersYou can buy a pair of these pants with a label which says 'Made at HMP Wakefield' for £14.99."]

summary:

Another Fort Pierce restaurant bought the monolith, he said, though he could not remember which one.
Proceeds are benefitting Main Street Fort Pierce, a nonprofit that supports small businesses in the historic downtown area.
Pierced Ciderworks saw upwards of 5,000 people who came to admire the monolith, Nolli said, some traveling from Tallahassee, Tampa and Orlando; a handful wanted to do more than just take a picture, though.
Monolith sightingsThe Fort Pierce monolith was just one in a slew popping up across the United States and Europe in the last few months.', 'eBay Luxury Watch of the Week: The Breitling Cockpit B50 Night MissionStrap on “the ultimate pilot’s watch” that comes with eBay’s trustworthy Authenticity Guarantee.

title: ['eBay Holds Seller Funds in Another Apparent Payout Glitch - EcommerceBytes', "Police shut down 'eBay of the dark web' in Germany - The Times"]
summary:
['eBay is holding seller funds today in what appears to be another payout glitch.
"Quite a few people are posting that eBay managed payments payout is being declined this morning.
I myself am included, and it is a higher payout than usual," an EcommerceBytes reader reported on Ecommerce EKGOne seller glommed on to a thread from December 2nd when eBay had experienced a similar payout glitch.
"I am seeing one of these today where it says payout failed and eBay will retry," the seller wrote this morning.
Sellers are also reporting missing payouts today on industry discussion boards.', 'The gang had converted a former military bunker near Koblenz into a “cyberbunker” containing 400 computer serversThe largest illegal bazaar on the global dark web, likened to an eBay for criminals, has been shut down after its alleged mastermind was arrested in Germany.
Darkmarket had more than half a million users and 2,500 vendors exchanging illicit goods such as drugs, stolen credit card details, counterfeit money and hacking tools.
SponsoredIt was taken offline on Tuesday as the Australian man believed to be its ringleader — identified as Julian K, 34 — was caught while attempting to cross the border from Denmark.
More than 20 of its computer servers, based in Ukraine and Moldova, were also confiscated in an operation involving the German police, the FBI and Scotland Yard.
The website had existed on the “dark” section of the internet, accessible only']

title: ['Dealers to be given free advertising across eBay Motors Group in ... - Car Dealer Magazine', 'Clyde Edwards-Helaire Rookie Card Picks and Hottest Auctions on ... - Sports Collectors Daily', 'DC Future State Teen Titans Hits $15 on eBay, Swamp Thing $13 + ... - Bleeding Cool News', 'Bitcoin exchange owner who helped scam eBay buyers sentenced to 10 years in prison - Yahoo News Australia', "TikTok: Claudia Conway posts about selling father's belongings on ... - HITC - Football, Gaming, Movies, TV, Music"]
summary:
['Dealers currently with eBay Motors Group won’t be charged for advertising in February to support them during the new lockdowns.
Not only will vehicle listings across Gumtree Motors, eBay Motors and Motors.co.uk and its network be fee-free for the month, to help them keep their stock visible, they won’t be charged for ‘reasonable over-posting’ either.
‘This comes at substantial cost to our business and underlines our long-term commitment to being a key automotive industry partner.
‘We hope that these new ways of operating, coupled with our financial relief, will allow our dealer partners to build and maintain a strong pipeline over the weeks and months ahead.’The free advertising offer only applies to dealers who stay with eBay Motors Group until June 30.
It follows on the heels of similar support initiatives by Auto Trader, CarGurus and PistonHeads, with Heycar offering free delivery to dealers throughout February.', '', '', 'Rossen G. Iossifov, the Bitcoin Exchange owner who was accused of laundering money for a Romanian gang putting up fake car listings on eBay, has been sentenced to 10 years in prison.
The DOJ busted the Romanian fraudsters back in 2019, and 20 people were accused of RICO, wire fraud, identity theft and money laundering offenses.
Iossifov’s business, the Bulgaria-based RG Coins, was one of the two exchanges authorities identified for the money laundering part of the operation.
The DOJ says the gang posed as military looking to sell their cars on Craigslist and eBay before deployment.
The money laundering aspect of the operation was pretty complex.', '16 year-old Claudia Conway (daughter of Kellyanne and George Conway) has been featured in several headlines over the past year since creating her TikTok account.
Claudia has over 1.5 million followers on her account, where she posts updates, funny videos, and shares her political opinions, often speaking against her mother.
In a string of recent videos, Claudia claimed that her father, George Conway, had walked out on the family, and posted a TikTok stating that she would be selling his belongings on eBay.
Claudia tells TikTok her father left the familyOn 9th January, Claudia Conway shared a TikTok video, which she captioned: “My Dad dipping this morning saying he wants nothing to do with out family and leaving for good.”Someone in a comment said “Haven’t seen George in a while,” to which Claudia replied: “Yeah me neither lol.”The next day, Claudia shared a screenshot of an alleged text conversation with her father, showing that he ignored her messages.
In one of the texts she wrote: “You’ve been tweeting but you can’t respond to your daughter?”@claudiamconway Reply to @khanthebloomer it was bound to happen sooner or later ♬ F Boy – Ander Huang & KROMI View TikTokClaudia posts TikTok about selling George Conway’s clothes on eBayOn January 12th, Claudia posted a TikTok from the inside of what appears to be George Conway’s wardrobe.']

title: ['Ivory Is Still Sold on eBay, Even Though It’s Illegal - EcoWatch', "Ebay Sellers Are Flogging M&S' Valentine's Day Percy Pig Biscuits For Nearly Three Times The Price - Tyla", 'Shopper looks at waffle maker on eBay and is stunned by X-rated feature - Daily Star']
summary:
['New research found that elephant ivory is still being sold on the online marketplace eBay, despite a company ban in 2009.
Netsuke are often made of ivory, and the researchers found that authentic elephant ivory was most frequently — and misleadingly — described as bone in netsuke listings, the statement said.
The authors identified mislabeled ivory by looking for Schreger lines in netsuke listing images, Roberts told EcoWatch.
Schreger lines are a unique overlapping pattern found in elephant ivory.
“Illegal ivory trade is a major threat,” Somerville emphasized.', "M&S' Valentine's Day Percy Pig biscuits are being flogged on eBay for a whopping three times the price.
As part of Marks and Spencer's Valentine's Day range, the tasty Percys come in an adorable keepsake tin, which is adorned with Percy's smiling face and heart head boppers.
The biscuits are being sold on eBay for nearly three times the price (Credit: eBay)Advert 10The crumbly vanilla biscuits, £5, are sandwiched together with a strawberry Percy flavoured filling and they even feature the iconic pig's face.
The brand has also created - for the first time ever - a Valentine's Percy & Penny Flowers Gift Bag, which comes complete with tasty Percy Pig sweets.
M&S has also introduced cola bottle flavoured 'Love... Sausage Dogs' - a pawfect pack of sausage dog, cola flavoured sweets for just £2.", 'Now, an unnamed eBay buyer has explained that they were recently looking to buy a waffle maker.
They captioned the shot: "Was looking to buy a waffle maker, this is not what I expected."
They continued: "I was looking to buy a waffle maker and didn't want to buy new.
“I searched eBay and found this listing for 'Commercial Electric Waffle Maker'.
This willy waffle maker will set you back a whopping £300.']

title: ["'Stolen' Bust of Abraham Lincoln to End Up on eBay? Speculations After Trump Staffers Remove WH Artefact - International Business Times, Singapore Edition", "eBay Won't Remove Late Shipment Ding - EcommerceBytes", 'eBay seller refuses to accept bike auction offer – says "would be unhappy if I sold to Scouser" - road.cc', 'Police drugs expert sold kit often used to grow cannabis - Grantham Journal']
summary:
['Mystery surrounds over the removal of the coveted bronze bust of Abraham Lincoln from the West Wing of the White house by Trump staffers on Thursday.
However, what caught the internet's fancy was the removal of the bronze bust of former US President Abraham Lincoln.
This is not an estate sale or Antiques Roadshow, but yet you're seeing some White House staffers taking mementos with them as they go," he reported.
"Why is the bust of Abraham Lincoln being removed from the White House?
I was afraid that the Trump administration would steal items before the administration ends," said another user.', "I received a hit for Late Shipment on eBay.
For some odd reason, the tracking never showed up through eBay, but did show up through the Post Office tracking.
I received the following this afternoon:Hello (user name redacted),Thanks for contacting us about the late shipment rating you received for the following transaction:Transaction ID: (transaction number redacted)Item: (item number and listing title redacted)We've reviewed your request to remove the late shipment rating related to this transaction.
We cannot remove it in this instance, as it is an indicator of a less than positive buying experience.
So I have a defect on my account that is absolutely incorrect and they won't remove it.", 'An eBay shop refused to sell a bike to a man because he is from Liverpool.
Ray Watt made an offer of £1,000 for a Giant TCR Advanced Pro during the auction, but was then sent a message by the seller saying, "Hi sorry too low, and would be unhappy if I sold to Scouser."
The Liverpool Echo reports that Watt expected that the offer would be seen as too low, but that he had been willing to pay more.
I expected them to say we won't take that price but would take another price, maybe £1,200 or £1,300.
Someone from the shop appears to have replied to Watt on Twitter since the Echo article was published.', 'A police drugs expert sold kit commonly used for growing cannabis on eBay, despite the risk of it falling into the hands of organised criminal gangs or attic bedroom growers.
At a misconduct hearing last Tuesday, Nottinghamshire Police’s chief constable Craig Guildford determined that, given Clarke’s role, his behaviour was an embarrassment to the force.
In his role, Clarke acted as an expert witness in a significant number of cases involving drugs over many years — many of them high profile — and has others pending before crown court.
After considering the evidence, Ch Cons Guildford determined that, given Clarke’s role as a police drugs expert, his behaviour would cause embarrassment to the force and amounted to discreditable conduct.
“He has always been against the illegal use of drugs as he has witnessed their affects in his career.']

title: ['Were Empty PS5 Boxes Sold on eBay for Thousands of Dollars? - Snopes.com', 'Nine Primark items you can buy online from Amazon, eBay, ASOS during lockdown - Birmingham Live']
summary:
["Claim: At least four buyers on eBay paid thousands of dollars for empty PlayStation 5 boxes.
However, some people might be surprised to learn that eBay sellers were also listing empty PS5 boxes that were receiving bids for hundreds and even thousands of dollars.
It's true that the video showed a real eBay listing for an empty PS5 box with buyers who were bidding thousands of dollars.
In the past, the empty PS5 boxes on eBay became a topic of discussion on Reddit.
While some eBay listings for empty PS5 boxes have received bids for hundreds or thousands of dollars, we also have found quite a few listings that ended under $50.", 'But there are ways that you can still purchase Primark items online from Amazon and eBay - and it might satisfy your fix during lockdown.
Third-party sellers are always selling items from certain brands on these sites and you might come across the perfect item that you were looking for.
So here are nine Primark items you can buy during lockdown:Primark Disney Stitch throw or bed blanket(Image: Amazon)Perfect to keep warm during winter.
Primark vintage blazer(Image: ASOS)If you need a new work jacket then ASOS is selling a Primark-branded blazer that you can buy from £29.99.
There plenty more items on Amazon, eBay and more if you keep looking and eventually, you might come across the item you always wanted - and keep your Primark urge satiated.']

['', 'Listed on eBay with the auction set to expire on Tuesday evening, it’s a partially-done restomod project car someone could buy and finish.
At the moment it doesn’t have door panels or other trim pieces, so you’ll need to address that.
As you can see, the body has been painted orange, but different trim pieces aren’t installed, especially on the front end.
Anyone thinking of buy this project car should definitely get the lowdown on the drivetrain before placing a bid.
Like we said, the eBay auction for this 1969 Ford Mustang Fastback restomod ends Tuesday evening.', 'eBay Luxury Watch of the Week: OMEGA Seamaster Planet Ocean Blue Dial Steel AutomaticThis gorgeous blue-dialed dive watch comes with eBay’s trustworthy Authenticity Guarantee.

Distinguished by its signature brilliant blue dial, this 2020 OMEGA Seamaster Blue Dial Steel Ceramic Automatic Men’s Watch (model no.

title: ['One-Owner 1985 Subaru GL Turbo Wagon Listed on eBay at $7000 - autoevolution', 'My Totally Normal Addiction to Buying Teen Magazines on eBay ... - The New York Times', 'EBay Has Tapped Charis Márquez as Vice President of Fashion - WWD']
summary:
['4WDeBay seller mrdeezy found one such Leone in California, a 1985 model with the GL equipment group, four-wheel drive, and the turbocharged boxer engine option.
Every single bit and bob works, including the digital instrument cluster as well as the shift-on-the-flysystem.
Light surface rust is the only issue to speak of, which is understandable because Aptos is located right next to Monterey Bay.
The EA-82T, as Subaru calls it, develops in the ballpark of 110 horsepower and very little torque.
But nevertheless, bear in mind this car wasn’t designed to go anywhere fast.', 'When the first issue of Sassy came out, I was about halfway through eighth grade, extremely self-conscious in my first year at a new school in a wealthier part of town.
I felt hopelessly different from all of my classmates, certain that I would never find another person like me.
It was different from all the other teen magazines.
Like them, Sassy covered pop culture, fashion, beauty (or Zits & Stuff, as the column was called), but it also took on heavy topics without condescending to its readers.
Functionally, collecting Sassy wasn’t that different from a gambling addiction: There was an element of chance, I was compulsive about it, it was expensive — and it passed the time.', 'Charis Márquez has joined eBay as vice president of fashion, a new post.
Márquez has been with Levi Strauss & Co. for the past four years, rising to VP, sales effectiveness.
Before joining Levi’s, Márquez, who has an MBA from the Kellogg School of Management at Northwestern University, held leadership and general management roles at such firms as Sears, Kmart and Sam’s Club.
“Having spent a career in retail, I’ve always admired eBay’s position as the originator of the resale platform,” Márquez said Tuesday.
As reported in August, tens of thousands of small business sellers had been added to eBay’s platform since last March.']

title: ['Ebay to sell Korean online retail platforms - 코리아타임스', 'eBay Replaces Chief Executive in Charge of HR - EcommerceBytes', 'Speculation over eBay’s sale of Korean unit grows amid appointment of new local CEO - The Korea Herald', "'Del Boy' number plate is for sale on eBay for incredible amount -  FM104"]
summary:
["eBay Korea with its Korean online retailers' logos / Korea Times fileBy Kim Jae-heunAmerican multinational e-commerce corporation eBay is in the process of selling its Korean online retail platforms G-Market, Auction and G9 for an estimated 5 trillion won.
eBay has been reviewing the sale of its Korean e-commerce platforms over the past few years, but this is the first time that the company has officially confirmed it.
An eBay Korea official also said that its headquarters in the U.S. is in the process of selling its Korean businesses.
Acquiring those three platforms can instantly catapult any player to become one of the top three e-commerce platforms in Korea.
Mirae Asset's data showed eBay Korea ranked at No.1 in terms of domestic market share, surpassing Coupang, 11st, WeMakePrice and SSG.com until 2019.", 'eBay’s head of Human Resources is departing the company.
The filing also noted that Yetto will remain with the company until March 16, 2021 to support the transition.
As a chief executive, Yetto is featured on eBay’s “Our Leaders” page, which outlines her responsibilities as follows: “Kristin Yetto is responsible for all aspects of human resources across eBay.
We want to wish Kristin the best of luck with her future endeavors.”Yetto’s replacement, Cornelius Boone, comes to eBay from American Airlines where he was Vice President of Human Resources.
I’m confident that Cornelius will integrate seamlessly with our strong and talented executive leadership team.”', 'EBay Korea appointed Chun Hang-il as its new chief executive officer on Wednesday, amid growing speculation that the US e-commerce firm is poised to sell its business interests in South Korea.Chun, who previously led the Japanese unit of eBay, will take over from outgoing CEO Byun Kwang-yun from Thursday.The leadership shakeup comes a day after the online retail giant announced it was looking at “alternatives for its Korea business” amid growing competition from the likes of Coupang and Naver Shopping, prompting reports that the e-commerce giant’s days in the country are numbered.EBay Korea owns major e-commerce giants in Korea including Gmarket, Auction and G9, boasting a combined market share of 12 percent to 14 percent, based on analysis of 2019 data from Statistics Korea.Given its size, the sale is likely to restructure the country’s e-commerce market -- the fifth-biggest in the world by sales, according to 2019 data from eMarketer.In a statement Wednesday, eBay said it has “initiated a process to explore, review, and evaluate a range of strategic alternatives for its Korea business” and is “considering options that would maximize value for its shareholders and create future growth opportunities for the business.”The company, however, refrained from making further public announcements regarding the strategic review “unless and until the board has approved a course of action requiring disclosure.”One eBay Korea official said the local unit was told that news related to its Korean business was on its way Saturday, before Wednesday’s announcement.“Based on the statement, there seems to be a will to sell,” the official added.In 2019, the Korean unit racked up over 1.95 trillion won in sales, which it said was a record-breaking performance for an open market business.Its operating profit during the same period jumped 27 percent from one year ago to 61.5 billion won, managing to stay in the black for 15 consecutive years.But as competition heated up and the company began trailing behind rivals such as Coupang in recent years, speculation grew that eBay could opt to sell its business in Korea, with major retail companies and private equity funds having emerged as potential buyers.The newly appointed 50-year-old chief executive joined eBay Korea in 2003 and became sales director in 2016 before being appointed as the head of eBay Japan.
He has been credited for “doubling the unit’s performance within two years,” the company said.His predecessor Byun joined the company in 2000 before being appointed to lead the company in 2013.“During his eight-year stint, he made eBay Korea the only leading e-commerce company in the country that stably yielded long-term profits,” the company said in a statement.By Yim Hyun-su ( hyunsu@heraldcorp.com', 'Only Fools and Horses fans can buy the 'Del Boy' number plate on eBay.
Only Fools and Horses fans can pay tribute to their love of the show with a Del Boy number plate that's for sale on eBay for £30,000.
The plate, DEL 30Y, also says Boysie’s Motors Peckham at the bottom in a misspelt reference to Derek Trotter’s car dealer pal Boycie.
The seller listed the plate along with the comments, "DEL 30Y plate on retention.
Elsewhere on the site, another fan another is selling a restored Del Boy three-wheeled car for almost £10,000.']

title: ['Some Top Rated eBay Sellers Can Say No to Remorse Returns - EcommerceBytes', 'Wrexham man who stole stock from workplace to sell himself on ... - The Leader', 'Kinross dealer put £5k stamp he stole from grieving family on Ebay - The Times', 'eBay Korea appoints Jeon Hang-il as new CEO - Korea IT Times']
summary:
["eBay sent a letter to sellers of certain collectible trading-card categories informing them of a new more seller-friendly policy.
eBay did not post the news on the announcement board, but it sent the following email to Top Rated sellers on January 19th:As of January 11, 2021, listings in the Sports Trading Cards, Collectible Card Games, & Non-Sports Trading Cards categories are no longer required to offer remorse returns to qualify for the Top Rated Plus 10% final value fee discount.
While your listings may qualify for the Top Rated Plus rating and discount, at this time, the Top Rated Plus seal will not apply to the listing in search results.
eBay is the world's leading marketplace for trading cards, and millions of buyers globally search for a wide variety of cards.
Removing Trading Cards returns as a Top Rated Plus eligibility requirement may help mitigate improper returns and give you higher confidence to list your inventory on eBay.", 'Ian Relish, 41, of College Fields, Tanyfron, Wrexham appeared before a judge at Mold Crown Court.
In December 2019, the court heard that company officials had become aware that a number of company products listed on eBay for sale.
The photos accompanying the items listed online appeared to have been taken in the back of a company vehicle that was later discovered to belong to Relish.
The company questioned him, and Relish initially denied any knowledge of the eBay account existing but was then subsequently suspended from his job.
In summary, He was sentenced to 30 weeks, suspended for two years and ordered to begin paying back the company.', 'Richard Allcoat, who trades at Kinross Stamp Shop, admitted stealing the rare Penny Blue after being asked to value a family collectionA stamp dealer stole a Penny Blue worth £5,000 from a grieving family’s collection after they entrusted him to value it.
Richard Allcoat, who has been trading as a dealer at Kinross Stamp Collectors for 20 years, selected the most valuable stamp in a £23,000 collection and tried to sell it on Ebay without the family’s knowledge.
SponsoredThe collection had belonged to David Jarvie Snr, a special constable with Strathclyde Police for 30 years.
Richard Allcoat admitted the theftAllcoat had asked the family to leave the collection with him for valuing and later offered to buy it for £5,000.
The offer was declined and when the Jarvie family returned home they discovered the most valuable stamp had been removed and replaced with another of lesser value.', '계정을 선택하시면 로그인·계정인증 을 통해댓글을 남기실 수 있습니다.

title: ['Ivory by any other name: Illegal trade thrives on eBay, study finds - Mongabay.com', 'eBay Warns Shipping to Canada Is at a Crawl - EcommerceBytes']
summary:
['A new study finds that ivory is still being regularly traded on eBay, despite the e-commerce site prohibiting this kind of trade.
The study focused on the online trade of miniature Japanese sculptures called netsuke, which are traditionally made from ivory.
While the study suggests that eBay isn’t doing enough to deter and stop the illegal online trade of ivory, eBay and its NGO partners say they are jointly committed to combating these illicit activities.
Both objects are made from a yellowish-white material that has crisscrossing patterns characteristic of elephant ivory — a banned item on eBay.
Given the nature of illegal trade, sellers are constantly deleting and recreating accounts and profiles across the internet.', 'eBay warned US sellers that shipments to Canada are experiencing extended delays due to unprecedented volume for Canada Post and for carriers shipping to Canada.
As a result, eBay adjusted its estimated delivery dates, which are shown to shoppers based on the location of the buyer and seller and other factors.
eBay Canada likewise warned Canadian sellers about shipping delays that it said have resulted in delays of up to 10 business days for shipments to the United States.
One difference in the message to Canadian sellers: eBay advised them to consider using FedEx.
“We also recommend offering additional shipping services from other carriers such as FedEx to provide your buyers with more options and flexibility.']

You can now buy one of just six Apple-1 computer systems still in their original cases on the e-commerce website for a cool for $1.5 million.
While the Macintosh 128K or iMac G3 are more renowned Apple computers, this is the model that actually kicked things off.

title: ['eBay Chief Marketing Officer to Oversee Seller Community - EcommerceBytes', 'How to Delete Your eBay Account - How-To Geek']
summary:
['eBay has a new Chief Marketing Officer after the departure of Suzy Deering, one who will also oversee Seller Community and eBay Canada.
eBay named Andrea Stairs its new Chief Marketing Officer (CMO) and Vice President of Seller Community for the North America marketplace.
One year ago, Stairs took over as Head of Marketing for eBay North America just after eBay had reportedly laid off many members of its marketing staff.
It’s not clear if Stairs will report directly to CEO Jamie Iannone or instead to eBay’s new Global Chief Growth Officer Julie Loeger, who joined eBay this month to oversee Global Marketing and Global Customer Experience.
But also as VP of Seller Community for North America, I’m here to serve as your voice.', 'If you have an old eBay account you don’t use anymore, you can submit a request to have the account and all accompanying data completely removed—as long as your account is in good standing.
What You Need to Know About Deleting Your eBay AccountIf you want to delete your eBay account, you first have to send in a request to have it deleted.
Usually, eBay will delete your account and its accompanying data within 30 days of receiving the request.
So, what happens when you delete your eBay account?
RELATED: How to Cancel a Bid on eBayHow to Delete Your eBay AccountTo delete your eBay account, you’ll need to log in to your account using your computer’s web browser.']

This Apple-1 is apparently still in its original Byte Shop KOA wood case, which comes with the original power supply and Datanetics Version D keyboard.

summary:
['eBay Luxury Watch of the Week: Panerai Luminor 1950 3 Days GMT FlybackOwn Sylvester Stallone’s iconic “Daylight” timepiece—backed by eBay’s trustworthy Authenticity Guarantee.
He bought one and loved it so much that he commissioned a number of Luminors with personalized engravings.
eBay‘s Authenticity Guarantee ensures confidence for fans of high-dollar collectibles like luxury watches and sneakers.
It also affirms that this Panerai Luminor 1950 will be safely delivered “via secure shipping with signature required” after it has been “inspected by independent authenticators.”Most watches sold for $2,000 or more will qualify for the Authenticity Guarantee.
This automatic 44mm Panerai Luminor 1950 3 Days GMT is currently listed with a “Buy It Now” price of $6,950.', 'HQRecently, we reported on the scalper issue plaguing the latest Nvidia RTX 3000 graphics card line-up, as well as the Xbox Series consoles on eBay and StockX, but now we have information regarding the impact of PS5 scalping.
Data engineer Michael Driscoll, the very same person who produced the previous reports is back again, and he has stated that over 157,000 PS5s were sold over the two platforms by scalpers, which accounted for $143 million in sales.
According to the report, only 7.06% of all PS5s sold in the US were scalped over these two platforms, but that amount did allow scalpers to net $43.2 million in profit for themselves.
Driscoll did also mention that a further 3-8% of the total PS5s were also scalped on other platforms, which in turn accounted for around 10-15% of total PS5s in the US.
No information regarding the scalper impact across Europe or the rest of the world has been detailed yet.']

title: ['Ebay earnings beat on pandemic-driven surge in online shopping ... - Reuters', 'EBay closes out 2020 strong, doubles EPS - Silicon Valley Business ... - The Business Journals', 'Sellers Thwarted by eBay International Shipping Option - EcommerceBytes', 'Brandon family’s ‘haunted’ doll carriage sells on eBay for $710 - WLBT', "LadBaby's wife's used socks fetch a bid of nearly £66,000 on eBay - Nottinghamshire Live"]
summary:
['Feb 3 (Reuters) - E-commerce firm eBay Inc (EBAY.O) said on Wednesday it would emerge "stronger" from the COVID-19 crisis after a pandemic-driven surge in online shopping helped the company beat estimates for sales and profit in the holiday quarter.
The global health crisis has forced millions of Americans to stay indoors, leading to a jump in online orders for e-commerce companies including eBay, Amazon.com Inc (AMZN.O) and Walmart Inc's (WMT.N) online business.
In the United States, one in 10 online shoppers bought something on eBay.
EBay also projected first-quarter revenue in the range of $2.94 billion to $2.99 billion, above estimates of $2.53 billion, according to IBES data from Refinitiv.
Revenue in the fourth quarter, ended Dec. 31, rose to $2.87 billion from $2.24 billion, beating analysts' average estimate of $2.70 billion.', '', 'eBay offers an international shipping option called "eBay International Standard Delivery," and we're seeing reports from sellers who are experiencing issues that are costing them time and money.
But in the notification, eBay includes its own tracking number for the shipment sent via eBay International Standard Delivery that shows the item was received at eBay's US facility.
The seller sent me a tracking number which when I entered it looked odd, as though it was for a domestic package rather than an international package.
ParcelsApp.com has a way to track eBay International Standard Delivery tracking numbers as far as the US, at which point, it seems eBay provides no way to track packages beyond that point.
Some buyers and sellers also confuse eBay International Standard Delivery with a different program, eBay Global Shipping.', 'BRANDON, Miss.
(WLBT) - A vintage doll carriage that a Brandon family alleges caused paranormal activity inside of their home has sold on eBay for $710.
Whitney Merritt, the owner of the carriage, says that after 50 bids the “haunted” item was won by a Kansas woman fascinated by ghosts and spirts.
Brandon family’s ‘haunted’ doll carriage sells on eBay for $710 (eBay/Whitney Merritt)Merritt says she is glad to be departing with the carriage, adding that her husband is more relieved.
“It’s not normal,” Merritt said, referring to the doll carriage.', 'Something went wrong, please try again later.

"The socks haven't been sold yet because eBay sent me an email saying it violated their guidelines of used socks so at the moment we are currently working out what we can do.']

According to FAQs, there is no cost to accessing any eBay Seller School learning content, and “students” can access content any time without having to sign in – “simply enter just your email address to launch the course,” it states.
Under Managing Returns, eBay explains how sellers can set their returns policy and offered tips on reducing returns.
In some areas of the “Shipping and Returns” course, eBay embedded videos, such as the following July 2020 YouTube video on Managed Payments.
Check out the eBay Seller School and share your tips on making the most of it.', 'Below, shop 10 standout Adidas Yeezy styles marked with eBay’s Authenticity Guarantee.

CREDIT: Courtesy of eBayAdidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Triple WhiteRock the all-white look with this monochromatic version of the Adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2.', 'A pair of unworn Air Jordan 1s signed by the GOAT himself have been listed on eBay, with an asking price of $1 million.
The Air Jordan 1, which first debuted in 1985, has skyrocketed in value in recent years.
ESPN’s recent Last Dance docuseries, which details Jordan’s career with the ’90s-era Bulls, appears to have pushed the sneakers’ value even higher.

Plus Mrs Hinch was left ‘crying and shaking’ by the reaction to her pregnancy announcement and teased ‘I’ve got so much to show you all’.", "McDonald’s is seeing its largest driver of Happy Meals since it included mini Beanie Babies with kiddie meals way back in the '90s.
But with demand so high, the “happy” part of the partnership is souring.
This week, McDonald’s launched Pokémon Happy Meals to mark the 25th anniversary of the franchise.
Each meal comes in a Pikachu box along with a pack of four Pokémon trading cards (including a McDonald’s exclusive holographic card) and a surprise gift.
The strategy is paired with new Pokémon stickers in the McDonald’s Happy Meal app and Pokémon-themed coloring and activity pages kids can download at happymeal.com.", 'An undercover sting snared a criminal who was selling stolen car parts on eBay.
And the operation lead to the discovery of a "chop shop" in Bury which contained £240,000 worth of stolen vehicles.
Police scrutinised Asad Mahmood's eBay account in November 2018 as car parts were being sold off it.
Officers posed as buyers and bought the parts, which turned out to be from stolen vehicles.
Including the two vehicles at Mahmood's address, he had handled 20 stolen vehicles.']

title: ['AMD Ryzen 7 5700G Zen 3 Cezanne CPU Engineering Samples Hit eBay - Hot Hardware', 'Trading card sales explode 142 percent on eBay in 2020 - Baltimore Sun', "Stamps category on eBay to see new postage option with tracking - Linn's Stamp News", 'Poshmark Seller Protection versus eBay Seller Protection - EcommerceBytes', 'eBay & WatchPro Auction Special Report, Volume 2: How 2020 ... - WatchPro USA', 'GAME PS5 shoppers livid as scalpers start listing their consoles on eBay - Birmingham Live']
summary:
["Earlier this year, we got our first glimpse at the upcoming Ryzen 7 5700G APU.
AMD's APUs are typically found in OEM systems, and are sought after because they include integrated graphics (something that mainline Ryzen processors do not include).
Now, the Ryzen 7 5700G is showing up in an unlikely place: eBay.
That's right; AMD hasn't even announced its Ryzen 5000G APUs yet, but some engineering samples have found their way to the popular online marketplace.
As we previously reported, the Ryzen 7 5700G is a Cezanne-based Zen 3 processor with 8 cores and 16 threads.", 'It’s one of the main reasons why trading cards — sports and non-sports — exploded in 2020.
AdvertisementOn Thursday, eBay released its first State Of Trading Cards report, which, among other things, revealed that gross trading card sales on the year were up 142 percent, with four million more cards sold into the platform than in 2019.
Go back to 2013 and the average Jordan sold on eBay for $1,849.
The other star of the trading card world was the 1979 O-Pee-Chee Wayne Gretzky rookie, which for the first time, hit the $100,000 barrier on eBay in 2020.
A record 125 Gretzky O-Pee-Chee cards sold on eBay last year with an average value of $4,520.', 'Stamps category on eBay to see new postage option with trackingFeb 11, 2021, 11 AMThe tracking log in the eBay buyer’s account shows notes about the delivery status of the item during its journey.
The online marketplace eBay is offering this new standard envelope with tracking in its trading cards category.
It currently is only available in the trading cards category, but eBay plans to also offer it in the stamps category.
For this service, tracking is not available via the Postal Service’s tracking program.
The seller printed one of the eBay standard envelope labels on a sheet of paper and taped it to the envelope.', "Dear Ina,I have been selling on Poshmark for several years now and selling on eBay for almost 18 years.
I am assuming that Poshmark examined my selling record and the newbie buyer's buying record to make their decision.
Buyer opened a SNAD for a new item that I sold her and one that she had for almost a month.
My guess is that I had a total of four or more hours invested in my efforts to receive seller protection.
I am a top-rated seller, but my reputation, my word and my selling record mean nothing to eBay.", '', "After GAME dropped its consoles earlier today, it immediately attracted the attention of scalpers who started to buy up consoles.
'Scalping' involves buying a high demand product that has limited stock and selling them for more money and making a profit.
It is believed that scalpers have been making large sums of cash during the lockdown on items that are in high demand.
One Twitter user showed BirminghamLive an eBay listing of a console bundle on sale for £800 after a GAME order.
A spokesperson said: “PlayStation 5’s continue to be in very high demand and that demand far outweighs current supply."]

title: ['PSA: eBay might not let you sell items without a bank account ... - The Verge', 'Pokémon trading card eBay sales increase almost 600% in one year - Metro.co.uk']
summary:
['In 2002, eBay bought PayPal for $1.5 billion, turning it into the way you’d buy and get paid for items you sell on the ginormous auction site.
But the once-happy couple has been breaking up for years — and on Valentine’s Day, some sellers may no longer be able to sell items on eBay at all without connecting an old-school bank account instead.
This isn’t the final phase either, as eBay tells us the rollout won’t be complete until 2022.
Digging up a bank account and plugging it into your profile may not be the only annoyance here, by the way.
(That said, my last eBay sale didn’t immediately release my funds to PayPal, either.', 'Don’t go thinking the newer cards will make you crazy money on eBay (Pic: Pokémon)A new eBay report reveals that sales of Pokémon cards were up by almost 600% last year, making them the most popular trading card category.
Now it turns out that Pokémon cards have become an incredibly popular commodity on eBay as well, outselling sports and Magic: The Gathering cards to become the most popular trading card category on the website.
According to an eBay report, Pokémon trading card sales increased by a whopping 574% from 2019 to 2020, with iconic creatures like Pikachu, Charizard, and Mewtwo being among the most popular individual cards.
As for what has caused this growth in overall trading card sales (not just Pokémon), eBay’s general manager of Collectibles & Trading Cards Nicole Colombo points to people looking into new forms of entertainment while stuck indoors due to the coronavirus.
Elsewhere, some people are lamenting that they never held on to their original Pokémon cards, since they’d likely be able to sell them for high profits now.']

title: ['Over 14,000 NVIDIA GPUs Have Been Sold On eBay This Year Alone And The Resale Price Is Going Up As Time Goes On - Wccftech', "eBay's Authentique Candle Smells Like New Sneakers - HYPEBEAST", 'Dropshipping: How to use Amazon and eBay to become your own boss - CNBC']
summary:
["The most obvious of those would be the tariffs, but the price jump on the resale listings for lower-end cards is greater than the price jump on the MSRP of those cards.
Data Shows That 15,300 Graphics Cards Have Been Sold On eBay From Both NVIDIA And AMDLet's look at the data.
Let's look at the increase of the resale price from January to February.
It is the average resale price on cards already well above their MSRP.
The RTX 3090 may not have had the most significant jump at 14%, but the average resale price is $2,379.", 'Didn’t get your other half a brand new pair of kicks for Valentine’s Day?
Well, there’s no need to worry, as eBay has announced the launch of its new scented candle, Authentique.
With scents of warm pebbled leather, glue, EVA foam, and an accenting touch of cotton blossom, Authentique is designed to smell just like a brand new pair of box-fresh sneakers.
Alongside the launch of its Authentique candle, eBay has expanded its Authenticity Guarantee offering to all new Nike and adidas sneakers worth $100 USD or more.
The eBay Authentique candle is dropping on a dedicated website this Valentine’s Day and costs $25 USD.', 'One of the most popular forms nowadays revolves around a concept in e-commerce known as dropshipping.
Dropshipping is a business model that allows entrepreneurs to sell products to their customers without ever having to stock inventory themselves.
According to a dropshipping explainer from e-commerce company Shopify , the model allows entrepreneurs to take more risks on products.
Because there is no overhead for storing the product, retailers can experiment with different products and product lines.
Tom Cormier, or eCom Tom as he is known, is the co-founder of Dropshipping University.']

title: ['Amazon & eBay Make Progress With Their Pirate Streaming Box ... - TorrentFreak']
summary:
['After being heavily criticized due to the prevalence of pirate streaming devices offered for sale on their platforms, Amazon and eBay now appear to be getting on top of the problem.
In 2017, with both platforms (eBay in particular) hosting thousands of listings for these devices, news of a crackdown emerged.
Pirate Devices Are Less Readily FoundIn common with our tests in 2017, our first port of call was a basic search for the old favorite – “Kodi Box”.
The term “fully loaded” – another pirate staple – is also dramatically less useful than it once was.
“Fully loaded boxes” reveals listings for fishing tackle, “fully loaded” returns high-spec cars, “fully loaded Android” shows books, and “fully loaded TV” conjures up Herbie DVDs.']

title: ['UK watchdog voices concern over $9.2 billion eBay-Adevinta deal - Reuters', 'eBay Find: 2021 Honda Civic Type R - Yahoo']
summary:
['OSLO (Reuters) - Britain’s competition watchdog on Tuesday raised concerns over Adevinta’s planned acquisition of U.S. e-commerce group eBay’s classified ads business, sending the Norwegian company’s shares down 4.3%.
Slideshow ( 2 images )The $9.2 billion deal announced in July would create the world’s largest classifieds group, but Adevinta and eBay must first resolve the Competition and Markets Authority’s concerns (CMA) to proceed with the takeover.
With the sale of its classifieds business, eBay will acquire a 33.3% voting stake in Adevinta and positions on the Adevinta board, the CMA also noted.
Britain accounted for less than 10% of the consolidated revenue of eBay’s classifieds business and 1% of Adevinta’s consolidated revenue, Adevinta said.
The CMA this month said Viagogo must sell StubHub’s international business after its $4.05 billion purchase of eBay’s ticket-reselling business.', 'Yeah, the Civic Type R is really quick and powerful… for a Civic.
photo credit: eBayNo matter what you do with this Type R, it’s never going to be the performance monster Honda fanboys will try pretending it is.
photo credit: eBayIt’s obvious whoever is selling this car is a Civic Type R fan because they show the car parked next to another one in their garage.
If you’re still interested in dropping an unreasonable amount on this Honda Civic Type R, check out the listing here.
Thanks to reader Tim Stapleton for the tip, if you have a hot car tip please send it to editorial@motorious.com.']

title: ['eBay sale up a Gumtree as competition watchdog raises concerns - Proactive Investors USA', 'eBay’s £6.5bn Gumtree deal could push up fees for online sellers, says competition watchdog - The Independent', 'The Good And Bad: eBay & Teradata - Forbes', 'Background Bob art to be sold on ebay for Colchester Hospital ... - Daily Gazette']
summary:
['', "Read our privacy notice Thanks for signing up to theBreaking News email {{ #verifyErrors }} {{ message }} {{ /verifyErrors }} {{ ^verifyErrors }} Something went wrong.
Please try again later {{ /verifyErrors }}Consumers could be charged more to buy and sell their goods online if eBay's planned £6.5bn sale of Gumtree goes ahead, the UK competition watchdog has warned.
Norwegian company Adevinta, which owns the Shpock classified ads website, agreed a deal to merge with Gumtree in July.
The CMA added that the move “could reduce consumer choice, increase fees or lower innovation in the supply of platforms that allow people to buy and sell goods online”.
“eBay and Adevinta remain excited about the proposed transaction and look forward to closing.”", '', "Noah's charity book for hospitalIn total more than 200 street artists and celebrities joined in with the project, including artists Ange Bell and Heath Kane and comedian Phill Jupitus.
Noah became better known as Background Bob and all of the work was brought together in a book of the same name.
Read more:It sold out in record time, raising £18,000 for Colchester and Ipswich Hospitals Charity, which will go towards the children’s department at Colchester Hospital.
To find the pieces, search for Background Bob at www.ebay.co.uk.
For more information about Background Bob, visit his Instagram page @background_bob."]

title: ['eBay Announces the Recipients of Its "Up & Running Grants" - PR Newswire', 'Reptil From Avengers Academy Gets His Own Series - eBay Goes ... - Bleeding Cool News', "Sustainable demand prompts surge in eBay's refurbished furniture ... - Retail Gazette"]
summary:
['eBay Announces the Recipients of Its "Up & Running Grants" Tweet this Sharing big news with eBay sellers - Up & Running Grants announcement!
eBay Up & Running Grants announcement eBay Up & Running Grants recipientsThese grants build on eBay's long-standing commitment to small businesses and expand the company's Up & Running initiative that was launched in March 2020.
"As the home of small business, we are proud to recognize these 50 Up & Running Grants recipients and provide funding and resources to propel them forward."
To learn more about the Up & Running Grants and the recipients, watch THIS short video.
About eBay Seller SchooleBay Seller School is a new virtual learning platform offering on-demand lessons, videos and more to help every eBay seller thrive in our marketplace.', '', '// New data from eBay UK reveals that more customers than ever before are actively choosing to purchase sustainable homewares// Searches for “eco furniture” on eBay UK up 123% and “sustainable furniture” up 171%#// This demand has driven a 74% searches increase in eBay UK’s refurbished home categoryNew data from eBay reveals that more customers than ever before are choosing to buy sustainable homewares, driving a boost in the refurbished furniture market.
At the same time, eBay said consumers were increasingly looking for more eco-friendly options to furnish their home, which has led to a big spike in searches for refurbished options.
READ MORE: Non-food retailers endure £22bn hit in sales due to Covid-19According to eBay, searches for “refurbished sofa” were up 133 per cent in 2020 vs the prior year, and searches for “refurbished bed” were up 50 per cent.
Meanwhile, searches for “eco furniture” and “sustainable furniture” saw a huge rise in 2020 compared to 2019, up 123 per cent and 171 per cent respectively.
“Refurbished items are clearly front of mind for many not just because they are more sustainable, but they’re also great value.']

summary:
['eBay and Amazon advised sellers about weather delays as winter storms had a severe impact on those living in Texas and elsewhere this week where shipping and delivery were ground to a halt.
“Winter weather conditions are still disrupting transportation lines across parts of the US.
We previously announced seller protections for these weather delays and we are expanding those to also cover defects resulting from transactions you cancelled,” eBay wrote in the announcement.
Amazon also posted an announcement for sellers impacted by the severe winter storms.
One seller responded by asking if Amazon sellers shipping to Texas would get dinged for delays.', 'A former lawyer for eBay Inc., Netflix Inc. and Lucasfilm Ltd. has changed lanes and entered the grocery industry as general counsel at Weee Inc.Thomas Jeon is the first chief lawyer for the Fremont, California-based ethnic e-grocer, which launched in 2015 as a social e-commerce company and has raised more than $100 million in funding.
Weee also named Ankur Shah as chief finance and strategy officer.', 'Nationwide — Meet Yassin Hall, an e-commerce mastermind and self-made millionaire who is teaching middle and high schoolers at Genesis Preparatory Academy near Atlanta how to profit from Amazon and eBay.
Amazon and Ebay Classes include: How to Set Up an eBay Store From Your Classroom to Earn Six Figures a Year; How to Sell on Amazon; Creating the Mindset for Being an Entrepreneur; and Understanding How to Manage Money.
eBay and Amazon classes,” says Yassin.
Yassin says the pandemic has shown many that they must create additional streams of income and look into home-based businesses.
To learn more about the courses, visit BossClassLLC.comTo learn more about Yassin Hall, visit YassinHall.com or follow her on Instagram @YassinHallFor press inquiries, contact 678-870-4099 or bossamazonclassSP@gmail.com', "NINTENDO Switch owners can bag 15% off some top games.
The eBay code you'll need is PLAYWITH15.
You can enter that on Nintendo Switch games on eBay for a 15% saving.
Nintendo Switch games at eBay – click here2 You can save money on this brilliant Nintendo remake Credit: NintendoIt's worth noting that you need to spend at least £20 to use the code.
Due to its popularity, the Nintendo Switch is often difficult to get a hold of."]

title: ['Recreating meaning: a guide to eBay and pandemic window shopping - Johns Hopkins News-Letter', 'From the docks to the eBay – will online marketplaces save the fishing industry? - The Guardian']
summary:
['There came a point during quarantine where I found myself on eBay for at least four hours every night.
The joy in eBay scrolling is not necessarily just the bargains available on the website.
Unlike Depop and other similar reselling platforms, eBay is not curated by any real sort of algorithm.
What you search for is what you get, so you have to really start figuring out search terms to find what you want.
The eBay site is perfect for curing those days where you simply no longer wish to be perceived by the algorithm.', 'On a bracing January morning in Hastings, the British fishing industry feels becalmed.
Pesky Fish sells more than two tonnes of fish per day from Britain’s day boats and artisanal fish farmers.
The industry is not going to regress.”Ben King, co-founder of Pesky Fish.
Photograph: Clare KinchinAfter starting with individual boats, Pesky has expanded to work with whole ports, Hastings being the most recent addition.
The Pesky pitch, offering daybook fishermen better prices for their fish and better value to the consumer, was persuasive.']

title: ['eBay Knows How to Hold Funds but Not How to Release Them - EcommerceBytes', 'Amazon, Rakuten, eBay Top List of Most Visited Ecommerce Sites - Retail TouchPoints']
summary:
["Imagine - the reader paid for an item, the seller cancelled the order, but eBay is still holding their funds weeks later.
The buyer filed a dispute, the seller okayed the refund, but eBay continues to hold an amount the seller already refunded to the buyer.
But neither reader could get eBay customer service to fix the problem and release their funds.
It begs the question, how much money is eBay holding altogether?
In these cases, eBay knows how to *hold* buyer and seller funds, they just don't know how to *release* them.", 'Retail ecommerce sales grew 27.6% worldwide in 2020 and global marketplaces ruled the roost, making up nine of the top 10 most visited retail sites last year, according to a report from Fasthosts.
Amazon and Japan’s Rakuten were the #1 and #2 most visited retail websites in the world last year, with Amazon domains taking three of the top 10 spots (.com at #1, .de at #3 and .co.uk at #6).
Amazon.com also ranks as the 12th-most-visited site globally across all sectors, beaten only by porn sites, social media sites and Google.
Number-two site Rakuten received an average of 268 million visits every week, equivalent to two times the total population of its home market, Japan.
Turkish marketplace Trendyol almost made the cut at #11, and a number of traditional retailers are among the top 20 retail sites of the year, including Nike, Macy’s, H&M, Zara, Uniqlo and Nordstrom.']

title: ['eBay Unveils Pokémon Shop 25th Anniversary - HYPEBEAST', 'eBay users attempt to sell ‘rare’ McDonald’s plastic straws for up to $1500 - PerthNow', "Exeter man flogs his notorious 'samurai sword' brolly on eBay - after FIVE police incidents - Devon Live"]
summary:
['In celebration of the Pokémon franchise’s 25th anniversary, eBay has unveiled the ultimate online Pokémon shop.
eBay has put together the ultimate collection of rare, trending and retro Pokémon collectibles and merchandise on a strictly Pokémon curated one-stop-shop.
The eBay Pokémon Shop features Pokémon McDonald’s promo cards, General Mills cereal promo cards, a TCG first partner collector’s binder, Pokémon Game Boy games by generation and even a Pokémon x Bear Walker 25th anniversary skateboard.
In celebration of the Pokémon memorabilia over the years, eBay is partnering with leading TCG seller PWCC for an exclusive auction on February 27.
Take a look at some of the Pokémon collectibles fans can find on eBay’s dedicated Pokémon Shop above.', 'Opportunistic eBay users have already started listing the famous white, red and yellow straws, with one seller form the Tweed Heads area in northern NSW offering an “Original McDonalds Plastic Straw” for $1500.
Camera Icon eBay users are trying to flog Macca’s straws for up to $1500.
Credit: News Corp Australia, Supplied NCA NewsWireA more generous offer is available from a user in Biggenden, Queensland, with the seller posting “2 Rare McDonalds plastic straws” for $500.
Federal Environment Minister Sussan Ley visited McDonald’s in Manuka on Wednesday to see the last handful of the 512 million plastic straws that have been phased out.
Camera Icon A pair of Macca’s straws in their plastic will cost you $500 from one eBay user.', 'Police had been informed by a member of the public that a person had been spotted with a samurai sword.
When the ‘sword’ was discovered to be an umbrella with a samurai sword handle, it was seized by police and Mike was able to continue his journey home.
He said: "I got it back after I received a call from Exeter's armed response unit, and sure enough a couple of hours later, an armed officer handed it back.
The item has a strap and is worn over Mike's back with a handle that looks exactly like that of a samurai sword.
"It turns out it wasn't a samurai sword, it was an umbrella made to look like a samurai sword.']

title: ['eBay Seller Update: Vertical Platform Strategy, Faster Payouts - EcommerceBytes', 'Does eBay report sales of under $20,000 to N.J.? - NJ.com', 'Friday Night Funkin Plush not available on eBay, Etsy yet for online ... - DigiStatement']
summary:
['The next categories where eBay will take a vertical approach include Comics, Coins, Stamps, and Vinyl, he said.
Keala Gaines, Vice President of Payment Services, provided an update on Managed Payments.
She said eBay was working on faster payouts of funds to sellers (previously sellers received money instantly into their PayPal accounts).
Hazel Mitchell, Senior Director of Global Customer Service, made a bold promise to sellers: over the next few weeks, wait times for customer service will improve.
eBay is recruiting sellers who would use an app to provide customer service on their own terms, with no obligation.', 'Does eBay report sales of under $20,000 to the state of New Jersey?
According to eBay’s website, if you’re a managed seller, you may receive a Form 1099-K from the company depending on your total sales and transactions.
You should have received this form by Jan. 31 if you had more than $20,000 in gross payments and more than 200 payment transactions, it said.
For New Jersey, that amount is $1,000 in gross payments with no threshold on the number of transactions, the website said.
You can also download Form 1099-K in the eBay Seller Hub.', 'Have you been looking FNF Plush merch?
Have you been scouring online shopping websites searching for your favourite character’s Plush doll?
As it is, FNF Plush is not available on eBay and Etsy yet.
As far as FNF merch is concerned, Fridge stickers, pins, magnets, t-shirts and hoodies are raking up in sales across various different locations.
Considering the anticipation for it, the reception for the plush merch is expected to be off the charts.']

title: ["Ebay creates 'multi-million pound' social enterprise shopfront - Pioneers Post", 'Police warn on fake Ergobaby Omni baby carriers sold on eBay - Telegraph and Argus', "Postie punting Nicola Sturgeon 'ya wee dafty' painting on eBay for £270 - and he wants her to buy it - Daily Record", "People Are Putting 'Rare' Plastic McDonald's Straws On eBay For ... - BroBible", "Ebay removes man's infamous samurai sword umbrella from sale - Devon Live", '17 Marvel Comics That Jumped In Price on eBay Thanks To ... - Bleeding Cool News', "eBay sellers listing 'rare' plastic McDonald's straws for as much as £5,000 - The Mirror", 'Reptil #1 First Marvel Comics Appearance Sells for $80 on eBay - Bleeding Cool News']
summary:
['Online marketplace eBay is creating a dedicated shopfront to encourage its 29 million UK customers to buy social.
Some 300,000 small businesses are successfully trading on eBay UK, the firm said.
This will provide training, coaching and financial support to 100 UK entrepreneurs to help them grow their businesses and their social impact.
Ebay was founded in 1995 by Pierre Omidyar, who later founded the Omidyar Group, which includes the impact investment firm Omidyar Network.
The company’s first full-time employee and first president was Jeff Skoll, who created the eBay Foundation and, in 1999, the Skoll Foundation to invest in and support social entrepreneurs.', 'The City of London Police's Intellectual Property Crime Unit (PIPCU) have launched an investigation into counterfeit Ergobaby Omni 360 baby carriers being sold on eBay.
Detective Inspector Kevin Ives, PIPCU, said: “If you have purchased an Ergobaby carrier online, but not via the company’s official website, you could be using a fake.
“A counterfeit item such as this could cause harm to you and your baby and it’s important you stop using it immediately.
Ergobaby said it "greatly appreciated" the help of the force in stopping the fakes being sold.
"This dedication to excellence has led to our carriers winning numerous international product awards and health endorsements, only serving to make it more damaging when counterfeits try to deceive parents into believing their fake products are genuine Ergobaby products.', 'Something went wrong, please try again later.
Invalid email Something went wrong, please try again later.
Get the latest top news stories sent straight to your inbox with our daily newsletterThe artist behind a viral painting of Nicola Sturgeon reckons the First Minister should buy it.
He said: "My manager sent me to the Uddingston office around that time and I actually delivered Nicola Sturgeon's ballet paper to her house.
David joked: "Apparently the painting has had a bid on it already but I think Nicola should buy it herself.', 'Which means, of course, that there are now people out there hoarding these plastic McDonald’s straws and trying to sell them as collector’s items on eBay to nostaglic bidders for, in some cases, thousands of dollars.
“DISCONTINUED AND RARE – BRAND NEW Mcdonalds Plastic Straw” reads one such listing with a starting bid of around $269.23.
Check out this description…BRAND NEW Mcdonalds Plastic Straw – (December 2020).
ebay“A superb opportunity to acquire a rare plastic McDonalds straw,” reads the description for the $6,344 listing.
Right now there are literally dozens of these listings for McDonald’s plastic straws on eBay, but who knows how long that will continue.', "Sign up for our Exeter newsletter and you'll never miss a big story againAn Exeter man who took to Ebay to try and flog his notorious samurai sword umbrella has been left astonished after the listing was removed.
Police had been informed by a member of the public that a person had been spotted with a samurai sword.
When the ‘sword’ was discovered to be Mike's umbrella with a samurai sword handle, it was seized by police and Mike was able to continue his journey home.
''Anyway, Ebay then took the listing down because I had mentioned the words samurai and sword.
With an aim to tempt potential buyers into purchasing the item, Mike states in the Ebay listing: ''So why am I selling this?", '', 'Hopeful eBay users are attempting to flog their old plastic McDonald's straws for thousands of pounds - and one listing even has three bids despite the shocking price tageBay sellers listing 'rare' plastic McDonald's straws for as much as £5,000McDonald's fans may remember the switch the fast food giant made to paper straws a few years back.
Well now, those who still have the discontinued straws laying about are selling them on eBay for eye-watering sums of money.
Currently, there are 29 listings on the buy-and-sell site for the "rare" McDonald's merchandise with some asking for as much as £5,000.
McDonald's banned plastic straws from its restaurants in September 2018 as part of a green drive.
Before that, the company was going through 1.8 million plastic straws each day in the UK.', '']

title: ['Haralambos Tsivicos Shares How He Went From Selling on eBay to ... - LA Weekly']
summary:
['Haralambos Tsivicos began molding his vision for his future as a boy, and today he says he still has not lost sight of it.
Born in Long Branch, New Jersey, Haralambos Tsivicos started incubating at a very young age.
Years after graduating, Haralambos Tsivicos would resurrect Tsivicos Enterprises, a government-specialized contracting company based in Neptune, New Jersey.
Tsivicos Enterprises proliferated.
Haralambos Tsivicos has also delved into other ventures, but he is focused on growing Tsivicos Enterprises to become a force to be reckoned with in the government contracting sector.']
