title: ["Emart to Acquire eBay's Businesses in Korea - PR Newswire", 'Top Wander Franco Cards, Hottest eBay Auctions as Top Prospect ... - Sports Collectors Daily', 'Suns in 4 toy action figure sells on eBay for $7,000 - Arizona Sports', 'YouTube Influencer Sells His Search Data On eBay 06/24/2021 - MediaPost Communications', "Faygo's new flavor Firework going for $200 a case on eBay - FOX 2 Detroit", 'Former eBay CEO Devin Wenig Named to Salesforce Advisory Board - EcommerceBytes', 'What’s the most expensive LA Rams item on Ebay? - Turf Show Times', 'Exclusive Edinburgh LEGO store figures given to first customers found on eBay within hours - Edinburgh Live']
summary:
['SAN JOSE, Calif., June 24, 2021 /PRNewswire/ -- eBay Inc. (NASDAQ: EBAY) and Emart today announced they reached an agreement for the purchase by Emart of eBay's businesses in Korea.
Pursuant to the transaction, eBay will sell an 80.01% stake in its Korean businesses for 3.44 trillion KRW (or approximately $3.0 billion USD1) of gross cash proceeds.
Together, eBay Korea and Emart can build a 360-degree ecosystem which will allow full touch points with customers in categories ranging from grocery to general merchandise.
Forward-Looking StatementsForward-Looking Statements Certain statements herein are "forward-looking statements" within the meaning of Section 27A of the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, and Section 21E of the Exchange Act.
Such forward-looking statements reflect eBay's current expectations or beliefs concerning future events and actual events may differ materially from historical results or current expectations.', '', 'Suns in four is still on the table with Phoenix holding a 2-0 lead on the Los Angeles Clippers in the Western Conference Finals.
What’s no longer on the table is a single “Suns in four” guy toy action figure that was put up for auction last Friday on eBay.
Bidding for the action figure made by Zach Pollard, who lives in the Valley, closed on Wednesday night.
After 101 bids, the toy resembling the Suns fan who got in a scuffle with Nuggets supporters in the conference semifinals sold for $7,000.
“I definitely was inspired to make the toy after watching the video,” Pollard told Arizona Sports via Instagram direct messages last week.', 'Rafael Neugart, an Instagram influencer and celebrity known for his RayFox YouTube channel in Germany, set out to prove that.
Neugart announced on Instagram at the beginning of June that he would sell his entire search history for sale on eBay.He has several hundred thousand followers on social networks.
The stunt was a campaign by Neugart, Foundry and privacy search engine Startpage.
advertisement advertisementNeugart listed his internet search history on eBay and then asked Instagram fans how much they would pay for his search history.
As uncomfortable as this may seem, consumers unknowingly share personal search history with third parties daily, said Startpage Founder Robert Beens.', 'Faygo, the iconic Michigan pop brand has just launched its newest flavor: Firework.
On eBay, a box of the new flavor is going for $200 bucks a case.
"It's like fine wine," said Lutfy.
Speaking of fine wine, criminal defense attorney and wine connoisseur David Kramer has some of the most expensive wines in the world.
And hidden in his selection is the same Faygo flavor that everyone's been raving about; Firework.', 'Salesforce has named former eBay CEO Devin Wenig to its Global Advisory Board to expand international growth.
“Now, the Global Advisory Board spans The Americas and EMEA to bring together some of the most accomplished business leaders from across industries to offer proven leadership, expertise, and a unique understanding of the transformational potential of Salesforce.
Other new members of the Global Advisory Board named today include former executives of companies including Aetna, Hudson’s Bay, The Dow Chemical Company, Gap, and TikTok.
Alex Dayon, President and Chief Strategy Officer, Chairman of the Advisory Board, Salesforce, was quoted in the announcement: “Overnight, digital became priority #1 for every company.
This Global Advisory Board will be instrumental in our ability to accelerate our customers’ success from anywhere.”', 'And now you can apparently own a piece of Rams history ... by owning Jack Youngblood’s Hall of Fame induction ring.
In searching for the most expensive Rams-related item on Ebay this morning, I came across Youngblood’s “2001 NFL FOOTBALL HOF CHAMPION CHAMPIONSHIP RING JACK YOUNGBLOOD LA RAMS BALFOUR”.
COMES WITH FULL LETTER FROM JACK YOUNGBLOOD !
IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO HAVE JACK YOUNGBLOOD CALL TO CONGRATULATE YOU ON THE RING PURCHASE WE CAN ARRANGE THAT TOO !
The second-most expensive Rams item was a signed football (used in the ‘99 Super Bowl) from Isaac Bruce listed at $7,000, followed by a vintage Eric Dickerson jersey listed at $2,549.99.', 'Don't miss any of Edinburgh Live's biggest stories - sign up to our daily email newsletterA number of limited edition LEGO figures from the St James Quarter opening have ended up on eBay within hours.
The popular and iconic store made its Edinburgh debut inside the new shopping development as it opened to customers for the first time on Thursday.
With hundreds of people making their way to the new centre, the LEGO store had proved to be one of the most popular haunts, as long queues were seen outside all day.
However, it appeared that some customers had seen the special gifts as an opportunity, with at least three appearing on eBay within just a few hours of the shop opening.
Completely unopened, all sellers had advertised the "Edinburgh 2021 Grand Store Opening Figures" as being in "sealed boxes", with the hope of racking up bids from collectors.']

title: ['Download eBay 6.106.0.3 for Android - Filehippo.com - FileHippo News', 'Shinsegae Group to Acquire 80% Stake in eBay Korea for 3.44 Tril ... - BusinessKorea', 'eBay Completes Transfer of Classifieds Business to Adevinta - PR Newswire', 'Environment Agency and eBay crack down on illegal vehicle breakers - GOV.UK', 'eBay fraudster walks free after conning sellers out of thousands of pounds - Express']
summary:
['Simply download the eBay app and sign in to get started.
Buying and selling - make the eBay shopping app work for you:Advertisement• Get app-exclusive offers and discover online shopping deals.
• Tech - find tech deals for computers, smartwatches, game consoles, TVs and more.
Shop Certified Refurbished• Shop smart and get amazing certified refurbished deals on premium brands backed with a two-year warranty on certified refurbished products.
Make $$$ fast by selling on the eBay marketplaceList items quickly with handy sellers features to help you make money on the eBay marketplace.', '', 'SAN JOSE, Calif., June 25, 2021 /PRNewswire/ -- eBay Inc. (Nasdaq: EBAY), a global commerce leader that connects millions of buyers and sellers around the world, today announced that it has completed the transfer of its Classifieds business to Adevinta in exchange for $2.5 billion in cash and a 44% equity stake in Adevinta, equivalent to approximately 540 million shares.
"We are pleased to finalize the deal between Adevinta and eBay Classifieds, where the combination of these two companies will create a leading global online classifieds business," said Jamie Iannone, Chief Executive Officer, eBay.
"By joining Adevinta, the eBay Classifieds' business has an enormous opportunity ahead.
The completion of this transaction results in after tax net cash proceeds of approximately $2 billion.
With this transfer complete, the Company is updating its capital allocation plans for 2021 by increasing its estimated share buyback from $2.0 billion to $5.0 billion.', 'During a two-week trial in February, the Environment Agency (EA) and eBay UK joined forces to target vehicle breakers and parts sellers using the marketplace to advertise vehicle parts, including catalytic converters, without the correct environmental permits.
Hotspots identified by the Vehicle Recyclers’ Association (VRA) where illegal sellers operate are in Yorkshire, the West Midlands and Lancashire.
As part of action to tackle illegal vehicle breakers, eBay is contacting around 20,000 active sellers to prompt them to trade legally.
Charles Ambrose, Association Secretary at the Vehicle Recyclers’ Association, said:VRA is very pleased that the Environment Agency and eBay are working together with VRA to bear down on the scourge of unpermitted and illegal vehicle dismantlers.
You can check the seller has a permit from the Environment Agency to dismantle parts safely here.', 'Afeez Ilesanmi was spared jail despite the 'nasty scam'Afeez Ilesanmi, 35, was part of a group of people who made more than a dozen victims "feel like idiots" with a "nasty" scam.
They were sent to a number of addresses, including Ilesanmi's in Newton Heath, Manchester.
The buyers would then "disappear into the ether", said Josh Bowker, prosecuting, told Manchester Crown Court on Thursday.
In total, the group including Ilesanmi and "others unknown", pocketed £8,000 in goods and money.
The case was heard at Manchester Crown CourtThe court heard Ilesanmi, who has four children, was arrested in November 2018 and his home was searched.']

title: ['Shinsegae makes $3bn bet on online retail with eBay Korea buy - Nikkei Asia']
summary: ["SEOUL -- Shinsegae Group's $3 billion deal to buy eBay Korea vaults the South Korean retail giant into a three-way competition with Naver and fast-growing Coupang for the country's e-commerce market.\nShinsegae, which beat out a competing bid from rival retail group Lotte, will acquire 80% of the eBay unit's outstanding shares through core group company Emart, according to an announcement Thursday."]

Now McLaughlin is auctioning off five unique pairs of shoes, with all money raised going towards Stop AAPI Hate.
Footwear on offer includes a Nike ACG Windbreaker slip-on, ASICS water bottle slippers and Salomon hiking shoes, alongside a pair of strapped Nike x Mead School bag sandals, with some pairs costing up to $560 USD at the time of writing.
You can find out more about Nicole McLaughlin’s eBay auction here, with bidding set to run until July 1.
In other news, Jil Sander has celebrated personal style and freedom for Spring/Summer 2022.', 'A REALITY TV star paid £800 for an iPhone on eBay – and received a package containing a piece of A4 paper.

I wanted to buy my boyfriend a brand new iPhone 11 Pro, and I went on eBay and looked for the specification I wanted.
I felt sick.” Modina ShokeyeAnd Apple has said it gets millions of fake products every year removed from online marketplaces.
"Reviews are no longer a sign of trust online, as scammers simply bulk buy fake five star reviews.', 'Online advertising agency Adevinta has put Gumtree and Motors.co.uk up for sale after completing its drawn-out £6.6bn takeover of eBay Classifieds Group (eCG).
The Norwegian company has confirmed the biggest deal in the history of classified advertising but is being forced to sell Gumtree and Motors.co.uk in a bid to appease competition watchdogs.
Both companies are part of the eBay Motors group, along with eBay Motors.
The concerns arose as Adevinta owns Shpock, and eCG owns Gumtree – the two leading online classified ad sites in the UK.
He said: ‘This is a game-changing transaction for Adevinta, making us the world’s leading online classifieds group with leading market positions in 16 countries.', 'HILARIOUS Matt Hancock merch has flooded the internet in the wake of his affair with his closest aide being exposed.
Comical commodities including a £35 cutout of the ex-Health Secretary and birthday cards with witty slogans alluding to his extra-marital activities have appeared on eBay.
One stockist is auctioning off a life-size cutout of Mr Hancock that you can purchase for £34.97 and less than a handful are left.
Married Mr Hancock was branded a hypocrite for canoodling with his mistress despite preaching to the nation to hug “carefully”.

title: ['eBay Ordered to Stop Selling Unregistered, Misbranded Pesticides - EP Magazine', 'Coin set sells for £930 on eBay thanks to tiny error on 2p coin - check your piggy bank - The Mirror']
summary:
['eBay Ordered to Stop Selling Unregistered, Misbranded PesticidesThe U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) ordered eBay, out of its San, Jose headquarters, to stop selling unregistered and/or misbranded pesticide products.
The EPA amended the “Stop Sale Use or Removal Order” issued to eBay on June 10, 2020 to include the additional products.
According to a press release, after tips and complaints from consumers and members of the regulated community, the EPA identified 170 pesticides on eBay.com.
The EPA is authorized to issue a stop sale use or removal order whenever a violation of FIFRA is found regarding pesticides.
According to the press release, the amendment order also includes pesticides that eBay failed to stop selling after the June 10, 2020 order: “Virus Shut Out.” This is a spatial disinfection card that claims to protect the person wearing it against COVID-19.', 'Both the Great British 1983 Coin Collection, which was issued by Martini as part of a drinks promotion, and the Heinz Royal Mint Uncirculated Coin Collection 1983, could potentially contain the error coin.
In one recent sale, which ended on May 30, 2021, one of the Martini sets sold for £930 on eBay after attracting 25 bids following a seven-day auction.
It’s important to remember that this particular collection sold for a high amount as it contained the 2p error coin.
The Martini and Heinz sets without the error coin sell for around £10 on eBay.
Another error coin you should keep an eye out for include this “undated 20p” - one of which recently sold for £57 on eBay.']

All that’s to say, anything sold and shipped through eBay’s Certified Refurbished Program seems to live up to the marketing lingo and other selling points.', 'The limited release of “Firework” is already sold out.

The popularity of the colourful shoes is evident already, with shoppers so desperate to snap up a pair that they've not sold out online.

Comments on the UK video show sellers have pointed out some challenges:- Personalization is available only in certain categories.

If you've used eBay's personalization features as a buyer or seller, let us know what you think.", "eBay's (EBAY 2.82%) stock is on fire in 2021.
That has some investors raising the question: Is there room for eBay's stock to go even higher?
The organic customer interest during the pandemic allowed eBay to pull back promotional spending.
The expected dropoff from pandemic-boosted earnings levels could be one reason why eBay's stock can be had at a relatively inexpensive forward price-to-earnings ratio of 17.7.
So despite the run-up of eBay's stock price in 2021, there is room for it to go even higher from here.", 'SunJoeIf you’ve ever pondered the question “do I really need a power washer?” allow me to direct your attention to the pressure washer porn subreddit.
Starting at $89.99, these certified refurbished pressure washers turn home, outdoor and car-cleaning into a fun and shareable experience as opposed to a boring weekend chore.

If you’re looking for a little more bang for your buck, check out this $233.99 Sun Joe Brushless Induction Electric Pressure Washer.

title: ['Kurt Angle Reveals His Wife is Buying his Merchandise Back on eBay - EssentiallySports', 'Rare £2 error coin sells for £420 on eBay after massive bidding war – how to spot one in your change... - The Sun', 'Couple make stunning pergola from rotting decking with £3.99 eBay bargains - Manchester Evening News']
summary:
['Kurt Angle gave all his ring gear away to charityvia Imago Kurt Angle and Shawn Michaels (Photo by J. Shearer/WireImage for BWR Public Relations)The iconic Kurt Angle singlet remained a staple throughout his career.
ADVERTISEMENT Article continues below this adHowever, Angle revealed he gave away most of his ring gear to charity.

So that’s what we’re buying back; we’re not really buying the ring gear back, ’cause I gave that away.
Believe it or not, a gold medal is not really gold, it’s silver.”ADVERTISEMENT Article continues below this adFair to say if any man can take shots at the Olympics, it’s one who won a gold medal.', "A RARE £2 coin with a minting error on it has sold for £420 after collectors battled to bag it in a massive bidding war.
While the other side, which features the “Standing on the Shoulders of Giants” design, also has the same minting error.

A rare HG Wells £2 error coin could be worth up to £1,000 according to experts – here's how to spot if you have one.", 'One couple decided to embark on a DIY garden project but had to get over the challenge of rotting decking.
Leigh decided he wanted black composite decking, so once that was decided I was filled with ideas," Emma told LatestDeals.co.uk.
While Leigh sourced supplies for composite decking and a pergola, Emma got the rest of the decor - and lots of it came from Facebook Marketplace at bargain prices.

title: ['eBay Sellers Report Little Defense against Chargebacks - EcommerceBytes']
summary:
['Now that eBay has taken over payment processing from PayPal for a majority of US sellers, it's responsible for representing them when buyers report chargebacks to their credit card companies.
An eBay seller said that chargebacks appeared to be at an all-time high, and wrote:"Why does eBay, Adyen or whomever else is responsible not support sellers by giving them a chance to present their case to the processors that are initiating the chargebacks on behalf of their customers?
"Ebay really needs to be better about supporting sellers with chargebacks.
(It explains: "A payment dispute on eBay is created when a buyer initiates a chargeback or other type of dispute with their financial institution").
Does eBay have skin in the game when it comes to chargebacks?']

summary:

Iannone said the San Jose office began allowing workers to return on a voluntary basis as of today, and said some of eBay's other offices around the world have already opened.
"As we slowly start to come back to the office, that can bring its own range of challenges and emotions.

https://t.co/c9O7NQXTTm — VeChain Foundation (@vechainofficial) July 9, 2021VeChain (VET) Makes Its Way To The High Table As It Gains More Relevance In ChinaThe VeChain foundation has been announcing important partnerships recently.', 'Resellers have been listing tickets for the Euro 2020 final between England and Italy for nearly £9,000 on eBay.
Football touts have tried to use this opportunity to make a significant profit.
READ MORE:300,000 sign petition demanding extra Bank Holiday if England win final on SundayReselling football tickets has been illegal since 1994, unless done with permission of the club.
An eBay spokesperson said: "We ban the resale of football tickets, in line with UK laws and regulations.
Earlier this week touts resold tickets to the England vs Denmark Euros semi-final for up to 10 times their original price at £1,750 each.', 'After bringing thousands of pounds in cash, often to secluded locations across Oldham and Manchester, victims were set upon by masked robbers armed with guns, machetes or hammers.
Undercover officers were deployed to pose as potential customers and conduct surveillance to try and bring down the gang.
(Image: GMP)The gang used sophisticated methods to avoid detection, creating new email accounts, new eBay profiles and regularly changing phone numbers.
As the investigation gathered pace, GMP deployed two undercover officers to try and reel in the gang, posing as potential customers.
Greater Manchester court cases We have a dedicated Facebook group covering court cases across Greater Manchester.', 'Two unused condoms from Stereosonic’s 2012 electronic dance festival are selling on eBay for a micro $999 each.
A young Australian from Melbourne, known only to us as the_fly_catcher is selling a pair of 2012 Stereosonic condoms that were apparently handed out during a Tiësto set.

I’ve got my code, I’ve got my #stereosonic condoms – lets do this!

title: ['eBay Cancelled Orders Cost Sellers in Several Ways - EcommerceBytes']
summary:
['When a buyer cancels an order, sellers are not refunded the entire eBay fee.
When a buyer places an order, sellers enrolled in eBay managed payments pay a Final Value Fee (commission plus payment-processing fees) to eBay along with a 30-cent per-transaction fee.
"I just realized when you do this eBay then takes the cancel / refund money out of your "Available Funds" and charges you $.30 for canceling the order.
Cancelled orders can also cost the seller time in dealing first with the order, then with the cancellation.
Let us know if you have a pet peeve related to cancelled orders and if the frequency with which your buyers cancel orders has changed.']

title: ["Strategies for Underdogs: How Alibaba's Taobao Beat eBay in China - Harvard Business School Working Knowledge"]
summary:
['I must have taught the Taobao case dozens of times.
Felix Oberholzer-Gee: The big question is really how you compete as a smaller player against the big platform.
The question then is, "If the big platform is so far ahead, what can you do to catch up?"
For instance, if you have an idea that involves significant fixed cost, that's probably not a leading candidate to compete against the big platform, because the big platform can spread fixed costs much more easily than you can.
The first really big business that he built is Alibaba, the name of the group today.']

title: ['eBay Sellers Are Having Problems Listing Items - EcommerceBytes', 'eBay taps computer vision to transform online shopping - VentureBeat', 'OpenBazaar Co-Founder Explains Why Web 3’s Answer to eBay Folded Its Tents - CoinDesk']
summary:
['eBay sellers began having problems listing items several days ago.
On Tuesday , one seller said they were unable to list anything and were getting the red eBay error message, "Sorry, something went wrong.
eBay is no longer accepting a Condition value of "-" so I need to select a Condition value of "New" or "Used" to get past the error message."
There was no acknowledgement or response on the thread from eBay moderators.
Let us know if you had problems and when they started, and if the condition field workaround works for you.', 'Learn MoreWhen eBay rolled out image-based search for shoppers nearly four years ago, the company was among the first to deploy computer vision technology in ecommerce.
Mekel-Bobrov discussed the challenges of developing image-based search technology, the essential elements of any AI strategy, and what’s next in computer vision.
“A lot of the workflows needed reworking to allow for integration of computer vision capabilities.”Additionally, ecommerce category taxonomy changes based on the market and inventory.
The ecommerce giant is now “turbocharging” its platform to make computer vision an integral part of the experience for both buyers and sellers, Mekel-Bobrov said.
“Doing that at a scale requires a lot of creative thinking and advanced technologies like computer vision.”', "As to why OpenBazaar didn’t take off for mainstream usage, there are countless possible reasons.
The biggest one I can point to is that crypto, particularly bitcoin, evolved from a cheap, cash alternative into a store of value – a digital gold – that didn’t make it conducive to daily Amazon-type e-commerce purchases.
When Ethereum came along and took the dapp thunder from Bitcoin, we were hesitant to get on board.
I’m not certain if that would have necessarily helped as there haven't yet been any Ethereum-based alternatives to OpenBazaar that have gained much traction.
Most have pivoted to digital-only goods or [non-fungible token] sales, which are far better suited for the instantaneous nature of cryptocurrency."]

title: ["Here's How eBay Became an Online Marketplace Powerhouse ... - TheStreet", 'Steam Deck reservations are already selling on eBay for absolutely ... - PC Gamer', 'This shag-adelic custom Ford van with only 873 miles is the best kind of flashback - Autoblog']
summary:
['', 'Steam Deck reservations went live today, and the online auction site eBay (opens in new tab) is already swimming in "confirmed order pre-sales" at prices far above cost.
The lowest price I've seen on a 512GB unit is $949; at least one true optimist is asking for more than double that amount.
And they are selling: This 256GB model (opens in new tab) went for $850, while this 512GB unit (opens in new tab) was a comparative steal at $975.
(Image credit: Valve)The more likely explanation, though, is that Steam Deck reservations are currently only available in the US, UK, EU, and Canada.
We managed to place a couple of Steam Deck reservations not too long after they went live, but many have experienced server errors and other problems.', "The custom van craze of the 1970s was huge, but relatively few have survived.
All of which makes this 1974 Ford Econoline, with just 873 miles from new, a most unusual time capsule.
And it's for sale right now on eBay Motors, offered by Classic Auto Mall.
Bought new from Miller McVeigh Ford of State College, Pennsylvania, in November 1974, this Econoline sold new for $6,791.02.
Brown, and his Econoline Custom 100 was equipped with a 302-cubic-inch V8, three-on-the-tree, and a high-output heater."]

I paid via PAYPAL as pigs will fly before I give eBay my credit card information.
I was able to walk him thru the MP steps, etc, and he said no, he wasn't going to complete the transaction thru eBay.

You don't have the recourse like you do if you use a credit card."]

title: ['eBay Scammer Sentenced to 14 Years - EcommerceBytes', 'LaMelo Ball Rookie Card Picks, Hottest eBay Auctions - Sports Collectors Daily', 'Steam Deck Reservations Are Already Selling On eBay For Upto ... - Techstory']
summary:
['The government said the head of an eBay sales scam was sentenced to over 14 years in prison after accusing him of pretending to part of an eBay program in order steal money through fake car sales.
The Department of Justice said the Ohio man pleaded guilty in July 2019 to conspiring to commit money laundering.
As part of his sentencing, he is ordered to pay over $10 million in restitution.
According to the government press release, the scheme took place from 2015 until October 2018:“He and the other co-conspirators were part of a network that attracted online customers through fraudulent postings for vehicle sales.
“Defendants communicated with victims through email and phone, posing as employees of eBay, and used third parties to open bank accounts in the names of shell corporations that appeared to be affiliated with eBay.', '', 'On Friday Valve announced that Steam Deck resellers are already started to take advantage of the situation.
To try to curb unauthorized resellers who raise prices, reserving a Steam Deck requires a valid Steam account with a good reputation.
Resellers are selling pre-orders for Steam Deck handheld for thousands of dollars above MSRP.
In addition, your Steam account must meet a certain number of requirements such as being in a valid region and making a Steam purchase before June 2021.
Once these $5 are included in the final purchase price, you are bound to the Steam Deck model you have pre-ordered.']

title: ['A Used 2021 Ford Bronco Is Already Over $100K on eBay - The Drive', 'Interview: Sneaker Authenticator Jasmine Habbouchi Sniffs out Fakes for eBay AU - Complex']
summary:
['Patience is a virtue and hopeful Ford Bronco owners are running out of it.
One lucky Bronco buyer who got theirs early has already listed it on eBay, and bidding has been pushed past $100,000.

It looks like they might double their money by scoring the first Bronco delivered in Tennessee.
When automotive writer and photographer Zerin Dube shared the eBay ad on Twitter, it showed a $99,600 bid with "reserve not met" directly underneath.', 'eBay Australia has linked up with Sneaker Con to authenticate the sneakers we’re buying and selling on the platform.
The local authentication couldn’t come soon enough on the booming reselling platforml someone in Australia buys a pair of sneakers every two minutes on eBay.
I saw the Sneaker Con Authenticator role advertised in my circles and knew I had to apply.
The authentication process starts even before you even open the shoe box.
Counterfeiters often focus on the sneaker itself and don’t put in the effort or resources to match the packaging exactly.']

title: ["A Rare Nintendo 'Kirby' e-Reader Card From E3 2002 Has Popped ... - HYPEBEAST", 'Profile: Michaela Edwards Runs Money for eBay Billionaire Jeff Skoll - Business Insider', 'EBay’s Drinking Culture Contributed to Misdeeds, Ex-Worker Says - Bloomberg']

This card was part of Nintendo’s e-Reader series of collectible cards that could be read on the GameBoy Advance (GBA) for special items and unlocked features.
This particular Kirby card was handed out at the 2002 E3 event where only 100 cards would garner a second-place prize and only 10 for the first-place prize.
This card is extremely rare as all existing first-place cards were either redeemed or destroyed.
In other gaming news, Collectors Universe purchases Wata Games grading company.', 'Capricorn was initially founded as the family office for Jeffrey Skoll and the Skoll Foundation.
She told Insider what it's like to work in the "quirky" yet quiet world of family offices.
Founded in 2004 as the family office and foundation for billionaire eBay co-founder Jeffrey Skoll, the Palo Alto, California-based firm now manages more than $8 billion for foundations, sovereign wealth funds, pension funds, and family offices, including Skoll's own assets.
"And we saw that specifically on the environmental side, how family offices often were early on the adaptation of integrating that into portfolios."
There's a lot of collaboration happening across family offices about this topic."', 'Why did this happen?

title: ['eBay UK records a 237% boom in small shops starting up on its ... - InternetRetailing', 'Lawsuit: eBay tried to “terrorize, stalk, and silence” couple that ran news site - Ars Technica', "Amazon and eBay next in line for ACCC's digital platforms assault - ZDNet", 'Natick couple stalked and harassed by eBay files suit - The Boston Globe', 'Couple in eBay harassment case sues company, ex-officials - The Associated Press']
summary:
['According to eBay’s data, these businesses have sold over 72 million items to eBay UK’s 29 million person shopper base in the past year.
New package of helpAs high streets and small businesses enjoy the final phase of lockdown restrictions lifting, eBay UK is also committing to help entrepreneurs survive and thrive beyond the pandemic, as part of the Small Business Power campaign.
It also provides coupons and discounts for eBay shoppers to incentivise purchasing from small businesses.
The support package offers new players investment in training programmes to help sellers make the most of the eBay platform, as well as greater investment in marketing our small business sellers across TV, social, print and online media.
It is now more important than ever to shop small and shop local – whether that is in-store or online – and to keep supporting and celebrating the power of small businesses.', 'Defendants include eBay itself, former eBay CEO Devin Wenig; former eBay Chief Communications Officer Steven Wymer; and Progressive F.O.R.C.E Concepts (PFC), a security firm that employed Cooke as a contractor before he became a full-time eBay employee.
"eBay... engaged in a coordinated effort to intimidate, threaten to kill, torture, terrorize, stalk and silence the Steiners, in order to stifle their reporting on eBay," the lawsuit alleged.
Four other former eBay security employees pleaded guilty in October 2020.
While the harassment case involves only eBay, the sentencing memorandum noted a similar drinking culture at Facebook.
"I did not know about the drinking culture at eBay and Facebook," Cooke's wife said in a statement quoted in the memorandum.', 'Screenshot: Asha Barbaschow/ZDNetOnline retail marketplaces operating in Australia such as eBay, Amazon, Catch.com.au, and Kogan are the latest companies to fall under the Australian Competition and Consumer Commission's (ACCC) microscope, with the watchdog concerned about potential competition and consumer issues within that space.
"While general online retail marketplaces provide benefits to sellers and consumers, concerns have been raised to the ACCC about the conduct of some marketplaces and the risk of harm to both sellers and consumers," it said.
It is also asking if competition, or potential competition, in the supply of online marketplaces services been affected by acquisitions of tech platforms and companies, including startups, the acquisition or development of new tech, and the expansion into Australia for international businesses.
The ACCC will also consider the degree to which brick and mortar sales, online sales direct from a retailer's website, comparison or referral services, and classifieds competitively constrain general online retail marketplaces.
For 2020, eBay Australia reported AU$6.5 billion in gross sales revenue, Amazon reported AU$2.6 billion, Kogan with just shy of AU$1.1 billion, and Catch generated AU$610 million.', 'After Wenig repeatedly complained to subordinates about the couple’s newsletter, eBay employees threatened the couple online and sent them items including live insects, a bloody pig mask, and a funeral wreath, according to previous criminal charges .
The harassment escalated in August 2019 when eBay employees traveled to Natick to stalk the couple in person.
A Natick couple subjected to a bizarre harassment and stalking campaign by eBay employees sued the e-commerce giant in federal court on Wednesday, alleging they had been emotionally and psychologically tortured.
The eBay story became public last year when federal prosecutors charged several members of the harassment team with criminal infractions.
Ina and David Steiner waited for their attorney, Rosemary Scapicchio, after they talked to the media Wednesday.', 'A Massachusetts couple subjected to threats and other bizarre harassment from former eBay Inc. employees filed a civil lawsuit against the Silicon Valley giant on Wednesday, July 21, 2021.
(AP Photo/Wilfredo Lee, File)FILE - In this July 11, 2019 file photo, an eBay app is shown on a mobile phone in Miami.
A Massachusetts couple subjected to threats and other bizarre harassment from former eBay Inc. employees filed a civil lawsuit against the Silicon Valley giant on Wednesday, July 21, 2021.
(AP Photo/Wilfredo Lee, File)BOSTON (AP) — A Massachusetts couple subjected to threats and other bizarre harassment from former eBay Inc. employees filed a civil lawsuit against the Silicon Valley giant on Wednesday.
“The events from 2019 should never have happened, and as eBay expressed to the Steiners, we are very sorry for what they endured.”Several former eBay employees were charged last June for their roles in the harassment campaign.']

title: ['2021 Ford Bronco First Edition Listed for $150,000 on eBay - MotorTrend', '3 Reasons to Consider Buying eBay Stock Right Now - The Motley Fool', 'eBay removes all Steam Deck listings to combat scalpers - NME']
summary:
['As it turns out, dealerships aren't the only salespeople cashing in on the all-new Ford Bronco craze and inflating sticker prices due to high demand and low supply.
Ford has experienced production delays due to the pandemic and a shortage of semiconductor chips, which has pushed back deliveries of its vehicles in general—the Bronco included—and resulted in canceled orders.
Even more outrageous, in some cases, the Bronco listed for sale with a fat markup has not made it out of the factory yet.
This price hiking mania brings us to the four-door 2021 Ford Bronco First Edition, starting at just over $63,000, limited to 7,000 units, and completely sold out.
As first reported by Motor1, there is currently a First Edition Bronco listed for sale on eBay as "used" for a whopping $150,000.', 'eBay (EBAY 2.82%) stock has been on a tear in 2021.
Here are three reasons why eBay stock is a nice choice for investors.
From the fourth quarter of 2019 to the first quarter of 2021, eBay added 13 million active buyers.
With the program in place, investors can be less fearful of a large drop in its share price.
That way, if there is a crash in the share price, part of your purchases will be at a lower price and therefore lower your overall cost basis.', 'eBay has removed every listing for sale of Steam Deck reservations from its site.
Valve’s handheld PC system, the Steam Deck, is set to release next year.
These reservations rapidly reached eBay, where listings offered Steam Deck reservations for more than the console’s price.
AdvertisementeBay spoke to Eurogamer to say that the orders were removed because of a breach of their presale policy.
“To comply with eBay’s presale policy, listings must clearly indicate that they are ‘presale’ items and must guarantee postage within 30 days of purchase.']

title: ['Seller Asks Why eBay Overcharges Buyers on Shipping - EcommerceBytes', 'Zirkelstein “Tabletop” mountain in Germany Listed on eBay - The Real Deal', 'Jalen Hurts Rookie Card Picks; Hottest eBay Auctions - Sports Collectors Daily']
summary:
["One of my accounts, the one I've used the longest has, since free shipping became a thing, offered that service.
There, I charge shipping for the majority of the items I sell.
I also explained that the buyer also paid tax on the excess shipping charge.
I also told them I have sent messages to buyers and they've never gotten a refund for overpaying on shipping.
I have a feeling eBay has found yet another way to make money meanwhile overcharging and over taxing my customers.", 'A literally picturesque “tabletop” mountain in Germany is on the market for $235,000.
The Zirkelstein is part of the Elbe Sandstone Mountains and is Saxon Switzerland’s smallest table hill, according to Zenger News.
The property consists of a wooded hill with a 130-foot-tall sandstone formation at its center, the Zirkelstein’s defining feature.
While the Zirkelstein is the smallest of the area’s tabletop hills, that doesn’t make it any less impressive than its larger counterparts.
The surrounding forest includes public footpaths and so the new owner will not have exclusive use of the property.', '']

title: ['This 2021 Ford Bronco First Edition Is Listed on eBay for $150,000 - Car and Driver', "'What We Do In The Shadows' Teases An eBay Sale In Season 3 ... - UPROXX", 'eBay making efforts to shut down Steam Deck reservation scalpers - Destructoid', "eBay Seller Hit by Low-Feedback Buyer Who Won't Pay - EcommerceBytes", 'Score Massive Apple MacBook Deals With eBay Certified ... - IGN', 'Former Santa Clara Cop Phil Cooke Pleads for Leniency in eBay Harassment Conspiracy - The Silicon Valley Voice', 'eBay partners with Orange Connex, Hermes and Royal Mail to ... - Motor Transport']
summary:
["A four-door 2021 Ford Bronco First Edition finished in Area 51 is listed on eBay for $150,000.
The sold-out First Edition was limited to 7000 units, and it starts at $62,605 for the four-door.
The First Edition is powered by a 330-hp twin-turbo V-6 and comes with the Sasquatch package that adds 35-inch tires.
Ford's new Bronco has started shipping to reservation holders, and included in the nearly 200,000 reserved off-road SUVs is a batch of the limited-production First Edition model.
The Bronco First Edition was limited to 7000 units, and they're all accounted for, but someone has already listed one on eBay in Long Island, NY, for an absurd price of $150,000.", 'Get ready to do your “dark bidding on the internet” because the vampires from What We Do in the Shadows are parting with several occult oddities in the latest trailer for the show’s third season.
In the trailer, Nandor’s (Kayvan Novak) over-worked and under-appreciated familiar Guillermo (Harvey Guillén) is seen assisting the vampires with some spring cleaning as he photographs items such as a loose bone, an evil bucket, and a tried-and-true “sex rock” and posts them on eBay to sell.
While the clip doesn’t give us a whole lot of information in regards to what the FX series’ third season has in store for us, it does remind us just how much we miss Nandor, Nadja (Natasia Demetriou), Laszlo (Matt Berry), Colin (Mark Proksch), and all their zany hijinks.
Luckily we won’t be waiting too much longer to reunite with our undead friends and see how many pennies their creepy clutter earns them.
Season 3 of What We Do in the Shadows premieres on FX on September 2, with episodes available for streaming the next day on both Hulu and FX.', 'Hold on to your $2000, sports fansIn inevitable events, online auction house eBay was overrun last week with new listings of Valve’s Steam Deck, mere hours after the manufacturer shut the door on reservations for its new handheld gaming system.
Of course, the Steam Deck is currently not scheduled to start rolling out customer orders until the end of 2021 at the earliest.
“We understand how frustrating it can be for gamers to see overpriced listings for presale hardware,” said eBay in a statement to Eurogamer.
“To comply with eBay’s presale policy, listings must clearly indicate that they are ‘presale’ items and must guarantee postage within 30 days of purchase.
Steam Deck will enter its order availability phase in early 2022, allowing reservists to place an official order for the hardware.', 'Dear Ina,eBay at one time had a listing option that was in essence: "block bids from potential buyers with a feedback rating of less than 5."
Did that get purged with the newer "we love buyers, sellers not so much" corporate strategy?
I've been screwed again by low-feedback buyers that won't pay.', "I have always recommended certified refurbished tech for maximizing value, and I speak from my own experience when I say the savings are absolutely worth it.
In 2015 I bought a refurbished MacBook Air (the same model available at eBay right now for $429) and I still use it to this day and have had zero issues with it.
Certified Refurbished Apple MacBook DealsApple Certified Refurbished MacBooks Whether you're looking for a MacBook Pro with Touchbar or just a super-light and capable MacBook Air, eBay's refurb line is stacked with options and the savings are legit.
It's called the bathtub curve because it's shaped like a bathtub.
Everything available through eBay's certified refurbished program comes with a 2-year warranty.", 'After release, Cooke will be required to perform 100 hours of community service and get therapy at his own expense.
With four other former eBay employees — including another former SCPD captain, Brian Gilbert — Cooke was charged early last summer in the conspiracy and a cover-up scheme that would enlist Santa Clara police.
“As a retired police captain with 27 years’ service, Cooke should have appreciated the impact a fraction of this conduct would have on the victims.
Winkler argued that Cooke was a well-liked community leader whose foray into felony resulted from post-retirement boredom and alcoholism.
Cooke’s sentencing hearing is currently scheduled for July 27 while Gilbert’s is currently scheduled for September 30.', 'Online grocery retailer Ocado has said its second customer fulfilment centre in Dordon, Warwickshire, will commence operations in February next year.
Equipment installation at the warehouse is almost complete and testing has been underway since May, the firm confirmed.
The project “remains in line with budget”, it said.
The retailer, which also announced it had […]']

title: ['Daft Punk rare prototype jacket available to buy on eBay for $10,000 - We Rave You', '2021 Ford Bronco First Edition For Sale On eBay With $150K Asking Price - Ford Authority', 'Former eBay Employee Sentenced for Role in Aggressive ... - Department of Justice', "Former eBay employee gets 18 months in prison for 'abominable ... - Reuters"]
summary:
['A jacket has been put on the buying and selling website, which happens to be a prototype of the leather jackets that Daft Punk had worn for years on end, custom-made for them back in 2005.
Designed by Hedi Slimane, the Dior green leather jacket prototype was based off the final design which they have been seen wearing in photo shoots, live shows and also in their ‘Epilogue’ video where the news of their split first broke.
In the listing description, it states:‘Very rare forest green Dior Homme prototype/sample Daft Punk leather jacket from Fall/Winter 2005.
Designed by Hedi Slimane, this all green leather version of the Daft Punk leather jacket features incredible leather ribbing detail throughout the entire jacket.
Certainly a rare chance to own a huge piece of electronic music history, the person who buys this will be very lucky.', '', 'BOSTON – A former supervisor of security operations for eBay’s was sentenced today for his role in a cyberstalking campaign targeting a Natick, Mass.
It is alleged that in August 2019, the defendants executed a three-part harassment campaign against the Natick couple.
The third phase of the campaign allegedly involved surveilling the victims in their home and community.
Aware that the police were investigating, the defendants allegedly sought to interfere with the investigation.
As the police and eBay’s lawyers continued to investigate, the defendants allegedly deleted digital evidence that showed their involvement, further obstructing what had by then become a federal investigation.', '[1/4] Former police captain who went on to work for eBay Inc Philip Cooke arrives at court for sentencing in his cyberstalking case in Boston, Massachusetts, U.S., July 27, 2021.
REUTERS/Nicholas PfosiBOSTON, July 27 (Reuters) - A former supervisor for security operations at eBay Inc (EBAY.O) was sentenced on Tuesday to 18 months in prison for his role in a cyberstalking campaign that targeted a Massachusetts couple whose online newsletter was viewed as critical of the e-commerce company.
U.S. District Judge Allison Burroughs called the employees' actions "really abominable" as she sentenced Cooke, who must also serve a year of home detention and pay a $15,000 fine.
Prosecutors said Cooke participated in an August 2019 planning meeting in which eBay employees discussed targeting the couple with threatening messages; unwanted deliveries like a bloody Halloween pig mask; and covert surveillance.
Cooke, in court, said he should have sought to prevent what became "horrific behavior to please the boss."']

title: ['Puma boxer briefs are 3 for $9 on eBay - SFGATE', 'A Ford Bronco First Edition Has Been Listed On eBay For $175,000 - CarScoops', 'eBay rolls out end-to-end fulfillment service in UK - Parcel and Postal Technology International', 'eBay manager imprisoned for harassment of journalists the CEO wanted to “take down” - Ars Technica', 'Bose, Sony, and Beats Headphones Up to 50% Off on eBay ... - IGN']
summary:
['Puma briefsLike many Millennials born in the late 80s, I was able to watch sites like Amazon, Google, and eBay evolve from clunky web pages to multi-billion dollar companies run by lizard people.
So it’s still funny to see deals like this 3-pack of Puma boxer briefs for $9 knowing it came from a website where I once bought a pirated DVD of Tenacious D’s HBO show.
Either way, it’s a deal worth jumping on.
Available in three colors (blue, red, and black) and sizes ranging from S - XL, these genuine Puma boxer briefs are made of breathable, anti-odor fabric that naturally wicks away moisture from sweat and irritation-prone... uh, body parts.', 'The 2021 Ford Bronco is proving to be very popular, so much so that many dealerships are hitting the off-roader with huge premiums.
The 2021 Bronco in question is a First Edition model and has been listed up for sale on eBay with an eye-watering price tag of $175,000.
Read Also: Ford Bronco Owners Report Quality Issues With Hardtop RoofsFord launched the Bronco First Edition exactly 12 months ago and initially intended on building just 3,500 examples.
Shoppers could purchase the Bronco First Edition in both two-door and four-door guise, and this one is a four-door.
advertisement scroll to continueTo put the $175,000 asking price of this example into perspective, four-door Bronco First Edition models ‘only’ cost $63,500 when ordered new from the factory.', "Online marketplace eBay is to roll out a new service in the UK, eBay fulfilment by Orange Connex, which it says is the first end-to-end fulfillment service for UK sellers, providing faster delivery options, improved logistics management, more streamlined processes and enhanced seller protection.')
} // --> ') } else { console.log ('nompuad'); document.write('') } // -->eBay business sellers will have access to dedicated fulfillment centers in Leicester and Birmingham, where goods can be stored, packed and delivered.
eBay UK is collaborating with global logistics firm Orange Connex to launch the service, which offers next-day delivery, same-day handling, a fully tracked service and late cut-off times to buyers.
The launch follows the rollout of similar end-to-end fulfillment services in Germany and China, which eBay says have been a success.
“At eBay, we’ve been making big investments in the UK to help our sellers grow, recently offering a financing scheme to give businesses much-needed access to finance.", "A former eBay security manager who pleaded guilty for his role in a cyberstalking conspiracy was sentenced to 18 months in prison yesterday.
Philip Cooke, former senior manager of security operations for eBay's Global Security Team, pleaded guilty in October 2020 to one count of conspiracy to commit cyberstalking and one count of conspiracy to commit witness tampering.
Cooke was one of seven eBay employees accused of harassment involving sending threatening messages and deliveries of live cockroaches, a funeral wreath, and a bloody pig mask to the couple's home.
The employees are Brian Gilbert, former senior manager of special operations for eBay's Global Security Team; Stephanie Stockwell, former manager of eBay's Global Intelligence Center; Stephanie Popp, eBay's former senior manager of Global Intelligence; and Veronica Zea, a former eBay contractor who was an intelligence analyst in eBay Global Intelligence.
Additionally, the Steiners filed a civil lawsuit against eBay, Wenig, Wymer, Baugh, Harville, and the former eBay employees who pleaded guilty.", "Certified refurbished headphones at eBay are basically like receiving a brand new product, but at the fraction of the price, you might expect.
This means you can get the best headphones from the likes of Bose, Sony, Apple, and more for even less.
Here are some of our favorite deals on headphones at eBay right now.
Certified Refurbished Headphone Deals at eBayCertified refurbished shouldn't be a scary phrase for gamers, especially those on a budget.
eBay will provide a 2-year warranty on any of its certified refurbished gear, so go nuts, and save some money along the way."]

title: ['Apple Pay now offered for eBay purchases made on desktop - AppleInsider', 'PayPal Falls On Worries Over Erosion Of eBay Business - Yahoo Finance', 'EBay looks to cash in on trading cards boom - CNN']
summary:
["Read our ethics policyArticle Hero ImageOnline retailer and auction site eBay has rolled out support for Apple Pay on its desktop website.
Support for Apple Pay has already existed in eBay's mobile apps for a significant period of time, but the move to support Apple Pay on desktop seems to be new.
Users who use their Apple Card for eBay purchases will receive 2% cashback as part of the Apple Card rewards program.
Apple continues to develop and expand its Apple Pay services as more users begin utilizing contactless payment methods.
Recently, Apple launched new Apple Wallet and Apple Pay webpages, designed to help users better understand the services.", 'eBay marketplaces represented 4% of its total payments volume in the second quarter compared to 17% in second quarter five years ago.
PayPal expects that to further dilute to less than 3% as it exits 2021, calling eBay marketplaces a headwind to its growth in 2021.
Total revenue in the second quarter rose 19% to $6.24 billion, missing the estimated $6.27 billion.
PayPal said it expects third-quarter net revenue to be in the range of about $6.15 billion to $6.25 billion and adjusted EPS at $1.07.
Related ArticlesPayPal Falls On Worries Over Erosion Of eBay BusinessU.S. charges Nikola founder Trevor Milton with lying to investorsForget NIO, These 4 Auto Manufacturers Are Better Buys', 'The sports trading card market alone is worth more than $5 billion, according to various industry group estimates.
It’s huge,” she said, adding that Pokémon card trading has been “on fire” lately, too.
Buying and selling trading cards is a giant business for eBay.
She said that eBay had 20 million new listings for trading cards in the first quarter, with 139 cards selling per minute.
But eBay faces tough competition in the collectibles world, particularly from upstarts selling digital trading cards via non-fungible tokens, or NFTs.']

title: ['How I buy designer dresses and shoes at bargain prices on eBay and Depop including £700 Louboutin heels... - The Sun', 'Port Authority to eBay and Craigslist: No more fake paper license ... - NorthJersey.com', 'Amazon plunge drags down eBay, Etsy and Wayfair as investors fret over slowing growth - CNBC', 'A three-pack of Google Nest Minis is only $64 at eBay right now - The Verge', 'A Former eBay Employee Has Been Sentenced To 18 Months In Prison For Cyberstalking Campaign - Wonderful Engineering']
summary:
["A MUM-of-two has shared her savvy shopping secrets after snapping up designer dresses and shoes at bargain prices via eBay and Depop.
While doing so she learned about some second-hand shopping websites such as Depop, a fashion app where you can buy and sell second-hand clothes.
If I decided to sell one of my Victoria Beckham dresses I'll probably get back what I bought it for.
It’s worth remembering that you can set up alerts for brands or specific items on websites like eBay or Vestiaire Collective.
Etsy bought Depop for £1.2bn earlier this year so we explain how it could affect users.", "The Port Authority of New York & New Jersey sent a letter to eBay and Craigslist requesting that the two websites crack down on the sale of fake paper license plates that the Port Authority says are being used by drivers to avoid paying tolls.
Michael Farbiarz, general counsel for the Port Authority, sent the letter to his counterparts at eBay and Craigslist on July 29.
The Port Authority collects tolls on bridges and tunnels by scanning license plates and routing the charge to the driver.
On July 29, Port Authority police arrested a Roselle man for allegedly selling fake paper license plates to undercover officers, according to the Hudson County Prosecutor's Office.
In the letter, Farbiarz said that the Port Authority would assist both eBay and Craigslist in identifying fake plates for sale on the websites.", "E-commerce stocks sank Friday after Amazon , the largest U.S. e-retailer, reported disappointing results and gave a weaker-than-expected outlook for the third quarter.
Amazon said revenue growth slowed in the second quarter to 27% from 41% a year earlier, when the company got a boost from stay-at-home orders during the pandemic.
Earnings beat expectations, but investors are typically more focused on Amazon's growth trajectory than its profitability.
During the pandemic, e-commerce companies across the board picked up business, benefiting their growth rates and lifting their stock prices.
But after a year of outsized expansion, investors have been gearing up for a slowdown in the second half of 2021.", 'Like Amazon’s Echo Dot, the Google Nest Mini is a miniature take on the larger smart speakers that came before it.
Apple’s MagSafe Battery Pack has officially arrived, however, if you’re looking for a cheaper means for charging your iPhone 12, 12 Pro, or an older device that supports Qi charging, there’s always Apple’s MagSafe Charger.
The simple, wired accessory attaches magnetically to the latest iPhone 12 models and allows for 15-watt charging speeds when paired with a 20-watt power brick (sold separately).
Normally $40, Apple’s MagSafe Charger is currently available at Woot for $30, matching its best-ever price.
Apple MagSafe Charger $ 30 $ 40 25 % off $ 30 $ 30 $ 40 25 % off Apple’s wired MagSafe Charger is nothing short of convenient.', 'AdvertisementA former security operations manager for eBay Inc. was sentenced to 18 months in prison Tuesday for his involvement in a massive campaign to terrorize and intimidate a Massachusetts couple editor and publisher of an online newsletter.
Cooke, A retired police captain in Santa Clara, Calif, was sentenced for “abominable” actions taken by him.
According to federal prosecutors, several other eBay employees led by executives have also pleaded guilty to the scheme.
They directed threatening messages to the Steiners in 2019.
In a statement responding to that lawsuit, eBay apologized to the couple and said that it fully cooperated with authorities during their inquiry.']

eBay and other responsible online retailers need to be more cognizant of these issues, and much more thorough in how they prevent them from making it to sale."
Welcoming eBay's removal of the items, he added: "This ought to mark a sea change for companies and responsible online retailing when it comes to glorifying these groups."', 'When it comes to discounts on major brand TV sets, very few retailers can match the value for money found on eBay, which is why we’ve rounded up the website’s best deals for you right here.
If you’re looking to spend around or over £1000 then you’re much better looking at the premium OLED sets that are available.

Top 4K UHD TV DealsThey might be at the cheaper end of the spectrum, but there’s nothing to turn your nose up at with a solid 4K TV.
Be sure to keep coming back as this page will be updated regularly with the latest deals and offers.', 'It's always been about the fans more than it is about the athletes," said Emmitt Smith, Founder of PROVA Group.
Founder and CEO of Notable Live, Mike Antonucci says, "As a fan, you always want to get closer to the game and to the players who inspire you.
Connect with Notable Live at www.notable.live or on Instagram , Facebook or Twitter .
Using modern technology, PROVA Group has developed a lifetime provenance system that closes the gaps in today's witnessed authentication practices and adds accountability where little to none currently exists.
Connect with PROVA Group, Inc. at www.provagroup.com .', 'The anonymous eBayer turned to online shopping to drown his sorrows after watching England lose in the Euro 2020 final against Italy, which was, of course, a sad evening for many.
Image: Spotted Whitwick/Facebook) Spotted Whitwick/Facebook) Image: Spotted Whitwick/Facebook) Spotted Whitwick/Facebook)In fact, it wasn't until the next day, when he received a shipping notification confirming his purchase was on its way, that he remembered the looming sex doll, and by this time it was too late to cancel it.
The shopper then goes on to reveal that upon opening the package, he immediately wanted to get rid of the creepy purchase.
Unsurprisingly, people were left bemused by the drunken mishap, with several Facebook users even offering to "take it off their hands."
If you message me privately, we'll come get it in the box, take her away and throw her on the bonfire.', 'Following a memorandum of understanding, the Dubai Chamber of Commerce and Industry and eBay have partnered up to launch a program to help Chamber members and UAE businesses expand globally and boost online sales worldwide by utilizing eBay.com.
With the eBay for Business – UAE Program, UAE companies will receive practical training and tailor-made support to start a new store and scale their businesses on eBay.com, including customized support from eBay's team.
"During the COVID-19 crisis, eBay experienced an extensive growth of 28% in new UAE sellers joining eBay, with an UAE seller selling an item every 90 seconds on the platform," he points out.

Currently, there are around 5,000 UAE-based companies currently selling on eBay and over 300,00 items exported by UAE sellers during 2020 alone.']

title: ['How do you cancel a bid on eBay?... - The US Sun', 'Video Couple speaks out about alleged harassment by eBay ... - ABC News', 'eBay Sneakers Review: How the new buying and selling platform works - Insider', 'What Is the New eBay Voices? - EcommerceBytes', 'eBay interviews pre-loved items on talk show via McCann - Mumbrella', "Multiple Sports Card Dealers Ranked Among World's Top 100 eBay ... - Sports Collectors Daily"]
summary:
['But how does bidding on the online auction site work, and how do you cancel a bid?
Enter the item number, the username of the member whose bid you're cancelling, and the reason you're cancelling the bid.
Select "cancel bid".
A buyer requests you cancel their bid and you agreeYou have to end the listing early because the item is no longer available for saleYou made an error in the listingYou're concerned the bid may be from a fraudulent buyer2) How do you remove a bid on eBay as a buyer?
If you're not able to retract your bid, you can also try contacting the seller to see if they'll cancel your bid for you.', 'Couple speaks out about alleged harassment by eBay executives David and Ina Steiner filed a lawsuit alleging they were the victims of a "systematic campaign to emotionally and psychologically torture" the pair "in order to stifle their reporting on eBay."', "Collectors have been using eBay to buy and sell sneakers for years, and the platform just got better.
Sneaker collectors have been using eBay as a place to buy and sell rare and expensive kicks since the early 2000s.
Earlier this year, I purchased a pair of Union Los Angeles x Air Jordan 4s using the new eBay Sneakers format, and the process was seamless.
Before the new eBay Sneakers format, you could expect to hand over roughly 10% of earnings in fees.
If you were ever hesitant about using eBay to buy sneakers, don't be.", 'Now, eBay has a new Voices program on its seller discussion boards, describing it as "a new place for sellers to provide category-specific recommendations to eBay, currently only for Collectibles."
Last week, eBay announced the " Voices: for Collectibles " board, explaining, "This is a space where Collectibles sellers can share category-specific ideas for improvement with the Collectibles Category Manager.
All sellers are able to "like" other sellers' posts, but only Voices Sellers are able to post.
It isn't clear why only "Voices Sellers" are able to post or who is allowed into the Voices program - and it appears it's by invitation only.
What do you think of the current Voices program, and how you think it differs from the eBay Weekly Chat or regular seller discussion boards where eBay can learn what's on sellers minds?', 'Get the latest media and marketing industry news (and views) direct to your inbox.', '']

title: ['eBay Inc. stock falls Wednesday, still outperforms market - MarketWatch', 'eBay has plans for Mexico, its biggest Latin American market - Mexico News Daily', 'Save Big Bucks on Auto, Truck, and Moto Deals Today at eBay ... - The Drive', 'Here are the top 5 Yeezy silhouettes that are resold - Straatosphere', "Everyone's a Winner in Ebay's New Campaign - Branding in Asia Magazine", 'EBay Engages With Trade At Las Vegas Antique Luxury Jewelry ... - WATCHPRO', 'eBay Seller Tries Small Claims Court to Get Held Funds Released - EcommerceBytes', 'PS5 Dev Kit eBay Listings Quickly Pulled From Auction Website - Kotaku', 'eBay CEO: More Seller Protections and Control over Funds - EcommerceBytes', 'eBay shopper ‘mortified’ by ‘obscene’ item delivered to his home after drunken purchase - Express']
summary:
["Shares of eBay Inc. EBAY dropped 0.01% to $68.00 Wednesday, on what proved to be an all-around poor trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index SPX falling 0.46% to 4,402.66 and Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA falling 0.92% to 34,792.67.
This was the stock's second consecutive day of losses.
eBay Inc. closed $6.13 short of its 52-week high ($74.13), which the company reached on July 29th.", 'E-commerce giant eBay says Mexico is a priority for the business and that its growth will create employment opportunities in the country, its largest market in the region.
Buying online boomed in 2020, when Mexico became the fourth fastest growing e-commerce market in the world, at 62%, despite an otherwise tumultuous year for the retail industry.
Mexico is likely to account for about 27% of the Latin American market this year at around $35 billion, second only to Brazil.
“The figures represent a great opportunity for us … Having Mexico as the largest market for eBay in Latin America makes it a priority for our business,” he said.
The contribution of all players involved in the market, such as logistics providers and authorities, can make e-commerce more accessible to Latin American sellers and buyers,” he said.', 'Learn more ›Looking for great deals on auto accessories, truck parts, motorcycle gear, and tools?
Just click and head over to one of our retail partners for fantastic savings right now.

Read more .,You can also take an extra 15 percent off your purchase at eBay Motors right now.
This discount applies to all sorts of stuff at eBay, including electronics, sporting goods, and more.', 'GIVEAWAY TERMS & CONDITIONSBy participating in our Straatosphere Giveaway, you fully accept these general terms and conditions of Straatosphere and you acknowledge that you fulfil all eligibility requirements.
Straatosphere may ask you, at any stage, to provide us with proof of age and/or identity and/or proof of such approval, if relevant.
DATE OF GIVEAWAYThis Giveaway shall start and close on the date specified on the this page, Straatosphere Facebook and/or Instagram posts.
The winner will be notified by email within five business days after the closing date of the Giveaway.
PRIZEThe promotional prize shall be a product as indicated on the the giveaway page on this site, Straatosphere’s Facebook and/or Instagram posts.', 'eBay has rolled out a new campaign featuring talking everyday items celebrating their second lease on life.
In a nostalgic nod to game shows of years gone by, the funny campaign features a talking dress and a gregarious talk show host.
“At first, I was all emo about being sold, but now I couldn’t be happier,” says the dress.
The integrated campaign launched nationally across multiple channels in partnership with Eight Productions.
We hope this campaign inspires even more Australians to get involved,” said Rebecca Newton, head of brand, loyalty and customer acquisition, eBay.', '', "I'm a 21 year Top Rated Seller with sales at $250k down from $500k because of Covid and eBay policies.
Our account was verified on the 12th of July, and we got an email from eBay stating that fact.
The original verification was through micro deposits which eBay successfully deposited two in our new bank account, which was how the account got verified first.
The excuse from Bogota Columbia is we uploaded wrong statements and the blank check we uploaded the name does not match.
Well that is impossible since we never uploaded bank statements because the account is not even a month old so there are no statements and we have not even ordered checks.", 'Earlier today, a pair of PlayStation 5 development kits reportedly popped up on eBay before being taken off the auction site within a few hours.
A screenshot of the eBay page indicates that the two consoles managed to reach €2,850 EUR (around $3,373 USD) after 12 bids.
AdvertisementWhile the test kit appears almost identical to retail PlayStation 5 models (well, apart from the large TEST stamp on the back, of course), images of the dev kit highlight the unique V-shaped construction used in pre-release patents.
AdvertisementManufacturers like Sony and Microsoft send game development kits to studios for use in, you guessed it, developing games.
The dang thing couldn’t even play retail PlayStation 4 games.', 'eBay CEO Jamie Iannone gave a keynote address at the eBay Open seller conference today.
“Our team has been listening carefully to our seller community about what needs to change and working hard to make improvements,” he told over 1200 virtual attendees.
Iannone said eBay will be extending seller protections and making changes to its payment processing system.
“Today I want to share news about the ways we’re working to improve the protection we offer you, our sellers.
Iannone said eBay will also be making changes with regard to Managed Payments based on seller feedback to give sellers more flexibility and control.', 'It was only the next day, when he received a shipping notification confirming his purchase was on its way, that he remembered ordering a life-size sex doll on eBay.
Posting on the Spotted Whitwick page, he said: "So it arrived in the post earlier than expected today and needless to say I am mortified.
The anonymous man had made the drunken purchase on eBay.
READ MORE: Man, 57, used sinister pig mask to terrify schoolchildrenThe man was horrified that the sex doll was not packaged discretely.
The man immediately wanted to get rid of it - but could not face the embarrassment of taking it back.']

title: ['eBay Seller Told She Must Accept Returns for SNAD Claims - EcommerceBytes', 'eBay to Offer Reduced Fees for Social Sharing - EcommerceBytes', 'eBay invests in Louisiana solar farm to power data center & operations - DatacenterDynamics']
summary:
['Dear Ina,For the first time, eBay emailed me that "When a "Not as described" return is filed, even private sellers are obliged to accept the return under the eBay Moneyback Guarantee Program."
There is no more seller protection.
You are not allowed now to dispute a not as described return.
This is something that all eBay seller should know.
I have an email that I have never seen in my 20 years at eBay.', 'eBay will offer Store sellers a substantial fee reduction for driving sales from their social channels.
Tom Pinckney, Vice President of eBay Stores, announced the news during a session at eBay Open seller conference on Thursday, which is taking place virtually.
"We all know that increasingly buyers are discovering products and getting validation of those products through their social channels.
"So this is a pretty substantial reduction in fees to help you drive repeat purchases, drive traffic into your listings and to your Store."
The VP also discussed other Store features during his presentation, which you can watch via YouTube - his discussion of reduced fees for social sharing begins at approximately 5 minutes and 30 seconds.', '']

title: ['eBay Launches 2021 "Up & Running Grants" to Support Small ... - PR Newswire', 'Ultra-Rare Cartrivision TV Is Being Sold On Ebay - Kotaku', 'PlayStation 5 Dev Kits Appeared on eBay and Immediately Got Pulled - PlayStation LifeStyle']
summary:
['"As the home of small business -- with hundreds of thousands of small businesses, accounting for the majority of our annual gross merchandise sales -- we feel a deep sense of responsibility to our eBay small business community.
Continuing our Up & Running Grants program is part of eBay's steadfast commitment in supporting and empowering our small business sellers through the relentless challenges brought on by the global pandemic."
2021 Up & Running Seller Grants ProgramThrough the 2021 eBay Up & Running Grants program, 50 eBay small business sellers will each receive a $10,000 grant package composed of cash, premium access to guided online learning content through Seller School and direct training and coaching from expert sellers and eBay Growth Advisors.
Apply for an Up & Running GrantNow through Friday, Sept. 3, 2021, eBay small business sellers are encouraged to apply for Up & Running Grants via an online application.
About eBay Seller SchooleBay Seller School is eBay's virtual learning platform offering on-demand lessons, videos, and more to help every eBay seller thrive in our marketplace.', 'At first glance, this might look like any old 1970s television, its modest-sized screen encased in a massive wooden console.
But look deeper and you’ll see that it’s actually one of the rarest and most special televisions in existence.
The brand is Teledyne Packard Bell, which, as Twitter’s resident hardware necromancer Foone points out, isn’t that special.
Buy for $72 Amazon AdvertisementAs Foone explains, Cartrivision was a short-lived analog format for which videos came on massive cartridges.
videolabguy ( YouTubeSears sold the Cartrivision + TV units for around $1,600, which as YouTuber Oddity Archive points out, would be around $9,000 in modern money.', 'A day ago, Twitter users Zuby Tech and iDCx1337 spotted listings for two different models of PlayStation 5 developer kits on eBay, and just as the bids reached €2,850 (approximately US$ 3,373), they were pulled without explanation.
Got delisted in a few hours Sony — @Zuby_Tech (@Zuby_Tech) August 4, 2021A PS5 Development Kit DFI-D1000AA was for sale today on eBay for a few hours pic.twitter.com/2Sebx2XApO — ً (@iDCx1337) August 3, 2021PS5 Testing kit DFI-T1000AA.
eBay listing got taken down pic.twitter.com/x61BtJihEt — ً (@iDCx1337) August 4, 2021The models in question are DFI-D1000AA and DFI-T1000AA test.
Console dev kits do appear in the market from time to time.
However, given that the PS5 is a new console that hasn’t even turned one yet, these eBay listings certainly came a little too soon and are likely in violation of a legal agreement.']

To access the live webcast, log on to https://investors.ebayinc.com/events/default.aspxThe views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.', 'Fred Durst has lost an eBay auction after bidding on an “illegal” action figure of himself sporting his new “dad rock” look.
