title: ['Upgrade eBay App to Fix Bug if You Want to Sell - EcommerceBytes', 'Have You Seen Videos in eBay Listings Yet? - EcommerceBytes', 'Deadline Day: Roberto Carlos and Eni Aluko sign for Sunday League - Sky Sports', 'Googler-exclusive clear Stadia Controller appears for purchase on ... - 9to5Google']
summary:
['eBay had to release a new version of its mobile app in order to fix a bug that prevented sellers from listing.
eBay acknowledged the glitch on threads where sellers reported the problem, but it did not seem to have announced it proactively.
The moderator returned to the thread today, January 31, to report a new version of the mobile app was released to fix the issue.
The Version History on the App Store indicates the problem was live from January 23 through January 30th (for sellers who updated the app).
eBay links to the Apple App store and the Google Play store on its eBay mobile app landing page.', '"I have a product that was suitable for a video insertion into an eBay listing.
In order to add video to listings using desktop, sellers must use a new listing tool, which the seller called time-consuming and inadequate.
He'll then revert back to the original listing tool, which is "a lot faster than using the new tool," he said.
During Wednesday's weekly chat session , a seller requested a status report from eBay on the video-in-listings feature.
And if you've encountered videos in other sellers' listings, what do you think of them?', '', 'A clear colored Stadia Controller – a gift to members of Google’s Stadia team – has appeared in a new eBay listing, and it’s even been modified to be fully functional.
As shared by OriginalPenguin on Twitter, one of these exclusive clear Stadia Controllers is currently up for auction on eBay.
Notably, as previously explained by a member of the Stadia team, these clear controllers were given away as decorative items, not functioning controllers.
Launch Team Exclusive Clear Stadia Controller (Working).
We’ve actually seen this mod performed once before, with Stadia’s UI engineering lead demonstrating a functioning version of the clear controller (seen in our header image above).']

title: ['eBay Comes Up Short with Micropayments Announcement - EcommerceBytes', "Working Prototype of Intel's Failed Larrabee GPU Sells for $5000 on ... - Tom's Hardware"]
summary:
['eBay underwhelmed sellers with its launch of micropayments in the UK today.
Sellers of low-cost items had relied on a temporary promotion to get by after eBay took over payment-processing from PayPal.
Going on how long it takes ebay to apply promotional credits, I can see many sellers being left short and waiting months for the correct credit to be applied."
In May of 2020, we explained the importance of a micropayments offering - something eBay sellers had access to until it took over payment-processing from PayPal.
If eBay wants to continue to host low-cost items, offering a viable payment-processing rate to sellers is crucial.', "It sold on eBay France (opens in new tab) for a mere €4,650 ($5,234) and even came in a snazzy case.
Image 1 of 5 (Image credit: leodanmarjod) (Image credit: leodanmarjod) (Image credit: leodanmarjod) (Image credit: leodanmarjod) (Image credit: leodanmarjod)Apparently fully working, a screenshot shows the BIOS startup, but without drivers, the Larrabee GPU is marked as an Intel engineering sample for internal use only.
Larrabee was Intel's 2008-vintage attempt to make a GPU, or rather a GPGPU, separately from the project that led to Iris Pro.
Rather than following in the footsteps of Nvidia and ATi, Larrabee used the X86 instruction set with special extensions, and the GPU functioned more like a hybrid of a CPU and GPU.
However, its graphics performance was poor compared to competing products, and the project was shelved as a GPU in 2009."]

title: ['There Are Four Lucid Air Dream Editions On eBay Right Now, All Priced Above $200K - CarScoops', 'PayPal Stock Plummets To 20-Month Low On eBay Hit To 2022 ... - TheStreet', 'Microsoft and eBay Veteran Latif Nathani Joins Sapien.Network as ... - PR Web', "Nike (NYSE: NKE) goes after 'counterfeit' resellers, faults Amazon ... - The Business Journals", 'Natick couple in talks to settle eBay lawsuit over bizarre harassment - The Boston Globe', 'OpenSea—known as the eBay of NFTs—is facing a host of user complaints amid rapid growth - Fortune', 'This Ultra-Rare Intel GPU Just Sold for $5,000 on eBay - Gizmodo', 'PayPal (PYPL) stock tanks after earnings, eBay, IRS news - Fast Company']
summary:
['The all-electric sedan is currently available in flagship Dream Edition Performance and Dream Edition Range variants, both of which set back customers a cool $170,500.
A quick search through the classifieds on eBay shows four Lucid Air Dream Edition Performance models looking for new homes, all priced at over $200,000.
Watch Also: Can The Lucid Air Dream Edition Take The Tesla Model S Plaid In The Quarter-Mile?
It is number 240 of the 520 Dream Edition models that Lucid plans to produce.
The two remaining Lucid Air Dream Edition Performance models have been listed for $210,000 and $206,000 respectively.', '', 'Latif Nathani, Chief Operating Officer Sapien.Network Throughout my career I have always believed that technology should be harnessed to help advance the human condition, while safeguarding the environment and delivering strong returns to investorsSapien.Network, a Web 3.0 social network for the next generation of human connection using crypto, NFTs, and the metaverse, has appointed Latif Nathani as its Chief Operating Officer.
Mr. Nathani is an experienced executive, innovator and investor with a proven track record of success.
Prior to Sapien, Mr. Nathani held senior roles at eBay, Microsoft and Symantec.
In his new role, Mr. Nathani will lead all aspects of the day-to-day activities including product, operations, marketing, organizational development and culture.
Mr. Nathani has three decades of technology industry experience.', '', 'Seven former eBay employees were charged with conspiracy to commit criminal cyberstalking and witness tampering, and five have pleaded guilty.
The couple publish an online newsletter called EcommerceBytes that drew the ire of top eBay executives, including its former chief executive Devin Wenig.
In the summer of 2019, eBay employees sent the Steiners a series of threatening messages and bizarre deliveries before traveling to Natick and spying on the couple.
Ina and David Steiner, the Natick couple harassed and stalked by eBay employees in 2019, have begun negotiations to settle their lawsuit against the company and other parties.
Then a team of eBay employees traveled to Natick, tried to install a tracking device on the Steiners’ car, and followed them around town.', '“They shouldn’t have put out an email trying to help people just to make the problem so much worse,” he told Fortune.
Rival marketplace LooksRare launched in early January, right around the time that many OpenSea users were experiencing these issues, and has since skyrocketed in popularity.
Most of the OpenSea users who spoke with Fortune had also begun to use LooksRare and currently hold LOOKS tokens.
But two, at some point, you kind of have a responsibility as someone that’s benefited at this stage,” he told Fortune.
Despite their frustrations, most of the OpenSea users Fortune spoke with are still using the platform.', 'Perhaps the only working prototype of Intel’s abandoned Larabee GPU just sold for more than scalped, pandemic-era AMD or Nvidia graphics card.
This lovely blue component, one of the only remaining reminders of Intel’s failed attempt at a discrete GPU, was purchased on eBay France for €4,650, or $5,234.
The graphics card is said to be functional and a screenshot in the listing shows a BIOS startup page.
Rather than create a graphics card meant for gaming, Intel’s version, based on x86, was a hybrid between a CPU and a GPU.
The company announced last month that the long-awaited high-end discrete graphics has started shipping to laptop and desktop vendors.', '']

title: ['AirTags with disabled anti-stalking speakers briefly surface on eBay, Etsy - AppleInsider', "'Silent AirTags' With Speakers Removed Pop Up on Etsy, eBay - PCMag UK", 'Lifeboat for sale on eBay for £400000 - Great Yarmouth Mercury', 'AirTags with deactivated speakers being sold on eBay and Etsy ... - 9to5Mac', 'Want a £1000 side hustle? Five top tips for selling on eBay - Motley Fool UK']
summary:
['Read our ethics policyAirTagsApple AirTag trackers that have had their speakers disabled are starting to surface on marketplaces like eBay, though their sellers insist they're not meant for stalking.
AirTags are designed to beep when separated from their paired iPhone, but some sellers are apparently selling trackers with disconnected speakers.
Products with listing names like "Silent AirTag" briefly went up for sale on Etsy and eBay, according to PCMag.
One listing on Etsy was for a "Silent AirTag" with a price tag of $77.50.
There is already a secondary market for modified AirTags with the speaker disabled for "stealth mode."', 'But a merchant on Etsy tried to undermine this safeguard by selling modified AirTags that had their internal speakers removed.
The product, dubbed “Silent AirTag,” was up for sale for $77.50 before the listing abruptly went offline minutes ago.
The sale alarmed privacy advocate Eva Galperin, director of cybersecurity at the Electronic Frontier Foundation, who tweeted about the Silent AirTag’s stalking risk on Wednesday.
These requests led me to listing it as a product on Etsy, albeit without a great deal of traction.
Apple also created a free app so Android users can scan for any AirTags that’ve been secretly slipped into their belongings.', 'Caister Lifeboat Station is making way for its new £2.5m rescue boat.
“We’ve learned from our current lifeboat and taken the best bits of its design.
But first, they are hoping to find a new home for the current lifeboat which has served them for 17 years.
The team has put it on eBay for around £400,000 and this includes the launch system and tractor transport.
Paul Garrod, chairman of Caister Volunteer Lifeboat Service, added: "Our current lifeboat has served us well and carried out many rescues during her time on service.', 'Listings for AirTags with deactivated speakers have been spotted on eBay and Etsy.
PCMag spotted listings for AirTags with deactivated speakers on both eBay and Etsy.
A merchant on Etsy tried to undermine this safeguard by selling modified AirTags that had their internal speakers removed.
The product, dubbed “Silent AirTag,” was up for sale for $77.50 before the listingabruptly went offline minutes ago.
However, TNW says that the Etsy seller subsequently removed the listing when the stalking risk was raised.', 'Here are my 5 top tips for selling on eBay, from choosing the right items to maximising selling prices.
Selling goods on eBay could make you over £1,000 per year.
Whether you’re looking to declutter your home or start a business selling products online, here are five top tips to maximise your profits on eBay.
eBay encourages sellers to list at 99p to attract more buyers and maximise the selling price.
Above all, I recommend deciding the minimum amount of profit you want to make before setting your selling price.']

title: ['eBay Is Not Backing Its Own Authentications, Sellers Say - EcommerceBytes', 'Man Utd fans BURN Mason Greenwood shirts & flog memorabilia on eBay after striker’s rape arrest... - The US Sun', 'eBay UK Re-Launch eBay Academy for 2022 - eSeller365', 'eBay Cops to Glitch over California Tax Form - EcommerceBytes']
summary:
["eBay is now in the authentication business for items like luxury handbags and watches, but some sellers say eBay is not standing behind its own authentications.
In one thread on the eBay discussion boards that started in November, a seller reported that eBay didn't stand behind its authentication of a vintage Chanel handbag.
The seller shipped the handbag to the eBay authenticators, who authenticated the bag and forwarded it to the buyer.
Several other sellers on the thread described similar issues of eBay authenticators siding with buyers on items that eBay authenticators themselves had authenticated.
What does it tell potential buyers if eBay isn't standing behind its own authentications?", 'MANCHESTER United fans are burning Mason Greenwood shirts and trying to flog the striker’s memorabilia online after he was released on bail.
Some United fans have been lighting their £65 shirts to destroy them, while others have even tried to scrape the name and numbers off.
Those with ultra-rare football cards have listed merchandise featuring the rape rap-haunted Manchester United star for up to £1,999.
Buyers are told: “A hand signed mounted Manchester United FC Football boot of Mason Greenwood.
In a statement, Manchester United said: "Manchester United reiterates its strong condemnation of violence of any kind.', 'eBay UK has relaunched the eBay Academy portal for 2022.
Whilst eBay Academy is not a brand new concept it is something that seems to get waves of attention from eBay.
The eBay Academy offers a range of free courses which you can access by entering your eBay credentials on the eBay Academy Portal.
eBay Academy 2022“Whether you’re new to eBay or have been selling for years, eBay Academy has a wide range of free interactive courses to offer for those just starting out to those looking to enhance their existing eBay business, there’s really something for everyone!
Join eBay Academy and start applying your knowledge today!', 'On Friday, eBay notified some California sellers to disregard IRS Form 1099-Ks that had been provided to them.
A reader forwarded the following message they received from eBay:“A recent technical issue resulted in a 1099-K form being incorrectly provided to you.
The incorrect 1099-K form was not sent to the IRS or California Franchise Tax Board.
Unless you had more than $20,000 in gross sales and 200 transactions in 2021, we will not submit a 1099-K form to the IRS or the California Franchise Tax Board.
One seller said the glitch impacting sellers in California wasn’t the only issue: “eBay is blundering all over the place and not even acknowledging the issues.']

title: ['Mum transforms kitchen for £230 using bargains from B&Q, Etsy and eBay - Liverpool Echo']
summary:
['Renovating a kitchen can cost thousands of pounds, but one DIY-savvy mum from Bedford has managed to transform hers for just £230.
Flight attendant Zuzana James, 31, bought bargains from B&Q, Etsy and eBay for the makeover and did the work herself to keep costs down.
I spent about £90 on the supplies, which included primer, cabinet paint, top coat, frog tape, sugar soap, a couple of sanding blocks and some brushes and foam rollers.
Then I used V33 cabinet paint in Soft Grey and also did two coats.
But it is doable - I managed on my own.”The total cost of the kitchen renovation was £230.']

title: ['Pokemon card collectors worried after shocking eBay authentication ... - Dexerto', 'Thrifty mum transforms kitchen with paint and eBay bargains for just £279 - Daily Record', "'Licorice Pizza' Costume Designer on Alana Haim's Vintage Look ... - WWD", 'Rare 5p coin sells on eBay for £161 - Gloucestershire Live', 'Natick couple who were harassed by eBay employees in settlement ... - MetroWest Daily News']
summary:
['Pokemon card collectors have become concerned after a customer’s bad experience with eBay’s new authentication service was posted on social media.
“Received my first eBay authenticated card and it was literally popping out of the card saver,” they tweeted.
Both Pokemon card collectors and sports fans sounded off on the tweet, expressing their concern.
The question is how to prevent this type of movement with a card sliding around inside a penny sleeve & card saver during transit.
Only time will tell whether eBay’s response will calm the worries of Pokemon card collectors who use the site to sell collectibles.', 'Share your email to get the latest property newsA thrift mum has shared her secret to achieving a dream kitchen on a budget - using paint and items she bought on ebay.
Rosie Holt, 29, who lives in Swansea, turned her wooden kitchen into a gorgeous sage green paradise using Frenchic paint, vinyl flooring and new eBay handles.
(Image: Latestdeals.co.uk)"I painted all the cupboards in Wise Old Sage Frenchic Alfresco paint.
The most costly part of the make-over were the vinyl floor titles, which came in at £225.
“Cost-wise, the floor was £225, the handles were £31, and the Frenchic paint was £22.95.', 'Bridges, a four-time Oscar nominee and two-time winner, says it was especially delightful to work on something so nostalgic as “Licorice Pizza” during the current state of the world.
And it’s so clever of Paul to have somehow seen that in the timing,” Bridges says over a Zoom call.
And I think that’s part of its charm and its success, certainly.”Below, WWD chats with Bridges about the project.
And then I find out from Paul that that’s who he’s loosely basing [the character of Gary Valentine] on.
Alana Haim and Cooper Hoffman in “Licorice Pizza.”WWD: Is that the piece that has gotten the most attention, from your perspective?', 'We have more newslettersSomething went wrong, please try again later.
Invalid email Something went wrong, please try again later.
Never miss the latest local news again by signing up to our Daily NewsletterA very rare 5p coin has sold for £161 on eBay thanks to an error in production.
Describing the make-up of the coin they wrote: “This coin: 1.83g, copper (in colour, non magnetic), 18mm, Raphael David Maklouf.
The rare 5p sold for £161.78, including £3 delivery, after attracting 20 bids following a seven-day auction.', 'BOSTON — A Natick couple who were terrorized by eBay employees for several months are in talks to settle the case against the California-based online auction website.
In a joint filing in U.S. District Court in Boston on Jan. 28, a lawyer for Ina and David Steiner of Natick and lawyers for eBay indicated they are in settlement talks on the lawsuit, which was filed last year.
The joint filing requested a hold put on the case for 90 days as both sides work to reach a settlement.
They had published negative articles about eBay that angered company executives, according to the lawsuit.
According to the lawsuit, the harassment began online, with the defendants creating fake names on Twitter and then to threatening Ina Steiner.']

title: ['B&Q, Etsy and eBay shopper transforms kitchen for a bargain price - Edinburgh Live', 'How to contact eBay customer service online or by phone - Business Insider', 'Ethiopian relics on eBay may have been looted from Tigray, experts ... - The Times', 'The story behind Jim Furyk’s eBay putter finds - Golf.com', 'FAN POLL - Has eBay Died? Where are Fans Selling Transformers ... - Tformers.com', 'Aggregator Elevate Brands Poaches Talent From Amazon, Wayfair ... - Business Insider', 'Introducing The George Sully X eBay Canada Collab - Sharp Magazine']
summary:
['One savvy mum was able to transform the look of her kitchen for only £230 using items purchased from B&Q, Etsy and eBay.
I then took the doors off the hinges and took the handles off.
All the cabinets got a light sanding with a sanding block before I started with the primer.
"For priming I used the Bullseye primer and did two coats, lightly sanding in between coats.
But it is doable - I managed on my own.”(Image: LatestDeals.co.uk)Overall, the project cost £230 — significantly lower than the standard cost of a kitchen renovation.', "The best way to contact eBay's customer service team is through their online help center.
And if you're running an online shopping juggernaut like eBay, you need a big customer service team.
How to contact eBay customer service through the Help portalThe best way to contact eBay — and the method that the company prefers — is online, through their Help & Contact page.
A real eBay customer service agent will take your request and call you, usually within half-an-hour.
How to call eBay's customer service team about fraudeBay doesn't run a general customer support number anymore.", 'Centuries-old manuscripts, Bibles and scrolls are being offered to collectors for as little as a few hundred poundsA surge in ancient Ethiopian relics for sale online has raised suspicions about links to the reported plundering of churches and monasteries during the 14-month conflict in Tigray.
Centuries-old manuscripts, Bibles and scrolls are being offered to collectors for as little as a few hundred pounds on sites including eBay, months after heritage experts warned of the “cultural cleansing” of the northern Tigray region.
SponsoredHagos Abrha Abay, a philologist who was in Tigray at the outbreak of the civil conflict, has recorded damage to scores of ancient sites where artefacts were destroyed or looted.
Since returning to Europe he and colleagues have monitored internet sales.
“It is hard to know if the Ethiopian artefacts we are seeing have been taken from Tigray without looking at', "The story behind Jim Furyk’s eBay putter findsShare on FacebookShare on TwitterShare by EmailFuryk has been using Odyssey's Versa #1W since 2013.
Getty ImagesJim Furyk has never been afraid to spend his own hard-earned money on a putter.
The putter ultimately helped him win the Tour Championship and a cool $11.35 million in Atlanta.
“It’s funny that I didn’t have a backup putter with this shaft,” Furyk told GOLF.com.
Instead of sticking with his tried-and-true method of buying putters from local golf shops, Furyk went a different route.", 'Sooner or later, we all have reasons to sell off our old and new Transformers.
There was a time when eBay was the go-to place for collectors to sell their new and vintage Transformers items to others.
Times have changed with the ubiquity of social networks, new online selling services, and eBay itself focusing more on large-scale retailers.
It is hard to know where to connect with other Transformers collectors anymore.
This begs the question for today's Fan Poll - "Where Are Fans Selling Transformers Today?"', 'Elevate Brands has hired Yury Gurevich, a former Amazon executive, as COO.
Yury Gurevich, a former Amazon executive, has joined Amazon roll-up firm Elevate Brands as its chief operating officer.
"From my perspective, in the aggregator model you can see the high innovation and potential for growth in high-value brands growing on Amazon," Gurevich said.
Gurevich said the aggregator model is the natural evolution of what Amazon itself does.
With more than $327 million in funding, according to Crunchbase, Elevate Brands said it acquired 30 e-commerce and direct-to-consumer (DTC) brands in 2021.', 'This New Sneaker Collab Is Donating All Proceeds to the Black Designers of Canada CharityFrom Limb Apparel, to Sully Wong, to Sully & Son Co., George Sully has maintained a strong yet somewhat under-the-radar presence in streetwear over the last couple of decades.
He’s also the vision behind Black Designers of Canada — a non-profit national database built to help amplify the voices of black designers in all disciplines.
On its side panel, you’ll notice a quote from Sully himself; “It’s not just about inviting us to the table.
Keep your eyes on the link below, as it’s unclear how many pairs will come available.
Learn more about the George Sully X eBay Canada launch here.']

title: ['Rare 5p coin sells on eBay for £161 - this is how you can spot one - Chronicle Live', "Charles Bronson's artwork selling for hundreds on eBay as Brits buy violent lag's work - Daily Star", 'Nike sues Amazon, eBay over counterfeit goods - Oregon Business News', 'Pink Lily Who Started as eBay Side Hustle Now Makes $141 Million in Sales - Coinspeaker', "Dyson Launch Outlet on Ebay's Irish Marketplace - Irish Tech News - Irish Tech News", 'Thrifty woman transforms kitchen for £90 using eBay and B&Q buys - Belfast Live', "What Is the 'Axel Panel Platform Bed' eBay Email? - Snopes.com", 'eBay Announces Fee Hike to Take Effect in 3 Weeks - EcommerceBytes']
summary:
["Invalid email Something went wrong, please try again later.
Sign up for free to get the latest North East news and updates delivered straight to your inboxAn unusual 5p coin has sold for £161 thanks to an error in production.
Coin collectors started a bidding war on eBay to get their hands on the unique 5p which looks copper in colour instead of the silver you'd expect, the Mirror reports.
The rare 5p coin sold for £161.78, including £3 delivery, after attracting 20 bids following a seven-day auction.
Coin collectors should always be wary and do their research first before buying any coin on eBay, to avoid buying fake.", "Artwork by Britain's most notorious prisoner Charles Bronson is being sold for hundreds of pounds on eBay.
His dedication and love of art is also demonstrated through his name after he decided to change it to Charles Salvador in tribute to his favourite artist Salvador Dali.
Bronson’s work is now available through multiple sellers online with some stating it has been authenticated by Bronson’s long-lost son George Bamby.
His artwork ranges from what appears to be Christmas Cards, depiction of prison life and a tribute to his friend and notorious London gangster Ronnie Kray.
Through his art, he managed to start the Charles Salvador Art Foundation to promote his work and also help people in less fortunate positions to participate in the activity.", 'By Oregon Small Business Association FoundationNike, a Portland-based sportswear giant, has filed a federal trademark infringement and counterfeiting lawsuit against anonymous resellers pushing fake products on online sites like Amazon and eBay.
In a lawsuit filed Jan. 31 in the U.S. Northern District Court in Illinois, where Nike says the counterfeiters have targeted residents, the company alleges that online sites fail to verify and confirm the identities of new sellers—perhaps from foreign countries—who sell the counterfeit products through their retail sites, according to the Portland Business Journal.
Nike wants an injunction to prevent counterfeiters from using the company’s trademark on products not produced Nike.
The company also wants repayment of all profits earned off its trademark and damages of three times the amount established by the court.', 'What started as a hobby due to the dearth of affordable fashion soon turned into a full-fledged Pink Lily business making $141 million in sales and having 3.6 million social media followers.
Tori’s Journey with Pink LilyTori got the idea to start Pink Lily in 2011 when she was just 24 years old.
The Turning PointBy the end of 2013 when the couple had saved $20,000, they decided to launch an official website for Pink Lily.
Tori’s Tips for All Aspiring EntrepreneursIn her journey through the birth and evolution of Pink Lily, Tori has gained wisdom regarding conducting a successful business operation.
Create engaging social media campaigns that not only highlight your brand’s distinct identity but also actively involve the shoppers.', '', 'Using MDF from B&Q, Frenchic paint and handles from eBay, she pulled off a stunning transformation for just £90.
“Then I filled in any minor gaps with decorator's caulk before reattaching the cupboard doors back to their frames.
"I painted the doors using Frenchic paint from the Alfresco range.
"I also painted the tiles with Frenchic paint in the shade Dazzle Me and covered the work surface with DC Fix sticky back plastic.
“Using budget materials such as DC Fix, Frenchic paint and MDF, she’s really kept the costs down, but without sacrificing on style!”For more stories from where you live, visit InYourArea.', 'Claim: An order confirmation email with an eBay logo thanks you for your order of an Axel Panel Platform Bed.
Rating: About this rating ScamReaders should beware of an eBay scam that sends thanks and confirmation for a supposed order of an "Axel Panel Platform Bed."
Axel Panel Platform Bed, Queen, Queen Price: $718 We need your confirmation to ship your order, please Click Here and reply with " Ship my order ".
According to messages from eBay users, this same scam for an "Axel Panel Platform Bed" had been going around as far back as 2017 and 2018.
They were:camavinga007@protonmail.comBazougalola@protonmail.comcamavinga01@op.plcamavingadodo@mailo.comcamavinga@net-c.ca,camavinga007@outlook.comtopoffersusanine@outlook.comcastrolefolow@hotmail.comcamavingadodo@inbox.lvcarlossantafi@inbox.lvcamavinga0@mail.ruisabbane@ukr.netcamavingatoto@aliyun.comcamavinga@internet.rumdvietri@usa.comcamavinga99@onet.plcamavinga@gazeta.plcamavingagogo@gazeta.plvescacamp@foxmail.comkrandelowez@foxmail.comcamavingalola@yandex.comcamavingafifi@yandex.byFelicitysfg35687@hotmail.comNieNall@gmx.comgregersmiele1973@vp.plXentheMacey51@outlook.comMarquiGallina@gmx.comViniP@gmx.comFionasgh2468@hotmail.comejnaraspidov1962@autograf.pladmin@camavinga.co.comhealth@shmaigel.netsupport@moronacod.comlive@laurades.comdude@paradisiene.orggood-life@yallashot.org.ukreply@bellachao.co.ukcontact@mallalicoza.comsupport@ballotell.comadmin@hindoras.org.ukreuben.saxon1@gmail.comrhomoore1@gmail.comflorentinoperez086@gmail.comjosephjacques1976@vp.plIn sum, we recommend that readers avoid the eBay email scam that mentions an "Axel Panel Platform Bed."', 'Not content with the baked-in fee increases it gets every time the cost of shipping rises, eBay is also raising Final Value Fees in most categories, giving sellers less than 3 weeks’ notice.
The fee hike was announced on Wednesday as part of the 2022 Winter Seller Update along with other changes coming to the site.
Starting March 1, 2022, we will increase additional final value fees from 5% to 6% for Below Standard sellers.
This fee does not apply to Above Standard and eBay Top Rated Sellers.
In addition, when you approve a buyer’s cancellation request, the entire final value fee, including the $0.30 per-order fee, will be refunded to you.”Here’s a link to the Announcement board post where you can find all of the changes coming to the eBay marketplace.']

title: ["Notes: eBay Fee Hike; Big Jersey Sale; '52 Mantle NFT; Historic ... - Sports Collectors Daily", "Save Big Money with eBay's Certified Refurbished Dyson Products - Gear Patrol", 'Looking for a Real Designer Bag on the Cheap? Japanese eBay ... - VICE', "Late Portsmouth firefighter's helmet, found on eBay, given to family - Seacoastonline.com", 'Is eBay a Top Stock to Buy and Hold in 2022 and Beyond? - The Motley Fool', 'Sync2Sell Launches Lightspeed Commerce Integrations with eBay ... - AiThority', 'PayPal Dumps 4.5 Million Users - Copies eBay Strategy - eSeller365']
summary:
['', '', 'Say you want a designer bag but you’re a normal person, which means you don’t have thousands of dollars lying around.
Where do you go to find reliable, authentic secondhand goods?
AdvertisementIf you’re willing to invest a little time window-shopping, Japan-based eBay resellers have literal thousands of designer bags for resale.
You might still need to drop a couple hundred dollars, versus the thousands it costs to buy first designer goods firsthand.
Advertisement“There are authentic designer bags in thrift stores [in the U.S.], but not as much or as frequently as it’s portrayed on TikTok,” he said.', 'PORTSMOUTH — How did a late Portsmouth volunteer firefighter’s helmet end up in Ohio?
Just before the New Year, a former city firefighter was browsing eBay and recognized the helmet as being one from the olden days of his previous employer.
A helmet handoff was conducted and given back to the Pizz family, which included his 73-year old son, daughter-in-law and grandson.
So when another previous Portsmouth firefighter, Jason Cleary, now the chief of the fire department at Manchester-by-the-Sea in Massachusetts, saw Pizz’s helmet listed on eBay and alerted a social media page dedicated to Portsmouth firefighters, Duddy took notice.
Soon enough, protected by layers of packing material, Stanley Pizz’s old helmet arrived on her doorstep, ready to be returned to its rightful owners.', "With so many e-commerce stocks competing for your attention, you may have overlooked one of the trailblazers in this space, eBay (EBAY 2.82%).
* They just revealed what they believe are the ten best stocks for investors to buy right now... and eBay wasn't one of them!
See the 10 stocks *Stock Advisor returns as of January 10, 2022Demitri Kalogeropoulos: The company I'm bringing to highlight today is eBay.
It's also a cash-generating machine because of that model and they pour most of that cash right back to the shareholders.
That's really what attracts me.", 'Sync2Sell.com offers Lightspeed Retail and Lightspeed Omnichannel users the ability to control marketplace eCommerce business within their Point of Sale system.
Sync2Sell now harnesses the power of Lightspeed Retail to effortlessly sync data directly to eBay, Amazon, and Reverb – managing all retail and eCommerce business in one place within Lightspeed.
Sync2Sell organizes all information within Lightspeed and automates the upload and synchronization to the user’s desired marketplace(s).
Sync2Sell globally automates everything from the user’s Lightspeed account, eliminating the hassle of navigating multiple marketplaces to update information, process orders, and communicate with customers.
Most Sync2Sell users experience tremendous eCommerce growth.', 'Over the past few years, PayPal has been aggressively adding users and even suggested that by 2025 it could reach 750 million active users.
Wall Street gurus anticipated that based PayPal would add 53 million new accounts in 2022.
The company identified 4.5 million “illegitimately” opened user accounts last quarter alone and already removed them from the active user list.
PayPal counts active users as those that used the service at least one time over the past 12 months, a typical standard used by others like eBay and Etsy as well.
Once the 12-month cycle ended that counted an active user on the platform, eBay’s numbers started to slide to a point where it also had to explain away this problem.']

title: ['Finest N-5 1825 cent acquired unattributed from eBay - Coin World', 'eBay 2022 Winter Seller Update – What You Need to Know - eSeller365', 'Seller Close to Quitting eBay over Nuisance Buyer - EcommerceBytes']
summary:
['The diagnostics of this reverse for an 1825 Matron Head cent were key in attributing as a rare Newcomb 5 die marriage.
The coin the finest of 17 known and was found unattributed on eBay for a fraction of its estimated value.
The coin was acquired unattributed by a collector who wishes to remain anonymous from an eBay auction Jan. 22 for $171.01, which included state sales tax.
The collector’s coin is the 17th known example of the N-5 variety.
In his 1944 reference United States Copper Cents 1816–1857, author Howard R. Newcomb, listed the N-5 die variety as being unknown.', 'This week, eBay surprisingly rolled out a major seller update across most of its marketplace platforms globally.
In addition, it’s not like these big seller update announcements are the same for all countries.
Usually, each country’s seller update includes different items, some that would be the same globally, while others only applied to that country.
Now that my rant is over about this big update nonsense (for now), let’s take a look at the eBay 2022 Winter Seller Update for the US.
This includes Promoted Listings Standard and international fees but excludes the 30 cents per-order fee, Promoted Listings Express fee, and Promoted Listings Advanced fee.', "Dear Ina,After over 17 years of selling on eBay, I'm seriously on the verge of permanently shutting down my eBay store.
I sold a new collectible mug in the original box and now the buyer wants to return it for a full refund.
The buyer is insisting that the mug I sent is not the same as the mug posted in my listing.
Instead, I received additional messages from the buyer continuing to insist that the mug the buyer received is not the same as in my photos and also demanded a prepaid return shipping label!
If the buyer doesn't cease with messaging me, I believe the next step would be to report them to eBay for harassment."]

title: ["New eBay User Agreement: Don't Share Log In with Anyone - EcommerceBytes"]
summary:
['As part of its new User Agreement taking effect for existing customers on March 11, eBay is prohibiting sellers from sharing log-in data with third-parties.
eBay notified users via email of the modified User Agreement on Wednesday, the same day it announced the 2022 Winter Seller Update.
The new User Agreement went into effect the same day for new users.
As part of that commitment, we’re announcing some changes to the eBay User Agreement.
Our updated User Agreement will take effect on February 9, 2022 and you can read the updated User Agreement on eBay.com.']

title: ['eBay Changes Return Policy, Cancellations, Money Back Guarantee - EcommerceBytes', 'People are selling the ‘last Chicken Big Macs’ on eBay after McDonald’s sells out – and you won’t believe t... - The US Sun']
summary:
['On the same day eBay announced a slew of changes as part of its 2022 Winter Seller Update that sellers had to parse through, eBay notified sellers by email that it was changing the User Agreement (UA).
It took us an excruciatingly long time to review the language eBay added and dropped (and moved around) from the new UA.
It's unfortunate eBay didn't call attention to and explain in greater detail what is changing and what it means for sellers.
In addition, eBay included a notice that "Payment terms now reflect eBay's migration to managed payments" in its email to sellers about the new UA, but as far as we can see, it failed to draw attention to the fact that the eBay "Payment Terms of Use" is changing effective April 16, 2022.
You can read in detail the changes we found in eBay's new User Agreement, including new language prohibiting users from sharing log-in information with third-parties; potential fees for buyers who use its authentication services; and changes to the language around returns and cancelations for buyers and sellers and the eBay Money Back Guarantee.', 'SOME McDonald’s fans were left disappointed after the chain revealed that it had removed the new Chicken Big Mac from the menu after selling out nationwide.
It tweeted: "Your love for the limited edition Chicken Big Mac knew no bounds and its sold out almost everywhere.
The Chicken Big Mac is a copycat of the original Big Mac but replaces beef patties with chicken burgers.
If you still want your Chicken Big Mac fix, we've explained how an easy menu hack will see you bag a similar alternative - at a cheaper price too.
So if you buy two Mayo Chicken burgers at 99p and tower them on top of each other, it will set you back under £2 - cheaper than the Chicken Big Mac itself which costs around £4.']

title: ['eBay and EFL partner to support local communities and over ... - Shrewsbury Town', 'Rare 10p coin sells for £104 on eBay because of huge design fault – check your change - The Mirror', "People are selling McDonald's sold out Chicken Big Macs on eBay - Daily Star", 'Offshore lifeboat with full launch system being auctioned on eBay for ... - The Yorkshire Post']
summary:
['Small businesses are etched into eBay’s DNA, so much so that they have over 300,000 of them to celebrate.
That’s why they’re proud to partner with the EFL to give back to their small business sellers.
Throughout the season, eBay are collaborating to donate stadium advertising space around EFL grounds to local businesses, in local communities, all over the country.
Help eBay celebrate their small businesses further by shopping their 15% off coupon, on selected sellers only.
In doing so, we’re all supporting local businesses, at a time they need us most.', 'The eBay seller says this is likely a minting errorRare 10p coin sells for £104 on eBay because of huge design fault – check your changeA rare 10p coin has sold for almost £104 on eBay because of a design flaw that makes it look dented.
The seller claims this could be down to the coin being misstruck at some point during the Royal Mint minting process.
This was certified in 1987 by the Royal Mint and returned with the certificate and returned to my father.
Last week, we reported on how a rare 5p error coin sold for £161 on eBay after a design fault left it looking copper in colour instead of silver.
This error coin sold for £257 after attracting 31 bids during a seven-day auction on eBay.', 'The Chicken Big Mac is a poultry take on the original Big Mac – it uses chicken patties rather than beef layered with cheese, lettuce, pickles and Big Mac sauce.
Sellers on eBay are listing the sell-out sandwich on the auction site claiming to be the “last Chicken Big Mac”.
(Image: ebay)Thankfully, the items are listed for in-person collection… so nobody is sending Chicken Big Macs in the post.
The Chicken Big Mac was launched just weeks ago before being removed from the menu due to the colossal demand.
It tweeted: "Your love for the limited edition Chicken Big Mac knew no bounds and its sold out almost everywhere.', 'An offshore lifeboat with a full launch system is being auctioned on eBay - for more than £400,000.
Volunteers at one of the UK's few remaining independent lifeboat stations are auctioning the orange and black vessel to raise money for a brand new £2million all-weather lifeboat.
Advertisement Hide AdAdvertisement Hide AdThe life-saving boat is in full working order and can reach up to 37 knots (43mph).
Advertisement Hide AdAdvertisement Hide AdThe lifeboat, measuring 11m x 4m, comes with a trailer and pulling tractor.
Advertisement Hide AdAdvertisement Hide AdPaul, 55, said: "It was like the heart of our village being ripped out.']

title: ['Offshore Norfolk lifeboat goes on sale on eBay for over £400k - Norfolk Live', 'Is Combined Shipping on eBay Still an Issue? - EcommerceBytes', "Seth Klarman's Baupost exits eBay, adds Fiserv, NortonLifeLock ... - Seeking Alpha", 'Pick, pack and delivery: eBay launches order fulfilment in Australia - SmartCompany', 'eBay Presidents’ Day sale takes extra 15% off: Switch OLED, PS5 DualSense controller, more - 9to5Toys', 'eBay UK Updates Payments Terms of Use - Effective 16 April 2022 - eSeller365', 'For Sale On eBay: An "Active Suspension" Prototype Corvette ZR-1 ... - Silodrome', "eBay coupon: 15% off select tech, home goods for Presidents' Day - AppleInsider", 'Gumtree, Facebook Marketplace and eBay: tips for turning your trash into cash - 7NEWS']
summary:
['We have more newslettersSomething went wrong, please try again later.
Invalid email Something went wrong, please try again later.
An offshore lifeboat from one of the UK's few remaining independent stations is being auctioned on bidding site Ebay for more than £400k.
Volunteers at Caister Lifeboat station in Norfolk are auctioning the vessel as they look to raise money for a brand new £2 million all-weather lifeboat.
"We'd like it to go to another independent lifeboat station in the country."', 'An eBay buyer wrote to us this week saying he could no long request a total for combined shipping from his cart when purchasing multiple items from a seller.
eBay CEO Jamie Iannone has touted the company's efforts to reduce unpaid items (UPIs), telling Wall Street analysts eBay had effectively eliminated "Unpaid Items" on Fixed Price transactions and had continued to reduce this issue for Best Offers, and promising to do the same for auction-format listingsSo are these efforts to reduce unpaid items impacting buyers who purchase multiple items from a single buyer?
As a seller wrote in October , "There is no penalty for issuing partial refunds for shipping.
One thing to keep in mind though is that eBay does not credit your FVFs on any partial refunds you issue."
So overall, it sounds like positive news: reduced incidents of unpaid items for sellers, and the ability to issue refunds without a monetary cost (FVFs).', 'To ensure this doesn’t happen in the future, please enable Javascript and cookies in your browser.
If you have an ad-blocker enabled you may be blocked from proceeding.
Please disable your ad-blocker and refresh.', 'A partnership between eBay and global logistics company Orange Connex will allow the global shopping site to add fulfilment services for sellers.
In Australia, eBay is opening two fulfilment centres in Sydney, with plans to roll out more across the other major cities.
According to eBay, the service — called eBay Fulfilment by Orange Connex — will offer a streamlined delivery experience for sellers.
Postage rates will start at $4.50 for the ‘pick, pack and delivery’ service, with rates based on product weight and size.
Australian eBay sellers are able to register their interest in the eBay fulfilment service now.', 'Be sure to Be sure to follow us on Twitter for the latest deals and more.
eBay is launching a new Presidents’ Day sale today, taking an extra 15% off a selection of tech, home goods, and more.
Sure this isn’t the just-announced colors, but it is still Sony’s DualSense Wireless Controller.
Playstation DualSense Wireless Controller features:Discover a deeper, highly immersive gaming experience¹ that brings the action to life in the palms of your hands.
The DualSense wireless controller offers immersive haptic feedback, dynamic adaptive triggers, and a built-in microphone, all integrated into an iconic comfortable design.', 'eBay UK is updating the payments terms for its sellers, effective on Saturday, 16 April 2022.
Don’t MissThe company revised the Payment Terms of Use to better describe the payment services they provide to sellers.
Here is a look at the new payments terms highlighting significantly changed sections from the previous (currently in force) version.
The assumption is that eBay UK may introduce such restrictions, once the new Payment Terms are in force.
A minimum reserve is a requirement to hold a specific amount of money in your reserve.', 'This fourth generation Chevrolet Corvette ZR1 is 1 of 25 original “Active Suspension” prototypes.
Fast Facts – The “Active Suspension” Chevrolet Corvette ZR1The “Active Suspension” ZR-1 Corvette was designed to be the first production car with active suspension in history.
The 3,000 PSI hydraulic system would shift pressure where needed to all but eliminate body roll and reduce oversteer or understeer.
Many of the same GM engineers who worked on this active suspension system would later develop the Active Handling system used from 1996 onwards.
The Active Suspension Corvette PrototypesIn the late 1990s GM was benefiting significantly from its acquisition of Lotus in 1986.', "If you buy through our links, we may get a commission.
Read our ethics policyArticle Hero ImageNow through Presidents' Day, save an extra 15% (or up to $100) on select products from popular brands, including Apple, Anker, Bose and Dyson.
Presidents' Day eBay promo codeTo activate the bonus savings, simply head over to the Presidents' Day sale page on eBay.com and look for qualifying items for your home, office, garden and more.
There are hundreds of items to choose from, including factory unlocked iPhones, Apple Watch Series 7 styles and even iPad accessories.
Once you're ready to check out, enter promo code PREZDAY15 to net an additional 15% off eligible items now through Feb. 21.", 'That means there’s never been a better time to make some extra cash from things you already own but no longer need.
“Finder research has shown the average Aussie has nearly $100 in gift cards sitting at home,” Cooke says.
Australians are sitting on a stockpile of gift cards.
The good news is that most gift cards now have a three-year expiry period, so if you don’t think you’ll use it, sell it for the cash.
“Once you’ve decided your price, take a photograph of the item and make sure the photo is good quality,” Cooke says.']

title: ["Recalled Beatles Doc 'Get Back' a Hot Commodity on eBay - Media Play News", 'Bradford woman bought 480 canisters of laughing gas on eBay to give out at party - Telegraph and Argus', "DigiDirect's eBay store is cutting prices across the board - T3"]
summary:
['Recalled Beatles Doc ‘Get Back’ a Hot Commodity on eBayThomas K. ArnoldCopies of the recalled The Beatles: Get Back documentary on Blu-ray Disc are a hot commodity on eBay, where they are being offered for as much as $999.99.
The docuseries, which was supposed to be released Feb. 8, was yanked by Disney due to a technical glitch.
The Imax event was followed by a global theatrical run of the 60-minute concert film that began Feb. 11 and ran through the weekend.
The Beatles: Get Back covers the making of the Beatles’ 1970 album Let It Be, whose working title was Get Back.
Originally conceived as a feature film, The Beatles: Get Back was expanded into three episodes with a total runtime of nearly eight hours.', 'She pleaded guilty to possession of a PAVA spray that belonged to a police officer searching her then home in Walden Drive, Heaton, Bradford, on the day the laughing gas was seized.
They found 480 canisters of nitrous oxide in cardboard boxes.
A second search of the premises was conducted on December 4, 2019, when the police officer’s PAVA spray was found in her bedroom drawer.
She bought the nitrous oxide to give out free at a party.
No separate penalty was imposed for possession of the PAVA spray.', 'Right now you can get 20% off on a world of goods from the official DigiDirect eBay store (opens in new tab).
But now, using the eBay code DDIRECT20 you can save plenty of dosh on some excellent bits of kit.
If you’re looking for other tech goods, DigiDirect has far more than just cameras on its eBay store.
Now anyone can snap up the X-T4 for less from DigiDirect’s eBay store with the code DDIRECT20.
(opens in new tab) Logitech C922 Pro | AU$179 AU$143.20 on DigiDirect eBay (opens in new tab) (save AU$35.80) The Logitech C922 Pro Stream is, in our opinion, the best webcam for most people.']

title: ["eBay lance une plateforme d'enchères en direct pour surfer sur le «live shopping» - Le Figaro", 'eBay Fulfillment Now Available in Australia – Following Previous ... - eSeller365', 'Should You Buy eBay Stock Ahead of Earnings? - The Motley Fool', 'Another Sneaky eBay Stealth Fee Increase in the UK for 2022 - eSeller365']
summary:
["Le site de commerce en ligne eBay, historiquement basé sur le système des enchères, va proposer une fois par mois une séance d'enchères en ligne et en direct, une manière de surfer sur la tendance du «live shopping», ou commerce social, selon un communiqué jeudi.
À lire aussieBay-Adevinta: un rapprochement qui inquièteLe site prévoit d'organiser un dimanche par mois en fin de journée une vente aux enchères en ligne.
Sur cette plateforme intitulée «live by eBay», eBay prévoit de mettre en vente des «objets d'exception», présélectionnés et expertisés par des spécialistes, «à des mises à prix abordables».
En outre, «exit les frais de commission qui peuvent atteindre 30% en salle de vente aux enchères», assure eBay.
Cette démarche s'inscrit dans la tendance de consommation du «live shopping», forme de téléachat revisité à l'ère des réseaux sociaux, très populaire en Chine notamment.", 'eBay has launched a fulfillment solution for Australian sellers from two warehouses in Sydney with additional warehouses planned in other major Australian cities the company confirmed this week.
Third eBay Fulfillment Launch Globally – What About US?
This is the third fulfillment service launched globally by eBay with previous launches in the UK (2021) and Germany (2020), yet, still, no word if eBay may consider adding the US to the list.
Originally, Orange Connex was launched to provide Chinese eBay sellers better shipping access to the US and other countries.
It’s unclear if Orange Connex was part of the aborted US fulfillment program or if eBay may reconsider the US anytime soon.', 'eBay (EBAY 2.82%) was one of the prime beneficiaries at the onset of the pandemic.
Still, eBay increased its revenue year over year, despite falling gross merchandise value.
Is eBay stock a buy?
eBay stock is trading at a price-to-free-cash-flow ratio of 15.7 and a forward price-to-earnings ratio of 13.2.
eBay may not be an explosive growth stock, but it offers investors good value at its current price.', 'We have received reports from our friends and readers over in the UK that eBay has found another way to increase selling fees.
This time it is by getting rid of the volume discounts that many sellers enjoyed.
Whilst not applicable to all sellers, those that would turn over a high volume on eBay UK were granted discounts on their final value fees.
eBay Want High Value Buyers But Not High Value Sellers?
What was seen by many as a nice incentive to succeed on the platform and be rewarded for being a high volume seller in good standing is being taken away.']

title: ['Holy Grail of Information about eBay 1099Ks - EcommerceBytes']
summary:
['Does eBay include sales tax in the information it gives to the IRS on Form 1099K?
And that means sellers need answers from eBay about the information it provides to the IRS on Form 1099-K.
(Every dollar eBay processes will show on eBay 1099Ks, said one seller replying to a seller’s question about sales tax inclusion in the form.
Sales tax is not included in eBay 1099Ks, wrote another.)
Lo and behold, the topic of IRS Form 1099-Ks came up again during eBay’s weekly chat session on Wednesday: “why is Managed payments having so many problems still?']

title: ['1099-K Forms - What eBay, Etsy, and Online Sellers Need to Know - eSeller365', 'Raw Deal: Buyer bemused by online ban after eBay brands her a ... - The Sunday Post']
summary:
['1099-K forms can be confusing, especially when sellers receive them for the first time.
This means some eBay sellers may receive multiple 1099-K forms, from eBay and Paypal.
Because I am focusing on 1099-K forms issued by marketplaces that are also Third-Party Settlement Organizations (TPSO), I may use those terms interchangeably.
As I mentioned earlier, this is one of the biggest misunderstood fears when sellers receive their first 1099-K form.
Last year, many eBay sellers were moved from PayPal to eBay Managed Payments and this applies to them.', 'Get a weekly round-up of stories from The Sunday Post: Thank you for signing up to our Sunday Post newsletter.
Sign UpFor almost 20 years, Nicola Morrison had enjoyed buying and selling small items on her favourite online marketplace.
eBay emailed her, saying: “We have reviewed your account and found that it is suspended because the pattern of activities exhibits a risk to eBay and to its community.
From this point forward, in order to conduct business on the internet, you will have to find a different venue.
“I had only been buying and selling things like small items of household furniture and clothes.']

title: ['Seller Satisfaction Survey: Visibility on eBay - Part 2 - EcommerceBytes', 'Greggs Primark £18 hoodies listed on Ebay for £140 after range sells out within hours in Newcastle - Chronicle Live', "Cards of the Top 5 Selling NBA Players on eBay in Season's 1st Half - Sports Collectors Daily"]
summary:
['In part one of our report today on the Seller Satisfaction Survey on visibility on eBay that we conducted last week, we provided background on the survey and information on the over 1,000 eBay sellers who responded.
Do you feel that your eBay items are shown to potential buyers fairly, regardless of how big or small a seller you are?
eBay search results say “ZERO MATCHES” – and brings up a huge CARS and TRUCKS search box – to take them out of my store.
“There is no consistency at all, its feast or famine,” said one seller of their visibility in eBay search results.
Others were positive with qualifications, such as the seller who wrote, “Visibility not sure, but I still feel there is potential.', 'Invalid email Something went wrong, please try again later.
Get the latest news from Newcastle straight to your inboxHoodies from the Greggs and Primark clothing range that are priced at £18 are being listed on Ebay for around eight times the price at £140.
One Ebay listing is advertising a Greggs and Primark black hoodie, which has a Greggs logo on the chest and is normally priced at £18, at £140.
Primark staff said that the average customer was spending around £60 on the Greggs range with the novelty £8 bucket hats selling out within minutes.
More stock - including the highly-anticipated Greggs trainers - would be coming into the Newcastle store on Tuesday morning, with the shop set to open from 8am.', '']

Commentator Chris Kamara hosted the match, as Eni Aluko was subbed on for Jasmin Beal, in the first half.
This match culminated from the eBay Dream Transfer, which allowed anyone associated with a Sunday League team to throw their hat into the ring, to sign football icons Eni Aluko and Roberto Carlos.
Having Eni play for Pevensey and Westham FC has meant so much to the team, including our younger girls squad who watched the game.
She’s truly an inspiration, who’s world class on and off the pitch.”Eni Aluko said: “It’s been fantastic to play alongside the ladies from Pevensey and Westham FC.', 'Plenty of Souls fans are desperate to get their hands on the Elden Ring Premium Collector’s Edition but these eBay prices are ridiculous!

title: ["Primark's new £18 Greggs hoodie listed on eBay for £140 after 'selling out' in stores - My London", "Mum replicates Stacey Solomon's flower wall using bargain £14 eBay panels - The Mirror", 'eBay Announces New Integration with QuickBooks Accounting - EcommerceBytes', 'Holyoke pawn shop owner buys $1M Florida home through ‘boosting,’ eBay scheme, feds say - MassLive.com']
summary:
["We didn't quite know what to expect when Primark revealed it was doing a collaboration with Greggs.
The special items were only made available in 60 UK stores, and some locations sold out of stock within minutes.
READ MORE:Greggs and Primark unveil full 11-piece fashion range(Image: Greggs/Primark)The relaxed black Greggs hoodie, for example, is £18 in Primark stores but has been listed by one eBay seller for almost nine times that price at £140.
The seller has also listed the white Greggs hoodie for the same price.
Another seller is offering the Greggs trainers, originally £16, for £99.99 excluding the £4.99 delivery.", 'After doing some hunting online, she found £14 flower panels on eBay and created the flower mural herself instead of hiring a professional.
Other wall panels she’d seem cost £30 each - meaning she’d saved around 50% by shopping around.
The panels were only 30cm x 40cm so we ended up needing 30 panels in total.”Samantha spent £392 in total on the 30 panels but is thrilled with the results.
She used a staple gun to attach the flower panels to the wall and said this worked better than using pins, as these kept coming loose.
"We were laughed at by so many people when we said we wanted a full flower wall as they all said it was a very ambitious idea.', 'eBay announced a new integration with QuickBooks, a service many small businesses use for bookkeeping and accounting purposes.
It appears that since eBay rolled out Managed Payments, sellers had to use OneSaas to integrate with QuickBooks.
eBay announced: “Managing your eBay business just got easier.
This exclusive offer from Quickbooks for eBay sellers is only available for a limited time.
Please see QuickBooks promo offer terms and conditions.”eBay pointed out that sellers can now access QuickBooks through a web browser – “no apps or special software required.', 'SPRINGFIELD — A Holyoke pawn shop owner bought a $1 million luxury home in Florida complete with six bedrooms and a pool nestled under a lanai and surrounded by palm trees off the back of a multimillion-dollar “boosting” and eBay scheme, according to a newly unsealed indictment in federal court.
Mimi Mai, 48, of Springfield was the proprietor of EZ Exchange, a pawn shop on Appleton Street in Holyoke.
She made $2.1 million over two years using a fleet of shoplifters who stole high-end goods from major retailers, according to the seven-count indictment.
“The boosters stole these goods from several stores, including but not limited to Home Depot, Target, CVS and Stop & Shop,” the charges read']

title: ['Products from the Greggs x Primark range found on eBay for three times the price - The Manc', 'Snowdrop bulb from Cottenham’s ‘King of snowdrops’ fetches £1,850 in eBay auction - Cambridge Independent', 'Jeep Gladiator is Hiding in This Monstrous Build for Sale on eBay - The Car Guide', 'New eBay Feature Helps Sellers Target Repeat Buyers - EcommerceBytes', 'Ebay becomes first major UK marketplace to sell CBD products - Charged Retail', 'eBay Fulfillment: Coming to a Country Near You - EcommerceBytes', 'eBay raises dividend by 22% to $0.22, expands buyback program ... - Seeking Alpha', 'eBay Payments Is Now Integrated With QuickBooks - eSeller365', 'Stocks making the biggest moves after hours: EBay, Booking Holdings, Allbirds and more - CNBC', 'eBay Inc. Reports Better Than Expected Fourth Quarter and Full ... - PR Newswire', 'EBay forecasts bleak quarter as online shopping frenzy wanes - Yahoo Canada Finance']
summary:
['NewsProducts from the Greggs x Primark range found on eBay for three times the priceFans have left been left "baffled" by the staggeringly-high resale prices.
Some sell-out products from the viral Greggs x Primark range have been found listed on eBay for up to three times the original price.
One shocked shopper said on Twitter: “The Greggs x Primark collection sold out and people are now reselling it on eBay for x8 the price – this country baffles me.”“The Greggs x Primark stuff sold out?
A third said: “I see that people have bought up all the Primark x Greggs clothing and are selling it on eBay for ridiculous prices.
Featured Image – Greggs x Primark & Thumbnail (via Twitter – @DanMcMahonF1)', 'A single snowdrop, created by Joe ‘King of Snowdrops’ Sharman of Cottenham-based Monksilver Nursery, has fetched a record £1,850 in an eBay auction.
Snowdrops in woodland (55066277)Mr Sharman has been growing and breeding snowdrops for 35 years and selling rare varieties on eBay for 15.
Quite different from Golden Fleece.
“The result of a deliberate cross by me using the same parents that created Golden Fleece.
Gardening writer Val Bourne told MailOnline that the bulb bought on eBay will likely “go under the knife”.', 'Remember the Ram 1500 TRX turned into a Warload 6x6 by Florida-based tuner Apocalypse and sold at a Barrett-Jackson auction in late January?
Well, we’d like to talk to you about another monstrous creature from the company.
Apocalypse is used to transforming Jeep Gladiators for doomsday scenarios.
Up until today, a copy of the last one was listed on eBay at a whopping $219,999 USD.
Photo: eBayAs for the engine, Apocalypse used the supercharged 6.2-litre Hellcat V8 and cranked it up to 750 horsepower.', 'I usually reach out to repeat buyers and personally thank them for their purchases.
This new repeat buyer feature can be found in many places, including on the Performance tab.
It can be seen in your seller’s Hub on each sales order that is from a repeat buyer (“Repeat” is conveniently placed next to the buyer’s name).
They have also added it to the Send Coupon option so now you can select your repeat buyers and target them specifically with coupons designed just for them.
Overall, this new repeat buyer feature is a great improvement and a new tool that sellers can use to their own advantage.', 'Ebay has become the first mainstream marketplace in the UK to sell CBD, with a new category dedicated to the products in the health and beauty section.
The sale of CBD products on eBay was previously banned globally and the move is already being highly regulated.
The category is essentially gated, meaning sellers will need to be thoroughly vetted to ensure products are approved for use in the UK.
There is an ever-growing demand for CBD products and eBay are jumping on the bandwagon, albeit cautiously.
READ MORE: Ebay bolsters black women entrepreneurs with Black Girl Fest partnershipEbay’s updated illegal drugs and drug paraphernalia policy reads: “CBD products that comply with all applicable legal requirements may only be sold by permitted sellers only.', 'In a FAQ on the landing page for the Australian service, eBay answers the question, "Does eBay own Orange Connex?"
eBay does not own Orange Connex, however it does have a partnership with plans to roll out eBay Fulfilment globally."
Here's the explanation of the new Australian fulfillment service : "eBay Fulfilment by Orange Connex is a new solution for delivery of your items.
eBay's announcement is still live, but the URL to the "eBay Managed Delivery" landing page (ebay.com/manageddelivery) goes to an error page.
How receptive would sellers be to an eBay fulfillment service today?', 'To ensure this doesn’t happen in the future, please enable Javascript and cookies in your browser.
If you have an ad-blocker enabled you may be blocked from proceeding.
Please disable your ad-blocker and refresh.', 'eBay announced that eBay Payments is now integrated into QuickBooks, which is one of the most popular accounting solutions for small and medium-sized businesses.
This exclusive offer from Quickbooks for eBay sellers is only available for a limited time.
QuickBooks Online subscribers can conveniently and securely access QuickBooks via a web browser without having to download an app or special software.
eBay Payments and QuickBooks BenefitsConnected for convenienceQuickBooks automatically syncs eBay transactions, reducing manual data entry.
To learn more about QuickBooks Online and eBay Payments, click here.', "Check out the companies making headlines in after-hours trading:Booking Holdings — Shares of the travel booking site operator rose more than 2% in after-hours trading following a strong quarterly earnings report.
Quarterly revenue of $2.98 billion was higher than the expected $2.85 billion.
RealReal — The luxury consignment marketplace saw its stock whipsaw during extended trading after reporting a wider-than-expected quarterly loss.
Allbirds — The shoe maker's shares fell 7% after the company reported a quarterly loss of 9 cents per share, in line with estimates.
Bath & Body Works — After reporting quarterly results and an executive shuffle, Bath & Body Works saw its shares fall 3% in extended trading.", 'Non-GAAP net income from continuing operations was $2.7 billion , or $4.02 per diluted share.
Generated $3.1 billion operating cash flow and $2.6 billion of free cash flow from continuing operations.
Non-GAAP operating margin decreased to 31.6% in the fourth quarter of 2021, compared to 31.7% for the same period last year.
Taxes – The GAAP effective tax rate for continuing operations for the fourth quarter of 2021 was 23.1%, compared to 29.4% for the fourth quarter of 2020.
The non-GAAP effective tax rate for continuing operations for the fourth quarter of 2021 was 17.3%, compared to 16.0% for the fourth quarter of 2020.', 'E-commerce companies raked in large profits as online shopping boomed last year during the pandemic, but vaccine rollouts could spell trouble as people return to brick-and-mortar shopping.
Biggest rival and online retail giant Amazon.com Inc has also forecast disappointing first-quarter sales estimates.
EBay, which is already grappling with declining active users, expects a further hit as ramping up investments put pressure on its margins.
However, gross merchandise volume, the total dollar value of sales on eBay from which the company takes a percentage, fell 10% to $20.7 billion.
Annual active buyers on eBay also declined 9% to 147 million in the quarter, the company said.']
