['An apparent prototype smart speaker from defunct smartphone manufacturer Essential has popped up in an eBay listing spotted by a keen-eyed Redditor.
It offers a tantalizing glimpse at what the ambitious-yet-unreleased “Essential Home” device could have been and seems to be partially functional.
The smart speaker was announced in May 2017 alongside the Essential Phone, and the company told Wired that it hoped to ship both later that summer.
The phone would eventually release in August, but the smart speaker was nowhere to be found.
Image: Essential A settings menu showing that the device appears to be running Android.', "Bob Means, eBay's director of trading cards, identified the top collectible categories on eBay.
He said sports trading cards, coins, toys, and comic books are in demand.
The company said the trading cards category accounted for over $2 billion in gross merchandise volume — or the total value of goods sold — on eBay in 2020.
It said that in the first half of 2021, an average of two trading cards sold every second on eBay.
The company said the total cash value of coins sold on eBay grew by 30% in 2021."]

title: ['eBay Bucks: Where Are They? - EcommerceBytes', 'Gamer Buys Custom-Built Nintendo 64 Portable from eBay, This is ... - TechEBlog']
summary:
["Where are eBay Bucks, a buyer asked today on the eBay discussion boards .
But despite ending enrollment of new members, it didn't end the eBay Bucks loyalty program entirely.
Will the buyer who posted about the missing eBay Bucks - and others like them - change their buying behavior going forward?
What exactly is eBay doing with the money it used to put into the eBay Bucks program to encourage buyers to purchase items from sellers?
Should it revitalize the eBay Bucks program?", 'Always wanted a portable Nintendo 64 console that accepts cartridges?
If so, then look no further than eBay, or at least that’s what one gamer did.
Unfortunately, it will cost you around $300 USD, but on the bright side, you’ll be able to take it just about anywhere.
Featuring a 7-inch display, dual speakers, all original N64 controller parts, a built-in Expansion Pak, stereo speakers, and a custom machined case that includes a fan to keep everything cool inside.
Overall, just about every game that Jacob R. tried appeared to work perfectly, including the Star Wars Episode 1: Racer, which makes full use of the Expansion Pak for enhanced graphics.']

title: ['Hilarious eBay Advert Selling 1980s Caravan Goes Viral - LADbible', 'Superteam Wheels/eBay | Forum | road.cc - road.cc']
summary:
['An hilarious eBay advert has gone viral after a man tried to sell his mother’s caravan from the 1980s.
It’s a caravan from 1980, and it’s in need of some serious TLC by the looks of things.
Credit: eBayAdvert 10Michael adds: "If you're lucky there might be 80% of a pack of Uno cards in there.
Advert 10Michael later added: "***update*** it does not include the awning, it is currently MIA.
“No doubt she will later find it in the loft and I will have to eBay that too!', "I purchased a set of Superteam 3K 50mm carbon wheels with R13 hubs from superteambike on eBay in December 2021.
They lasted 2 months when in February 2022 the rear hub would no longer freewheel in reverse, instead locking up.
I contacted eBay after Superteambike wouldn't respond to my several messages 2 months after the wheel failure through eBay.
After a lengthy chat eBay they stated superteambike would be reported and investigated as a bad vendor.
Superteam wheels is a bad product... made worse by a shister company who won't honor their own 2 year warranty... and even made worse by eBay's current rules & regs."]

title: ['Siobhán Curtin appointed site lead at eBay Ireland - The Irish Times', 'Ebay appoints Siobhán Curtin as new Irish boss - Independent.ie', 'Incredible eBay Ad For A 1980s Caravan Amasses A Cult Following - The Project']
summary:
["Siobhán Curtin has been appointed site lead at eBay Ireland and will lead operations at the group's EU headquarters in Blanchardstown, Co Dublin.
The group said she will be responsible for the cross-functional teams and departments supporting local and global eBay programmes.
The Kildare native has worked with eBay for over 17 years.
She joined eBay as a customer services representative.
Most recently she was director of UK and Ireland customer operations.", 'The web listings giant, which employs 900 people at its European headquarters in Blanchardstown, has announced the Kildare woman as its new site lead.
Ebay has announced that its director of customer operations for the UK and Ireland, Siobhán Curtin, is to be the tech giant’s new site lead in Ireland.
Ms Curtin has worked at Ebay since 2004, when she started as a customer services representative.
"Her experience, integrity and motivational qualities are widely recognised across the business and make her the outstanding candidate for the position of site lead for Ebay Ireland,” said Derek Allgood, vice president at eBay.
From Kildare but living in Navan, Ms Curtin will be responsible for the cross-functional teams and departments supporting local and global eBay programmes.', 'So a caravan doesn't seem that unusual.
The seller from Lancashire in the United Kingdom has gone viral for his unique listing.
Well, this is what's making this eBay listing so unique, and why it has a cult following.
In the listing, Michael says, "This was our family caravan; it's in half-decent nick considering its age.
This listing, which has been edited more than 20 times, goes on to share more background about Michael and his family and the caravan.']

title: ["EBay Shows Users How to Pimp Their Mom's Ride - Adweek", 'How about a Maserati? Best Used Cars on eBay for Less Than ... - The Drive', 'Funny eBay Listing For Vintage Camper Van Goes Viral - Obsev']
summary:
['The handing down of a car from parent to child is a rite of passage that ends up with them trying to look cool while driving a sky-blue Fiat Punto, hoping to impress their friends.
That’s an issue that online marketplace eBay has focused on in its latest ad as it continues to promote its creative platform “Inspired by an eBay Story.”', 'Shopping for used cars used to be fun as heck.
Because of the chip shortage and high asking prices on used cars, however, it’s sucked the fun right out of it.
We’re looking to change that and find you, our dear readers, a few affordable used cars on eBay that would look perfect sitting in your garage or parked on your street.
"Yeah, it'd be easier to get those cars than a new or used Honda Ridgeline right now."
The price is somewhat inflated thanks to our current used-car hellscape, but you're still getting a lot of car for the money.', 'A listing for a vintage camper van recently went viral, and not because it was in perfect shape.
The eBay listing posted by a seller named Michael who lives in Lancashire, England, and the entertaining post quickly drew in some attention because of Michael’s lovely mother.
The listing read, “This was our family caravan, it's in half decent nick considering its age.
eBay"If you're lucky there might be 80% of a pack of Uno cards in there,” the listing continued.
“There might even be an awning, I'll have to check, if there then it's included.']

title: ['eBay Changes How It Counts Page Views - EcommerceBytes', 'eBay Names Eddie Garcia Chief Product Officer - PR Newswire', 'Examining the Circuit Split on Preliminary Injunctions in False ... - IPWatchdog.com', 'Fylde man sells dilapidated caravan for £2,100 on eBay - and ... - Blackpool Gazette']
summary:
['eBay is changing how it counts page views on sellers’ listings to be more accurate by filtering out more “non-human” traffic.
“To give you clearer insight into your listings’ performance, we’re changing to a more accurate way of counting page views, and updating how we display traffic data on your listings,” eBay said.
* Learn more about non-human traffic and bots in the Listing Page Views FAQs tab.
“Although this non-human traffic is currently counted as a “page view,” it doesn’t represent real shoppers or lead to sales, and recent analysis has shown how much it inflates your page view numbers.
We’re just updating what types of traffic we count as page views to more accurately show views by potential buyers.', 'SAN JOSE, Calif., April 13, 2022 /PRNewswire/ -- eBay Inc. (NASDAQ: EBAY) today announced the appointment of Eddie Garcia as Chief Product Officer.
Eddie will report directly to Jamie Iannone, eBay's Chief Executive Officer, and will join the company on April 18, 2022.
This role marks a return to the eBay product organization for Eddie, where he held roles in search and buyer experience from 2003-2014.
His passion for building successful product teams dedicated to customers fits perfectly with our growth strategy," said Jamie Iannone, Chief Executive Officer at eBay.
"I am proud to join an eBay team that puts an outstanding customer experience at the center of everything they do," said Eddie Garcia, incoming Chief Product Officer, eBay.', 'Petitioners raise false advertising claims and try to stop misleading advertisements by seeking injunctions.
Some courts continued the irreparable harm presumption in false advertising cases; some courts refused a blanket presumption and required proving irreparable harm caused by false advertisements.
This article discusses the eBay case, the split over the irreparable harm presumption, and the problems created by the split.
In most false advertising cases, plaintiffs will seek preliminary injunctions to enjoin defendants’ false advertisements, and courts will evaluate the above five false advertising elements to determine the probability of winning on the merits.
For example, the Third Circuit in Ferring Pharmaceuticals, Inc. v. Watson Pharmaceuticals, Inc.determined whether the irreparable harm presumption was applicable in false advertising context.', 'Sylvia Ellis, Michael's mum, was amazed at how much the caravan raisedMichael said: “I put my mum's caravan on eBay after she was nagging me to get it off her driveway and things just spiralled from there.
"But mum and I are amazed and delighted that it has raised a good chunk of money for the British Heart Foundation in memory of Dad…that was the whole point.
Advertisement Hide Ad"We had many great childhood holidays in that caravan so it’s bittersweet to let go of it.
Michael Ellis' dad, Dave, who inspired the the donation to the British Heart FoundationAdvertisement Hide Ad“Dad suffered a heart attack last October and had to have an emergency triple heart bypass.
"We hope the caravan will make someone a happy camper while raising money for the BHF’s life saving research into heart and circulatory disease.”The caravan bathroom']

Garcia will report to eBay CEO Jamie Iannone and will manage the marketplace’s Core Product organization and cultivate tech-led reimagination to improve the user experience.

Also moving on from Meta, the company’s former VP of Commerce Partnerships Annelies Jansen has joined creator commerce platform Spring as President and COO.
At Spring, Jansen will cultivate partnerships strategy to drive growth by developing enhanced tools for creators, distribution and the company’s global fulfillment network.']

Please make sure your readers know to check payment method (bottom of page) EVERY time they print a shipping label, in case eBay changes it.", 'Fahmida Khatun completely changed the look of her kitchen floor for under £50 by using a cheap eBay stencil to paint a pattern on her tiles.

title: ['Sponsored: eBay is Adding an Extra Layer of Trust with Authenticity ... - Watchtime.com', "eBay Wants to Act on Seller's Behalf on Twitter Social Channel - EcommerceBytes", 'eBay Demands Seller Provide an Invoice from His Supplier - EcommerceBytes', '2021-22 NBA Rookie Card Roundup, 100 Most Watched eBay ... - Sports Collectors Daily']
summary:
['In a nutshell, all watches on the platform that match the criteria are marked with the blue Authenticity Guarantee badge.
Sold watches are then shipped by the seller to eBay’s third-party authentication partners Stoll & Co..
If a buyer opts into this service, their watch will go to our authentication partner where it will go through our Authenticity Guarantee process.
On average, there are over 150,000 daily live listings for luxury watches, and every eight seconds, a watch is sold on eBay, with the most expensive luxury watch sale on eBay in 2021 having been a Patek Phillipe which sold for $230,000.
Follow this link to learn more about eBay’s “Authenticity Guarantee,” a post-sale authentication service for watches sold for $2,000 or more in the U.S.Authenticity Guarantee is not affiliated with or endorsed by any of the brands sold on eBay.', 'This is the same eBay account I've been using for 20 years, and the one and only Twitter account I've used in reference to that account since I've been on Twitter (probably 2 to 3 years).
So, I followed the link, and it's asking me to "Review and Grant Application Access: eBay Social Channel".
"Privacy policy" is a link, but it just opens up a new browser tab with the exact same details (no actual privacy policy!).
Then it says, "you're letting eBay Social Channel act on your behalf on eBay".
But now I'm being asked to allow some eBay Social app to act "on my behalf"???', "We're used to reports of Amazon requiring sellers to provide the name of their suppliers along with copies of invoices, but I don't recall seeing similar reports regarding eBay.
Today, a seller reported that eBay requested a copy of his ID (not unusual for eBay) - but also an invoice showing the supplier from whom he purchased an item that has not yet been delivered along with a copy of his business EIN notice, and a bank statement.
(The seller didn't specific if it was related to an Item Not Received claim.)
Is eBay now requiring sellers to provide it with copies of invoices of items they're selling?
After all, many sellers don't have invoices from suppliers since many items are used or scavenged.", '']

title: ['Former eBay executive to plead guilty to cyberstalking campaign ... - Reuters', 'Ultra Rare Commodore 65 In Pristine Working Condition Is Back On Ebay For Big Money - Hot Hardware', 'eBay CEO Gets the Band Back Together - EcommerceBytes']
summary:
["REUTERS/Dado Ruvic/Illustration/File PhotoBOSTON, April 19 (Reuters) - A former eBay Inc (EBAY.O) security executive intends to plead guilty to federal charges that he planned a cyberstalking campaign that targeted a Massachusetts couple whose online newsletter was seen as critical of the e-commerce company.
At the request of Baugh's lawyers, a federal judge on Tuesday scheduled a hearing for him to instead plead guilty on April 25.
Baugh is one of seven former eBay workers who were charged in 2020 with harassing the married couple in Natick, Massachusetts, behind the newsletter EcommerceBytes.
Five other former eBay workers have pleaded guilty.
eBay has said it is in settlement talks with the couple.", 'However, there remain a small number of C65 prototypes in the wild, and one of them has landed on eBay.
I personally would like to see the alternate timeline where the C65 released.
Working prototypes are supremely rare, and so these systems fetch big money on auction sites.
"The C65 is highly sought and valued collector's items, especially when in fully working order: very few working machines are known to exist.
Otherwise, the rare prototype is said to be fully working, as shown in the video above.', '“This role marks a return to the eBay product organization for Eddie, where he held roles in search and buyer experience from 2003-2014,” eBay noted in the announcement.
Like Iannone, Garcia did a stint at Walmart between tours of duty at eBay.
Another boomerang executive whose time at eBay overlapped that of Iannone and Garcia is Randy Shoup, who rejoined eBay in June of 2020.
Iannone is bringing back the two alum, Garcia as eBay’s Chief Product Officer, and Shoup as eBay’s Chief Architect.
What may catch sellers’ attention is that Garcia and Shoup both worked on search as eBay transitioned to Cassini.']

title: ['Dyson Airwrap launches on eBay with £70 off but you’ll need to be fast... - The Irish Sun', 'eBay Helps Brands Offload Imperfections in Name of Sustainability - EcommerceBytes', "Ukraine Issued 'Go Fuck Yourself' Stamps. Prices Are Skyrocketing ... - VICE"]

And luckily for beauty fans shoppers can save £70 on the device but they'll need to be fast.
Dyson Airwrap, £379.99, Ebay (Save £70) - buy hereShoppers, we have good news.
If you're looking for a great deal on the Dyson Airwrap; eBay are here to help.
Both the Airwrap and Airwrap Long are on offer with 15% off - a saving of £70.", 'eBay UK is helping brands offload fashion items with imperfections in the name of sustainability.
eBay Imperfects is launching this week to coincide with Earth Day (April 22), with eBay encouraging shoppers to “invest in their planet.”The new Imperfects landing page is found under the eBay Brand Outlet hub, which eBay UK launched in September 2020 offering up to 70% off over 150 designer brands.
It appears the program is available only to select sellers including brands and brand-authorized resellers.
“An Imperfects purchases also come with free shipping and 30 day returns, with a money back guarantee so customers can shop with peace of mind.”The eBay Imperfects landing page on the UK website trumpets, “Up to 60% off Imperfects.
Give new life to slightly damaged items.”How “imperfect” are these eBay Imperfects?', 'When the Russian warship Moskva told the Ukrainian border guards on Snake Island to surrender, the soldiers told the ship to go fuck itself.
It’s even become a stamp that’s selling for outrageous prices on secondary markets like eBay.
The Ukrainian post office turned the painting into a stamp and issued the first run of them on April 13.
The Ukrainian postal service issued 1 million of these stamps and is selling 700,000 of them in Ukraine.
Ukraine is selling the stamps for their face value—about $1 a piece.']

title: ['PayPal down: eBay payments not working for many - iLounge', "eBay 'Refreshes' Board of Directors; Annual Meeting Set for June - EcommerceBytes", "eBay embraces Oscars' star power with partnership at the event's ... - WatchPro USA", 'Commodore 65 Prototype Pops Up on eBay for $30,000 - Gizmodo', "Alienware's new 34-inch QD-OLED monitor is 20% off on eBay AU - PC Gamer"]
summary:
['According to many users on Twitter, PayPal is not working on eBay for them.
PayPal DownCurrently, users are being greeted with the following error message when they are trying to make a payment:Things don’t appear to be working at the moment.
^RK https://t.co/MbymXn02mi — PayPal Support (@AskPayPal) April 20, 2022Hi there, we understand that you have concerns regarding any issue with your PayPal account.
^SAHU https://t.co/MbymXn02mi — PayPal Support (@AskPayPal) April 20, 2022Hi there, we understand that you have concerns regarding any issue with your PayPal account.
^SAHU https://t.co/MbymXn02mi — PayPal Support (@AskPayPal) April 20, 2022Hi there, we understand that you have concerns regarding any issue with your PayPal account.', 'Four members of eBay’s Board of Directors will step down in June.
The median employee’s annual total compensation was $135,528.
That makes the ratio of the CEO’s annual total compensation to the median employee’s annual total compensation 160:1, eBay disclosed.
She received $18 million in total compensation in 2021 in exchange for her execution and non-revocation of a release of claims against eBay under the terms of a 2015 offer letter agreement.
eBay will hold its 2022 Annual Meeting of Shareholders on June 8, 2022, at 8:00 am Pacific Time and will hold it virtually.', '', 'A rare piece of computing history is for sale on eBay, and it can be yours for the low, low price of $30,000.
We’ve all heard of the Commodore 64—the best-selling computer model of all time—but had things gone differently, we’d also be looking back fondly on the Commodore 65.
This proposed successor to the Commodore 64 now commands a lofty price, and for good reasons.
For one, the Commodore 65 was never officially released to the public, and only a few prototypes—like the one being sold on eBay (via HotHardware)—were built.
There are an estimated 50 to 2,000 Commodore 65 machines still in existence, and only a handful of those are operational.', '']

title: ['Snag the Best Earth Day Deals from Amazon, eBay, Samsung, and ... - Futurism', "Vegan who vandalised Scottish Highlands 'secretly flogs leather handbags on eBay' - Daily Mail", 'Hands-on: eBay’s refreshed refurbished program offers the best iPhone 12 value on the market - 9to5Toys', 'eBay Forces Sellers into New Unified Listing Tool - EcommerceBytes', 'eBay Canada Runs Earth Day Listing Promotion - EcommerceBytes', 'Best Exhibits at The 2022 eBay Auto Parts Show | NYAPS 2022 - Popular Mechanics', 'Sponsored: eBay - How Jomashop was Able to Build Trust With ... - Watchtime.com']
summary:
['Earth Day is a good time to reflect not only on small steps we can take to live more sustainably but celebrate a planet we call home.
To ring in the day right, Amazon, Home Depot, eBay, Samsung, and Walmart offering tons of great deals on everything from sustainable home goods to tech.
Home and KitchenAmazonOne of the easiest ways to curb your energy use is by using a smart thermostat.
It’s Energy Star-certified, and can save you as much as $50 a year on your energy bills.
Not only is this smart thermostat great for more energy-efficient living, but it’s Climate Pledge-friendly so it’s built sustainably too.', 'A militant vegan activist has been unmasked as a hypocrite who secretly flogs designer leather handbags on eBay.
Now it can be revealed he is raking in thousands selling leather handbags from his flat in Edinburgh.
They are marked as ‘100 per cent authentic’ and ‘vintage’, mainly from the last 20 years – meaning they are real leather.
Peta also attacked Gucci in a hard-hitting investigation last December, which showed workers decapitating lizards to make handbags.
Hillwalker Anne Butler was shocked to find a stone with ‘Be kind to animals or I’ll kill you’ scrawled on it.', 'Hands-on with eBay’s refurbished iPhone experienceFollowing its original refresh last fall, eBay went back to update its Refurbished Program once again earlier in the week.
As for the actual experience, we’re taking a look at what you can expect by buying an iPhone 12 from the eBay refurbished program.
Excellent condition iPhone 12 on the left, Very Good model on the rightSo how do they stack up and compare?
Passing the test in condition category, the real value in going with a refurbished iPhone 12 from the eBay program is the price.
On the actual iPhone 12 front, the final verdict for buying a refurbished model from eBay and its Refurbished program is pretty solid.', 'Sellers report eBay is forcing them to use a new listing tool that they say makes the job of adding items for sale more difficult.
Among the problems they identified were the following:- Significant lag when opening a listing/draft with the new listing tool.
Last year, eBay announced the "New unified listing experience" on January 19, 2021.
That means groups of sellers are being migrated to the new listing flow without an option to return to the classic listing form.
Update 4/22/2022: Other issues reported on : Other issues reported on this eBay thread : "you cannot look up by ISBN numbers, cannot use ebay descriptions, cannot use stock photos,..."', 'eBay Canada is running an “Earth Day” listing promotion that kicked off on April 22 and runs through April 29, 2022.
The promotion offers a 50% discount on commission fees for up to 10 used items that qualify once the seller has activated the promo.
Among the other restrictions: The promotion is only valid for listings on the Canadian eBay sites at www.ebay.ca, www.cafr.ebay.ca.
Only registered eBay members with an address located in Canada can receive the promotion.
You can find details about the Earth Day promotion on eBay Canada.', 'Amid this climate, eBay Motors threw its very own New York Auto Parts Show last week, celebrating hare-brained DIY projects featuring cars and components bought, naturally, through its own platform.
A Hot Vapor EngineIf you’re at all interested in NASCAR folklore, you’ve no doubt heard of Smokey Yunick.
Open GalleryOne such project involved the hot vapor engine.
Hot vapor engines also worked super close to their breaking point, meaning any minor issue like improper air/fuel ratio or temperature would lead to instant engine failure.
Open GalleryFor those who are unaware, the impetus for such a crazy automobile began as just another one of Benoit’s crazy Tesla parts-bin specials.', 'We started selling watches in our small Manhattan office in 1987.
Can you roughly quantify how many watches you’ve sold through eBay since joining the platform?
No one wants to be on the wrong end of a fraudulent transaction, but this is where the eBay Authenticity Guarantee service has really shined.
Could you tell us a bit more about how you and your customers benefit from eBay’s Authenticity Guarantee?
The Authenticity Guarantee service has really solidified trust with our customers and allowed our business to continue to succeed in a competitive environment.']

I was on with eBay and they advised that it’s an issue with Northern Ireland sellers,” they said.
Any Northern Ireland sellers, I would advise you to check all your sales and get on with eBay about this.', 'C8 Corvette parts are stacking up on eBay following a tornado that caused significant damage to the factory and the vehicles that were being built there.

title: ['Former eBay Executive Pleads Guilty to His Role in Cyberstalking ... - Department of Justice', 'eBay Mangled a Claim for an Item Damaged during Shipping - EcommerceBytes', 'Ex-eBay executive threatened newsletter writers, sent ‘disturbing’ packages, feds say - Miami Herald', 'People Are Selling Theranos Merch for a Small Fortune on eBay - MEL Magazine', 'Ebay Launches Marketplace To Divert Imperfect New Fashion Items From Landfill - Green Queen Media']
summary:
['BOSTON – A former eBay, Inc. executive pleaded guilty today in connection with his role in a cyberstalking campaign targeting the editor and publisher of a newsletter that eBay executives viewed as critical of the company.
Co-conspirators and former eBay employees Philip Cooke, Brian Gilbert, Stephanie Popp, Veronica Zea and Stephanie Stockwell previously pleaded guilty.
The harassment campaign arose from communications between those executives and Baugh, who was eBay’s senior security employee.
After learning of the police’s investigation, Baugh made false statements to police and internal investigators, deleted digital evidence related to the cyberstalking campaign and falsified records intended to throw the police off the trail.
The remaining defendant is presumed innocent unless and until proven guilty beyond a reasonable doubt in a court of law.', "Dear Ina,We sold a $3XX.xx item on eBay, purchased label and coverage with UPS on eBay.
eBay did not help us filing a claim with UPS for over 9 days.
eBay then provided a return label to our buyer and send them a full refund (against or will) on our behalf.
Even worse, eBay provided our buyer with the wrong address on return label.
Now our merchandise is lost, we didn't make any money on this sale, we can't open a claim with UPS, and eBay refuse to take any responsibility, and is even charging us for the return label.", '', 'How else do you explain the fact that there are currently three different people on eBay hocking their authentic Columbia Theranos fleece pullover for $500 each?
“Theranos fleece pullover given to employees,” the final listing explains.
On the higher end of the price spectrum — and back on the Theranos tip — the bidding for a lab coat from Elizabeth Holmes’ scambo company starts at $7,010.
Which is to say, it’s not enough to be a bad company with terrible business practices — or leadership.
This is so cool!’”So cool it seems that it’s worth hundreds, if not thousands of dollars, to engage in a little con artist cosplay.', 'Ebay Imperfects offers a way for clothing brands to sell new but not QC-passed pieces to consumers looking for a bargain.
The move to imperfect demandSelling imperfect items has the potential to vastly increase the online sales sector.
Ebay has predicted that its concept has the potential to divert 13 million pieces of fashion from entering landfill, each week.
“It’s often the fashion items that may have not made the ‘cut’ and failed quality assurance checks [that end up in landfill].
Together, the two will boast a 23 million membership base, with 5 million items for sale, representing $1 billion in gross merchandise value.']

title: ['Understanding the Quirks of eBay Standard Envelope - EcommerceBytes', 'Ex-eBay exec pleads guilty to role in cyberstalking campaign of Mass. couple - Boston.com']
summary:
['You can't use the USPS tracking tool to find items sent eBay Standard Envelope, as eBay explains in the following FAQWhy can't I track eBay standard envelope shipments on the USPS website?
eBay standard envelope is an eBay Delivery Service and is tracked by our customers through their eBay accounts.
That explains confusion on the part of a buyer on this recent thread who wrote:"I buy sports cards on eBay and sometimes they get shipped via eBay Standard Envelope service.
Is that what others are seeing when they ship using Ebay Standard Envelope," the seller asked.
And clearly it's important for buyers to understand the quirks and limitations of eBay Standard Envelope tracking as well.', 'Crime Ex-eBay exec pleads guilty to role in cyberstalking campaign of Mass.
The intimidation started when senior executives at eBay became frustrated with the newsletter’s tone and content, according to federal documents.
Baugh was one of seven eBay employees or contractors charged in the harassment scheme that ran from August 2019 until August 2020.
Wenig was not criminally charged, has denied any knowledge of the harassment campaign, and his lawyers have asked that the Steiners’ claims against him be dismissed.
The Silicon Valley giant has apologized to the couple and said that it fully cooperated with the law enforcement investigation.']

title: ['eBay, Etsy, Mercari, Poshmark Found Coalition for 1099-K Fairness - EcommerceBytes', 'A former eBay official faces prison for harassment of Natick couple - MetroWest Daily News', "Here's what you need to know about doing DEI at your company right now - Protocol", 'Man finds £130,000 in cash hidden inside second-hand kitchen cabinets bought off eBay - Daily Star', 'Vinted trumps Amazon, eBay and Facebook in ratings for second-hand marketplace - Yahoo Finance UK', 'EBay Positions Itself As The Backbone Of Small Businesses - The Drum']
summary:
['eBay announced today it had joined the Coalition for 1099-K Fairness – though a visit to the website reveals eBay cofounded the group along with Etsy, Mercari, OfferUp, Poshmark, Reverb (owned by Etsy), and Tradesy (owned by Vestiaire Collective).
Noticeably absent from the list of online marketplaces was Amazon.
69% of respondents said they would be likelky to stop selling online or would sell less online based on the new requirements.
eBay commissioned Burke Research to conduct the survey on behalf of the Coalition for 1099-K Fairness.
4) Advocating for Congress to urgently fix Section 9674 of the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 to raise the 1099-K online sales reporting threshold.', "BOSTON — The leader of a group of eBay employees who allegedly terrorized a Natick couple that published negative articles about the cyber auction house pleaded guilty Monday in federal court.
Baugh is the former senior director of safety and security at eBay.
The couple ran an online e-commerce newsletter called Ecommercebytes that published negative articles about eBay, angering eBay executives.
That progressed to mailing disturbing items such as spiders and cockroaches and other items to the Steiners' home, while at the same time sending pornographic magazines with David Steiner's name as the subscriber to neighbors' homes.
David Harville is the only remaining person alleged to have taken part in the harassment campaign to not plead guilty.", "Bennett Richardson ( @bennettrich) is the president of Protocol.
Prior to joining Protocol in 2019, Bennett was executive director of global strategic partnerships at POLITICO, where he led strategic growth efforts including POLITICO's European expansion in Brussels and POLITICO's creative agency POLITICO Focus during his six years with the company.
Prior to POLITICO, Bennett was co-founder and CMO of Hinge, the mobile dating company recently acquired by Match Group.
Bennett began his career in digital and social brand marketing working with major brands across tech, energy, and health care at leading marketing and communications agencies including Edelman and GMMB.
Bennett is originally from Portland, Maine, and received his bachelor's degree from Colgate University.", 'Something went wrong, please try again later.
Invalid email Something went wrong, please try again later.
A man was shocked to find more than £125,000 in cash inside some second-hand cabinets he bought off eBay.
Thomas Heller from Bitterfield, Germany bought the cabinets for just €240 (£203) having negotiated the price down from €300 (£253).
Inside one of the cabinets, bought from an elderly couple’s estate sale, the 50-year-old social housing project director found two hidden boxes, containing wads of cash totalling €150,000 (£126,166).', 'The large group of "feral" youths have been causing havoc across the sleepy Worcestershire town of Malvern Link for the past several months.
"We were driving back home after we found out but we were told by a neighbour that they had already left and had made their way to Malvern Link station.
"One said they were too scared to let their children play out after a boy was beaten up by them.
"I want to make the people of Malvern Link aware of this because things are getting worse here.
Residents say the group was the same that had previously been banned from Malvern Link Station by police at the weekend.', 'eBay is positioning itself as a champion of the little guy in its latest bid to bring the Amazons of the world down a peg or two.
The David v Goliath positioning sees the online marketplace tout its credentials as the platform of choice for over 300,000 small businesses in Britain with ’There’s a small business for that.’']

title: ['Tesla Model S Plaid Battery Pack Appears on eBay With a Hefty Price - MotorBiscuit', 'Shop the eBay x SONRA Proto 3 Sneakers Here - Highsnobiety']
summary:
['If you own a base or older model Tesla Model S and you want a bit more range and power, now might be your chance.
This 100-kilowatt-hour battery pack is all yours for just $32,500Tesla Model S Plaid | TeslaIt’s always fun to dig through eBay listings and see what you come across.
In this instance, a unique listing appeared; a 2021 Tesla Model S Plaid battery pack.
It does; however, show pictures of the totaled Model S Plaid the seller plucked from it.
However, this means that, in theory, this battery pack could go into a standard Tesla Model S P100D or another model that came with the 100 kWh battery pack.', 'That’s right, eBay kicks exist.
Whether you’re a huge eBay Stan or just have an eye for a collectible, eBay x SONRA Proto 3 is an enticing proposition.
Could eBay x SONRA Proto 3 be an unexpected collector’s piece in years to come?
1 / 4 eBay eBay eBay eBayWhether this comes true or not, the eBay x SONRA Proto 3 does bring something to the table outside of its potential collectability.

title: ["eBay UK's 'Imperfects' Marketplace Gives Flawed Fashion Items a ... - Sustainable Brands", 'eBay Raises Ad Fees on June 1st - EcommerceBytes', 'Amazon Australia Joins Kogan, eBay and Catch in ACCC Investigation - Power Retail', '1947 Jowett Bradford light van on sale on eBay for £8,495 - Telegraph and Argus', 'eBay UK is newest Patron of British Fashion Council - ww.fashionnetwork.com']
summary:
['The platform features items from over 100 high-street and high-end designers at up to 60% off.
All items are considered new, but feature minor defects that would prevent brands from selling them in stores at full retail prices.
eBay UK has launched Imperfects — a marketplace for apparel brands to sell clothing, shoes and accessories with minor defects at discounted prices, to keep previously “unsellable” items out of landfill.
“With growing financial pressures and the climate crisis continuing to be at the forefront of consumers’ minds, we’re proud to launch Imperfects as another avenue to help keep fashion items out of landfill,” said Jemma Tadd, head of fashion for eBay UK.
“It’s often the fashion items that may have not made the ‘cut’ and failed quality assurance checks [that end up in landfill].', 'eBay is raising ad fees sellers pay on June 1st.
The company had informed sellers in February that it would change how it calculated Promoted Listings Standard ad fees - instead of basing the fees on the final selling price of an item, basing it on the selling price + taxes + shipping + other applicable fees.
This week, eBay sent the following reminder to sellers:"We wanted to let you know that starting on Jun 1, 2022, we'll be changing how Promoted Listings Standard ad fees are calculated and updating our marketing program terms.
As a result, you may see some changes in your ad fees.
A seller who forwarded the reminder to EcommerceBytes had the following reaction:"This company is seriously charging fees on Taxes and Shipping?', 'They join the list of other online marketplaces under scrutiny from the ACCC, including Kogan, Catch and eBay Australia.
“Online marketplaces have an important role in connecting Australian consumers and sellers, and make up a growing share of consumer sales.
It is important to note that no single online marketplace holds a dominant position in the Australian e-commerce landscape.
Collection of Consumer DataOther issues raised by the report include the large amounts of consumer data collected by online marketplaces.
This is supported and encouraged by the ACCC for online marketplaces, which can strengthen the safety of online marketplaces.', 'A maroon and black-coloured Jowett Bradford classic light van dating back to 1947 is up for grabs on eBay.
The 1947 Jowett Bradford classic light van on sale via eBayThe right-hand drive vehicle has clocked up a total mileage of 6,700.
The van is not up for auction on eBay but instead will go to a buyer who will meet the £8,495 asking price.
In 1906, Bradford brothers Benjamin and William Jowett designed and built their first car.
Early Jowetts were built in Girlington, Bradford, before the company moved to Idle in 1920, where it stayed until 1954.', 'eBay UK is newest Patron of British Fashion Council BySandra Halliday PublishedApr 29, 2022The has announced UK as its newest Patron, joining brands such as , and as official Patrons.
, eBay “will contribute to the BFC’s mission to make positive change in the fashion industry – notably, driving awareness of sustainable fashion for buyers and sellers, and progressing innovation for re-use and resale solutions”.
Jemma Tadd, Head of Fashion at eBay UK, said: “For 25 years eBay has been connecting shoppers with their favourite brands, helping to make fashion more accessible for everyone.
Our patronage of the British Fashion Council is a demonstration of our commitment to UK retail and the fashion industry.”And Caroline Rush, CEO of the BFC added: “E-commerce is a major part of the fashion industry, helping to raise the profile of many British designers and brands among a global audience.
It has also expanded its Brand Outlet end-of-season stock offer and seen the number of fashion pieces on the site rising 28%.']

title: ['Can eBay Turn Things Around in 2022? - The Motley Fool', 'Theranos merchandise on eBay sparks bloodlust among Elizabeth Holmes fans - The Guardian']
summary:
["Because of unusually strong e-commerce demand a year ago, eBay (EBAY 2.82%) is going through a major growth hangover that's likely to pressure the business at least through the first half of 2022.
Yet eBay has some advantages that help it stand out in the crowded e-commerce industry.
Let's see whether these wins might help the stock return to a growth path this year.
eBay has shed buyers at an accelerating rate in each of the last three quarters, and that worsening trend might continue for another quarter or two.
If the latest results keep eBay on that positive path, then investors might have more reasons to consider owning shares.", 'Fans and followers of Theranos and its founder Elizabeth Holmes can now take home an expensive original piece of the company.
For $11,000, you can purchase an “authentic” Theranos lab coat (notably “never worn”).
An ‘authentic’ Theranos lab coat for sale on eBay.
John, a seller behind one account listing Theranos products, worked at the company from 2012 to 2018 and was left with a handful of merchandise.
An ‘unworn’ authentic Theranos jacket for sale.']

title: ["TTM This Week: The eBay Market; Players Who Won't Sign Certain ... - Sports Collectors Daily", 'Coin collecting is big business on social media - Marketplace', 'eBay Blocks Buyer Who Disputed a Claim through AmEx - EcommerceBytes', "eBay's Authenticity Guarantee now includes graded trading cards ... - The Verge", 'Rare Kew Gardens 50p sells for £215 on eBay after attracting flurry of bids - The Mirror', "Mum creates daughter's dream Disney-themed bedroom with bargains from eBay and Facebook marketplace - Manchester Evening News", 'I started my business selling Nikes on eBay from my front room… now I’m making millions of pounds... - The Sun', '‘Flogging it on eBay’ – Twitter in stitches as Allardyce seems to ask Sir Alex Ferguson for an autograph at... - The Irish Sun']
summary:
['', 'At a recent meeting of the Palm Beach Coin Club, members bought and sold coins, discussed the current market, latest trends and upcoming shows.
(Yvonne zum Tobel)These days, he said he’s putting himself through graduate school with his rare coin business.
Now, selling coins is big business on social media and younger collectors are helping to drive the spike in popularity.
Jeff Garrett is senior editor of “A Guide Book of United States Coins,” known as the Redbook.
This year, he said, he increased the value of nearly every U.S. coin in his book by between 10% and 30%.', "Dear Ina,A few years ago I purchased a number of separate items on eBay from the same vendor.
I said they could ship all of the items in one package.
Since I paid with American Express and was keeping them appraised of the issue they finally said they would contact the seller who never responded.
Unknown to me eBay blocked my account even though I had many years of excellent buyer records.
DavidNote from the editor: It's true that eBay had owned PayPal, though they are now two separate companies.", 'eBay is expanding its authentication services to include single graded trading cards over $2,000, the company announced today.
The company is partnering with third-party trading card authentication and grading service Professional Sports Authenticator (PSA) for the expanded service.
Graded cards often fetch more money because they’ve been inspected and rated using a standardized system.
Fake trading cards are a niche but real problem for some — Logan Paul famously bought $3.5 million worth of Pokémon cards that turned out to be fake.
eBay’s authentication service will eventually expand to include graded cards sold for over $250.', 'This particular coin sold for £215 on eBay after attracting 31 bids following a seven-day auctionRare Kew Gardens 50p sells for £215 on eBay after attracting flurry of bidsA rare Kew Gardens 50p has sold for £215 on eBay after attracting dozens of bids from coin collectors.
This particular Kew Gardens 50p sold for £215 on eBay, with free delivery, on April 29 after attracting 31 bids following a seven-day auction.
Image: PA) PA)Change checking website Coin Hunter says the mid-point price for a Kew Gardens 50p is £156.25.
Let us know: mirror.money.saving@mirror.co.ukIf you find a Kew Gardens 50p in your change, you should check the date on it first.
With the Kew Gardens 50p, you also want to check for a sharp "pointy" roof on the top of the pagoda.', 'Sharnene Jewell, who is a keen DIYer, set out to create a princess themed bedroom for her youngest daughter Amaya.
(Image: Sharnene Jewell / LatestDeals)Sharnene began by upcycling the bed to give it a stone-effect look.
(Image: Sharnene Jewell / LatestDeals)Sharnene took a paintbrush to the walls and doors to give them the same castle feel and also added a tree feature.
(Image: Sharnene Jewell / LatestDeals)She added: "The tree painting was mostly created with poster paints.
(Image: Sharnene Jewell / LatestDeals)When accessorising, Sharnene also found bargain buys from car boot sales and online.', 'AN entrepreneur built a multi-million pound fashion business after selling trainers from eBay in his front room.
Mo Patel, 36, now boasts footballer and superstar clients at Crepslocker, which sells designer shoes and accessories for as much as £10,495.
And he now has his own store in Manchester selling luxury brands including Yeezy, Dior, Nike and Louis Vuitton.
Mo told Manchester Evening News: “I’ve started from nowhere and now I’m looking at other stores across the UK.
It became his full-time job a year after he started and was making up to £4,500 in monthly sales.', 'FOOTBALL fans were in stitches as Sam Allardyce was spotted seemingly asking legendary Sir Alex Ferguson for an autograph.
One wrote: "Did I just see Sir Alex Ferguson signing an autograph for Sam Allardyce at the Man Utd game??"
FREE BETS AND SIGN UP DEALS - BEST NEW CUSTOMER OFFERSThe United fan Tweeted: "Sir Alex Ferguson and Sam Allardyce plotting their next horse race."
Ferguson will be hoping incoming Man Utd boss Erik ten Hag can bring back the glory days he saw as manager.
Speaking at Punchestown horse racing festival, Fergie told RTE Racing: "I hope he does well [Ten Hag], because the club needs someone to get in control."']

title: ['Prada and Ralph Lauren products up for grab on eBay this week - Liverpool Echo', 'Aldi and eBay recall products over urgent fire safety concerns - Royston Crow', "eBay Launches 2022 'Up & Running Grants' to Support Small ... - PR Newswire", 'The rare 50p fetching £150 on eBay - how to tell if your coin is ... - Bucks Herald', 'First Appearance Of Peggy As Captain Carter Explodes On eBay - Bleeding Cool News', "Singular Hula Hoop selling on eBay for £69 - and it's shaped like a pair of binoculars - The Mirror", 'The Vogue Business and eBay Technology Forum - Vogue Business']
summary:
['Shoppers can get their hands on the bargain of the year from today as a huge charity auction with designer products is launched.
The Reuse Revolution is taking place online via eBay as well as in BHF stores across the UK.
Among the products available will be Alexandra Shulman’s navy-blue polka dot Samantha Sung dress and model Olivia Arben’s Prada bucket hat, Maje dress and two Ralph Lauren dresses.
The competition is available to enter via the Reuse Revolution website now.
Allison Swaine-Hughes, retail director at the BHF, said: “What an incredible way to kickstart our Reuse Revolution with the support of so many celebrities donating their pre-loved items.', 'Outdoor furniture cushion covers and energy saving devices are among the products being recalled due to urgent safety concerns.
Aldi has asked customers to return cushion covers for multiple furniture items after it was found that the fire-retardant effectiveness may deteriorate over time.
Available in multiple colours.
Product descriptionBlack and gold energy saving plug in device.
Product descriptionWhite two-pin energy saving plug-in device.', 'Now open for nominations, eBay's 2022 Up & Running Grants will award $10,000 grants each to 50 small business sellers in the U.S. for business needs such as physical and digital store improvements, new equipment and inventory, technology, hiring and training to support their success.
"The strength of our economy depends on small business owners, and our Up & Running Grants program is part of eBay's ongoing commitment to empowering them.
"We are thrilled to continue our partnership with eBay on their Up & Running Grants program to ensure that small business owners have the capital they need to succeed.
Apply for an Up & Running GrantNow through Friday, June 10, 2022, eBay small business sellers are encouraged to apply for Up & Running Grants via an online application.
Business sellers will be asked to share details of their small business and how they plan to use the grant to accelerate their growth.', '50p coins are seen at the Royal Mint plant (Photo by Matt Cardy/Getty Images)Rare 50p coins are being sold online for around 300 times their original value.
With 210,000 of the coins in circulation, the 50p Kew Gardens release of 2009 is fetching roughly £150 on the auction site, eBay.
AdvertisementAdvertisementOne of the rare 50p coins, listed a starting price of 99p, sold for 300 times its value on eBay recently.
The item was described on the site as a "Kew Gardens 50p genuine 2009 circulated Great Condition Fifty Pence RARE".
Change checking website, Coin Hunter, puts the average price range for the Kew gardens 50p to be between £150.89 and £161.50, but there have been occasions where the coin sold up to £200.', '', 'An oddly shaped Hula Hoop crisp is selling on eBay for £69 because the seller says it looks like a pair of binoculars - but they could be tempted into a lower offerSingular Hula Hoop selling on eBay for £69 - and it's shaped like a pair of binocularsA singular Hula Hoop crisp has hit the market on the bidding site eBay - for a whopping £69.
Image: eBay/aurora35o/Triangle News) eBay/aurora35o/Triangle News) Image: eBay/aurora35o/Triangle News) eBay/aurora35o/Triangle News)Get the news you want straight to your inbox.
The unique crisp came from a packet of original salt flavour Hula Hoops and was specifically found in a grab bag of 'Big' Hula Hoops - that would only cost you 90p to buy from most supermarkets.
The item is also listed as used, and the listing was titled: "Very rare shaped Big Hula Hoop crisp!"
And in the product description, the anonymous seller wrote : "Never before seen, one of a kind Big Hula Hoop that looks like a pair of fancy binoculars."', 'The Vogue Business and eBay Technology Forum, taking place virtually on 26 May, will help Vogue Business Members understand and prepare for the next stage of the internet age.
Web3 offers consumers new opportunities to communicate their identities and provides brands and creatives with a new virtual terrain to reach them.
The Vogue Business and eBay Technology Forum will go beyond the headlines of this cultural and technological revolution, bringing together experts and early adopters from across the industry.']

title: ['New eBay business roadshow helping sellers become online sensation - Wales Online', 'Sales platform eBay buys Serie A sponsorship; Bombeer in one ... - Inside World Football', "This 35-year-old turned her eBay side hustle into a $141 million company: 'Here's the business plan I used' - CNBC", 'eBay Response to Ad Controversy Is Lacking - EcommerceBytes', 'eBay Partial Refunds: Good News, Bad News - EcommerceBytes', 'EBay Drops After Weak Outlook on Fading Pandemic Sales Bump - Yahoo Finance', 'Stocks making the biggest moves after hours: Etsy, Booking Holdings, eBay and more - CNBC']
summary:
['eBay’s Business Roadshow will travel to multiple locations across the country over the next 12 months - in partnership with Small Business Britain and the British Chamber of Commerce - as the company kicks-off its first ever physical regional roadshow and investment programme in the UK.
The corporate world just didn’t suit us and the eBay platform allowed us to make our dreams a reality.
That’s why an event like this is so important; not only in the support it provides but in gathering so many small businesses together to share their experiences.
Entrepreneurs and small businesses attending each event will have the opportunity to apply for eBay’s new grants and support packages, with winners announced in the following weeks.
Lambell added: “This roadshow was a valuable opportunity for us to hear first-hand from local entrepreneurs and the stories that brought them here today.', 'May 4 – Italy’s Serie A has signed and the online sales and auction platform eBay as an official partner across all its competitions.
In a one-match deal Bombeer will be the Official Beer Supplier and will have visibility in the advertising on the pitchside LEDs and giant screens.
The beer will be available exclusively in the hospitality areas of the Olympic stadium.
Serie A said that it hoped this is the start of a longer term relationship with Bombeer.
Contact the writer of this story at moc.l1683323389labto1683323389ofdlr1683323389owedi1683323389sni@n1683323389osloh1683323389cin.l1683323389uap1683323389', "In 2014, I walked away from my $35,000-per-year job in insurance sales to grow my e-commerce side hustle with my husband Chris.
Today, we run our online fashion retail business, Pink Lily, full-time.
Whenever aspiring entrepreneurs ask for my advice, I tell them that the most important step we took early on was creating a business plan.
Your business plan doesn't have to be perfect, and you should expect to make changes along the way.
Here are the five essential elements of the business plan we used to ensure success:", "eBay sellers have been trying to get answers to questions about its new terms governing Promoted Listings beginning June 1st, and its response has been lacking.
In researching it, we found numerous questions from sellers, but could only find one response from eBay - on its eBay for Business Facebook pageThe seller's question and eBay's response are no longer visible.
Her question and eBay's response on Facebook, no longer visible, is as follows:Cathy (Redacted)Does anyone understand what the new update is?
I've read it twice now, and am watching Auction Professor to try to understand how ebay is changing promoted.
The next problem was the lack of answers to the numerous questions sellers asked over the course of several days requesting clarification.", 'eBay will soon share the burden sellers bear when issuing partial refunds to customers, though not entirely.
Beginning May 23, 2022, eBay will automatically issue FVF credits to sellers for partial refunds on a prorated basis.
Previously, sellers could not recoup the commission fees they paid when issuing partial refunds – not a rare occurrence especially when sellers want to offer partial refunds for shipping.
While eBay will automatically credit prorated portions of Promoted Listings Standard and international fees for global sellers, it will not issue credits for Promoted Listings Express fee or Promoted Listings Advanced fee.
eBay said the credits would appear in seller accounts starting May 23 – the full announcement is available on the eBay Seller Announcement board.', '(Bloomberg) -- EBay Inc. gave a lackluster sales and profit outlook for the current quarter, accelerating its decline from the peaks reached when shoppers were stuck at home during the pandemic.
The momentum the online shopping site gained during the pandemic when people abandoned stores for websites has been fading as shoppers return to in-person browsing and buying.
EBay sales decreased 5.9% to $2.48 billion in the period ended March 31, the company said Wednesday in a statement.
Gross merchandise volume, which is the value of all goods sold on the site, fell 20% to $19.4 billion.
Most Read from Bloomberg Businessweek©2022 Bloomberg L.P.', "Etsy — Shares of the e-commerce company plunged by more than 12% after Etsy's revenue guidance for the second quarter came in lighter than anticipated.
eBay — The online marketplace's shares fell 5.8% following the company's quarterly earnings.
EBay posted a slight first-quarter revenue beat, but issued weaker-than-expected earnings and revenue guidance for the second quarter and for the full year.
Cognizant — The information technology company saw shares drop 4.5% after hours following its quarterly earnings report.
However, it issued weaker-than-expected earnings and revenue guidance for the second quarter and the full year."]

title: ['Milan man falls victim to $1,200 eBay gift card scam while buying car - WQAD Moline', 'Massacre of the Online Retail Stocks Amazon, eBay, Wayfair, Etsy ... - WOLF STREET', "Boom's Grim #1 Sells Out And Hits $150 On eBay - Bleeding Cool News", "Jesse Wood on the £100 Les Paul he found on eBay and Reef's ... - Guitar.com", 'eBay Bike Bargains - Gravel Bikes | Cycling deals from Dealclincher - Road.cc', "eBay Canada to Collect 'Sales Taxes' Starting July 1 to Comply with ... - eSeller365"]
summary:
['To buy the car, Dobbins said he had to buy eBay gift cards and send that information to the owner.
"I was told that I'd have to buy eBay gift cards (for) a total of $1,200."
Dobbins bought the gift cards and received what appeared to be a contract from the seller that also said to send the gift card's pin codes for the purchase.
He then read the back of the gift cards that said not to share any of the card's information with another person.
"I was more interested in buying the gift cards so I could get the car."', 'On crappy earnings and lowered guidance, many of these highflyer stocks kathoomphed -70% to -85% from highs last year.
As consumers shift their spending from goods sold by retailers, to services, the miracle-stimulus-fueled demand for goods is reverting to pre-pandemic trends.
And the stocks of online retailers, after the hype and hoopla for them during the pandemic, are now getting shookalacked.
Revenues plunged by 13.9% from miracle-stimulus Q1 last year to $3 billion, after having already plunged 11% in the prior quarter.
The only year the online retailer of furniture and home furnishings ever made a net profit was the stimulus-and-lockdown-miracle year 2020.', '', '“It’s like four or five guitarists with him!” Jesse Wood enthuses, when discussing working with Duran Duran’s Andy Taylor on Reef’s colossal new album, Shoot Me Your Ace.
Below, he talks us through the recording process and his five favourite guitar parts on Shoot Me Your Ace.
I used a Les Paul 2009 Reissue double cutaway with P-90s that I found on eBay, it’s a lovely lump of wood.
Gary came in with the catchy chorus and we all made it as one.
With Shoot Me Your Ace, that’s a song that just came out in the room.', 'This week on eBay Bike Bargains, we are looking at a range of gravel bikes from Cube, Trek, Orbea and Sensa!
Gravel bikes are perfect if you love going on adventures that cover a range of terrains.
Furthermore, gravel bikes are super versatile.
First up we have this super cool Orbea Terra H30 GRX gravel bike.
Key features:SRAM wireless electronic drivetrainCarbon wheelsOCLV Carbon gravel frameSRAM XG-1270, 10-36, 12-speed cassetteNext is this Sensa Romagna Gravel Bike which is in brilliant condition!', 'This week, in an email to eBay Canada users, the company notified its users that it will have to collect ‘sales taxes’ on items sold by Canadian sellers shipping to Canadian addresses starting on July 1, 2022.
Don’t MissThis new requirement is a direct result of a new law that changes how Canada requires eCommerce businesses to collect taxes on goods and services sold online.
Beginning on July 1st, eBay will have to collect the following applicable taxes:GST – Goods and Services TaxHST – Harmonized Sales TaxQST – Québec Sales Tax / QuébecPST – Provincial Sales Tax / Columbia and SaskatchewanRST – Retail Sales Tax / Manitoba** eBay omitted RST from its email announcement, but it appears the marketplace will also be required to collect RST from buyers located in Manitoba.
In this case, eBay says it “will be appointed as a billing agent for collection and remittance of Canadian sales taxes where the sales tax laws do not automatically require it.
Just as the sales tax rules enacted by US states impacted eBay sales and created a lot of questions and confusion, Canada’s new regulations will be equally messy at the beginning.']

title: ['New eBay-style online property auctions offer transparency as Australian buyers bid from home - ABC News']
['Falling Consumer Spending Leads eBay to Lower 2022 Targets - The Motley Fool']
summary:
["Sales surged for eBay (EBAY 2.82%) in the early months of the pandemic.
Fortunately, eBay's revenue only fell 5% year over year.
Undoubtedly, sellers on eBay's platform are not happy about paying higher fees just as buyer spending is falling.
Exacerbating the decline in GMV, eBay has reduced spending on marketing in recent quarters.
eBay stock is not expensiveThe faster-than-expected slowdown in spending had eBay lower its revenue target for the rest of 2022."]

title: ["Mum creates 'princess bedroom' using bargains from Matalan, Next and eBay - Liverpool Echo", 'eBay Acquires Stake in Funko, Becomes Its Preferred Marketplace - EcommerceBytes']
summary:
['It can be super expensive to give a bedroom a complete makeover, but one mum has managed to transform her daughter’s bedroom on a budget.
Sharnene Jewell, 45, a mum of four, wanted to give daughter Amaya a Princess bedroom.
To keep costs down, she decided to do the makeover herself using second-hand products and bargains from high street stores, including Matalan and Next.
Then I did the wardrobe which I bought for just £10 on eBay, which was amazing and I’m so happy I found it.
I kept the white curtains my other daughter had in the room which went perfectly with Amaya’s own bedding.', 'eBay was part of a consortium of investors that acquired a $263 million stake in Funko, and as part of its investment, eBay will become the preferred secondary marketplace for Funko collectibles.
eBay and Funko will also partner on creating exclusive product releases.
Ends in 10h 32m.”)Interestingly a search for “funko” brought back “630,000+ results” on eBay this weekend.
Building on the incredible appetite for Funko products on eBay, we look forward to what our companies can do together.
The investment and partnership with Funko will make eBay the preferred resale marketplace for Funko fans around the world and give customers new and exclusive products.”Wondering about the origins of Funko?']

title: ['eBay UK Launches Authenticity Guarantee for Luxury Handbags - eSeller365', "eBay Seller's Listings Are Missing in Search - EcommerceBytes"]
summary:
['Global online marketplace eBay has launched its Authenticity Guarantee service for luxury handbags within the UK.
The pre-loved luxury handbag market is growing and is valued at £115.3 million to date.
eBay UK however has identified that 32% of buyers have hesitated to purchase a pre-loved luxury handbag from the platform in the last 24 months due to mistrust and concerns about authenticity.
eBay’s introduction of the Authenticity Guarantee service into the category hopes to combat this uncertainty and build consumer confidence when purchasing genuine pre-loved luxury handbags.
eBay Luxury Handbags on eBay.co.uk by numbersA handbag sold every 15 seconds on eBay.co.uk in 2021.', "This is happening on the app as well as the browser.
This has happened to me before about 2 1/2 years ago when I brought to their attention that my listings weren't appearing in the search results, even if I copied and pasted the listing title.
Then, they actually gave me a credit for a full months subscription.
On another note, I've still yet to see the benefits of the latest update, i.e., requiring buyers to enter their payment information before submitting an offer.
Has eBay back-pedaled regarding that benefit?"]

title: ['DIY mum creates Disney Princess bedroom for £450 using Gumtree and eBay bargains - The Mirror', 'Ex-Disney CEO Bob Iger & Ebay Buy 25% Of Funko - Small Screen', 'Low-Mileage 1954 Jaguar XK120 Roadster Listed on eBay - HotCars', "Singular Pringles crisp on sale on eBay for £2,000 - as owner claims it's 'rare' - The Mirror", 'eBay Australia Prime-Like Service Disqualifies Untracked Letters - EcommerceBytes', "'Like shopping on eBay': Norway's house bidding process explained - The Local Norway"]
summary:
['Sharnene Jewell spent £450 on giving her youngest daughter Amaya the Disney Princess bedroom of her dreams.
See the final results and stunning images from the DIY makeover belowA mum-of-four has explained how she created the perfect Disney Princess bedroom for her daughter by spending just £450.
To keep costs down, Sharnene found second-hand bargains on Gumtree and eBay - including a Disney Princess bed for £100.
"Amaya loves dressing up as a princess, so we were thrilled to find a real Disney princess bed for sale second-hand for £100 on Gumtree.
Image: LatestDeals.co.uk) LatestDeals.co.uk) Image: LatestDeals.co.uk) LatestDeals.co.uk)"I decided to do a stone effect again, but this time I wanted texture.', 'Ex-Disney CEO Bob Iger & Ebay Buy 25% Of FunkoIt looks like Bob Iger has found his new company to expand as Deadline has reported Funko is now 25% owned by Ex-Disney CEO Bob Iger and eBay.
The former Disney CEO Bob Iger, along with Ebay, and other such investors, all bought a 25% stake in Funko.
Former chair and CEO of Fox Group Peter Chernin, founder of the Chernin Group wants to put two directors on the board for Funko.
Bob Iger, eBay And Peter Chernin Go All In With FunkoREAD MORE: Pixar Wants Out: Furious With Disney & CEO Bob ChapekThe CEO of Funko Andrew Perlmutter stated:The Chernin Group validates Funko as a leading lifestyle brand with a pulse on what’s trending in pop culture.
We all know that Bob Iger, Disney’s ex CEO, was responsible for many of Disney’s acquisitions.', '', 'A singular Pringles crisp has hit the market on eBay for a staggering £2,000 - as the seller claims the snack is 'extremely rare' due to its unique folded shapeSingular Pringles crisp on sale on eBay for £2,000 - as owner claims it's 'rare'Have you ever opened up a bag of crisps and marvelled at the bizarre shape of one of the snacks?
Finding a misshapen crisp isn't impossible but it is usually pretty rare, which is why some people have taken to sites like eBay to sell their unique finds for staggering amounts.
In fact, one seller currently has a listing for one Sour Cream and Onion flavour Pringle that is on sale for an eye-watering £2,000 - all because they believe the shape of the crisp is "extremely rare".
Image: Ebay/Triangle News) Ebay/Triangle News) Image: Ebay/Triangle News) Ebay/Triangle News)Get the news you want straight to your inbox.
Don’t miss out, you won’t see one again!”For your £65 total spend you'll also receive the glass jar with a lid that houses the rare Pringle.', 'eBay sellers in Australia can no longer display a Plus badge on items unless they offer a free-shipping option with a tracked service.
That was always the case with one exception: items that could be shipped via Untracked Letter Service.
eBay Plus is eBay’s Prime-like program in which buyers can choose to pay a membership fee to receive free shipping on qualifying items, a major difference being that sellers are responsible for shipping items to eBay Plus members.
eBay announced this week that it was removing Untracked Letter Service from Plus Eligibility.
To continue displaying a Plus badge, eligible sellers must choose a free-shipping option with a tracked service by early June.', '']

title: ["'1,000 songs in your pocket': Apple's iconic iPod commercial - Daily Mail", 'Apple iPods, especially iPod Classic, could be worth thousands on ... - Wicked Local', 'eBay offers small business sellers support - Chain Store Age']
summary:
['', 'If you have an old model of an Apple iPod, it could literally be worth thousands of dollars, as the company announced recently it would be discontinuing the iconic device.
"I assure you, you can still get a classic iPod for a reasonable price - $200 or $300."
More:Some old iPods worth thousandsThousands of dollars for Apple iPods?
"But some people will pay really high prices for something like an iPod Classic because it's got the classic hard- drive with the rotating disc.
A second-generation iPod on eBay was listed at $8,700; some of third-generation had price tags of $4,500 and even $5,000.', 'eBay announced the launch of its third annual Up & Running Grants program, created to support U.S. small businesses with e-commerce.
Recipients also receive access to guided online learning content through the eBay Academy, and direct training and coaching from other sellers and small business growth advocates.
“This year, we look forward to supporting even more eBay Sellers as they grow on the marketplace and we commend eBay for their ongoing support of the small businesses on the platform."
Now through Friday, June 10, 2022, eBay small business sellers can apply for Up & Running Grants via an online application.
Business sellers will be asked to share details of their small business and how they plan to use the grant to accelerate their growth.']

title: ['What item make the most money on eBay? Top 10 household items you can sell for huge profit - Express', 'Ex-eBay exec pleads guilty to terrorizing couple with spiders and funeral wreaths - The Guardian', 'eBay: Match Worn Conor McGrandles Lincoln City Home Shirt - Vital Football', 'eBay shopper splits opinion after deciding to keep £20k he found in purchase - Express', 'EBay Stock Lost 9% In One Week, What To Expect? - Forbes']
summary:
['One way to make a quick buck is by selling unwanted household items, but which ones are going to make the most money?
Wholesale Clearance UK conducted research to find the top-grossing products on eBay of the last year, with sub-categories such as watches, bikes and fabric making the top 10.
Here are the most popular things to sell on eBay right now:1.
DVDsWith the popularity of streaming services rising, demand and sales figures for DVDs are surprisingly high.
Total sold: 6,818,873READ MORE: Sainsbury’s, Aldi, M&S and more recall several chicken products', 'A former eBay executive pleaded guilty on Thursday to participating in a scheme to terrorize the creators of an online newsletter that included the delivery of live spiders and other disturbing items to their home.
David Harville, eBay’s former director of global resiliency, is the final onetime eBay employee charged in the case to plead guilty.
eBay employees also set up fake social media accounts to send threatening messages to the couple and posted the couple’s home address online.
Another former executive who pleaded guilty last month, James Baugh, held meetings to coordinate the harassment campaign and directed Harville to go with him to Boston to spy on the couple, prosecutors say.
Harville pleaded guilty during a hearing held via video conference before a Boston federal court judge.', 'During the 2021/22 season, Vital Lincoln City sponsored Sean Roughan (home and away), John Marquis (home), eleven of the Lincoln City U18s players, and a donation of just over £2,100.00 towards the Stacey West Development Fund which raised an incredible £10,000.00.
Thank you to those that have played a part in making this happen by posting on the forum, reading our front page articles, voting on polls, doing our quizzes and making donations!
A few days ago we listed a home match-worn Conor McGrandles shirt on eBay, and you can bid on this HERE.
It is currently £72.00 with 18 people “watching” it, so off to a great start!
We have also published our Spring 2022 Quiz in three parts, which can be found here: Part One, Part Two, and Part Three.', 'The seller listed the safe on eBay because he could not open itJames Labrecque decided to sell the heavy-duty safe on eBay as he did not have the combination to open it.
Shortly after it was placed on the online market place a buyer snapped it up and, upon prising it open, was surprised to find £20,000 inside.
"I shook it and I didn't feel anything inside of it, so I figured, well, maybe it's just a locked safe, you know.
So I put it on eBay."
Describing it as a 'life altering' amount of money, James was gutted that he did not prise the safe open, instead posting it out to the buyer in Bartlett, Tennessee.', '']
