Did you cop one of the popular t-shirts?', 'Photo: eBay | toybarncars4youICEAMGSUVkWLaunched in the first quarter of 2018 as their third model, after the V10-powered Huracan, and V12-powered Aventador, the Lamborghini Urus bet has more than paid off.
Without these, and before destination, the 2022 Lamborghini Urus starts at around $230,000.
And this has got us thinking, how about searching for the most affordable example that we could find on eBay ?
Actually, you’d be wrong by thinking of these numbers, as it is accompanied by a buy-it-now price of $235,000.
The Urus EVO will debut in a few months, alongside the normal facelifted model, as 2022 will be Lambo’s final year of non-electrified vehicle launches.', 'What does a day in the life of one of eBay’s go-to sneaker sellers look like?
What does a day in the life of one of eBay’s go-to sneaker sellers look like?
How did you transition from being a sneaker collector to becoming one of eBay’s sellers?
Sarah: What I love the most about eBay’s sneaker community is how helpful everyone is.
Simon: Being part of eBay’s sneaker community means that we get to speak to some lovely customers and some amazing sellers.', 'New York CNN Business —Tech stocks have been obliterated this year.
Unfortunately for investors, analysts at Goldman Sachs see more pain ahead for some (but not all) tech heavyweights.
Goldman Sachs analysts downgraded shares of Netflix (NFLX), eBay (EBAY) and gaming/metaverse giant Roblox to rare “sell” ratings on Thursday.
Shares of Netflix and eBay both tumbled 5% Friday while Roblox fell 9%.
The Goldman analysts expect “slowing growth” in the near term.', 'eBay is running a promotion in Australia: "Promote your auction listings for only $0.99 between 9 June to 8 July 2022."
eBay is encouraging sellers to use its Promoted Listings feature for auction listings, no matter the starting price, and they can pay 99 cents for the ads.
The idea that sellers on eBay would have to pay extra to get visibility for their auction listings says a lot about how much eBay has changed from its earlier history.
We did a search for "ebay 99-cent auction" on YouTube - and there are numerous sellers sharing their stories over the years and up to the present time.
Have you tried eBay's new Promoted Listings Express to advertise your auction listings?', '"Organised ivory poaching remains a threat in some regions, especially in central Africa, but has been much reduced in parts of eastern and southern Africa," said Mr Scanlon.
"We believe that the biggest emerging threat comes from the increasing competition between growing human populations and elephants for land and resources, especially as the impact of climate change is beginning to be felt."']

title: ['Inside An EBay Marking Laser - Hackaday']
summary:
['In his video teardown and tour of an industrial marking laser, [Les] suggests that he was really just in it for the optics — which is not a surprise, given his interest in optics in general and lasers in particular.
The 20-W CO 2 laser once etched barcodes and the like into products on assembly lines, but with a 2009 date code of its own, it was a safe bet that it was pitched due to a burned-out laser tube.
By a happy accident, [Les] found that the laser actually still works, at least most of the time.
There appears to be an intermittent problem with the RF driver, but the laser works long enough to release the magic smoke from anything combustible that gets in its way.
Galvos, lenses worth more than $800, and a working laser tube — not a bad haul.']

['Dudley eBay seller set to pocket £65000 from Liam Gallagher gig ... - Express & Star', "How to sell something on eBay: A beginner's step-by-step guide - USA TODAY", 'EBay opens 31000-foot vault for valuable trading cards - Washington Examiner']
summary:
["Liam Gallagher on stage at Knebworth with Oasis concert in 1996Lucky seller David Watson 35, from Stourbridge, had the bright idea of listing the grass on the poplar marketplace.
Titled ‘Grass From Liam Gallagher at Knebworth 2022’, potential buyers flocked to the auction, with a total of 120 bids made.
Grass From Liam Gallagher at KnebworthThe former Oasis singer staged two concerts at the Hertfordshire site on Friday and Saturday last weekend to sell-out crowds.
Postage for the item will also set the buyer back a further 95p, which some online users have joked should be covered by the seller, given the price.
The shows marked a special milestone, being 25 years since Oasis first performed at Knebworth in 1996 before Noel and Liam's long-running feud.", 'Here is a quick step-by-step guide on how to sell something on eBay.
Talking Tech newsletter:Get the current news, tips, and talk of tech in your inboxSave money:Ease through the holidays with these tech tipsHow to sell on eBayFirst, make an eBay account and sign in.
Then, click on “sell” in the top right cornerClick on “list an item”If you’re selling a product that is fairly common, eBay allows you to search for your item and select a pre-filled listing.
Here, you can add photos of your item or use a stock photo provided by eBay.
If you plan to sell only via a bid, you can choose eBay’s recommended start price or choose your own.', 'EBay has taken a major step toward simplifying the sale and shipping of trading cards.
The online auction website announced Tuesday it was opening a vault in Delaware dedicated to helping consumers trade collectible cards.
Once placed in the vault, cards can be bought and sold within seconds without having to be authenticated again or subjected to shipping costs.
Companies like PWCC Marketplace have provided both security and safety for valuable trading cards within their vaults.
The company has continued to invest in trading card sales, including by launching an authentication service for trading cards in January.']

title: ['eBay For Business Awards UK Is Now Open For 2022 Nominations - eSeller365', 'Optiseller Launches New Platform to Help eBay Sellers Create ... - eSeller365', 'eBay Drives Up Cost of Ads for 2nd Time in 6 Weeks - EcommerceBytes', 'eBay CEO Tells Shareholders Old Strategy Was Not Working - EcommerceBytes', 'Man tries to sell PS4 on eBay but delivery firm sends buyer a T-SHIRT instead - The Mirror', "Five facts you didn't know about Ebay's partnership with Love Island - Drapers"]
summary:
['Every year eBay UK holds its eBay For Business awards which allows eBay sellers in the UK to have their business recognized and have the opportunity to receive some fantastic prizes that would significantly impact their business.
If you want to find out more and perhaps enter your business for 2022 then check out the full announcement from eBay UK below.
How To Apply For eBay For Business Awards 2022“The eBay for Business Awards celebrates and rewards business owners in our community.
Entering your business story in the competition is free of charge via the eBay for Business Awards page.
A package of tailored business benefits including a free anchor store subscription and enhanced growth support from dedicated eBay team members.', 'Optiseller has released an upgraded data optimization platform that will guide sellers through the entire process of creating effective marketplace listings in record time.
Don’t MissThe platform enables sellers to transform product data from a spreadsheet or text format into a fully-optimized eBay listing in minutes, saving sellers valuable time and resources.
Optiseller’s platform involves five steps crucial to making listings stand apart: file upload, categorization, variation optimization, data optimization, and review and export.
How Optiseller’s eBay Data Optimization Platform WorksThe platform enables sellers to transform product data in .csv or .txt format into eBay listing data.
For more information on how Optisellers new eBay Data Optimization Platform can help eBay sellers create perfect listings in minutes, click here.', "eBay informed sellers today it is effectively increasing the cost of advertising for some sellers by raising the minimum ad rate for Promoted Listings Standard from 1% to 2% beginning July 11th.
The announcement comes just 2 weeks after eBay raised advertising fees by changing how it calculates Promoted Listings Standard ad fees.
Sellers were quick to react to the latest change to ad fees on the eBay for Business Facebook page.
Sellers are also discussing the changes on the eBay discussion boards, with sellers stating they may reduce their advertising spend or end advertising on eBay altogether.
As part of this work, effective July 11, we'll be changing the minimum ad rate for Promoted Listings Standard from 1% to 2%.", 'eBay CEO Jamie Iannone told investors at a presentation following the company's annual shareholder meeting on June 8, 2022, that the company's previous strategy was not working.
Iannone returned to eBay in April of 2020 as its new CEO and shared his vision of a "tech-led reimagination" of eBay.
We instead focused on branded new in-season products, and this strategy wasn't working.
(Last year, he said, over 3 million sellers used Promoted Listings, its 1st-party ads product.)
You can find a link to the recording of eBay's June 8th annual meeting and CEO presentation on the eBay Investor Relations websiteLet us know what you think of eBay's former and current strategies - or if you have an idea for the strategy eBay should be following.', 'Liam O’Rourke sold the PS4 and PSVR headset on eBay and sent them to Sheffield and London a month ago.
Image: Liam O'Rourke) Liam O'Rourke)He said: "The guy who brought the PS4 said 'where's my PS4' I said 'well, I've sent it'.
I was trying to get the money from Evri so I wasn't out of pocket but eBay just took the money.
Image: Hollandse Hoogte/REX/Shutterstock) Hollandse Hoogte/REX/Shutterstock)He said: "The guy who brought the PS4 said 'where's my PS4' I said 'well, I've sent it'.
I was trying to get the money from Evri so I wasn't out of pocket but eBay just took the money.', "This year Ebay UK became the first pre-loved fashion partner to couple up with ITV’s Love Island.
Ebay UK recruited celebrity stylist and secondhand enthusiast Amy Bannerman to style this year’s contestants.
A month since announcing the partnership and one week since the first episode of Love Island premiered, Ebay's senior director of UK trading Kirsty Keoghan sat down with Drapers editor Jill Geoghegan to reveal some behind-the-scenes facts about the deal.
Some islanders shed tears about the partnership with EbayKeoghan revealed that Bannerman’s styling choices resulted in some emotional responses from a number of contestants.
AdvertisementEbay is open to new partnerships – and isn't afraid of competitionEbay isn't limiting itself to the Love Island partnership and is actively exploring ways to expand its offerings to more retailers."]

title: ['How much your PS5 and Xbox are worth on eBay TODAY – earn easy money... - The Sun', 'Score the Best Deals on eBay With These Tips and Tricks - Lifehacker Australia', 'eBay Gets Its Wires Crossed with Automatic Feedback Feature - EcommerceBytes', 'Hurr, Hirestreet, Ebay and N Brown: can tech power circular fashion? - Drapers', 'Executive interview with eBay: why inclusion is a learning process - CBI', 'Save money with a used camera on eBay: everything you need to ... - Digital Camera World', 'eBay Sellers Can Now Transfer Funds to Their Bank Account in ... - eSeller365']
summary:
["PS5 listings on eBay average out to $674.50 per unit, according to Average Finder.
Sellers who are willing to part with their Xbox Series X could take advantage of similar circumstances.
The Xbox Series X is the more advanced console of Microsoft's latest-generation - the Xbox Series S is smaller, cheaper, and less powerful but will satisfy casual players.
Average Finder says that the average price of an Xbox Series X on eBay is $464.86 - but a grim outlook on resupply could result in this price jumping.
Again, the seller wins - while the average eBay price is currently below retail, there are scores of successful Xbox Series X sales calling for more than $600.", "Score the Best Deals on eBay With These Tips and TricksAt Lifehacker, we independently select and write about stuff we love and think you'll like too.
Tips and tricks for shopping online at eBay AustraliaFind your favourite retailers’ official eBay storeNavigating so many deals (and potentially dodgy sellers) is the biggest reason why some shy away from shopping online at eBay.
But keep in mind that there’s two definitions of refurbished over at eBay: seller refurbished and certified refurbished.
Ebay loves to throw tons of sales at its members, such as its eBay Plus Weekend Sale that recently took place in late May.
If you’re unsure how to tell, look out for the eBay Plus badge, or stick to the eBay Plus Deals page instead.", 'eBay encouraged sellers on Monday to use its Automatic Feedback feature, but 2 days later, sellers began reporting a glitch.
When the feature is turned on, it is supposed to automatically give buyers positive feedback for their purchases.
But sellers said turning on the feature also resulted in positive feedback being automatically left for sellers when they bought something on eBay.
I’m a seller, and had my automatic feedback options set to leave feedback for buyers as soon as they leave me positive feedback.
I had to disable automatic feedback entirely.', "Drapers Future of Fashion conference 2022 provided the perfect opportunity to ask the fashion industry its thoughts on innovative technologies.
News editor Isabella Fish took the opportunity to ask representatives from Ebay, Hirestreet, Hurr and N Brown Group how technology can be used to tackle sustainability challenges.
Hurr: 'As tech gets better, consumers adopt things quicker'Technology has the power to encourage consumers to change their mindset, according to Hurr CEO and co-founder Victoria Prew.
“As tech gets better, consumers adopt things quicker,” she said.
The consumer behaviour has always been in that place and what Hirestreet does is change the market for that and formalise it.”N Brown: 'We’ve got the data on who [our customer] is'The N Brown Group, parent company of retailers JD Williams, N Brown, Jacamo and Simply Be, is facilitating data to create a better profile of its customers.", 'In many ways inclusion is at the heart of what eBay does.
And it was that level playing field that first attracted Murray Lambell, eBay UK’s Managing Director, to the role.
“My parents owned a business, they started it from scratch, and they made it work,” he says.
This level of engagement allows its employees to get under the surface of issues faced by staff and then bring those issues to senior management.
One example of this came when a group came forward with an issue around accessibility issues for disabled people using the eBay website.', "• Our expert pick of the best used cameras (opens in new tab)So what do you need to look out for when choosing your next used camera, lens, or photographic accessory on eBay?
Look at the seller's feedback(Image credit: eBay)Once you've found a tempting example of the camera you're after, first examine the seller's feedback profile.
Regardless of how temptingly shiny the camera may be, you'll want to know the person selling it is reputable.
Examine the camera listing(Image credit: eBay)But assuming your chosen seller's feedback is good, it's time to examine the camera they're selling in more detail.
Read more:Best camera under $500 (opens in new tab)Best camera under £500 (opens in new tab)Best cheap cameras (opens in new tab)", 'eBay expanded its payout options today for US users adding an express (instant) payout option for a processing fee.
The fees basically match PayPal’s previous fee structure, making eBay’s express payout option now slightly more affordable over PayPal or Venmo.
But this express payout is another step in the right direction to being more competitive while enabling faster access to funds.
eBay will continue to provide daily, biweekly, and monthly payout schedule options and a no-fee on-demand payout as long as sellers do not use the daily payout option by default.
But by comparison, eBay’s payment or money management solution still falls way short to be called a digital wallet, a moniker the company plans to use soon.']

title: ['eBay is launching an interactive live shopping platform - TechCrunch', 'YouTuber Installs $450 eBay Turbo Kit on LS-Swapped V8 Ford ... - autoevolution', 'eBay Seller Seeks Lawyer to Help Fight VeRO Counterfeit Claims - EcommerceBytes', '2 Weird Pieces of Justin Timberlake Memorabilia Sold for $1,025 on ... - Showbiz Cheat Sheet', 'HOT 100 AMERICAN TRAILBLAZERS: Tirath Kamdar — EBay - WATCHPRO', "eBay x Morley's Sneaker Pop-Up Store In London - HYPEBEAST", 'eBay Launches Live Shopping for Collectibles - PR Newswire', 'eBay Live is the online auction site’s new livestream sales platform - The Verge']
summary:
['EBay announced today that it’s launching eBay Live, a dedicated shopping platform that gives users a way to purchase products in a live and interactive environment.
The company’s first live shopping event will offer a curated selection of rare trading cards from eBay seller Bleecker Trading.
Last month, YouTube teased a livestream shopping expansion, including the ability for two creators to go live at the same time to co-host a single live shopping stream.
Also in November 2021, Facebook rolled out a test of Live Shopping for Creators.
Live shopping isn’t the only new space that eBay is focused on, as today’s announcement comes a few weeks after eBay announced that it’s launching its first collection of NFTs in partnership with web3 platform OneOf.', 'ECUBefore fitting a turbo into a naturally aspirated vehicle, there are a few things to consider.
Firstly, a naturally aspirated car is not designed to run a turbo .
He cut an exhaust outlet on the right-hand-side fender, though (which automatically strips its sleeper tag off).
"I'll be honest, I'm getting really concerned right now because this is going well… there's no other word for it.
This is going good," Champlin confessed.After running a tune on the, he turns on the ignition, steps on the gas, and his LS-swapped V8 Ford Ranger is eligible for some turbo flutter.', 'Letters to the EditorYour emails to EcommerceBytesFor consideration, send your email to ina@auctionbytes.com with "Letters to the Editor Blog" in the subject line!
Remember to include your name as you would like it to appear in the blog.', 'Justin Timberlake has built a long-standing career on his singing, dancing, and acting talents.
So it would make sense his followers would want to get their hands on a piece of Justin Timberlake memorabilia — no matter how bizarre.
With a musical career spanning over two decades, Justin Timberlake has earned legions of followers.
2 weird pieces of Justin Timberlake memorabilia sold for $1,025Justin Timberlake in 2017 | Valerie Macon/AFP via Getty ImagesAccording to Entertainment Weekly, Justin Timberlake left behind two pieces of French toast after a breakfast interview with the New York-based radio station Z-100.
That weird bit of Justin Timberlake memorabilia isn’t the only strange celebrity memorabiliaJustin Timberlake is one of many celebrities whose memorabilia has have sold for large sums.', '', 'London-based Morley’s chicken shop is collaborating with eBay UK for a sneaker pop-up store that will allow sneakerheads to get their hands on exclusive silhouettes for the original retail price rather than the much higher resell value.
Along with the available sneakers, the pop-up also comes with Morley’s famous food and an exclusive chat from broadcaster, host, and media executive Julie Adenuga who will be unboxing trade secrets from the sneaker industry.
At the store, eBay is offering the Air Jordan 1 Low x Travis Scott for £51, Off White Jordan 2’s for £84, and and many more at their original price.
People shouldn’t have to jump through hoops to curate a sneaker collection that they love.
I can’t wait to explore how we got here with true OGs at the sneaker store very soon.”The eBay x Morley’s pop-up store will be open on June 18 at Morley’s Brick Lane.', 'New live shopping platform, eBay Live, lets enthusiasts discover, chat and purchase instantly, from anywhere in the worldInaugural event kicks off with trading card expert DJ Skee and top eBay seller Bleecker TradingSAN JOSE, Calif., June 16, 2022 /PRNewswire/ -- eBay today announces the launch of eBay Live, a dedicated shopping platform that gives people a new way to browse and buy products in a live, interactive environment.
New live shopping platform, eBay Live, lets enthusiasts discover, chat and purchase instantly, from anywhere in the world.
"eBay has always been the original home for trading cards and collectibles," said Dawn Block, VP Collectibles, Electronics and Home at eBay.
Currently in beta, eBay Live will deliver a more streamlined, entertaining and sophisticated way for our community to connect, buy and sell."
"eBay's constant roll out of new offerings – Authenticity Guarantee for trading cards, the eBay vault and now eBay Live beta –- has been absolutely game-changing."', 'eBay’s combining online and real-world auction experiences with its newly launched eBay Live platform, where people can chat and react to sellers through Livestream video and buy their products.
The event will be hosted live by avid collector DJ Skee, and interested buyers can join in via the eBay app.
The service will also continue into real-world trading card conferences, including The National from July 27th–31st in Atlantic City, New Jersey, and Gen Con from August 4th–7th in Indianapolis, Indiana.
We asked eBay if we can expect anything before the June 22nd event and if regular eBay sellers can expect to access the platform, but eBay was unable to answer at time of publishing.
eBay has been doubling down on ways to sell collectibles, especially with the rise of trading card popularity during the pandemic.']

title: ['Closer Look at the New Ebay x Nike SB Dunk - Complex', 'YoungLanes Amazon Appeal Services Help Reinstate Over 1k eBay ... - Digital Journal', 'eBay UK Now Offers Royal Mail International Services - eSeller365', 'eBay loses head of Europe to Asda owner TDR Capital - Retail Gazette', 'Seventh eBay Executive Pleaded Guilty in May to Role in ... - EcommerceBytes', 'GLIDE, eBay and Warren Buffett Celebrate the Grand Finale Power ... - PR Newswire', 'Dyson Airwrap is now restocked on eBay with 15 percent off deal - hurry to buy - Express']
summary:
['Nike is planning to honor the man behind its skateboarding category with a sneaker that references one of the rarest SBs ever, the “Ebay” Dunk.
This upcoming pair features clear panels on the sides and outsole referencing the original pair that was destroyed.
Only a handful of the original Ebay x Nike SB Dunk Lows are known to exist.
UPDATE (09/14): Thanks to Prvt.selection on Instagram, we now have a closer look at the forthcoming Ebay Nike SB Dunk Low.
Image via Prvt.selectionImage via Prvt.selectionImage via Prvt.selectionImage via Prvt.selectionImage via Prvt.selectionImage via Prvt.selectionImage via Prvt.selection', 'Arizona-based providers of Amazon reinstatement services, YoungLanes Amazon Appeal Services, records another amazing feat with 600 Amazon sellers and over 900 eBay sellers accounts reinstatementThe team at YoungLanes Amazon Appeal Services has again lived up to the billing of being account reinstatement experts, following a recent success of helping over 600 Amazon sellers and over 900 eBay sellers reinstate suspended accounts.
However, YoungLanes Amazon Appeal Services has mastered the art of helping clients get back their accounts as demonstrated with the recent feat achieved with eBay and Amazon sellers.
The comprehensiveness of the money-back guarantee services offered by the team at YoungLanes Amazon Appeal Services has continued to endear the brand to sellers amidst rave reviews.
For further information about YoungLanes Amazon Appeal Services, visit – www.younglanesappealservices.com.
Media ContactCompany Name: YoungLanes Amazon Appeal ServicesContact Person: Lamont Lane, Kevin WilliamsEmail: Send EmailPhone: 3177286789City: PhoenixState: ArizonaCountry: United StatesWebsite: https://www.younglanesappealservices.com/', 'eBay has announced today that Royal Mail International Services are now available for sellers on the eBay UK marketplace.
Don’t MissThis means that international services such as Royal Mail International Tracked & Signed, Royal Mail International Signed and Royal Mail International Standard are now available to sellers on eBay.
You can see the announcement from eBay UK below.
Royal Mail International on eBay UK“Royal Mail international services including Royal Mail International Tracked & Signed, Royal Mail International Signed and Royal Mail International Standard are now available on eBay.co.uk.
With the launch of the Royal Mail international services on the eBay platform, non-Royal Mail account business sellers and consumer sellers now have the same easy access to IOSS as business customers in the EU and global markets – the eBay IOSS number is automatically applied to any shipment sent with these services.', '// eBay European boss Rob Hattrell has been poached by Asda owner TDR Capital// Hattrell will be joining TDR as a partner from September and will leave eBay after five yearseBay’s international leadership team has been given a shakeup as its head of Europe Rob Hattrell is set to depart next month to join private equity firm and Asda co-owner TDR Capital in the autumn, according to Retail Week.
An eBay spokesman confirmed Hattrell’s departure, saying: “eBay can confirm that Rob Hattrell will leave eBay next month to pursue a new opportunity.
Rob led the UK business for three years until 2020 when he took over responsibility for all European markets.
Farren left KFC last year to join Asda but will return in the autumn as general manager for the UK and Ireland.
Click here to sign up to Retail Gazette‘s free daily email newsletter', 'In June 2020, Harville was arrested and charged along with James Baugh, eBay’s former Senior Director of Safety & Security, who pleaded guilty on April 25, 2022.
Co-conspirators and former eBay employees Philip Cooke, Brian Gilbert, Stephanie Popp, Veronica Zea and Stephanie Stockwell previously pleaded guilty.
Harville and his co-conspirators executed a three-part harassment campaign intended to intimidate the victims and to change the content of the newsletter’s reporting.
After learning of the police’s investigation, Harville turned in his company-issued cell phone from which evidence related to the cyberstalking campaign had been deleted.
SOURCE: US Department of Justice Press ReleaseNote: Also see, “Ex eBay Exec Who Sells Tactical Weapons Online Pleads Guilty to Cyberstalking” (EcommerceBytes Newsflash, 5/12/2022)', 'GLIDE, eBay and Warren Buffett Celebrate the Grand Finale Power of One Charity Auction Lunch With Record Breaking Winning Bid of $19,000,100.
The grand finale and winning bid was celebrated by the GLIDE community, local elected officials and community leaders at a countdown party held in San Francisco.
Conceived by the late Susie Buffett, the Power of One Charity Auction Lunch was launched in 2000.
Due to a two-year pandemic hiatus, the last auction took place in 2019 with a winning bid of $4,567,888.
The grand finale Power of One Charity Auction Lunch will take place at a mutually beneficial date and time in the coming months.', 'Dyson Airwrap is now restocked on eBay with 15 percent off deal - hurry to buy.
Now, the popular tool is back on eBay with a 15 percent off deal – hurry to buy it now.
Dyson Airwrap £322.99 View Deal Save 15 percent off off the Dyson Airwrap on eBay when you buy from the eBay Certified Refurbished hub with code BIG15**.
Dyson Airwrap Long £322.99 View Deal Save 15 percent off off the Dyson Airwrap on eBay when you buy from the eBay Certified Refurbished hub with code BIG15**.
Available from 10AM onwards today, shoppers can buy the Dyson Airwrap styler on eBay with £127 off when they buy from the eBay Certified Refurbished hub.']

title: ['BSB: Bradley Ray stormed to victory in the eBay Sprint Race at ... - Motorsport Radio', 'Ukrainians Are Selling War Trophies on eBay and Americans Are ... - The Daily Beast']
summary:
['After setting a new lap record around Knockhill during qualifying it looked inevitable that he would win a race this weekend.
In race one Ray was flying and won by a comfortable margin.
Ray took the holeshot and never looked back.
Ray took his third race win of the 2022 season and looks like him and the Yamaha are a match made in heaven.
The 2021 BSB Champion Tarran Mackenzie was unable to start race one.', "Taras just started selling war relics this month, and has moved about 20 items so far.
It’s all permitted for sale under eBay’s military items policy, which excludes weapons, explosives, and certain types of body armor.
For $123 plus $16 shipping, an eBay vendor who goes by “ukrseller_one” will send you a “Modern Russian Soldier’s military trevel [sic] kit.
Inside you can watch what Russian soldiers use in the field.
“There was [a] night battle and Russian soldiers hadn't time to take on [sic] own underwear."]

title: ['I’m an eBay expert – follow these lesser-known tips to make HUNDREDS from your unwanted junk... - The Sun']
summary:
["THEY say one man's trash is another treasure - so it's no wonder that three-quarters of Brits are selling items from around the house to raise some extra cash.
And according to Ebay, you could pocket as much as £1,106 if you pick the right items to sell.
On Ebay, you can list up to 1,000 items a month for free, although you can pay to have your listing promoted higher up.
We picked the brains of Emma Grant, head of pre-loved at eBay UK, to find out how to make the most from your old junk.
For example, if you are selling old children’s clothes, make sure its listed in the children’s fashion category, rather than just fashion in general."]

title: ['eBay to Close GittiGidiyor Operations - PR Newswire', 'How to shop preloved on eBay - BHF - British Heart Foundation', 'Simple eBay trick can get you huge bargains - including £30 off Nike - Wales Online', 'Warren Buffett will dine with eBay auction winner for $19 million - USA TODAY']
summary:
['SAN JOSE, Calif., June 20, 2022 /PRNewswire/ -- eBay Inc. (NASDAQ: EBAY) today announced it will be taking steps to close its marketplace business in Turkey, GittiGidiyor.
eBay acquired the majority stake in GittiGidiyor in 2011 and has operated the business as an independent platform.
eBay regularly reviews its business operations globally and made this difficult but strategic decision based on the ongoing competitive dynamics in the market.
eBay will work closely with GittiGidiyor buyers and sellers to assist in the migration off the platform, and will share more detailed information with them directly later today.
Forward-Looking StatementsCertain statements herein are "forward-looking statements" within the meaning of Section 27A of the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, and Section 21E of the Exchange Act.', 'How to shop preloved on eBay Category: BHF ShopsWith Love Island back on our screens the nation is glued to the re-couplings, romance and rejections in the hit TV show.
Contestants are dressed in all things preloved and we are encouraging shoppers to visit our eBay shop, the largest charity retailer on the site in the world, before opting to buy new.
SHOOT YOUR SHOT and wait until the last few minutes to place a bid.
Allison Swaine Hughes, Retail Director said: “As the biggest charity retailer on eBay, rest assured we know what we’re talking about.
It might not be your type on paper but consider looking on eBay or visiting your local BHF shop before buying new.”', 'According to the findings, Fred Perry and Lacoste have the most misspelt listings, accounting for 8.17 and 8.05 percent of brand listings.
However, on rare occasions, products listed as ‘Lacose’ or ‘Lacosse’ have sold for £3 and £5 respectively, saving buyers up to £21.
It might not be the most misspelt brand, but purchasing a Nike product, listed as ‘Nie’ helped 156 people save an average of £30 per purchase.
Typically, Nike products sell for an average of £46, but the products with the brand name misspelt in the listing sold for £16 – on average.
Dr. Martens sell for an average of £60 on eBay, while listings which misspell the brand sell for an average of £36, resulting in savings of £24.', 'Someone paid $19 million to go to lunch with Warren Buffett.
"It's been nothing but good," Buffett said of past experiences dining with strangers, eBay reported.
Buffett, 91, has raised more than $53.2 million for Glide in 21 auctions, which began in 2000.
Winning bids have ranged from $25,000 to this year's highest-ever bid, eBay reported.
"Glide is grateful for our treasured friendship with Warren Buffet and partner eBay," the GLIDE President and CEO Karen Hanranhan posted on the nonprofit's website.']

title: ['Bizarre trophy found on eBay reunited with North Wales owners a century after going missing - North Wales Live', 'The Last of Us Part 1 Firefly Edition eBay Scalpers Might Be Struggling - PlayStation LifeStyle', 'The fall of Missguided and rise of eBay shows Gen Z is falling out of ... - inews', 'Where to buy Sandy Bodecker x eBay x Nike SB Dunk Low Retro? Everything we know so far - Sportskeeda', 'eBay Bike Bargains - Gravel Bikes | Cycling deals from Dealclincher - Road.cc', 'San Jose: Feds charge suspected ‘money mule’ in $1.85 million eBay fraud scheme - Silicon Valley', 'Bayern-Zoff wegen Jubiläumstrikot: Bis zu 1250 Euro auf Ebay ... - tz.de', 'Love Island and eBay: how the reality show could model a radically sustainable future for its young viewers - The Conversation Indonesia']
summary:
['A long-lost silver trophy has been reunited with the agricultural show that first awarded it more than a century ago.
Now badly lopsided, it was donated to Llanrwst Rural Show by a retired London solicitor who bought it for a few quid on eBay.
“I’m a passionate sailor and was looking for a trophy for a minor yachting competition,” he said.
“When I came across this rather nice, old trophy on eBay, I bought it, though I couldn’t see its engraving from the photo.
Providing post-show entertainment in the bar will be Welsh folk singer Gwilyn Bowen Rhys and Llanrwst regular Tudur Wyn Jones.', 'The Last of Us Part 1 Firefly Edition sold out almost immediately, which is a bummer for fans that wanted to pre-order.
Unfortunately, like almost every other popular video game product in the last three years, it seems like eBay scalpers scooped up many.
Poor The Last of Us Part 1 Firefly Edition eBay sales might mean things are turning around with scalpingAccording to eBay’s sold listings for The Last of Us Part 1 Firefly Edition, only one copy has been purchased in the last ten days.
However, aside from the 48 hours after the Firefly Edition was announced, sales have almost completely flatlined.
However, better enforcement of eBay’s policies and general apathy around the Firefly Edition may have at least made scalping it a little less lucrative.', 'The news comes in the midst of what appears to be a sea change in attitudes towards fast fashion, illustrated most notably by Love Island bringing eBay on board as its fashion sponsor for this year’s series.
The fall of Missguided isn’t the end of fast fashion – people buy from Boohoo or Shein because the offers are too good to reject.
Brianna Mills 24, London Although I have tried them in the past, I don’t shop at Shein, Boohoo or Missguided.
The consumer focus on making better choices means fast fashion brands are now competing against themselves as Zara, Pretty Little Thing, ASOS, and Boohoo are among the most resold fashion brands on platforms like eBay and Depop.
Missguided’s collapse lays bare the high cost of fast fashion to people and planet.', "The OG eBay x SB Dunk Low, dubbed the Charity, was only made in two pairs, one of which was reportedly sawed in half to make it the world's only pair.
Later, Bodecker took to Instagram, on May 8, 2018, to reveal that he is the only one to own a pair of eBay x SB Dunk Low Charity.
He claimed that this was the rarest SB pair and one-of-a-kind sneakers he owned.
More about the upcoming Sandy Bodecker x eBay x Nike SB Dunk Low RetroOn June 18, 2022, The Bodecker Foundation, took to Instagram to share the first look of the upcoming Sandy Bodecker x eBay x Nike SB Dunk Low Retro shoes, a tribute to the late swoosh label's veteran and SB pioneer, Sandy Bodecker, who passed away back in 2018, following his fight with cancer.
Nike SB x eBay to Honor Sandy Bodecker With New Dunk Low makeover (Image via Nike)The upcoming SB Dunk low pair is constructed out of smooth leather white base uppers, which contrasts with vibrant patent PU leather accents.", "In this week's eBay Bike Bargains we are checking out some excellent second-hand gravel bikes you could get your hands on from Boardman, Planet and NS Bikes!
First up we have this Boardman ADV 8.9 adventure bike!
Key features:Adventure-specific Shimano GRX gearingPowerful Shimano GRX hydraulic brakesGrippy yet fast, tubeless-ready tyresNext up we have this NS Bikes Rag +2 Gravel bike!
Key features:SRAM Apex GroupsetSRAM 10-42 CassetteWTB RIDDLER tyres 45mmNew upgraded NS saddle and FABRIC KNURL bar tapePerfect for your multi-terrain rides or simply travelling to work, next up we have this Planet X Full Monty Gravel / Commuter Bike!
Key features:Comes with a spare wheel set and tyresSRAM Rival hydraulic brakesMavic 819s wheelsSRAM 10-42 cassettes.", 'SAN JOSE — A suspected “money mule” for a multi-million dollar fraud ring was indicted on federal charges, nearly two years after authorities charged him as “John Doe” because they hadn’t yet identified him, according to court records.
Ionut Ganea was charged with bank fraud, an offense that carries up to 30 years in prison and a $1 million fine.
The indictment alleges that Ganea withdrew more than $1.85 million in cash that had been swindled from victims through a scheme that posted false ads on eBay Motors purporting to sell real cars.
Authorities allege Ganea opened dozens of bank accounts around the Bay Area, where unsuspecting “car” buyers would wire money.
In 2020, authorities charged “John Doe” with bank fraud in connection with the scheme, because they weren’t sure who the “money mule” was, according to the complaint.', 'Bayern-Zoff wegen Jubiläumstrikot: Bis zu 1250 Euro auf Ebay – Neuauflage geplantVon: Christoph Gschoßmann, Manuel Bonke, Philipp KesslerTeilenDer FC Bayern München feiert die zehnte deutsche Meisterschaft in Folge mit einem Sondertrikot.
Juni, 16.03 Uhr: München - Zehn Mal Deutscher Meister in Folge - das feiert der FC Bayern München nun mit einem ganz speziellen Trikot.
© FC Bayern FanshopSondertrikot des FC Bayern sofort ausverkauft: Fans bieten über 400 Euro bei EbayDas Trikot war in allen Größen erhältlich, ohne oder mit individueller Beflockung.
Auf Ebay boten Fans für die Trikots teilweise mehr als 400 Euro (Originalpreis: 89,95 Euro).
(cg)Lars Lukas Mai galt beim FC Bayern lange als großes Abwehrtalent.', 'A recently announced partnership between ITV reality show Love Island and secondhand e-commerce giant eBay sends a strong positive signal about prioritising sustainability over fast fashion.
Love Island boasts huge audience ratings among young people.
Some 43% of Love Island viewers are under 30, and 16-34 year-olds made up one-third of viewers of the series premiere on June 6.
Sustainability advocates, including former Love Island contestant, model and fashion influencer Brett Staniland, have argued that the show endorses a throwaway attitude to fashion.
Love Island already shows the good and the bad of dating – it’s time for it to get real about sustainability too.']

title: ['How I Made $1.35 Million on eBay Last Year Selling Secondhand ... - Business Insider', 'Global Online Classified Ad Platform Market (2022 to 2026 ... - Business Wire', "LEGO's Galaxy Explorer re-release is cheaper than the classics on ... - Midland Reporter-Telegram", 'The Cost of Buying Collectibles Stored in the eBay Vault - EcommerceBytes', 'eBay acquires established NFT marketplace KnownOrigin - The Verge', 'eBay Acquires Leading NFT Marketplace, KnownOrigin - PR Newswire', 'eBay acquires NFT marketplace KnownOrigin for an undisclosed sum - TechCrunch']
summary:
["Here's how they scaled to make $1.4 million in revenue on eBay last year, as told to Amber Sunner.
I started selling vintage clothes in 2018 as a side hustle.
Sam, a friend, joined forces with me, and we sold clothes via Asos Marketplace, Depop, and eBay.
We had to really focus on pricing our products competitively because lots of people sell secondhand clothes on eBay.
We started working on a website for the business in October 2021, and it launched in April.", 'DUBLIN--(BUSINESS WIRE)--The "Global Online Classified Ad Platform Market 2022-2026" report has been added to ResearchAndMarkets.com's offering.
The online classified ad platform market is poised to grow by $16.1 billion during 2022-2026, accelerating at a CAGR of 10.36% during the forecast period.
This report on the online classified ad platform market provides a holistic analysis, market size and forecast, trends, growth drivers, and challenges, as well as vendor analysis covering around 25 vendors.
The online classified ad platform market analysis includes business segment and geographic landscape.
This report covers the following areas:Online classified ad platform market sizingOnline classified ad platform market forecastOnline classified ad platform market industry analysisThe study was conducted using an objective combination of primary and secondary information including inputs from key participants in the industry.', 'LegoLEGO’s new products just keep coming, and for those hardcore collectors (or wannabe hardcore collectors), there’s a reissue of a classic Galaxy Explorer set coming that previously was only available on eBay.
And not just casually on eBay, but for the not-insignificant price of $400 for an opened box, though some sites have reported spotting sealed boxes of the ‘79 edition for sale for literally thousands of dollars.
Part of LEGO’s 90th Anniversary celebrations, the reissue is a replica of 1979 original, albeit with a few upgrades.
The old set featured 338 pieces and sold for $31.99.', 'Sellers, on the other hand, won't pay fees for selling items that are *already* stored in the eBay Vault.
eBay is currently limiting who can submit items, and only items valued at $750+ are currently eligible for the eBay Vault.
But for now, eBay explains, "you can only send eligible cards that you buy on eBay to the eBay vault.
eBay explains: "The instant transfer fee covers the administrative costs of securely reassigning ownership of the item within the eBay Vault."
- If the *current* owner removes an item from the eBay Vault, eBay charges a withdrawal fee and an insured shipping fee.', 'eBay made its biggest move yet into the world of digital collectibles with news today of the company acquiring NFT marketplace KnownOrigin.
“This partnership will help us attract a new wave of NFT creators and collectors,” said KnownOrigin co-founder David Moore.
eBay started allowing NFT sales on its site last year.
With the KnownOrigin acquisition, eBay has the opportunity to control a proper digital marketplace where NFT transactions can be both monitored and controlled — not just offered with the fingers-crossed hope the seller transfers an NFT to the buyer’s wallet correctly.
eBay declined to comment on whether there will be any integration between physical collectibles in the vault and NFTs in the future.', 'KnownOrigin, which was founded in 2018 in Manchester, UK, enables artists and collectors to create, buy and resell NFTs via blockchain-support transactions.
Since its founding, KnownOrigin has seen significant growth as it has revolutionized the way people create, buy, and sell NFTs.
Forward-Looking StatementsCertain statements herein are "forward-looking statements" within the meaning of Section 27A of the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, and Section 21E of the Exchange Act.
Such forward-looking statements reflect eBay's current expectations or beliefs concerning future events and actual events may differ materially from historical results or current expectations.
The forward-looking statements in this document speak only as of this date.', 'eBay announced today that it’s acquiring Manchester-based NFT marketplace KnownOrigin.
We look forward to welcoming these innovators as they join the eBay community.”The acquisition comes a month after eBay launched its first collection of NFTs in partnership with web3 platform OneOf.
The company’s new “Genesis” NFT Collection will feature 3D and animated interpretations of the iconic athletes featured on Sports Illustrated covers over the years.
eBay says the surge in the collectibles market led to its first collaboration in the NFT space.
However, its acquisition of KnownOrigin indicates that the company is getting serious about NFTs.']

title: ['eBay Updates Sellers On New Legal Requirements When Selling to ... - eSeller365', "eBay India hosts event for India's top-performing cross-border sellers - ANI News", "What eBay's certification partnership means for resellers - E-Scrap News", 'I spent $500 on 100 lost mail packages from eBay – I thought I’d been scammed but I did make a profit in th... - The US Sun']
summary:
['eBay has sent a reminder out to its sellers across the US about some changes that will be required if selling items to customers in Germany.
Steps that eBay Sellers Need To Take To Sell To Germany“We wanted to remind you that there are important upcoming changes to how you sell goods to German buyers on eBay.
Add your LUCID number to your business profile on My eBayWhat information will I need to register with LUCID?
You will then receive your LUCID number.
eBay has a legal obligation to ensure that all our B2C sellers are compliant.', 'Jaipur (Rajasthan) [India], June 23 (ANI/NewsVoir): eBay, a global commerce leader connecting millions of buyers and sellers worldwide, organized an event in Jaipur for leading sellers from across the country.
With an aim to empower India's leading exports to further expand their footprint in the international markets, the company hosted this event to encourage the seller community to scale their Cross-border trade business.
The event saw the participation of top sellers from every nook and corner of the country.
Attending the event alongside India's top-performing sellers, Pavan Ponnappa, Head - Categories, Acquisition and Marketing (India - Cross Border Trade), said, "Indian products and sellers are appreciated across the eBay marketplace which is demonstrated by the high percentage of repeat business that sellers see.
eBay Inc. (Nasdaq: EBAY) is a global commerce leader that connects people and builds communities to create economic opportunities for all.', 'One of the world’s biggest e-commerce channels, eBay, has launched a program allowing refurbishers to sell Phonecheck-certified devices through the platform.
Last month, eBay announced a partnership with Los Angeles-based mobile device certification provider Phonecheck, which uses advanced software to evaluate and pull device history data for a device – essentially a Carfax for refurbished electronics.
To compete with certification programs from other online refurbished electronics marketplaces, including Amazon’s Renewed program, San Jose, Calif.-based eBay launched its eBay Refurbished program.
U.S. remarketers now have the option of having Phonecheck evaluate and produce reports on their devices sold through the eBay Refurbished program.
In an interview with E-Scrap News, Laura Homar, certification program manager at Phonecheck, said Phonecheck’s certification is allowing resellers to sell their electronics for 5% to 10% higher prices than non-certified devices.', "WHEN packages get lost in the mail, they don't disappear forever – and eventually, someone else may get to buy them.
One YouTuber shared her recent experience purchasing $500 worth of lost packages from other shoppers who originally bought from eBay.
Her story about taking home $500 worth of eBay packages is already garnering a lot of attention.
She explains: “Lost packages end up at a mail recovery center.
It turns out that she walked away with $850.17 worth of items after spending $500 at the lost packages auction."]

title: ['eBay walks off Turkish e-commerce scene amid stiff competition | Daily Sabah - Daily Sabah', '5 Modern Classic Sneakers To Cop On eBay Right Now - Complex']
summary:
['Global e-commerce giant eBay this week surprised many with its announcement that it was dropping out of Turkey.
The San Jose, California-based company said it was closing its Turkey-based online marketplace business GittiGidiyor, one of the oldest players in the Turkish e-commerce market.
Turkish e-commerce and fashion company Markafoni, which was owned by South African media and internet giant Naspers, shut down in mid-2017.
Naspers, made powerful by its stake in Chinese internet giant Tencent, bought Markafoni from its founder in 2014 as Turkey’s then-small, yet growing, e-commerce market drew international investors.
I think eBay had a few options ahead of it.', 'As temperatures continue to heat up, there’s never been a better time to update your footwear rotation.
With many sneakerheads already flexing their creps in the summer heat, the chances of copping an authentic sneaker grail can be increasingly harder to find.
Thankfully we have eBay, which last year launched its Authenticity Guarantee, a new service which has been designed to add an extra layer of security and trust between eBay’s sneaker sellers and customers.
Now, with continuous rollouts and fire releases, choosing the right sneaker—or even navigating the world of sneaker drops—can be a whole other job in itself.
From the Nike Air Jordan 4 to the Adidas Yeezy Boost “Wave Runner”, the Complex UK crew have put together a list of modern classic, Authenticity Guaranteed, sneakers that you can get your hands on through eBay right now*.']

title: ['EBay Uses Machine Learning to Refine Promoted Listings - The New Stack', "Phoenix veteran loses $1,000 in eBay vehicle scam - Arizona's Family", 'Ebay partners with GJEPC to offer jewellery businesses affordable ... - FashionNetwork.com', 'Donovan Mitchell Talks About Life After Injury And His eBay Store - Racer X Online']
summary:
['Online marketplace eBay incorporated additional buying signals such as “Add to Watchlist,” “Make Offer,” and “Add to Cart” into its machine learning model to improve the relevance of recommended ad listings, based on the initial items searched for.
EBay’s Promoted Listings Standard (PLS) is a paid option for sellers.
With one option, PLSIM, eBay’s recommendation engines suggest sponsored items similar to something a potential buyer just clicked on.
EBay had to run tests iteratively until they came up with numbers that made the model work.
They experimented with only adding a click as additional relevance feedback and applied tuned hyperparameter “Purchase” sample weight 150.', 'The seller, who was actually a scammer, said the truck was being sold through eBay and claimed Angel could only buy the truck using eBay gift cards.
So, Angel went to Safeway and purchased five eBay cards at $200 a piece for a total of $1,000.
It should be noted that a Safeway manager questioned Angel about his purchase, telling him there are many scams involving eBay gift cards.
Angel then called the scammer, believing the truck sale was legitimate, and told them he had purchased those eBay cards.
But if you’re ever asked to use gift cards like eBay, Amazon, or others in order to purchase something, you’re most likely getting involved in a scam.', 'Ebay partners with GJEPC to offer jewellery businesses affordable global shipping ByIsabelle Crossley PublishedJun 28, 2022International e-commerce marketplace Ebay and the Gem and Jewellery Export Promotion Council have partnered with the aim of offering jewellery retailers cheap international shipping rates to boost global sales.
The GJEPC hopes to boost international jewellery sales on Ebay with cheap shipping and Ebay hopes to onboard sellers - GJEPC - India- Facebook“Expand your export business with and Ebay partnership,” the GJEPC announced on Facebook on June 27.
“Avail of the economical shipping costs.” With the new tie-up, international jewellery shipping starts at Rs 323 and the GJEPC describes it as fast, affordable, and safe.
The Ebay ‘Global Shipping Platform’, also referred to as the ‘EGS Platform’, provides users with access to independent, third-party logistics services providers.
Shipping services procured from the EGS Platform can only be used to ship goods sold by the Ebay account in question.', 'With this injury, it comes with a high, high level of nerve pain and just discomfort on a daily basis.
KTM had approached me and said, “We’d like you to go do this.” There’s going to be celebrities and all kinds of cool things going on.
I am involved with the Wings for Life Foundation that’s part of Red Bull and Heinz Kinigadner, after my injury and his son’s injury back in the early 2000s.
There’s a lot of things that are promising, but that’s just kind of the way it is with life sometimes.
It’s no easy task to keep a race team going.']

['As NFTs remain a buzzy topic among brand marketers and crypto enthusiasts, marketplaces are trying out different ways to tap into the growing trend.
“NFTs make more sense in this context, given the same scarcity economics at play and the ability to authenticate goods.
There is likely a fair amount of overlap between the collector community and NFT users, so it does make sense for eBay to experiment and invest in the space,” added Lipsman.
“But with the recent rationalization of this market, there’s a growing sense that NFTs will be more of a fad than a trend.
As marketplaces bet on NFTs to attract buyers and sellers, other e-commerce platforms are looking at how they can make it easier for their users to experiment with NFTs.', "eBay was on hand at a cross-border trade expo in Shenzhen, China recently where it hosted lectures to teach sellers there about the popular product categories available on its platform, according to the South China Morning Post (via Yahoo News ).
While Covid saw China's cross-border ecommerce trade growing at 31% (and exports up over 40%) in 2020, that growth has seen a significant slowdown - growing 15% and 24.5% respectively in 2021.
Those incidents highlight the challenges companies face in managing the influx of overseas sellers.
Marketplaces have been helping sellers in various countries for years export to the US and Europe, though you seldom hear about it.
While domestic sellers in Western countries may resent the help overseas sellers get selling into their market, what isn't know is the kind of financial incentives companies like eBay give to international sellers and whether they're more favorable than those given to domestic sellers.", 'and humanitarian, Muhammad Ali.
The new Sports Illustrated x Muhammad Ali NFT collection launched on June 27, 2022, and will be available for a limited time, exclusively on eBay.
ABG also owns Muhammad Ali Enterprises, in partnership with Lonnie Ali as trustee of the Muhammad Ali Family Trust (MAFT).
Through OneOf’s ongoing partnership with eBay, the Sports Illustrated x Muhammad Ali NFT collection will be offered for a limited time to eBay’s community of 142+ million active buyers.
OneOf’s partnership with Sports Illustrated is taking these connections — and the traditional “buyer-seller” relationship on both platforms — to the next level.', 'Headlining this time around is the DJI Mavic Air 2 Drone at $679.
Down from the original $799 price tag, this is marking the third-best price of the year.
Stepping up a bit from the lead deal, the DJI Air 2S Drone Fly More Combo is also on sale.
This one too is available in certified refurbished condition and is down from the original $449 price tag.
DJI Mavic Air 2 features:A midrange drone with flagship features, the DJI Mavic Air 2 combines a foldable and portable frame, high-end camera system, and a host of accessories to get you flying quickly.', 'Felixstowe man Simon Lewis bought the bus, currently parked in Gainsborough Road, for £6,000 from eBay after his family was served with an eviction notice to leave their current home by August 9 as their landlord wished to sell the property.
Sophie Underwood with the bus, bought on eBay for £6,000 (Image: CHARLOTTE BOND)He is now spending £14,000 converting the out-of-service bus, previously owned by a Cambridge bus company, by creating four bedrooms, a bathroom and toilet on the top deck, while downstairs there will be a kitchen, dining room and seating area.
Mr Lewis said: “We are renting and unfortunately the landlord has decided to sell and there is literally nothing available.
I would impose four times the current level of council tax on second homes and use the money to fund house building.
The green double decker bus which will become home for Simon Lewis, his partner Sophie Underwood and their three children (Image: CHARLOTTE BOND)']

title: ['Be Wary of eBay Handling Time Rules - EcommerceBytes']
summary:
['At the time, eBay told sellers , "You may still choose any handling time for your listings - sometimes longer handling times are appropriate, like if you're shipping custom items - and this new treatment of handling times helps set the right expectations for your buyers."
The eBay Presale policy states sellers must ship within 30 days of purchase items clearly stating (in the title and description) that they are presale offers.
For regular items, eBay tells sellers to "be realistic" when setting handling times.
The Handling Time and Estimated Delivery Dates help page doesn't offer a specific recommendation except for noting the benefit eBay provides sellers for listings with same-day or 1-day handling.
And given the fact eBay uses handling time as a factor in how it sorts search results in Best Match, it would appear the quicker the handling time, the better.']

If this is the new normal of credit card companies, disaster may be looming for sellers.", 'July 15 will mark the one-year anniversary of eBay eliminating its Adult Only category.
As we reported last year, eBay announced that, "effective July 15, 2021, the Adult Only category will no longer be available for new listings."
The sale of adult items is an issue eBay struggled with for over 2 decades.
In August 2000, then-CEO Meg Whitman looked into the issue, according to Adam Cohen in his book, "The Perfect Store: Inside eBay."
Under its current policy, eBay allows the sale of adult toys in its "Adult Sex Toys" category in eBay's "Sexual Wellness Products" category.', 'NEWPORT, Tenn. (WATE) — A coin collector from Newport is despondent after being scammed by a would-be buyer.
22 years ago, he bought a series of uncirculated 24kt gold coins, state coins.
“They sent me an email stating that they were taking me off their account, that they would not let me sell counterfeit coins on eBay,” James said.
James believes once the coin arrived, the would-be buyer, Doug, told eBay that James had sent a counterfeit coin.
Still, James has others to sell, but eBay suspended his account, which hurts despite the proof of authenticity he sent to eBay last month.', 'Batrodz Ressurection Garage out of New York state has built a 1955 Futura show car replica based on a stretched 1987 C4 Corvette chassis.
Ford design chief George Walker was on a roll in the fifties.
He was coming off a grand slam hit with the two-seat Thunderbird of 1955 and he oversaw an army of talented designers.
His Futura show car was a test bed for all sorts of new-fangled design ideas.
This replica recreates the Futura while adding the radiused wheel wells from the Batmobile.']

It said today average prices and dealer stock levels both dipped in June as days to sell increased.
According to eBay Motors Group’s Market View, the average advertised used car price dropped 1.4% from £16,872 to £16,627, the fifth consecutive monthly fall, although it was 20.3% ahead of June 2021.
Car supermarkets bore the brunt of the shortage with inventories down 3.1% from 293 to 284, while franchised dealers were down 5.4% from 56 to 53.
Average days to sell increased by nearly three full days from 36.7 to 39.5 days.']

title: ['The "Lost" 1948 Tucker Convertible Prototype Is For Sale On eBay - Silodrome']

Preston Tucker launched his design for the “Tucker Torpedo” into this void and the American people loved it.
The Tucker 48 included a slew of unique design features, many of which were focused on occupant safety.
The controversial car you see here, chassis 1057, is believed to be either the original Tucker 48 convertible prototype or the Tucker 49 prototype with a wraparound rear window.
The “Lost” Tucker Convertible Prototype Shown HereThe car you see here has been the subject of no small amount of controversy over the years.']

title: ['"They’d sell mad on eBay"- Fans react to Red Bull\'s orange army invading track and taking away Rolex advertisement boards as souvenirs after 2022 F1 Austrian GP - Sportskeeda', 'Get 20% Off at eBay This Week: All the Best Deals on Tech, Home ... - PCMag UK', 'German Classifieds Site eBay Kleinanzeigen to Yank eBay Name ... - eSeller365', 'Antique Jewelry & Watch 2022 Show Exhibitors Tell Their eBay Stories - aBlogtoWatch', 'FedEx partners with eBay to boost APAC ecommerce - The Paypers', "eBay's Sneaker Authenticators Reveal Their Rarest Sneaker Finds - Complex", 'Seller Hits Roadblock Signing up for eBay Express Payouts - EcommerceBytes']
summary:
["Red Bull's orange army was a thing of beauty (and a bit of trepidation as well) during the 2022 F1 Austrian GP.
The orange smoke billowing over the track before the start of the race was something else.
To add to it, the cheers that Max Verstappen received when he secured pole position on Friday or won the 2022 F1 Austrian GP Sprint were next level.
Arguably one of the funnier things that Red Bull's orange army did was storm the track after the race and take away the Rolex advertisement boards as souvenirs.
Four-time world champion Sebastian Vettel even went one step ahead and asked F1 to ban such offensive crowds for their lifetimes from attending races.", 'Additionally, with much of its offerings being used, eBay prices are often unmatched by other major retailers.
From July 9th to 13th, though, eBay will lower prices even further — with a 20% sale on Buy Now and New items across a host of select sellers.
There are a few ways to buy products on eBay.
Alternatively, you can shop for new or refurbished items, which are often available in much higher quantities and have set prices.
To score this sweet deal, simply visit the sale’s eBay microsite and click the HOT20 code button.', 'Adevinta is removing the eBay logo and name from eBay Kleinanzeigen, the German classifieds portal the Norwegian company acquired last year from eBay.
Don’t MissThe company operates online marketplaces and classifieds platforms in 14 countries globally, with two in Germany, eBay Kleinanzeigen and Mobile.de.
According to a statement by Linde Scheers, CMO, eBay Germany, eBay is happy with the name change as shoppers have been confused by the name eBay Kleinanzeigen believing the classifieds platform is still part of eBay.
With this branding change to use Kleinanzeigen (German for Classifieds) only, the confusion some shoppers had will go away, Scheers explained.
eBay Kleinanzeigen Was Part of eBay Classifieds Group SaleThe German eBay Kleinanzeigen classifieds platform was part of the eBay Classifieds Group transaction between eBay and Adevinta for $2.5 billion in cash and a 44% equity stake in the classifieds marketplace operator.', 'Sponsored post presented on aBlogtoWatch for advertiserThe long-standing Antique Jewelry & Watch Show series continues to welcome eBay at the 2022 iteration of its Las Vegas show.
Held in tandem with the prestigious Couture and JCK watch and jewelry industry tradeshows, the Antique Jewelry & Watch Show is a specialty gathering of dealers and industry specialists who buy and sell mostly pre-owned and estate watches and jewelry.
aBlogtoWatch tagged along with members of the eBay team at the 2022 Antique Jewelry & Watch Show to meet some of the exhibitors who also have important storefronts on eBay.com.
Emotional stories about buying vintage watches and jewelry on eBay are matching with nearly as many stories about people selling important vintage watches and jewelry on eBay.
For those instances when you can’t view antique, vintage, and estate watches in person, check them out on the eBay website.', 'OKFor optimum operation, this website makes use of cookies.
For more information click here', 'It’s been just over a year since marketplace giant eBay launched its Authenticity Guarantee in the UK.
The process takes place at eBay’s dedicated Authentication Centre, hosted in a warehouse on the outskirts of London.
Soon after its launch, Complex headed along to meet the experts behind the site’s trusted guarantee.
If that wasn’t enough, the after-market institution also sold a pair of kicks every 9 seconds on its site in 2020 and also predicts that the sneaker resale market itself could be worth as much as £4.3 billion by 2025.
Keen to uncover more, we decided to catch up with eBay’s authenticity team once again to find out more about the sneaker gems coming through their doors.', "Dear Ina,Would you have any information about the bizarre way eBay is implementing Express Payouts?
Here's my experience: I tried to sign up for Express Payouts using the debit card attached to the bank account that was verified by eBay for Managed Payments.
I entered my debit card info and then received a request for a bank statement, which I uploaded.
The next day I received another request for a bank statement (no explanation why).
I have accounts at five different financial institutions, not one statement referenced my debit card number on my statement."]

title: ['Clothes worn by Love Island stars being sold on eBay including iconic Ekin Su dress and Dami shirt - Irish Mirror', 'The eBay x Nike Dunk Calls Out to One of the Most Legendary Sneaker Stories in History - Yahoo Entertainment', "Preloved pioneer: eBay's UK boss on why it's more relevant than ever - Retail Gazette", 'eBay x Nike Transparent Dunk Low Revealed - HYPEBAE', 'Ebay launches “hub” for Black-owned fashion, beauty brands - Vogue Business']
summary:
["This series is the show’s eighth and it’s the first time that a pre-loved fashion retailer has provided clothes for those in the villa.
From Indiyah's Poster Girl turquoise dress to Tasha's vintage Champion jacket, you can now add the Islander's pre-loved clothes to your collection.
But Ekin Su’s herve leger blue bandage dress appears to be the most wanted with bidding currently at £490.
The proceeds from the sale of the islanders’ pre-loved items sold in the auction will be donated to charity.
Jemma Tadd, Head of Fashion at eBay said: “We’re thrilled to be giving fans a first-of-its-kind opportunity to shop the actual outfits worn by the Islanders.", "The eBay x Nike Dunk Calls Out to One of the Most Legendary Sneaker Stories in HistoryIn 2003, e-commerce platform eBay and sportswear giant Nike joined forces on a Dunk Low model limited to a mere three pairs.
One pair was sold at auction for nearly $30,000 USD, one was given to innovative Nike designer Sandy Bodecker and the last sample was cut into four parts.
Now, nearly twenty years later, the split sample is referenced in the reimagined eBay x Nike Dunk with the shoe's colorblocked upper segmented with transparent strips.
Instagram user @jfgrails teased the collaboration, but no official release information has been confirmed.
Elsewhere in sneakers, take an official look at the Cactus Plant Flea Market x Nike Dunk Low.", '“During the pandemic sustainability really fell down consumers’ list of priorities but it is now front and centre for many consumers,” says eBay UK boss Murray Lambell.
Since the show started, the marketplace has seen 700% more searches for preloved clothing, while on Google there has also been 756% more searches for ‘eBay preloved clothes’ and 660% more for ‘preloved’, compared to last month.
It works with third parties like Royal Mail to give eBay sellers access to enhanced services for exporting goods overseas.
Ecommerce peaked at 37.8% of UK retail sales in January 2021, when the UK was in its third lockdown, according to the Office for National Statistic.
We’ve lent around £70 million to UK businesses since we launched last year and we’re seeing exponential demand,” he says.', 'The eBay x Nike Dunk Calls Out to One of the Most Legendary Sneaker Stories in HistoryIn 2003, e-commerce platform eBay and sportswear giant Nike joined forces on a Dunk Low model limited to a mere three pairs.
One pair was sold at auction for nearly $30,000 USD, one was given to innovative Nike designer Sandy Bodecker and the last sample was cut into four parts.
Now, nearly twenty years later, the split sample is referenced in the reimagined eBay x Nike Dunk with the shoe’s colorblocked upper segmented with transparent strips.
Instagram user @jfgrails teased the collaboration, but no official release information has been confirmed.
Elsewhere in sneakers, take an official look at the Cactus Plant Flea Market x Nike Dunk Low.', 'Ebay UK is launching a new hub on its website called Black in Bloom to connect consumers to Black-owned SMEs.
Fashion, beauty and other consumer goods such as household products will be sold on the hub by graduates of the Black Girl Fest X Ebay Sellers academy.
The launch follows a series of collaborations between Ebay and Black Girl Fest (BGF), a festival and platform designed for Black women, girls and non-binary people.
Once graduated, brands can then sell via the Black in Bloom hub.
“Once they’ve got those skills the hub is really a way for us, Ebay, to drive traffic towards those businesses,” says Gale.']

title: ["Inside the 'eBay of football' that clubs like Arsenal and Man Utd use ... - inews"]
summary:
['And he believed he had the answer: the transfer market was broken.
Clubs were overpaying, no one knew who was available and a shroud of secrecy prevented the money and players ending up transferring from clubs who had them to clubs who needed them.
TransferRoom’s CEO Jonas Ankersen, who set up the business to bring ‘clarity’ to football’s transfer market (Photo: Karolis Gadliauskas)“Those responsible for making decisions involving millions of euros were working in the dark.
“The result was that buying clubs had no reliable method of finding out which players were available for transfer, and selling clubs did not know what profile of player the buying clubs were seeking.
“Buying clubs want information about as many relevant options as possible, while selling clubs want to have a choice of as many potential buyers as possible.']

title: ['1 green flag for eBay, and 1 red flag - The Motley Fool Australia', 'eBay Open Announcement on Facebook Brings Harsh Reality Check - EcommerceBytes', "Laura Whitmore's Pre-Loved Collection With Ebay Includes Sizzling ... - Grazia", 'Bootleg Nintendo soundtracks are being sold for big money on eBay ... - Video Games Chronicle', 'eBay Ads Welcomes Upasana Gupta as New GM of Advertising UK - eSeller365', "EBay Kleinanzeigen to drop the 'EBay' - AIM Group", "UK's rarest 50p coin sells for £160 with thousands more out there - Lincolnshire Live", 'Senior buys eBay gift cards at CVS and almost gets scammed. Now she wants a refund. - NJ.com']
summary:
["Investors have mixed feelings about eBay (NASDAQ: EBAY).
The company is implementing a strategy to boost revenue, even as customer spending is falling.
Green flag: Increasing the take rateNotably, eBay does not own any inventory for sale on its platform.
This red flag can primarily explain why eBay's stock is off 47% from its highs.
While the risk should not be ignored, it's no reason for shareholders to sell eBay stock.", 'But if some executives are in denial, they need only go to its eBay for Business Facebook page for a reality check.
eBay is losing control of the message on Facebook as evidenced by its recent post announcing the upcoming eBay Open seller conference to be held virtually in September.
"Read our official announcement on eBay Open 2022—including details about this year’s exciting, virtual and in-person hybrid format.
Among the negative comments on the eBay Facebook post were the following:Jimmy ThornhillSelling for 20+ years...I have absolutely no confidence in eBay.
The eBay Open announcement on Facebook may have been a little more "open" than the company had anticipated.', "From the bomber jackets to the party dresses (Poster Girl, always), the show's new sponsor, eBay, has officially changed the game, proving once and for all that second-hand = sizzling.
Love Island's host, Laura Whitmore, has also been getting in on the pre-loved action, restyling 'old' looks to make them 'new' - and tonight is launching her very own collection with eBay.
With a front-row seat to everything happening in the villa, Whitmore admits to being jealous of more than one look.
I’ve been obsessed with the bomber jackets and thought the Opening Ceremony co-ord worn by Andrew was very stylish.'
With bids starting from just 99p - and all funds raised being donated to Oxfam - you best set a reminder for this afternoon.", 'Numerous fake versions of Nintendo soundtrack CDs are currently being sold on eBay for up to hundreds of dollars, it’s claimed.
What does appear to be the case, however, is that the CDs being sold aren’t official products.
“They find good deals on video game soundtrack CDs and then sell them for sometimes a 1000% markup.
Part of the reason for these large prices is Nintendo’s continued apparent reluctance to make official soundtracks of its game music widely available, either physically or digitally.
Japan is the only market where physical video game soundtracks are commonplace, forcing the rest of the world to import them at often exorbitant prices.', 'eBay Ads has announced the appointment of Upasana Gupta as its new General Manager of Advertising in the UK.
Don’t MissHeading up the eBay Ads UK team based in Richmond, London, Upasana will focus on driving the adoption of advertising solutions to help sellers to thrive, brands to grow, and buyers discover products on the eBay platform.
Gupta joins eBay Ads from Microsoft Advertising, where she worked for 16 years — most recently as the EMEA Marketing Lead where she was responsible for building and evolving Microsoft’s advertising business to drive success and growth for its advertising customers.
eBay AdseBay Ads operates out of four offices globally, located in the US, UK, Germany, and Australia.
Just recently, the unit released a report on how the circular economy is providing opportunities for eBay sellers on the online marketplace.', 'Germany's largest online classified portal, EBay Kleinanzeigen, will change its name to Kleinanzeigen in a new rebranding campaign.
The site will also include a "buy direct" option, while bolstering its security.
Paul Heimann, CEO of EBay Kleinanz...', "One of the most popular 50p coins among UK coin collectors has sold on eBay for £160.
The coin has sold for 320 times its value after a total of 12 bids were placed on the piece.
You may be familiar with the 'Kew Gardens' 50p by now, with more and more people being able to sell their rare coins online for a handsome fee over the past year.
There was a second mint in 2019 to celebrate 50 years of the 50p coin - but this version isn't worth anywhere near as much.
Coin enthusiast website Change Checker has some tips on the best ways to ensure a Kew Gardens 50p coin is genuine.", 'Charlene Sozansky holds gift cards that were purchased by a friend who thought she was buying them to help Sozansky.
But instead, she was tricked into buying them as part of a scam.
(Courtesy Charlene Sozansky)']

title: ['eBay Seller Files His First Police Report over Brazen Buyer - EcommerceBytes', 'Overpriced God of War: Ragnarok Special Edition Listings Are ... - GameSpot']
summary:
['He had opened a SNAD return request and then shipped us back completely different cartridges of no value to secure his refund.
I had other eBay sellers actually reach out to me about this same buyer and found out he had been perpetrating the same fraudulent scheme on other eBay sellers as well.
On top of that we also got hit with a $20 dispute fee from eBay.
We had a second eBay payment dispute about a month later from someone who did the exact same thing.
Basically I discovered trying to fight a SNAD chargeback claim is a complete farce and waste of time, they are essentially unwinnable.', "Preorders for God of War: Ragnarok went up just hours ago and already grifters have loaded eBay with inflated listings, doubling or even almost tripling the standard price of the collector’s editions.
For context, you can preorder three different versions of God of War: Ragnarok, all coming with different extras and goodies.
In contrast, confirmed preorder listings on eBay are costing anywhere from $260 to $445 for the collector’s edition and $448 to $600 for the Jotnar edition.
While you might still be able to grab a special edition preorder, collector's editions go fast and several retailers are already listing Ragnarok's special editions as out of stock.
God of War: Ragnarok is releasing for PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5 on November 9."]

Access support and educationWe're offering investment programmes like the eBay Business Roadshow and advanced eBay Academy courses.
Boost salesWe're upgrading Shops to help you attract more customers to your eBay business.
Receive payments on demandWe're giving you greater flexibility in receiving payments to help with cash flow.
Have those changes helped you, and have they made a difference in keeping you selling on eBay?", "Problems have been detected with baby baths, lawnmowers, hair dryers and children's clothing.

The product does not meet the requirements of the General Product Safety Regulations 2005.
