['Arnold Schwarzenegger rose to fame in 1984 after the release of ‘The Terminator,’ in which he collaborated with Cameron.
Arnold Schwarzenegger is currently streamable, thanks to the person who bought the rights.
ADVERTISEMENT Article continues below this adWhat is the debut film of Arnold Schwarzenegger about?
In the movie, Hercules (Arnold Schwarzenegger) is upset with his father, Zeus, for not letting him have adventures on Earth.
Arnold Schwarzenegger’s Movie CareerArnold Schwarzenegger’s acting career had a modest start, but he is today one of the biggest action stars.', 'Inxeption, the leader in Industrial Commerce and supply chain digitization, is again expanding its executive team with the addition of Brian Hsu, who joins the company as chief digital officer.
Reporting to Inxeption CEO and co-founder Farzad Dibachi, Hsu will be responsible for digital go-to market strategy, including scaling the Industrial Commerce marketplace model as Inxeption adds industry verticals.
“I’m thrilled to have him on board in the new position of chief digital officer.”Hsu joins Inxeption at a time of expansive growth.
Its secure and scalable cloud-based digital commerce platform brings Capital, Data, Products and Services on-demand for industrial and supply chain businesses.
Inxeption Commerce Partners enjoy access to sell products on the Inxeption B2B marketplace and to develop new online commerce channels by utilizing valuable applications that simplify and streamline logistics and other operations.', 'Letters to the EditorYour emails to EcommerceBytesFor consideration, send your email to ina@auctionbytes.com with "Letters to the Editor Blog" in the subject line!
Remember to include your name as you would like it to appear in the blog.', 'BOWLING GREEN, Ky. (WBKO) - The eBay Motors “Parts of America” tour made a pit stop in Bowling Green Tuesday night.
They appeared at the “Cruising for a Cure” community car show at Bruster’s Real Ice Cream on Scottsville Road.
The tour is a cross-court car enthusiast road trip, which aims to spotlight some unique car cultures across the U.S.To celebrate Bowling Green being the home of the Corvette, eBay Motors displayed a collection that included a 1958 Corvette “Gasser” drag strip car that was restored after being found in a barn.
The tour is heading to California for the LA Auto Show.
Copyright 2022 WBKO.', 'Merch for Money Challenge with eBayeBay for Capital.
Picture: GlobalRoman, Sonny and Sian are going head-to-head to raise money for Capital’s charity Global’s Make Some Noise.
They’ve been tasked with coming up with their own products to sell on eBay, and it’s up to YOU to decide the winner.
Get your hands on your favourite product now and choose your winner, all thanks to eBay for Charity.
BUY HEREThe best part is, when you buy one of our products, eBay for Charity will match the amount you pay, up to £50,000, making even more money for Global’s Make Some Noise.', 'The largest eBay sellers have each sold tens of millions of items.
And despite eBay struggling to grow over the past few years, those sellers still run massive businesses.
Many eBay sellers generate most of their sales on eBay - while they often sell on other platforms, including Amazon, their business model is built around eBay.
Top eBay sellers confirm the Marketplaces Power Law and, plotted as a chart, draw a near-perfect power law distribution line.
Because every user can become a seller by listing an item, eBay has tens of millions of sellers.']

title: ['EcommerceBytes Publishers Appear on Boston TV to Discuss eBay ... - EcommerceBytes', "eBay's Latest Boomerang Hire: Gene Cook Returns as VP of ... - EcommerceBytes", 'Natick couple harassed by eBay executives still traumatized ... - GBH News', 'Rex to launch eBay-style bidding for upgrades - Australian Aviation', 'Killer fitness deal: Fitbit, Garmin smartwatches up to 56% off on eBay - finder.com.au', 'Use of eBay Gift Cards: The Basics - Weird News Era']
summary:
['Days after two former eBay executives were sentenced for their role in the cyberstalking of EcommerceBytes publishers Ina and David Steiner, the couple appeared on local PBS television program Greater Boston to discuss the stalking campaign and its aftermath.
Host Jim Braude also interviewed attorney Rosemary Scapicchio about the civil lawsuit the Steiners filed last year against eBay and former executives and employees.
The segment can be viewed on the WGBH.org website or via YouTube:', 'eBay has welcomed yet another executive back into the fold with the return of Gene Cook.
The “boomerang” hiring spree of high level executives started with the return of Jamie Iannone in the role of CEO in 2020.
Cook announced his return as Vice President of Collectibles at eBay in a LinkedIn post today.
He’ll be in charge of one of eBay’s most important “focus” categories.
A few years later in 2014, as eBay’s General Manager of Emerging Verticals, he was tasked with reviving the live auction format through a partnership with Invaluable.', 'The Natick couple that was harassed by eBay executives still lives in fear, three years following the traumatizing incidents that landed several of the executives in jail.
David and Ina Steiner, the cofounders of EcommerceBytes, were terrorized by eBay executives in 2019 after writing a newsletter that criticized the company's policies and wasteful spending.
The couple was sent a box of live spiders, a funeral wreath and a bloody pig mask among other horrifying items.
"We are really depressed because our life is different now and it's hard to see what's ahead in the future," Ina said.
Watch: ‘Life was a nightmare’: Natick couple recalls constant harassment from eBay executives', 'Rex will soon allow economy passengers to take part in an eBay-style auction to bid for an upgrade to business class.
How Rex’s ‘real-time’ bidding worksMaking your initial bidAll customers make their initial bid in the same way.
You simply click on the link provided to go to the Rex real-time bid update page.
However, Real-time bidding doesn’t let you know exactly where you fall in the list.
Once you have finished bidding you can simply close the real-time bidding screen and wait until bidding closes to see if you have been successful.', "If you need a new wearable, you wouldn't want to miss out on this eBay smartwatch sale.
eBay smartwatch sale October 2022Garmin Fenix 6S | $999 $789 (save $210) Don't miss this discount on a truly premium wearable.
The Garmin Fenix 6S offers advanced running and cycling tracking, an extensive GPS system and Body Battery energy monitoring.
View dealFitbit Versa 3 | $399.99 $234.99 (save $165) Find out why Fitbit fitness trackers stand as some of the best in the game with this eBay smartwatch sale.
The Versa 3 boasts over 6 days of battery life and a built-in GPS.", 'You are able to use eBay gift cards to pay for all or a portion of your subsequent purchase made on the website.
How to use eBay gift cards?
FAQsCan I use an eBay Gift Card without creating an eBay account?
When can I get my hands on the cash from my eBay gift card?
To avoid confusion, eBay gift cards cannot be used to purchase bullion, coins, paper money, virtual currency, or coupons.']

title: ['eBay Motors Experience Brings Industry Products to Life at 2022 ... - Motor Sports Newswire', 'eBay UK Introduces Seller Protections For Upcoming Royal Mail ... - eSeller365', 'eBay Abandons Shopify App 5 Years after Launch - EcommerceBytes', 'eBay finds a brilliant way for you to forget Amazon - ZDNet', 'Can Relisting or Restocking Harm Visibility of eBay Listings? - EcommerceBytes', 'Insight: eBay data reveals consumer behaviour is focused on ... - Charged Retail', "Fake Kanye West 'White Lives Matter' shirts selling on eBay - New York Post"]
summary:
['New feature includes extreme performance,immersive ride-alongs, up-close buildsDIAMOND BAR, CA – October 6, 2022 – (Motor Sports NewsWire) – The 2022 SEMA Show will include a brand-new feature—the eBay Motors Experience, where attendees will be able to experience the industry’s products live, in action.
The eBay Motors Experience will consist of multiple activities taking place simultaneously.
“The eBay Motors Experience will be the center of the action at this year’s Show,” said Tom Gattuso, SEMA vice president of events.
Showgoers are going to feel the impact of the feature immediately when they arrive at the Show.”The eBay Motors Experience is open to all credentialed SEMA Showgoers during the event, Tuesday-Friday, Nov. 1-4.
About SEMA and the SEMA ShowThe SEMA Show is a trade show produced by the Specialty Equipment Market Association (SEMA), a nonprofit trade association founded in 1963.', 'eBay UK has today announced that they will be putting seller protections in place for the newly announced Royal Mail strikes that are taking part throughout October.
The strike action is now creeping closer and closer to peak holiday shopping times which could cause huge disruption for eCommerce businesses.
Don’t MisseBay has clearly taken note of that and as such put into place its well-established seller protections.
eBay UK Seller Protections Announcement RE Royal Mail Strike in October“Dear Sellers,The Communication Workers Union (CWU) at Royal Mail and Parcelforce has called on its members who collect, sort, and deliver parcels and mail to take strike action again throughout October on Thursday 13th, Thursday 20th, and Tuesday 25th October 2022.
If you buy and print your Royal Mail labels on eBay, you can easily switch to send with Evri, UPS, DPD and DHL on eBay delivery powered by Packlink.', 'eBay is pulling its app from the Shopify app store 5 years after launching it as an easy way for merchants on the Shopify platform to list their items on its marketplace.
News of the eBay app’s demise appeared on a backend page on ZenDesk on October 4 – it isn’t clear that eBay or Shopify proactively notified sellers of the change.
In the announcement on ZenDesk, titled, “On January 1, 2023, the eBay app on Shopify is scheduled to be discontinued,” eBay encouraged sellers to find another app to use if they wished to continue to post their Shopify-hosted items on eBay.
Check out the top-rated 3PP apps on the Shopify app store or these,” listing the following five third-party apps: Codisto, CedCommerce, inkFrog, Sellbrite, and Magnalister.
A seller using the handle CouchFrancois wrote:“Very disheartened to hear that eBay is dropping the eBay Shopify app.', "Here's howSo you're unreasonably excited to see whether you can buy something you don't really need for less than when you still didn't really need it.
Have you ever thought that Amazon isn't the only shopping game in town?
Have you ever wondered whether everything on Amazon isn't really so wonderful or even cheap?
One day, while rummaging around in an old storage room, the daughter discovers dad used to be quite good at photography.
The whole thing is marvelously performed, and a warming reminder that Amazon isn't everything.", 'Have you checked the visibility of your listings in search results on eBay and on Google to ensure your items are being shown to shoppers?
The seller, Therapydragon, explained that after they restock listings that ran out (leaving them with a quantity of "0"), the restocked listings fail to appear in eBay search results.
Hidden listings mean no sales means no revenue."
"There's also the issue of gaslighting sellers (intentional or otherwise) in letting them have active but hidden listings."
And do you periodically test your listings to see if they appear in eBay and Google search results?', 'Data from eBay Ads has revealed that consumers are looking for alternative ways to keep warm and save money this winter as energy bills and inflation continue to soar.
Insights from eBay Ads show that searches for these products typically ramp up in autumn – for example, in October 2021 searches for ‘heated blanket’ on ebay.co.uk increased 147% compared to the month before.
eBay Ads also revealed that shoppers are prioritising value for money this season, with almost a third (32%) putting deals and budget items at the top of their list.
One in every five shoppers (20%) are also focusing on searching for second-hand items as a means to save money.
“It’s clear that the rising cost-of-living is going to significantly impact consumer behaviour this winter, as people are looking to find new ways to make ends meet,” said eBay Ads UK general manager Upasana Gupta.', 'Online opportunists are cashing in on controversy by hawking fake versions of Kanye West’s now-notorious “White Lives Matter” shirts.
eBayKanye West and Candace Owens sport “White Lives Matter” shirts at Paris Fashion Week.
Interestingly, bonafide versions of the “White Lives Matter” tees are currently unavailable and West hasn’t divulged whether he’ll be hawking the authentic shirts in the future.
Black Lives Matter.
AFP via Getty ImagesPrior to that, the “Jesus Walks” singer had also taken potshots at the “Black Lives Matter” organization.']

title: ['Judge to lead EBay Motors Group new senior management team - AIM Group', '1962 Amazing Spider-Man Comic Makes eBay History - eBay Inc.', 'NYCC 2022: eBay Expands into Collectable Space - The Pop Insider', 'eBay: Top picks for updating your home sustainably and affordably - The Independent']
summary:
['EBay Motors Group and Motors.co.uk have appointed Barry Judge as chief executive.
Judge (LinkedIn profile) will be responsible for the company’s overall B2B and B2C strategy, including managing collaboration between Motors.co.uk and linked company Gumtree Motors.
He will aim to increase choice for car buyers and to expand commercial opportunities for car retailers, using the reach of EBay Motors Group.
Phill Jones (LinkedIn profile) takes up the position of chief operating officer, responsible for both commercial and operational teams, Lucy Tugby (LinkedIn profile) is appointed as marketing director, Katherine Cunliffe (LinkedIn profile) becomes product director and Gary Reck (LinkedIn profile) continues as chief technology officer.
Under licence from EBay, Gumtree Limited sell and manage the dealer subscription advertising for eBay.co.uk, sold through the dealer facing brand, EBay Motors Group, which launched under EBay ownership in January 2020 and includes Motors.co.uk, EBay Motors and Gumtree Motors marketplaces.', 'The Amazing Spider-Man may be a household name today, but in the early 1960s, Peter Parker was one of the newest masked superheroes in the Marvel Universe.
Created by Marvel Comics legend Stan Lee, Spider-Man made his first appearance in Amazing Fantasy #15 despite its publisher’s reservations.
Sales for Amazing Fantasy #15 comics proved to be one of Marvel’s most popular at the time, solidifying Spider-Man as one of the world’s most beloved superheroes for decades to come.
Like Spider-Man, Amazing Fantasy #15 has also achieved near-universal recognition, as it marks the first-ever appearance of the Amazing Spider-Man.
Though he has a few comics on inventory, Straka originally sourced his copy of the Amazing Fantasy #15 from a friend.', 'eBay is releasing an exclusive Shuri Funko Pop!
The Pop Insider spoke with Bob Means — director of trading cards at eBay —to learn more about the company’s newest ventures.
| Source: eBayPI: eBay recently made updates to its eBay vault, where trading card fans can buy and sell cards worth $350+ securely.
BM: The eBay vault is an exciting move forward for us.
We’re super excited about the vault right now, and again, we’re working on it with trading cards.', 'The dark green velvet makes it look particularly grand, and it’s also available in dark navy (£799, Ebay.co.uk) should you prefer.
So, if you’re looking for a contemporary way to display you’re favourite tapered candlesticks, this is the perfect option.
And thanks to Simba’s outlet on eBay, you can get the brand’s bestselling design for less.
A round mirror is a firm favourite, and this one on eBay is available in a full range of sizes, from 40cm to 80cm.
Similarly, if you’re looking for a new bed frame, turn to VonHaus’s frame (£64.99, Ebay.co.uk), which costs less than £70.']

title: ["eBay driving licence just doesn't cut it with Wiltshire Police - Swindon Advertiser", 'eBay Expands CPC Advertising One Year Later - EcommerceBytes', "eBay Inserted an Ad alongside a Seller's Photos in Their Listing - EcommerceBytes"]
summary:
['When the driver produced a driving licence, it was discovered that it was a homemade one which had been brought off eBay.
#RPU have another car being seized for no licence and insurance… to be fair that’s not strictly true, they did produce a licence, just a shame it was a home made one purchased off eBay!
Car stopped for a dodgy number plate.
Writing on social media, WiltsSpecOps said: “Car stopped for a dodgy number plate.
Vehicle seized in Swindon, the driver didn’t have a valid licence to drive in the UK #RPU #seized pic.twitter.com/zorL0J67iA — Wilts Specialist Ops (@WiltsSpecOps) October 9, 2022Without a driving licence, people cannot obtain an insurance policy making their cars illegal to drive.', 'eBay is now offering a “Quick Setup” feature for its CPC ads.
eBay launched Promoted Listings Advanced a year ago and, given the “beta” designation that remains, appears to still be in test mode.
Choose Quick setup and add your desired listings to the campaign.
eBay will take care of the rest of setup – organizing your listings into ad groups and selecting the suggested keywords, keyword match types and bids.
It also pitched the CPC ads as a way to grow sales during the holiday shopping season.', 'In a move that could be described as brazen, eBay inserted an ad for its eBay Vault right alongside a seller's photos on the listing page.
We viewed the ad on the seller's listing page.
The ad is in the form of a video (eBay now allows sellers to upload videos as well as photos).
"When I access the listing page, eBay has inserted a Video in between the 2 photos advertising the Vault Service.
When you buy an eligible card on eBay, it can be sent directly to the eBay vault at checkout.']

title: ['NVIDIA RTX 3090 Selling for Less than Half on eBay; AMD Radeon RX 6900 XT Goes for $669 on Newegg - Hardware Times', "Guns N' Roses Riot Chair Sells on eBay - Ultimate Classic Rock", 'Loose Ends after eBay Moves to Managed Payments - EcommerceBytes']
summary:
['Newegg and Amazon have listed the pricier RTX GPUs at a fraction of their MSRPs.
At launch, the RTX 3090 was officially priced at $1,499 but has dropped to $948 on Newegg, and resellers are offering them for as low as $700 (less than half its price).
A short while back, BestBuy had a brand new MSI GeForce RTX 3090 Gaming X Trio going for just $839, the cheapest of its kind, with a discount of 45%.
(phentermine375.net)Looking at Red Team’s top gun, the Radeon RX 6900 XT is now going for $699, roughly 34% less than its sticker price of $999.
As with the RTX 3090, MSI’s Gaming X Trio variant was sold for even less during a flash sale, but that listing’s long dead.', "A chair removed during the infamous Guns N’ Roses fan riot near St. Louis recently sold on eBay for $122.
“Thanks to the lame-ass security, I'm going home,” he said before leaving the audience to riot.
The band didn’t return to St. Louis until 2017.
“A friend grabbed a chair during the mayhem on the way out and put it in my car.
The sale of stolen property violates state, federal and international law, and we will work with law enforcement in any attempts to sell stolen property on eBay.”Even after three decades, it seems that Guns N’ Roses’ relationship with St. Louis still isn’t on the straight and narrow.", 'eBay sellers no longer receive funds from buyers into their PayPal accounts now that eBay rolled out Managed Payments.
But there is at least one loose end a year after eBay migrated to managing its own payment processing.
A seller raised the issue on the eBay discussion boards on Saturday:"I am looking to delete my PayPal account but the eBay PIP Insurance only pays out via PayPal.
eBay needs to have alternative payment methods for this and just add it back to your managed payments amount.
Are there other loose ends you've discovered where features or services require eBay sellers to have a PayPal account even though eBay now manages payment processing itself?']

title: ['Unreleased Rare Nintendo Power Glove Game Turns Up On eBay - Kotaku', 'Ex-eBay employee gets 1 year in prison for harassment scheme against Natick couple - Boston.com', 'SFLMaven Auctions on eBay Are a Huge Success - GlobeNewswire', 'Judge sentences ex-eBay employees for roles in harassment scheme - CBS News', 'Two Former eBay Employees Sentenced for Aggressive ... - Department of Justice']
summary:
['T wo unreleased NES games have recently appeared on eBay, and one of them in particular should be of huge interest to fans of the Nintendo Power Glove, and/or Donkey Kong Country developers Rare.
Buy for $72 Amazon AdvertisementWhile this particular version of the game—localised into English and published by Broberbund—is unreleased, we do at least know what this is.
AdvertisementThere weren’t many of those, with only two games ever being released with specific Power Glove support (one of them, Super Glove Ball, also having been developed by Rare).
Nobody in the public has ever seen or played this game, with no physical or digital dumps having ever made it out into the wild.
Punching rocks or turning keys etc.”That makes preservation of the game pretty damn important, which is why the Video Game History Foundation are trying to secure the funds needed to get hold of the cartridge.', 'Local Ex-eBay employee gets 1 year in prison for harassment scheme against Natick couple Another former employee, Stephanie Stockwell, 28, of Redwood City, California, was also sentenced for her role in the scheme, but avoided prison time.
Stephanie Stockwell, 28, of Redwood City, California, former manager of eBay’s Global Intelligence Center, was also sentenced on Tuesday for her role in the scheme, but avoided prison time.
Another eBay executive who pleaded guilty in the case, David Harville, was sentenced to two years in prison.
Authorities say eBay employees — at Baugh’s direction — sent anonymous harassing and sometimes threatening Twitter messages criticizing the newsletter’s coverage of eBay.
At one point, Baugh recruited Harville to go with him to Massachusetts to spy on the couple, authorities say.', "Our metaverse store is open and expected to have auctions in the future, so please check it out!
SFLMaven is a luxury jewelry company specializing in high-end fashion and lifestyle products on eBay and now in the Metaverse.
We offer two ways to shop with us: our online auction platform on eBay or our metaverse store.
SFLMaven is proud to announce that our Thursday night auction on eBay was a huge success!
FORWARD-LOOKING STATEMENTS: This press release may contain forward-looking statements, including management's view of SFLMaven Corp.'s future expectations, plans, and prospects.", 'BOSTON (CBS SF/AP) — A judge sentenced two former eBay Inc. employees Tuesday for their roles in a harassment scheme targeting creators of an online newsletter that included the delivery of live spiders, a bloody pig mask and other disturbing items to their home.
Stockwell and Popp reported to James Baugh, the former senior director of safety and security, who authorities say was the leader of the scheme.
Authorities say eBay employees — at Baugh's direction — sent anonymous harassing and sometimes threatening Twitter messages criticizing the newsletter's coverage of eBay.
They went to the couple's home in the hopes of installing a GPS tracker on their car but the garage was locked, so Harville bought tools with a plan to break into it, prosecutors say.
Prosecutors called Popp one of the "most culpable participants" in the scheme.', 'BOSTON – Two former employees of eBay, Inc. were sentenced today for their roles in a cyberstalking campaign targeting the editor and publisher of a newsletter that eBay executives viewed as critical of the company.
Co-conspirators and former eBay employees Philip Cooke, Brian Gilbert and Veronica Zea previously pleaded guilty for their roles in the conspiracy to cyberstalk the victims.
Between approximately Aug. 5, 2019 and Sept. 6, 2019, Stockwell, Popp and their co-conspirators at eBay agreed to engage in a harassment campaign targeting a husband and wife in Natick, Mass.
The harassment campaign arose from communications between those senior executives and Baugh, who was eBay’s senior security employee.
In August 2019, the defendants and their co-conspirators executed a three-part harassment campaign intended to intimidate the victims and to influence their reporting about eBay.']

title: ["Elon Musk's Burnt Hair Fragrance Listed At Up To $1,000 On eBay - InsideEVs", 'Ex-eBay manager gets 1 year in prison for harassing Natick couple - CBS Boston', 'Former eBay employees who harassed Natick couple sentenced in ... - MetroWest Daily News', 'eBay Motors Group - Highly commended Online Advertiser for Used ... - Car Dealer Magazine', 'Amazon Stole the World From eBay - Marketplace Pulse', 'Man selling Cold War bunker he bought on a whim off eBay - Lincolnshire Live', "Office manager barred for selling City firm's property on eBay - Law Gazette", 'Kentucky ex-eBay employee gets 1 year in prison for harassment scheme - Fox 56 News']
summary:
['Not long ago, Tesla and The Boring Company CEO Elon Musk – who has now added "Perfume Salesman" to his Twitter bio – teased a new fragrance coined "Burnt Hair."
Musk tweeted early this morning that he couldn't wait for the media to report that The Boring Company sold about $1,000,000 worth of the funny fragrance.
Merritt posted a link to The Boring Company shop for those who are interested in checking it out.
Musk also went on to tweet out jokes about Burnt Hair as sales were taking off.
Even though Burnt Hair appears to still be available, it seems people are already selling it on eBay for as much as $1,000.', "Stephanie Stockwell, 28, of Redwood City, California, former manager of eBay's Global Intelligence Center, was also sentenced on Tuesday for her role in the scheme, but avoided prison time.
Another eBay executive who pleaded guilty in the case, David Harville, was sentenced to two years in prison.
Authorities say eBay employees - at Baugh's direction - sent anonymous harassing and sometimes threatening Twitter messages criticizing the newsletter's coverage of eBay.
At one point, Baugh recruited Harville to go with him to Massachusetts to spy on the couple, authorities say.
Prosecutors did not seek prison time for Stockwell, describing her as among the least culpable.", "BOSTON — Two more former employees of eBay Inc. who were convicted of harassing a Natick couple over negative articles the couple wrote on their e-commerce website were sentenced Tuesday in U.S. District Court.
Young sentenced Stockwell, former manager of eBay's Global Intelligence Center, to two years of probation and one year of home confinement.
What to know about their prison sentenceFederal authorities said the group conducted a harassment campaign against Ina and David Steiner, of Natick.
Authorities said eBay was angry about negative articles written about the international auction website and that several employees then targeted the couple.
The Steiners' home address was included, as well as threats to visit the home and confront the couple.", 'With used car sales soaring, stock in short supply and prices going crazy – it’s never been more important to partner with a platform that gets your used cars in front of the right buyers.
As a highly commended firm, eBay Motors Group has worked tirelessly on providing a great user experience that engages with consumers and helps dealers sell cars.
Speaking to Car Dealer, Lucy Tugby, marketing director of eBay Motors Group, said: ‘We are delighted to be highly commended as Online Advertiser for Used Cars in the Car Dealer Power Awards 2022.
‘Being highly commended in the Car Dealer Power Awards 2022 will resonate with our dealer partners as further validation of eBay Motors Group’s track record of delivering a dynamic digital platform for their used car inventories.
‘We look forward to sharing news of forthcoming initiatives over the coming months which will further consolidate our position as an advertising ecosystem serving the changing needs of our dealer partners and their customers.’', 'Ten years ago, Amazon was more popular than eBay in only the U.S.
The color represents the more popular search term on Google during the year - countries marked in red had more searches for Amazon, and countries painted blue had more searches for eBay.
Shein, a fast-fashion marketplace, has recently been more popular than either Amazon or eBay in countries like Poland, Chile, and Brazil.
Amazon overtaking the map also only means it is more popular than eBay - in many countries, it is not the most popular shopping destination.
Amazon has won against eBay, but the fight now has a dozen new and much stronger players.', 'The subterranean Royal Observer Corps monitoring post lies beneath a field between the A16 London Road and Kenwick Hill and is accessed down a 14ft shaft.
The bunker near Louth is identical to more than 1,500 constructed around the UK from the late 1950s onwards, which were decommissioned in 1991.
Mark Colledge, 64, bought Louth monitoring post from a telecoms firms in 2003 for £12,500.
Mr Colledge, who lives in Saltburn-by-the-Sea, said: "I just saw it on eBay and bought it on a whim.
(Image: Google)Jim Demitriou, national valuer at SDL Property Auctions, who is handling the sale, said has never sold a nuclear bunker before.', 'A long-serving former office manager for a City firm has been barred after being found to have sold office equipment on market website eBay.
Glen Warwick, who worked for Faegre Drinker Biddle & Reath LLP in London’s Square Mile, sold the firm’s property on the site without his employer’s knowledge or consent.
Warwick, a non-solicitor, had worked for the firm and its predecessor business from 1994 until his resignation in October 2021.
Faegre Drinker took on its current form after a merger in 2020 of Faegre Baker Daniels and Drinker Biddle & Reath.
The firm has 1,200 lawyers, consultants and other professionals in 21 locations in the US, London and Shanghai.', 'Stephanie Stockwell, 28, of Redwood City, California, former manager of eBay’s Global Intelligence Center, was also sentenced on Tuesday for her role in the scheme, but avoided prison time.
Stockwell and Popp reported to James Baugh, the former senior director of safety and security, who authorities say was the leader of the scheme.
Another eBay executive who pleaded guilty in the case, David Harville, was sentenced to two years in prison.
Authorities say eBay employees — at Baugh’s direction — sent anonymous harassing and sometimes threatening Twitter messages criticizing the newsletter’s coverage of eBay.
Prosecutors did not seek prison time for Stockwell, describing her as among the least culpable.']

summary:
["AMD's all-new Ryzen 7000 series of processors have only just been released, but they have already been subject to some rather handy discounts thanks to a site-wide eBay discount code.
To be specific, NOW10 is the code to use to grab 10 percent off the entire range.
For reference, the Ryzen 7600X is available from Tech Next Day for £315 with the code, while the Ryzen 7700X (£390), Ryzen 7900X (£542), and the Ryzen 7950X (£708) come from Ebuyer's eBay store.
Firstly, let's take a look at the general motivations for grabbing one of these Ryzen 7000 series chips.
Not to worry though, as eBay also has handy discounts on motherboards that'll play nicely with the 7000 series.", '', 'Australians are seeking pre-loved wedding dresses for their big day, according to the latest eBay data.
In the past three months, sales of pre-loved beaded wedding dresses have grown by 186%, with pre-loved sleeveless wedding dresses growing by 171% and pre-loved lace wedding dresses by 61%.
According to the online marketplace, it’s not just bridal gowns dominating pre-loved wedding purchases.
Sales of pre-loved bow ties have quadrupled by 426%, while pre-loved veils have increased by 131%.
eBay Australia’s Brooke Eichhorn said as cost of living pressures continue, eBay is in a prime position to capitalise as consumers seek bargains on discretionary items.', 'This was the overwhelming consensus in Retail 2023, Retail Week’s annual report, which is now in its 11th year and was produced in association with Zebra Technologies for the second year running.
Retail 2023 provides a critical strategic outlook on the year ahead and insight into the conversations happening across UK boardrooms.
We spoke to 57 leaders across 54 retailers including Ikea, Waitrose, River Island and McDonald’s (see the full list below).
The data dilemmaIt was clear that data – specifically achieving a single view of both consumer and stock in real time – is holding retailers back.
Sizing up sustainable investment opportunitiesSustainability is another key focus for retail leaders.', "The mining era and GPU shortage might be over, but scalpers are still making chaos in the GPU market.
Scalpers have gone to town on Nvidia's GeForce RTX 4090, selling cards at well over MSRP on eBay (opens in new tab) — with some cards priced at $4000 and higher.
But what's especially crazy is that many of the RTX 4090 listings are pre-order listings.
The RTX 4090 went on sale yesterday — and sold out immediately, so desperate customers have no choice but to pay the scalped markup or wait for restocks.
But we suspect availability will take some time to return to normal for the RTX 4090, as well as the RTX 4080 16GB and the RTX 4080 12GB when they launch later this year.", 'Session expiredYour session has expired.
Please log in again.', '', 'Stephanie Popp, 34, of Louisville, Kentucky, eBay’s former senior manager of global intelligence, was sentenced to one year and one day in prison and two years of probation.
Stephanie Stockwell, 28, of Redwood City, California, the former manager of eBay’s global intelligence center, was sentenced to two years of probation, with one year to be served in home confinement.
The harassment included sending anonymous deliveries to the couples’ home — live spiders, a book on surviving the death of a spouse, a bloody pig mask, a fetal pig and a funeral wreath, pornography and more.
According to prosecutors, Stockwell, at Baugh’s direction, purchased a laptop to use in harassing the couple.
“The harassment also featured Craigslist posts inviting members of the public to experience sexual encounters at the victims’ home,” prosecutors said.', '']

['£100k to be made available for small businesses providing circular fashion technologyApplications open now until 3rd November 2022Leading marketplace eBay UK has today announced a partnership with the British Fashion Council to launch the Circular Fashion Innovator’s Fund, offering £100,000 in funding for small businesses specialising in circular fashion solutions.
About the British Fashion Council:The British Fashion Council (BFC) is a not-for-profit organisation set up in 1983 with the role to strengthen British fashion in the global economy as a leader in responsible, creative businesses.
The BFC promotes British fashion internationally and does so through fashion weeks, exhibitions and showcasing events.
Established by the British Fashion Council, led by a steering committee of industry experts, supported by advisory groups comprising industry, government and academia.
The British Fashion Council thanks the steering committee for their time and expertise in the ongoing development of the Institute of Positive Fashion.', 'Speakers from eBay, Amazon and TikTok all had advice for sellers and retailers trading through their channels on how to navigate a highly challenging retail environment.
Amazon EU marketplace director Shauli Ziv agreed, saying: “We know it’s a difficult time to operate.
And we really appreciate what you guys are doing to keep your business going and going after new growth opportunities.
So make-up does incredibly well, and so do fashion items.” Vintage furniture and refurbished technology are also doing well, says Lambell.
You know, with higher prices and slower speeds, that’s never going to be true.', 'F or many of my generation, buying at auction means stalking eBay listings.
I’ve already shared my love of markets, but I’ve found myself haunting auction houses, too.
They open their doors at a respectable 9am, and you can try before you buy, making a regrettable impulse purchase far less likely.
Then there’s the knowledge you’re buying from genuine experts, with full access to an item’s history and the receipts to prove it.
But hurry, that prize piece will be going, going, gone!', 'The Tillamook County Creamery Association (Tillamook) launched a one-of-a-kind virtual eBay charity auction to benefit the American Farmland Trust – a national non-profit dedicated to preserving farmland and helping farmers thrive.

title: ['Check Your eBay Bank Verification Microdeposits - EcommerceBytes']
summary:
['An online seller said eBay withdrew more from their bank account than it had deposited during a bank-verification review.
eBay recently explained its bank verification process, which confirmed the withdrawal amount should be the same as the deposit amount:"With this method, eBay will make two deposits in unique amounts to your checking account to verify that we have the correct bank account information for you.
The microdeposits will usually post to your bank account within 1-3 business days.
We'll withdraw the amount of the microdeposits from your bank account typically within 3 business days."
Other sellers have been reporting since the spring that they're unable to get eBay to verify their bank account at all through microdeposits.']

Put simply, for prices to fall, the supply of used cars needs to increase dramatically, and we expect that this is unlikely to happen.
“However, low consumer confidence means that these high prices do not necessarily mean the profit levels that many dealers benefited from post-lockdown.

For example, eBay displays the number of Positive, Neutral, and Negative feedback ratings for the past 1-month, 6-month, and 12-month periods.
On the new page the seller spotted, eBay only displayed the number of Positive, Neutral, and Negative feedback ratings for the past 12 months.
Buyers and sellers shouldn't panic - eBay has not made any announcement about making changes to the feedback profile page.
However, the original poster did say that a "Tell Us What You Think" box opened on the page asking for feedback.', 'The CPaSS platform will enable eBay sellers to access and compare multiple logistics options from different logistics service providers in various categories.
Upon completion of each order, the CPaSS platform will automatically save shipment information, making it simpler for seller to process orders for repeat customers.
Vidmay Naini, Regional General Manager for Southeast Asia and India at eBay said, "eBay has always supported sellers in exploring overseas markets.
The CPaSS one-stop shipping platform is tailored for sellers in the Asia Pacific region, allowing them to streamline resources, reduce time spent on logistics operations and focus on expanding their cross-border businesses.
We will continue to introduce new logistics solutions to the CPaSS platform with the aim of helping SMEs maximize cross-border e-commerce opportunities and achieve global success."', 'If your eyes are set on Black Friday 2022 for some extraordinary deals, then you’ll be happy to hear about eBay’s early Black Friday deals that are going on now.

In its Q3 2022 investor letter, Smead Value Fund mentioned eBay Inc. (NASDAQ:EBAY) and explained its insights for the company.
Our biggest detractors was dominated by eBay (NASDAQ:EBAY).
Story continuesIn August 2022, we also shared another hedge fund’s views on eBay Inc. (NASDAQ:EBAY) in another article.
You can find other investor letters from hedge funds and prominent investors on our hedge fund investor letters 2022 Q3 page.', 'CHARLOTTE, N.C.– Ebay has announced that is has banned Jeffrey Dahmer Halloween costumes from its site.
The company says the costumes violate its policy on violence and violent criminals.
Items that have been posted on Ebay include and orange jumpsuit, a mask and glasses that look like the ones worn by Dahmer.', '', 'Back in 2003, eBay and Nike partnered for a SB Dunk Low that became one of the most storied sneakers of all time.
The extremely limited drop spanned a mere three pairs — one of which was sold at auction for nearly $30,000 USD, another given to innovative Nike designer Sandy Bodecker and the last cut into four parts.
The latter pair has become the inspiration for the forthcoming eBay x Nike SB Dunk “Sandy Bodecker” which enlists transparent elements to mimic the four segments.
Thanks to @YankeeKicks, we now have a closer look at the eBay x Nike SB Dunk Low “Sandy Bodecker” both with and without socks.
Elsewhere in sneakers, Nike teases a four-part “Animal Instinct” collection.', 'Inter Milan have announced a partnership agreement with EBay for the 2022/23 season that will see the Italian soccer giants open a dedicated club shop on the ecommerce platform.
As the Serie A club’s new official marketplace, the Inter will launch an official store on EBay.
The agreement, which sees Inter follow city rivals AC Milan in inking a deal with the online retail giant, also includes several other activations and branding inventory at the San Siro.
“We’re thrilled to announce this new partnership with eBay which brings together two brands that are global leaders in their respective sectors,” said Inter’s chief executive Alessandro Antonello.
Gabriele Gravina, president of the FIGC, said: “It is an honour for the federation and for the Italian women’s football movement to have such a recognised and recognisable international brand as a teammate.”', '']

About iPhone 12 Pro MaxYou might think the iPhone 12 Pro Max has been superseded, but it still has plenty to offer in 2022.", 'A month after its release, Netflix’s Ryan Murphy-produced DAHMER – Monster: The Jeffrey Dahmer Story remains one of the most talked about television shows of the fall.
Ever since the first trailer dropped, reactions to the true-crime series have been wildly mixed.

Commission is taken from your account monthly.

How it works It’s Zara galore on Vinted, where there are no auctions — you', 'CNN —Netflix’s hit series “Monster: The Jeffrey Dahmer Story” has sparked renewed interest in the notorious serial killer just in time for Halloween season, but at least one online retailer is shutting down sales of Dahmer costumes.
A spokesperson for eBay confirmed to CNN in an email listings described as Jeffrey Dahmer costumes are banned on the platform and are being removed under its “Violence and Violent Criminal Policy.
Dahmer murdered and dismembered seventeen men and boys, most of whom were Black, in Wisconsin between 1978 and 1991.
As of Saturday afternoon, searching “Jeffrey Dahmer costume” on eBay still brings up some listings, like clear glasses resembling those worn by the real-life Dahmer and Peters playing Dahmer in “Monster.” And other online retailers like Etsy also appear to be selling kits of blonde wigs, clear glasses, and orange jumpsuits labeled as Jeffrey Dahmer costumes.
Gymnast Simone Biles has also spoken out against the costumes, writing, “put the jeffrey dahmer costumes back in the closet,” on Twitter last week.']

Our free email updates are the best way to get headlines direct to your inboxA rare 50p coin has been sold on eBay for 330 times its face value – and there are thousands more of them in circulation.
The special coin was released in 2009 to mark 250 years since the opening of Kew Gardens.
The coin sold on eBay, listed as "Fifty Pence 50p 2009 - Kew Gardens Genuine", for a staggering £165 – plus £1.70 postage and packaging – after a 32-way bidding war, reports the Echo.
The reissued version, celebrating 50 years of the 50p coin, generally doesn't sell for as much – but could still fetch between £70 and £80 on eBay.', "In the latest chapter in the creative platform ‘Inspired by an eBay Story’, ‘World of Passions’ transports us into the world of eBay customers' passions.

Zara Pre-Owned will be an integrated platform available through Zara stores, Zara.com and the retailer’s mobile app.

So when it came time last winter to shovel my driveway and walkways, I was naive enough to think I could handle it all with just a shovel and a can-do attitude.
After seeing me struggle, my neighbors brought their snowblower over and gave me a much-needed hand.
I won't do another winter without one and you don't have to either, with these deals I found on Amazon and eBay.", 'Original Story: There’s a crazy good deal going on the Nintendo Switch OLED Model Splatoon 3 Edition right now, but you’ll need to be an eBay Plus member to get it.

A spokesperson for the company told CNN that a Dahmer costume violates its Violence and Violent Criminal Policy.
“Listings that promote or glorify violence or violent acts, or are associated with individuals who are notorious for committing violent acts, are not allowed," the spokesperson said.
People have taken a renewed interest in Dahmer following the release of the Netflix series “Monster: The Jeffrey Dahmer Story."
He was serving 15 consecutive life sentences when he was killed in 1994 by another inmate in prison.', '', 'With Halloween fast approaching, online sales platform eBay has banned Jeffrey Dahmer costumes.
Back in the spotlight following a recent Netflix series, serial killer Jeffrey Dahmer has obviously inspired some Halloween costume ideas.
Between controversy and unhealthy fascination, the true-crime story has given some in the US ideas for their Halloween costumes.
Yet, according to a statement made by an eBay spokesperson to Mashable, Jeffrey Dahmer-inspired costumes have always been banned on the platform.
Interest in Jeffrey Dahmer has only been amplified by the ratings success of Ryan Murphy and Ian Brennan’s Netflix miniseries.', 'The judge ordered that Fugatt pay a sum of £31,479 as restoration to his former employer by the end of the week.
The court heard this sum was considered acceptable by the business’s owner, who Judge Pawson described as being “extremely phlegmatic”.
Judge Pawson said the offender was fortunate to have supportive parents.
He told Fugatt: “They care for you and they want right to be done.
Before letting the defendant leave the dock the judge told him he hoped he had learnt his lesson and he would repay the support he had received from his parents.', '“The old adage ‘what goes up must come down’ doesn’t seem to apply to used cars, at least not for the time being.
The unprecedented increase in average used car values that we’ve seen in the last 12 months shows no sign of a major reversal.
Put simply, for prices to fall, the supply of used cars needs to increase dramatically, and we expect that this is unlikely to happen.
“This still translates into a significant volume of used car transactions, as many purchase decisions are led by necessity to change.
“While there is no doubt the UK’s used car market faces challenges in quarter four and into 2023, Glass’s does not expect a crash in used car values.']

['Assistant Editor, MTL BlogMike Chaar is a writer by day and reality TV binge-watcher by night.
When he’s not cracking down on recalls, celeb news and discovering the best of the best foodie spots across Montreal, he can be found indulging in his love for new cuisines, reading and music, with Mariah Carey being his ultimate diva.', 'Female entrepreneurs in the U.S. are using online marketplaces like eBay to build their business and reach international customers, according to a new eBay report.
Released in honor of National Women’s Small Business Month, the 2022 U.S. Women-Owned Small Online Business Export Report shows how eBay is helping even the smallest women-owned businesses and microentrepreneurs access global markets.
The report found that 97% of U.S. small businesses owned by women on eBay are exporters, compared to less than 1% of traditional businesses.
In addition, U.S. women-owned eBay small businesses reach an average of 15 international markets — nearly four times that of traditional businesses.
eBay-enabled small businesses owned by women even outperform eBay small businesses overall in reaching international buyers.', 'With Christmas just around the corner, eBay Australia is helping Aussie parents wrap their shopping up early with the release of its 2022 hottest Christmas toys list alongside a mega toy sale that will run from November 1-10.e-commerce giant eBay’s data-backed top toys list will make sure everyone sleighs their gift-giving with classic toys, affordability and sustainability trending.
eBay research has shown classic toys such as games and puzzles continue to be a staple but with a modern twist.
Toys under $50 are being snapped up by parents keen to get the jump on their Christmas shopping, with sales of the TikTok-viral Its Bubbles Light Bubble Blaster up a whopping 1450 per cent.
Amid its top toy suggestions, eBay Australia is holding a massive toy sale from November 1 to 10, offering a mega 20 per cent off selected toys with an additional 5 per cent off selected toys when checking out with Afterpay.
eBay Australia’s 2022 Christmas trending toys list', "Dear Ina,I thought maybe all the eBay Sellers should be aware of some shipping problems they may not have caught.
If a Seller uses the eBay Standard International Shipping Label, the tracking number is not trackable through USPS, only through eBay.
This has caused problems with a few Buyers previous as the Buyers do not understand that they can track the item through their My eBay page.
Question: With all the fees we pay, why is it my responsibility to educate Buyers on how to use eBay?
As a result of this problem with eBay's shipping system (as well as others), I will no longer be using the eBay non-traceable shipping labels or eBay shipping as well, as the savings you get is not worth it.", 'This story originally appeared on MarketBeatGlobal digital marketplace platform eBay (NASDAQ: EBAY) stock has fallen (-43.7%) for 2022. eBay is commonly known as the world’s largest auction marketplace for every sort of item you can imagine.
eBay appears to be aiming for Whatnot and competitors with its eBay Live platform currently still in beta.
Attractive pullback levels sit at the $36.47 fib, $35.04 fib, $33.11 fib, $31.76 fib, $30.40 fib, $28.47 fib, and the $27.32 fib level.
eBay Live centers around eBay sellers having the ability to livestream their auctions in addition to listing them on the site.
Q2 2022 EarningsOn Aug. 23, 2022, eBay released its fiscal second-quarter 2022 results for the quarter ending June 2022.', 'The Drum Media Summit 2022 has tapped agenda-setting CMOs from global brands including Mastercard, Hyundai and McDonald’s.

Set on accelerating the car brand’s social strategy, TikTok will be a key focus, with Hyundai finding unexpected success on the platform.
In 2022 eBay ramped up its TV strategy to become Love Island’s first non-fast fashion sponsor.
Eve Williams, chief marketing officer for eBay UK, reveals all on the AdFab show on November 2.']

['', 'This dedication to giving investors a trading advantage led to the creation of our proven Zacks Rank stock-rating system.
Zacks Rank stock-rating system returns are computed monthly based on the beginning of the month and end of the month Zacks Rank stock prices plus any dividends received during that particular month.
A simple, equally-weighted average return of all Zacks Rank stocks is calculated to determine the monthly return.
Only Zacks Rank stocks included in Zacks hypothetical portfolios at the beginning of each month are included in the return calculations.
Certain Zacks Rank stocks for which no month-end price was available, pricing information was not collected, or for certain other reasons have been excluded from these return calculations.', 'If the team trusts each other and are aligned on the vision and goals, then once the team decides on a particular point, they will commit and own the decision — even if they entered the room with a different opinion to begin with.', '', '“By joining forces with TCGplayer, eBay has even more ways to connect brick-and-mortar hobbyists and sellers with passionate collectors around the world,” said Dawn Block, VP of Collectibles at eBay.
Today, TCGplayer employs more than 600 team members, serving millions of hobbyist buyers, and tens of thousands of online sellers and brick-and-mortar retailers through the TCGplayer Marketplace and its Authentication Center.
A purpose-driven company, TCGplayer prides itself on creating a culture that fosters camaraderie, embraces diversity and exudes passion.

In addition to knowing about insider transactions going on, it's beneficial to identify the risks facing eBay.", 'Insurance firm Protect Your Bubble compared the average eBay selling price of dozens of popular retro phones and found a clear winner when it comes to the most profitable.

The second top grossing phone was the Nokia 2100 and 15 of the top 20 were Nokia models.', 'At any given point, eBay has more than a lakh registered sellers from India engaging in cross-border trade and export, Pavan Ponnappa, Head, Categories, Acquisition & Marketing at eBay India told businessline.
He added that out of these lakh registered sellers, transacting sellers would be in the thousands as many sellers export seasonal products, so they might sell a lot in one quarter and not do many transactions in other months.
eBay India has been focusing on cross-border trade, specifically export for the past 3-4 years, as the company exited all other services it used to offer in India.
Following the acquisition of eBay India by Flipkart, eBay’s consumer-facing marketplace offering was shut down in 2018.
For eBay, it is not just about bringing more sellers but bringing more high-quality supply even if it is from fewer sellers.', 'An energy drink in Asda has become so popular that shoppers are buying bottles of it to flog online.

One Asda worker assured shoppers that the drinks are still being sold despite Londoners' difficulties in finding them, she said: "They sell out extremely fast in Asda.', "The sale has something for children of every age – and maybe even some of the big kids, too!

With songs, dance moves and more than 55 phrases, Dance & Play Bluey is sure to keep your kids entertained for hours on end.
And when the kids have finally had enough of Dance Mode, Dance & Play Bluey is made out of soft, plush fabric, too.
Dance & Play Bluey is the perfect playroom companion for any child who's a fan of the wonderful cartoon series."]

Monies raised have been committed to the cancer research work of the T. J. Martell Foundation for Cancer, AIDS and Leukemia Research, the gastric cancer research unit of the M.D.
Anderson Cancer Center in Houston, where Ronnie was treated for gastric cancer during the last six months of his life, and other cancer research projects.', 'As eBay transitions to a new shipping program, there's a sign that things could go wrong for unsuspecting sellers.
eBay said it would be migrating sellers who had opted in to its Global Shipping Program into its brand new eBay International Shipping program (EIS).
But in a post on the eBay discussion boards, a seller said that despite the fact they had their settings set to ship domestically only, eBay entered them into its eBay International Shipping.
"Unbeknownst to us eBay made a change enrolling us (and I'm assuming everyone else) into the "eBay International Shipping" program making our listings available for sale internationally.
The response from eBay's shipping team relayed by an eBay moderator: "Sellers are being ramped into the new international shipping program in phases.', 'The Motley Fool TakeIf you want to defend against inflation, consider investing in inflation-resistant eBay.
As prices rise on its platform due to inflation, eBay is poised to increase its revenue per transaction without necessarily increasing its costs.
With its robust cash flow, eBay has focused on creating shareholder value through share repurchases and a growing dividend.
(The Motley Fool has recommended eBay stock and options.)
If environmental, social and governance concerns matter to you, you might look up the ESG score of a stock you’re thinking of buying.']

['', 'Sell on Poshmark, Facebook Marketplace or eBay?
You Might Have To Pay More in Taxesijeab / Getty Images/iStockphotoIn recent years, resale sites like Poshmark, eBay and Facebook Marketplace have become hugely attractive to buyers looking for good bargains and hard-to-find collectibles.
But, if you are one of those sellers, here’s a warning: You might owe more in taxes in 2023.
There’s the Cut Red Tape for Online Sales Act, which aims to bring the annual sales threshold to $5,000.
More: 9 Bills You Should Never Put on AutopayMake Your Money WorkRepublican lawmakers are pushing three bills which would see the original $20,000 annual sales threshold reinstated.', 'eBay Inc. (Nasdaq: EBAY) (the “Company” or “eBay”) announced today the pricing of a $1,150,000,000 underwritten public offering of its senior unsecured notes, consisting of $425,000,000 of 5.900% Notes due 2025 (the “2025 Notes”), $300,000,000 of 5.950% Notes due 2027 (the “2027 Notes”) and $425,000,000 of 6.300% Notes due 2032 (the “2032 Notes”).
The offering is expected to close on November 22, 2022, subject to the satisfaction of customary closing conditions.
About eBayeBay Inc. (Nasdaq: EBAY) is a global commerce leader that connects people and builds communities to create economic opportunity for all.
In 2021, eBay enabled over $87 billion of gross merchandise volume.
These statements include, but are not limited to, statements regarding the planned closing of and expected use of proceeds from the company’s senior unsecured notes offering as described above.', 'DICK’S Sporting Goods is getting into the online marketplace space with a strategic investment in sports gear resale marketplace SidelineSwap.
The expanded partnership enables SidelineSwap to further enhance its online marketplace and technology while DICK’S Sporting Goods can bring more circular shopping experiences to its customers.
DICK’S Sporting Goods Investment Follows Retail TrendAnd with more consumers interested in buying pre-owned goods, retailers are increasingly seeking solutions to take advantage of the growth in these consumers.
SidelineSwap’s expanded partnership with DICK’s Sporting Goods is a “true win-win-win,” said Doug Smith, VP of Partnerships at SidelineSwap.
Through this partnership, DICK’S Sporting Goods has the opportunity to increase foot traffic and sales while embracing sustainability.', 'I know the holiday season is all about shopping for others, and everyone says it’s better to give than receive.
If you feel like you deserve the ultimate treat this holiday season, I highly recommend checking out the luxury handbag selection over at eBay.
When you’re shopping for luxury goods on eBay, keep a special eye out for items that have the Authenticity Guarantee checkmark.
The luxury selection at eBay is pretty unreal these days, so don’t wait to splurge on something nice for yourself.
Chanel HandbagsCredit: eBayGucci HandbagsCredit: eBayLouis Vuitton HandbagsCredit: eBayIf you liked this story, check out Yankee Candle’s 40% off holiday sale.']

['', "If you live in Ulster County and you received one of the famous 'I Voted' stickers then you might want to hang on to it because people all around the country are after them and are willing to pay top dollar.
Do you remember the sticker that shocked the Hudson Valley a few months ago?
Hudson Rowan, the teenager who entered a local graphic design contest quickly became the winner and won the prize of having his design as Ulster County's 'I Voted' sticker on election night.
A listing on eBay shows that a New York resident sold just one of these stickers sold for $40.00 plus shipping costs.
7 Most Violent Streets in Kingston, New York Violent Streets in Kingston, New York", "CNN —Two veterinarians driving around the world in an ambulance with their dog in tow might sound like the premise of a movie.
In traffic, everyone’s looking at you.”Ambulance challengeUK couple Lawrence Dodi and Rachel Nixon are attempting to set the Guinness World Record for the 'Longest Journey in an Ambulance'.
“The initial plan wasn’t to buy an ambulance or try to set a world record or anything like that,” explains Dodi.
When she discovered that no one seemed to have formally attempted this in an ambulance, the couple contacted Guinness World Record to ask if they could give it a try.
Dodi and Nixon say they’ve both lost colleagues and friends in the industry to suicide and are keen to raise awareness on this issue.", 'The cost of shipping FedEx packages to residential addresses through eBay’s shipping program actually dropped, the marketplace announced on Tuesday.
According to the FedEx Ground website:FedEx Ground delivers packages 150 lbs.
FedEx Home Delivery, which is part of the FedEx Ground network, delivers packages 150 lbs.
Another issue worth pointing out: sellers have chronically complained that eBay underquotes the cost of FedEx, leaving sellers with an unexpected bill after delivery.
Maybe you could mention this in an upcoming newsletter so sellers can check their actual charges (the eBay quoted cost remains under “shipping charges” but the actual charges show up under all transactions).', 'Today’s episode reviews some of the hottest players in the NBA and their card values that could continue to rise – including the return of Darius Garland, Zion Williamson, and Jamal Murray!
Gary also goes over some timely advice for investors looking to sell or unload cards on eBay and how to make your sales listings stand out.
Finally, there are certain players and teams that are dominating the news for all the wrong reasons.', 'articleCenter fielders Julio Rodríguez of the Seattle Mariners and Michael Harris II of the Atlanta Braves were chosen rookies of the year by Baseball Digest and eBay.
Rodríguez won the American League award Tuesday after hitting .284 with 28 home runs and 75 RBIs this season to help Seattle earn its first playoff berth since 2001.
Harris took the NL honor after making his major league debut May 28 and batting .297 with 19 homers and 64 RBIs for the NL East champion Braves.
ATLANTA, GA - OCTOBER 11: Michael Harris II #23 of the Atlanta Braves is introduced before game one of the National League Division Series against the Philadelphia Phillies at Truist Park on October 11, 2022 in Atlanta, Georgia.
Rodríguez and Harris, both 21, are among the three finalists in their respective leagues for the Rookie of the Year awards to be announced Monday by the Baseball Writers’ Association of America.', 'PEOPLE have been paying big money for older, discontinued gadgets on eBay – and you may have some of these in your home.
Discontinued tech items can either fall into an abyss of obsolescence – or they can sell for a mini-fortune online.
4 Discontinued tech items can either fall can sell for a mini-fortune online Credit: Nintendo"Old tech is finding an audience of memorabilia-collector-minded people," sound engineer and old-tech guru David Frangioni told RD.
Here are some of the best-selling old tech gadgets you need to list on eBay ASAP.
And while gaming systems have come a long way since then, the Nintendo 64 still has a major nostalgic appeal for collectors.']

This is perfect for attorneys licensed in multiple jurisdictions or for attorneys that have fulfilled their CLE requirement but need to access resourceful information for their practice areas.
View NowTeam Accounts Our Team Account subscription service is for legal teams of four or more attorneys.
Each attorney is granted unlimited access to high quality, on-demand premium content from well-respected faculty in the legal industry along with administrative access to easily manage CLE for the entire team.', 'RE-SELLING books on Amazon could be a great side hustle to help you earn thousands per month.
And in this video, he gives a brief overview of his process on how he now earns more than $30,000 per month.
How it works"Learning how to sell on Amazon changed my life," he said.
Initially, he started small, finding items for sale in person and turning them around on the internet as fast as he could.
To start this side hustle, keep in mind that you'll need an Amazon seller account.', 'Online marketplace eBay, which has over 20 million active users in the UK, has appointed Manchester’s Citypress to handle its integrated corporate communications.
From December, Citypress will join eBay’s UK agency roster which also includes Weber Shandwick on consumer PR, Launch on crisis & issues, Portland on public affairs and Coldr on DE&I.
Fergus Campbell, head of corporate communications for eBay UK, said: “Citypress demonstrated deep sector expertise, strategic insight and the creative flair needed to help us build even more powerful and authentic corporate communications campaigns.
We value their national scale and regional presence, which will help us build our reputation and showcase the social, environmental and economic benefits we create to an even wider audience.”Martin Currie, managing director at Citypress, said: “eBay is one of the world’s most powerful and best loved brands.
Used by almost every household in the country, eBay creates opportunities for countless British entrepreneurs, unlocks the potential of disadvantaged communities, and powers a more sustainable, circular economy.', 'COMICS RELEASING ON 11/9Specs #1We sold 15 copies of Cover A.

title: ['eBay predicts shoppers will ditch buying new products this Black ... - eBay Inc.', "Tried & trusted — how eBay's Authenticity Guarantee is transforming ... - WatchPro USA", "eBay Bug Resets Sellers' Listings to Zero Views - EcommerceBytes", "eBay and Tasha Ghouri launch new 'Store of Pre-Loved Sparkle ... - Charged Retail"]
summary:
['Today, eBay predicts that on Christmas morning the nation will wake up to pre-loved and refurbished presents, as shoppers turn away from new products this Black Friday in a bid to save money.
New research from eBay UK finds 52% of people will be shopping for second-hand or refurbished products this festive season, with saving money as the top incentive (56%) for changing their shopping preferences*.
Following its pre-loved fashion sponsorship of Love Island earlier this summer, eBay is continuing to demonstrate its commitment to driving better shopping habits with a new approach to Black Friday.
Customers can expect refurbished items like laptops, phones, vacuum cleaners and furniture up for grabs, alongside deals on pre-loved fashion from top brands.
Murray Lambell, General Manager of eBay UK said: “In its current form Black Friday is broken, but it’s not too late to make it relevant for today’s consumer.', '', 'Sellers woke up this morning to find their listings had zero views, despite them having views yesterday.
One seller who reported the problem early Thursday morning on the eBay discussion boards wondered if their listings were showing up to buyers.
“View counts are all now Zero, even those with a non-zero Watch count.
If you click the “0” and the chart loads, you will see the actual views, but that’s IF the chart loads, which it sometimes is not.
One seller suggested the following work around: “Temp workaround for the Ebay app.', 'eBay pre-loved ambassador Tasha Ghouri has launched her new ‘Store of Pre-Loved Sparkle’ on the online marketplace, to encourage shoppers to buy second-hand this festive season, while also tackling the issue of sequin waste.
In addition, 52% of UK shoppers are planning on shopping second-hand this festive season and 59% hope to receive a pre-loved present rather than something new.
The edit is made up of over 100 items, including pre-loved sequin dresses, as ‘good as new’ professionally refurbished tech and pre-loved luxury handbags and watches that come with an Authenticity Guarantee.
“There is a misconception that pre-loved is dull which is why I’m especially excited to have worked on this show-stopping edit with eBay.
“The unique range in Tasha’s ‘Store of Pre-Loved Sparkle’ also promotes more conscious purchasing beyond just the price point – whether it’s tackling waste by opting for preloved sequins, or choosing to gift refurbished over new tech.']

title: ['Lost and found: how two dead giant bees on eBay sparked the hunt to find one alive - The Guardian', 'TCGplayer now operates under the ownership of eBay - The Central New York Business Journal', 'Best Black Friday eBay voucher code: Save 20% - Mashable', "Walker gambling addict who sold work tools worth around £16k on eBay caught in 'sting' - Chronicle Live"]
summary:
['Wallace’s giant bee (Megachile pluto) is certainly a bee-hemoth.
The idea of finding Wallace’s giant bee was given fresh hope when researchers found a specimen in a Dutch museum that had been collected in 1991, and two more dead specimens went up for sale on eBay.
A female giant bee, collected on Bacan, sold to a private collector for about $9,100 (£8,100).
Bolt was able to photograph Wallace’s giant bee on its nest on a tree trunk, thought to be the only image of the bee in the wild that exists.
They concluded this was a giant bee.”Bolt was able to photograph Wallace’s giant bee alive in the wild for the first time.', 'eBay Inc. (NASDAQ: EBAY), a San Jose, California–based e-commerce company, has formally completed its acquisition of Syracuse’s TCGplayer in a deal valued at about $295 million.
TCGplayer, which operates at 440 S. Warren St. in Syracuse, is a marketplace for collectible-card game enthusiasts and will continue operating independently once the deal closes.
(PHOTO CREDIT: ZOEYADVERTISING.COM)SYRACUSE — Syracuse’s TCGplayer is now operating under the ownership of eBay Inc. (NASDAQ: EBAY), which announced the completion of the acquisition on Oct. 31.
“By joining forces with TCGplayer, eBay has even more ways to connect brick-and-mortar hobbyists and sellers with passionate collectors around the world,” Dawn Block, VP of collectibles at eBay, said.
TCGplayer employs more than 600 people, serving millions of hobbyist buyers, and tens of thousands of online sellers and brick-and-mortar retailers through the TCGplayer Marketplace and its authentication center.', "SAVE 20%: There's no need to compromise with Refurbished on eBay.
Save 20% on the already discounted items in eBay's refurbished store with the early Black Friday code BAG20OFF(opens in a new tab).
We're always waxing lyrical about refurbished products, but we're not going to stop until the message gets across to all you shoppers out there.
You can now save 20% on the already discounted items in eBay's refurbished store with the early Black Friday code BAG20OFF(opens in a new tab).
Save an extra 20% in eBay's refurbished store with the Black Friday code BAG20OFF(opens in a new tab).", 'The 61-year-old would take photographs of the tools at his workplace, and was caught after a fellow employee recognised the equipment for sale on eBay.
After being caught, Pattinson resigned from his job, stating he suffered from a gambling addiction and was in debt.
Mr Pallister said that some employees of the company were also part of a Whatsapp group where they would purchase tools from eBay.
Mr Pallister said: "The employee then reported it to management and the defendant was suspended with pay pending an investigation."
The court heard that Pattinson later resigned from his job, detailing a "gambling addiction" and debt as being the reason in a letter.']

title: ['eBay Sued over Insurance Claim for Civil Cyberstalking Lawsuit - EcommerceBytes', '‘Tenner on eBay’ – Fans all say same thing as New Zealand handed bizarre rugby World Cup trophy after beati... - The Sun', 'eBay Touts Sales Tax Savings in Using Its Trading Card Vault - EcommerceBytes']
summary:
['ACE said eBay requested coverage for the Civil Action on August 11, 2021.
ACE also said it agreed in April to investigate the Civil Action for eBay, Devin Wenig (eBay's former CEO), and Steve Wymer (eBay's former Chief Communications Officer), subject to a full reservation of rights.
In Friday's court filing, ACE said its umbrella policies do not cover the civil action.
"In the eBay PowerPoint Deck, eBay acknowledged "the seriousness of the misconduct and the company's responsibility."
ACE stated in Friday's filing: "A binding declaration determining the rights and obligations of ACE and eBay, Wenig, and Wymer under the ACE Umbrella Policies with respect to the Civil Action is necessary, will resolve the parties' disagreement, and will facilitate any settlement efforts in the Civil Action."', 'NEW Zealand beat England to lift the rugby World Cup - but fans claimed the small trophy looked like it could be bought on "eBay for a tenner".
New Zealand's women's rugby team beat England 34-31, ending the Red Roses' 30-Test winning streak.
The Women’s Rugby World Cup deserves a better trophy than that.
A third tweeted: "That rugby World Cup trophy…awful!!!
PLAY OUR DREAM TEAM WORLD CUP FANTASY FOOTBALL GAME TO WIN A SHARE OF £50kThe win crowned New Zealand six-time world champions in their own back yard at Eden Park.', 'eBay is cleverly appealing to collectors’ desire to save money by touting an advantage to using its trading card “vault.” In a marketing email eBay sent this week, it stated: “Shop vault-eligible cards: No sales tax when you store them in our secure facility.”The vault is a physical building where eBay stores collectible trading cards for buyers and sellers.
It’s part of eBay’s focus category strategy, aka vertical strategy, which preceded current CEO Jamie Iannone’s arrival.
In addition to launching the eBay Vault (which copied other companies’ vault offerings such as PWCC), eBay also launched authentication services in Trading Cards and other categories.
This week’s email carried the subject line, “Shop top cards and send them straight to the eBay vault.” It linked to Vault listings, stated the benefits of using the Vault, and linked to a YouTube playlist featuring videos about the trading card vault.
In Episode 1 of the video series “Loading the eBay Vault,” four collectors spoke about their collections.']
