title: ['eBay to only promote refurbished and pre-loved deals this Black ... - Retail Gazette', 'Go Bid Or Go Home: NECKFACE Talks Special ebay Auction Of His Nike SB Dunk Low - Sneaker News', 'Aldi shoppers fume as sold out air fryer appears on eBay for double the price - Express', 'eBay Seller Seeks Help in Opting Out of Global Shipping Program - EcommerceBytes', 'Reader Says eBay Change May Deter Buyer Feedback - EcommerceBytes', 'This Gen Z Seller Turned a $1 Book Into a Thriving eBay Business - eBay Inc.', 'eBay accepts luxury trade-ins at New York pop-up - Chain Store Age']
summary:
['New research by the pair revealed that UK shoppers could be looking to make pre-loved and refurbished purchases instead of new products for the upcoming discount shopping day next week.
To further drive this change, the marketplace will only be promoting refurbished and pre-loved deals for this year’s Black Friday across all of its marketing content.
In the report, Ebay found 52% of people said they would be shopping for secondhand or refurbished products during the festive season, with saving money as the top incentive for changing their shopping habits.
The online marketplace giant predicted that consumers are intending to spend over £100 less on average than last year on Black Friday, as a nation saving £8 billion per year.
eBay UK general manager Murray Lambell said: “In its current form Black Friday is broken, but it’s not too late to make it relevant for today’s consumer.', 'Segueing into the ebay stuff, as of earlier this afternoon, those four [NECKFACE Nike SB] pairs have over 270 bids.
Taking it to the next level – that’s what I’m all about.
Well, first of all, you go to a skatepark and, just you going there, you’re instantly down with the crew.
And I have no doubt in my mind that that’s what’s gonna happen here.
So anywhere we build these things, people are gonna travel to go skate ’em.', 'Aldi launched its own version of the popular Ninja air fryer for £89.99Aldi shoppers who failed to get their hands on the supermarket's Ninja-style air fryer have been left fuming after the sold-out item appeared on eBay for more than double the original price.
Many hopefuls walked away empty-handed after queuing up for the Ambiano dual air fryer.
The SpecialBuy item is said to be a dupe of the popular Ninja Dual Air Fryer while being £140 cheaper than the original.
One Aldi shopper claimed he had to be escorted to his car by supermarket staff after he purchased the last remaining air fryer at his local store.
Jamie Crossely wrote in the Extreme Couponing and Bargains UK group: "Managed to get my Aldi air fryer only one in my store was first in queue at 8am.', 'Dear Ina,I recently read your article on EcommerceBytes: " Beware Migration to New eBay Shipping Program " and wondered if you would be able to help me.
We have received a VERO/Copyright issue stemming from GSP auto-enrolling us.
Since January we have opted out no fewer that 10 times and eBay simply throws us back in, thus causing listings to appear in the USA and therefore causing a copyright breach.
Is there any thing that eBay has published or a statement where they have explained this technical issue that you would be able to direct me to?
Sellers are getting the blame for something we have not done and didn't realise was happening.', "Dear Ina,I just noticed today the Purchase History page no longer shows whether you've left feedback to the seller or if the seller has left feedback for the buyer.
After opening a purchase, I'll leave feedback.
Then I'll keep that item on the purchase page until the seller has left feedback.
I like to keep track of whether a seller has left feedback or not so I can send a reminder (for a guaranteed positive feedback).
Now there's no way to keep track of this unless you sort through your feedback page - very inefficient.", 'Jude Lugo wasn’t expecting much when he bought a nutrition book from the dollar store with money he received for his 13th birthday.
But when he got the notification that he’d sold his $1 book for $8, Jude knew he had unlocked a lifelong hobby.
Today, the Dallas-based student manages his eBay store, J&L Making a Difference, with his mom while studying business as a sophomore at Southern Methodist University.
As someone who is now able to pursue entrepreneurship at a college-level, Jude is determined to make an impact through his eBay sales.
“Making an impact has been a core part of our business since we started.”Learning is another driving force behind Jude’s eBay store.', 'For 48 hours, luxury shoppers in New York City can make purchases with used goods as currency at an eBay pop-up shop.
The e-commerce giant is operating the eBay Luxury Exchange on West 47th Street in New York City from Wednesday, Nov. 16 through Thursday, Nov. 17, from 11a.m.
eBay expands luxury offeringThe launch of the eBay Luxury Exchange pop-up comes on the heels of the recent expansion of its “Authenticity Guarantee” to jewelry.
eBay introduced the Authenticity Guarantee in 2020 as post-sale authentication service for all watches sold for $2,000 or more in the U.S.
The eBay Authenticity Guarantee program now includes sneakers, watches, handbags, trading cards, and fine jewelry.']

title: ['Get Real (Fly Sneakers) with eBay at ComplexCon - Complex', 'Neckface on Why eBay ‘Is the Sickest Website in the World,’ Working With Nike and Wanting to Build Skateparks Worldwide - Footwear News', 'Pawn shop busted for reselling stolen items on eBay - News Channel 5 Nashville', 'eBay Nike SB Dunk Low FD8777-100 Release Date - HYPEBEAST', 'Zip adds Australia’s largest shopping site eBay to partnership list - Stockhead', 'eBay Opens Store in NYC that Accepts Pre-Owned Luxury as ... - PR Newswire', 'How to sell on eBay: Man makes profits selling sale items from Officeworks, Big W and JB Hi-Fi - Daily Mail', "Swap Designer Goods at eBay's Luxury Exchange Pop-Up - Pursuitist"]
summary:
['ComplexCon is a few days away and eBay is bringing the heat by taking sneaker lover’s dreams from the screen to reality.
The namesake game will give shoe lovers the opportunity to show off their knowledge and take home an eBay gift card if they can guess which pair of shoes Williams is thinking of.
If participants guess the shoes correctly, they’ll win an eBay gift card.
But if they get it wrong, well, there’s always a consolation prize—in this case, it’s also an eBay gift card (just not the same amount).
Winners will receive eBay gift cards and bragging rights.', 'Not long after delivering one of the year’s boldest and most interesting collaborations with Nike SB, California-based artist Neckface teamed up with eBay with an auction that skateboarders would love.
Neckface and eBay held an auction from Nov. 11 that ended today with five pairs of his Nike SB Dunk, which dropped in October.
CREDIT: Courtesy of eBayWhat was the inspiration behind your recent Nike SB Dunk release?
“If you watch the Nike SB commercial for my shoe, there’s actually a skate-able object in there, and that’s the first time the world has ever seen one of these objects.
I’m going to do whatever I want as long as I’m having fun.”Do you have any other collaborations in the works?', 'NASHVILLE, Tenn. (WTVF) — Officers have busted a pawn shop business for allegedly selling close to $1 million worth of stolen items.
Metro Police said this operation was happening at three Music City Pawn shop locations in Davidson County: on Nolensville Pike, Lebanon Pike, and Dickerson Pike.
Then, they would resell those items for a 15-20% markup at their shops and on their eBay store.
This wasn't just an expedition to see who would buy stolen stuff, this was a complaint brought to our unit.
"It's not a small crime; this is a huge avenue and conduit for thieves to be able to unload stolen stuff for whatever they need it," Warren said.', 'The early 2000s was arguably the golden era for Nike and its Nike SB catalog as a plethora of rare collaborations and colorways were brought to fruition.
One was the eBay x Nike SB Dunk Low from 2003 — which the Swoosh team designed a mere three pairs of.
Additionally, the kicks appear with a segmented aesthetic as three sections of the shoe are separated by see-through panels.
Branding atop the tongues and heels have been modified with skewed-to-the-left SB branding (a nod to Bodecker), the former swapping out its usual Dunk Low hit for a NIKESBFOREVER hashtag.
Special graphics also appear on the insoles: the right foot shows Bodecker trying on the original eBay x Nike SB Dunk Low, and the left shoe shows him holding longtime Nike employee James Arizumi’s son.', 'shareLink copied toclipboardMajor buy now, pay later platform Zip partners with eBay, the #1 most-visited online shopping site in AustraliaZip Co (ASX:ZIP) has announced its new partnership with Australia’s largest online shopping site, eBay.
The shopping site’s millions of unique monthly visitors will now be able to pay for their purchases with flexible instalments through Zip.
Eligible eBay customers can access up to $2,000 (interest free) with Zip Pay and up to $5,000 (interest free up to six months) with Zip Money.
Post-pandemic, both companies identified the opportunity presented by the growing number of Australian consumers making purchases online versus at traditional bricks and mortar stores.
"*" indicates required fields Name * Email * Hidden Email Lists Morning Update Lunch Update Market Close Update Weekend Update It's free.', "eBay Opens Store in NYC that Accepts Pre-Owned Luxury as Currency eBay’s Luxury Exchange invites shoppers to have their jewelry, handbags, and watches appraised and exchanged for “closet currency” to purchase authentic items from eBay’s top luxury sellers.
eBay’s Luxury Exchange invites shoppers to have their jewelry, handbags, and watches appraised and exchanged for “closet currency” to purchase authentic items from eBay’s top luxury sellers.
eBay's Luxury Exchange capitalizes on the skyrocketing value of authenticated luxury items by letting shoppers exchange jewelry, handbags and watches from top brands like Gucci, Rolex, and Van Cleef & Arpels.
eBay's Luxury Exchange capitalizes on the skyrocketing value of authenticated luxury items by letting shoppers exchange jewelry, handbags and watches from top brands like Gucci, Rolex, and Van Cleef & Arpels.
The Luxury Exchange comes on the heels of the expansion of Authenticity Guarantee to jewelry, a move that significantly augments eBay's luxury offering.", '', 'In celebration of New York Jewelry Week, eBay opened the doors to the Luxury Exchange pop-up that landed in the heart of Diamond District.
Addressing the surging price trend in the designer goods market, eBay offers luxury enthusiasts an opportunity to exchange their lesser-loved pieces for other authentic luxury items that might better suit their collection.
57% of luxury shoppers believe the value of their authenticated luxury accessories will appreciate if the item remains in excellent condition.
The Luxury Exchange project is a part of eBay’s Authenticity Guarantee program launched in 2020.
Additionally, luxury items are viewed as an investment that could get a higher return on investment than other categories of products.']

['As more and more shops and tuning companies face large fines for selling and distributing these components, eBay Motors has quietly moved to ban them from their site.
R&T’s first encounter with this parts ban on eBay came by way of a Facebook user in a private automotive-focused Facebook Group.
“eBay prohibits the sale of items that bypass, defeat or render inoperative emission-control systems under the Defeat Device Policy and an EPA Enforcement Alert ,” an eBay spokesperson confirmed to R&T.
Mention of that EPA Enforcement Alert is no coincidence.
EPA has identified Stopping Aftermarket Defeat Devices for Vehicles and Engines as a National Compliance Initiative.', "Amazon and eBay sell the substance, either in its natural form of raw apricot kernels or capsules containing powder from the crushed seeds.
Cancer Research UK's specialist cancer information nurse Caroline Geraghty said, while it was understandable that cancer patients look to all sources for a potential treatment, there is no evidence amygdalin was safe.
The study of 39 brain cancer sufferers showed many dismissed their lack of balance as part of getting older.
In Dr Scott's study, brain cancer patients reported being less interested in activities, as well as not caring about their relationships, job and hobbies.
According to the Brain Tumour Charity, as many as one in three people with a brain tumour experience a personality change.", 'Sales of styles like the Balenciaga Le Cagole and Chanel 22 are up triple-digits on eBay year-over-year in the US and Canada in 2022.
Luxury on eBay – By the NumbersIn a press release on Wednesday publicizing an appraisal pop-up event in New York City this week, eBay revealed the following statistics:WatchesIn 2021, eight watches were purchased on eBay in the US every minute.
HandbagsIn 2021, a handbag was purchased on eBay in the US and Canada every 13 seconds.

Sales of styles like the Balenciaga Le Cagole and Chanel 22 are up triple-digits YoY in the US and Canada in 2022.', 'eBay is urging sellers in what seems like a last-ditch effort to have Congress raise the new IRS tax reporting threshold.
While a few states had lowered the threshold for state tax reporting purposes already, the majority of sellers only received the tax form when the IRS federal threshold was met.
We have a guide on this new regulation and an explainer about Form 1099-K here.
eBay: Tell Congress To Fix Burdensome Tax Reporting Requirements Before January 1st!
It’s an easy and quick way to hopefully influence Congress to adjust the new Form 1099-K reporting requirement before it goes into effect.', "We have been selling on eBay since 2006 as a top rated seller.
We sold an item overseas few months ago, buyer said in eBay messages he doesn't want to pay customs taxes and he is going to refuse it.
Then he filled a chargeback that he doesn't recognize the transaction.
The managed payment department is useless and never had a similar case, they refunded the buyer.
In our conversation with the buyer we mentioned the tracking # but we do have a printscreen of the tracking and an email from DHL asking to pay the fees."]

title: ['eBay Rethinks Part of Its Book Banning Policy - EcommerceBytes']
summary:
['eBay will no longer restrict the accounts of sellers who list banned books on its marketplace, though it will continue to remove listings of books it finds violate its Offensive Materials policy.
eBay did not widely publicize the change in policy that took effect on Thursday.
I cannot find anybody at eBay that can give me a list of things that I can't list."
Starting Thursday, November 17, if you have a book removed under eBay's Offensive Materials policy, there will not be a selling restriction.
We appreciate your feedback on this issue which helps us continue to make eBay a trusted and inclusive environment."']

['', 'With the 2022 World Cup kicking off today, new research from eBay Ads UK reveals that this year’s festive season will be a football frenzy as over a third (38%) of those planning to watch the World Cup are more excited about the tournament than they are about Christmas.
Don’t MissThat’s according to a survey of UK consumers, which also found that football fever is set to be a significant influence on consumers’ gifting plans this year.
What’s more, 29% of respondents agree that they’re intending to invest in items like televisions, soundbars and projectors to host World Cup viewing parties.
On this day searches for ‘soundbar’ nearly doubled compared to the same day a week before.
“A winter World Cup is unprecedented territory for consumers and brands alike, and it’s clear that Brits will be football-minded when gifting as the games dominate festivities,” said Upasana Gupta, GM, eBay Ads UK.']

summary:
['', 'eBay sellers are reporting that local pickup is being offered as a delivery option in their listings even though they didn't turn on the setting.
A seller reported it on Ecommerce EKG on November 3rd.
The seller explained, "I had item listed with calculated shipping but it only shows "Local Pickup" when viewed.
On November 17, the well-known forum poster Shipscript reported they and other sellers were experiencing the same issue: "Free Local Pickup erroneously shows in several of my listings and in some of the listings of a number of other sellers (shown in my spreadsheet) who have reported on the forums."
One important piece of information Shipscript noted: "The Local Pickup carries through to checkout and can be selected, so it is not simply a display issue."']

GeForce RTX 4080 sales numbers are incredibly low compared to the flagship, with the RTX 4090 outselling the RTX 4080 3.4 to 1.
The average RTX 4080 on eBay is priced about 30% over MSRP, which is noticeably less lucrative than the RTX 4090 (38% over MSRP).
However, from our observations, RTX 4090 prices are holding steady or even rising a little in the wake of widespread consumer disappointment with the RTX 4080.", 'Read on for tips on how to protect yourself from an eBay motors scam, and stay safe while trading online.

As a subsidiary of the well-known eBay brand, eBay Motors has established a strong reputation for securely facilitating transactions between buyers and sellers.', 'eBay executives have talked a lot about its strategy of targeting “high-value” and “enthusiast” buyers, but what does that mean exactly?
Of eBay’s 138 million buyers worldwide (at the time of the presentation), enthusiast buyers were eBay’s “best and most valuable group,” she said.
eBay talks a lot about focus categories, Jay said, but that’s because enthusiast buyers also make purchases outside of their main category.
Some of Phil’s purchases were used goods, had free shipping, or were made through a seller offer (you can learn more about offers to buyers on eBay Seller Center).
In 2021, eBay CEO Jamie Iannone and Chief Financial Officer Steve Priest discussed their new approach to buyers and explained the distinction between “high-value” buyers and “low-value” buyers ( see “eBay CEO Jamie Iannone Rejects Predecessor’s Approach to Buyers“).', 'It’s no secret that retro silhouettes are having a moment.
Brands like New Balance have been leading the throwback aesthetic for a while now by re-releasing classic silhouettes and combining the old with the new.
Sometimes the old ways are the best ways.
So far the six centres have authenticated more than 1.5 million pairs of sneakers from all over the globe.
So, with vintage sneakers on the mind, here are 5 silhouettes that originate from years gone by, as well as modern adaptations and homages, that are available to purchase right now on eBay*.', '', 'That being said, if you're looking to pick up a new "off-road only" performance part, eBay likely won't be your go-to website for much longer.
"Products that bypass, defeat or render inoperative emission-control systems aren’t allowed, either on their own or when combined with other hardware or software," reads eBay's policy on prohibited items.
Historically, the EPA has primarily been targeting defeat devices for diesel vehicles, however, individual states like California have also jumped into the mix to condemn non-approved ECU software.
It's possible that eBay is tuning its enforcement of this policy, or that certain items are flying under the radar for now.
Regardless, the banning of these items on eBay opens up a door with consequences behind it that nobody in the automotive scene wants to see.', 'Want to read the full story?

By choosing I accept, or by continuing being on the website, you consent to our use of Cookies and Terms & Conditions.', 'The tuning world has always had to adapt to changing laws and regulations, but the industry is grappling with tightening emissions regulations that have changed almost everything about how they can do business.
Iconic Miata tuner Flyin’ Miata announced it would no longer sell completely converted cars or conversion kits because of the changes, and now eBay has banned the sale of emissions defeat devices.
Road and Track became aware of the changes at eBay through a private automotive Facebook Group, where a user detailed their experience selling a tuning device for Hondas.
The sale ran afoul of eBay’s Emissions control defeat devices policy, which states that users cannot list “products that bypass, defeat or render inoperative emission-control systems.”eBay’s ban covers hardware and software and includes language that bans components like modified ECUs, off-road exhausts, and more.

The campaign “Export ka Expert” illustrates the challenges faced by B2C sellers on other export marketplaces and how these pain points are solved for them on eBay.', "Researchers from Gembyte.com decided to take a look at eBay and find out just how much money you can sell your old games, books and toys.

title: ['Local grinch steals toys, lists them on eBay - Newnan Times-Herald', 'Black Friday pre-loved focus was "right thing to do", says eBay UK ... - TheIndustry.fashion', 'Shark vacuum cleaner now £99 in stunning eBay Cyber Monday deal... - The Irish Sun', 'eBay Spends Big in 4th Quarter to Attract High-End Shoppers - EcommerceBytes']
summary:
['The news you’re reading was written by a local reporter, one of several employed by The Newnan Times-Herald.
For more than 155 years, The Newnan Times-Herald has been Coweta County’s source for independent, local news.
We ask that you please support our mission by becoming a subscriber for only 22 cents a day.
There aren’t many things 22 cents will buy these days, but you can buy verified, quality journalism that aims to cover the issues that concern you the most.
The Newnan Times-Herald is here for you.', 'Focusing on selling used and refurbished items this Black Friday was “a big bet” but “the right thing to do”, the boss of eBay UK has said.
The online marketplace took the decision to promote only refurbished and “pre-loved” items for the annual pre-Christmas sale this year, responding to cost of living and environmental pressures.
Even before Black Friday, UK general manager Murray Lambell had issued strident criticism of the annual event, calling it “broken” and a “frenzy with a ‘buying for buying sake’ mentality”.
In the summer, the company launched a “pre-loved fashion” sponsorship of reality show Love Island, and also partnered with Oxfam for the charity’s Second-Hand September campaign.
Lambell said it had been important for him that eBay took a leading role in efforts to promote second-hand products.', "You can pick up the Shark Cylinder Anti Hair Wrap Vacuum Cleaner for just £99 - that's £200 cheaper than full price.
It's worth noting that these items aren't the typical second-hand products eBay is famous for selling.
Instead, the store's line of refurbished products have been checked and certified by a team of engineers, and come with a 1-year warranty.
If you're keener on getting a Shark vac brand-new instead, head over to our Shark Black Friday deals page where we've got lots more discounts listed.
Shark Cylinder Anti Hair Wrap Vacuum Cleaner, refurbished £99.09 with code CYBER10 (full price £299.99) - buy from eBayYou'll find plenty more vacuum deals on our Black Friday Dyson deals article.", 'eBay appears to be putting its holiday marketing budget into its handful of focus categories as it runs another sale in luxury goods to attract big spenders.
After recently funding coupons to encourage shoppers in luxury watches and fine jewelry, it kicked off a sale on designer handbags on Cyber Monday.
Last year, eBay disclosed its strategy of going after what it termed “high value buyers,” explaining to Wall Street analysts that was the reason for the 2% decline in the number of buyers to 159 million in the first half of 2021. eBay Chief Financial Officer Steve Priest said high value buyers represented 20% of eBay buyers and account for about 75% of GMV (sales), while “low value buyers” represented 50% of eBay buyers and account for about 5% of GMV.
(At the end of September 2022, eBay had 135 million active buyers worldwide.)
That was followed by its 10% off sale in fine jewelry November 22nd through November 28th with a $300 minimum purchase and a discount capped at $500.']

title: ['ex-eBay President Jeff Skoll invests in company behind Washington ... - The Business Journals', "What Does eBay's Debt Look Like? - eBay (NASDAQ:EBAY) - Benzinga", 'Vivo X90 Pro Plus has made it to eBay check it out - The Tech Outlook', 'eBay Inc. stock falls Tuesday, underperforms market - MarketWatch']
summary:
['', "One key aspect of a companies financials is its debt, but before we understand the importance of debt, let's look at how much debt eBay has.
eBay DebtAccording to the eBay's most recent financial statement as reported on November 3, 2022, total debt is at $7.73 billion, with $6.58 billion in long-term debt and $1.15 billion in current debt.
Current debt is the portion of a company's debt which is due within 1 year, while long-term debt is the portion due in more than 1 year.
Total debt equals current debt plus long-term debt minus cash equivalents.
Besides equity, debt is an important factor in the capital structure of a company, and contributes to its growth.", 'Vivo X90 Pro Plus has made it to eBay check it outWe are shocked to see how Vivo X90 Pro Plus has reached eBay.

This was the stock's third consecutive day of losses.
eBay Inc. closed $26.96 below its 52-week high ($70.73), which the company achieved on November 30th."]

title: ["EBay's efforts to grow its luxury business are paying off - Glossy", 'Save £200 on iPhone 12 in epic eBay Black Friday deal ending SOON... - The Sun', 'Cristiano Ronaldo Cards: The Top 10 to Store in the eBay Vault - Yahoo Entertainment', 'Retired Carmi cruiser hits the auction block on eBay - Eyewitness News (WEHT/WTVW)', "eBay India unveils its latest brand campaign, 'eBay. Export Ka Expert' - Adgully", 'Last defendant in eBay stalking case has cancer, sentencing delayed - The Boston Globe', 'eBay Sellers Can Now Add Twice as Many Photos to Their Listings - EcommerceBytes', 'eBay Fearing EPA Backlash - Bans Some Off-Road and Race-Only ... - eSeller365']
summary:
['In addition to the targeted efforts eBay has made to grow the luxury business, it has also benefitted from a general increase in global luxury sales this year, which could reach $1.45 trillion.
A typical post from this account is a video documenting the behind-the-scenes watch authentication process with the company Stoll & Co.
The @eBayWatches account has comparatively less engagement than the main @eBay account, with only 20,000 followers to the latter’s 1 million.
Other marketing efforts have included hosting the Luxury Exchange, a two-day in-person event where customers can buy and sell jewelry and other luxury goods held in New York City’s Diamond District.
Iannone said these kinds of marketing efforts are a new strategy for eBay.', "Head to eBay's refurbished goods store, and you can pick up the iPhone 12 for just £439.99 - that's over £200 less than full price.
A refurbed SIM-free iPhone 12 handset usually costs £499.99, but right now it's £60 cheaper.
When compared to the cost of a brand-new iPhone 12 at the Apple Store - £649 - this offer looks mighty tempting.
Apple iPhone 12, refurbished, £395.99 (full price £649) - buy from eBayTo find out more about this phone, read our Tech Editor Sean Keach's iPhone 12 review.
For another choice of Apple phone, head to our iPhone 13 Black Friday deals page.", 'Aside from his status as one of the most popular individuals on Earth, Cristiano Ronaldo is also an amazing soccer player.
The eBay vault enters the market as enthusiasts are increasingly investing differently and looking at collectible items—like Cristiano Ronaldo cards—as alternative assets.
With soccer’s biggest stage now underway, it’s only fitting that we highlight some potential Ronaldo cards to add to your collection in the eBay vault.
Cristiano Ronaldo 2014 Prizm World Cup Silver PrizmImage credit: eBayThere’s no modern soccer set quite as revered as the 2014 Prizm World Cup.
Shop Cristiano Ronaldo 2003 Upper Deck Manchester UnitedWill you be adding any Cristiano Ronaldo cards or perhaps trading cards from other top stars in this year’s World Cup tournament to your collection in the eBay vault?', 'CARMI, Ill. (WEHT) — If you’re in the market for a used Ford Crown Victoria, the Carmi Police Department might have exactly what you’re looking for.
Officers listed their decommissioned cruiser on the auction website eBay in hopes to find it a new owner.
(Courtesy: Carmi PD) (Courtesy: Carmi PD)When new, the cruiser sold for over $20,000, but now sits online with a starting bid of $3,000.
Over its thirteen year history, officers have driven it around 92,000 miles worth of Illinois roads.
To place a bid or learn more information about this retired cruiser, click here.', 'eBay, a global commerce leader connecting millions of buyers and sellers, launched its seller-focused marketing campaign ‘eBay.
Export Ka Expert’ today.
Export Ka Expert’ launched today.
Export Ka Expert, a seller-first campaign communicates to its audience through multiple video assets which will be released in a phased manner.
The campaign “Export ka Expert” illustrates the challenges faced by B2C sellers on other export marketplaces and how these pain points are solved for them on eBay.', 'Young agreed to delay sentencing and scheduled a status conference in March 2023 for an update on Gilbert’s health.
The federal judge responsible for sentencing Brian Gilbert, the final criminal defendant in the bizarre stalking of a Natick couple, delayed the proceeding until next year.
Santa Clara Police DepartmentGilbert was among seven former eBay workers who pleaded guilty to criminal charges over the 2019 stalking and harassment of David and Ina Steiner.
The Natick couple published an online newsletter that covered eBay and drew the ire of top eBay executives.
Six other former eBay workers have already been sentenced in the case, including Baugh, who received a prison term of almost five years.', 'eBay doubled the number of photos it allows sellers to add to their listings.
Sellers can now add 24 photos, up from the previous limit of 12, via desktop, mobile, and eBay App.
While eBay has been rolling out the feature to sellers in recent weeks, it officially announced the news this week.
While sellers received the news positively, some were skeptical when they saw eBay insert an advertisement into the photo sections of sellers’ listings.
Fine, do what you will, but kindly insert the ads AFTER a seller’s listing photos PLEASE!”Yet despite eBay seeing fit to add its own promotional messages in the photo section of sellers’ listings, it advised sellers not to overlay text such as “Free postage” or their logos themselves, writing, “That kind of information should go in your title, subtitle, or item description.”More information about adding photos to listings is available on the eBay website.', 'California has been at the forefront of cracking down on illegal defeat devices and tuning products that modify OEM emissions control systems.
eBay FlinchesFor more than a year, eBay has been refocusing on growing its vehicle parts and accessories (P&A) business.
eBay has also been a source for performance enthusiasts to find car parts that may not be legal in their states for public highway use.
Previously, eBay’s policy on defeat devices was broad, stating that “anything that indicates it will defeat, bypass, or shut down emission control devices” is prohibited on the marketplace.
That’s a very broad list of common motorsports parts that eBay says are now technically prohibited on the site.']

title: ['Inflatable Rudolph mauled by bear now up for sale on eBay, proceeds for charity - ABC6OnYourSide.com', 'Lunchbox Sold His Old Slippers On eBay - The Bobby Bones Show', 'Aramex and eBay partner to support business growth of Asia Pacific ... - PR Newswire Asia', 'LEGO pogo stick selling for eye-watering prices on eBay - Brick Fanatics', "Eddie Campbell's Bacchus Gets A Bump On eBay Over IDW TV Deal - Bleeding Cool News"]
summary:
['', 'Lunchbox thinks he has something in common with Steve Jobs because they’ve both sold a pair of their old shoes on eBay.
Steve Jobs’ pair sold for $218,000 dollars, so Lunchbox decided to sell his old slippers on eBay.
Lunchbox’s old slippers,” and they sold!
He said these slippers are so worn out with holes in them that they are unwearable.
He couldn’t believe it because he didn’t promote the slippers, someone just randomly found them on eBay and decided to buy them.', 'Aramex & eBay AgreementThe collaboration will enable eBay sellers across Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, Indonesia, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Vietnam, and the Philippines to ship orders conveniently and reliably across the globe.
Under the partnership, Aramex will offer two tailored solutions that match the needs of eBay sellers for cross-border shipments.
SMEs with formal business registration can benefit from the Aramex Ship & Pay Service, which is seamlessly integrated into eBay's proprietary shipping platform called Cross Border Parcel Shipping Solution or "CPaSS".
In addition, small businesses without formal business registration will be able to ship orders efficiently through the Aramex Pay & Ship Service.
By using Aramex Ship & Pay and Aramex Pay & Ship services, SMEs can improve brand trust and customer experience through accurate and seamless deliveries of goods they sell on eBay.', 'The 3D-printed LEGO pogo stick that came as a special reward for a crowdfunded LEGO book is already lighting up the secondhand market.
Limited edition LEGO elements will always go for high prices on eBay (and even not-so-limited-edition minifigures).
Unbound’s crowdfunded The Secret Life of LEGO Bricks, a comprehensive look at LEGO elements, offered a 3D-printed pogo stick as a reward to encourage people to pledge £90 during its money-raising stage.
Despite the book only shipping out to crowdfunders from today (December 1), there are already three example of the pogo stick on eBay at the time of writing.
What’s more, listings like this are now the only way to get the pogo stick, as the crowdfunding for the book has now closed.', '']

title: ['Snoop Dogg Launches Members-Only Death Row Inmate Program Exclusively On eBay - Vibe', 'I plan to make $6,000 on eBay. Can I put it into an IRA instead of paying taxes? - MarketWatch', 'EBay, Lawmakers Push to Change Tax Reporting Rule in Lame Duck - Bloomberg Tax', 'eBay 90-Day Limit on Order History May Be Coming to an End - EcommerceBytes', 'Luke Combs X Crocs 2022 collaboration reselling on eBay for ... - HITC - Football, Gaming, Movies, TV, Music']
summary:
['Snoop Dogg attends the 2022 MTV VMAs at Prudential Center on August 28, 2022 in Newark, New Jersey.
Last night (Dec. 1), West Coast Hip-Hop legend Snoop Dogg released not only an exclusive capsule of items on eBay that fans can bid on but also his new Death Row Inmate Program.
The eBay program (D.R.I.P) is a members-only initiative that offers fans three annual membership tiers including one-of-a-kind merchandise and perks from the DoggFather himself.
This package includes a black dog tag and chain, access to AMA meet and greets with the label’s artists, Death Row Radio & 187.7 WBALLZ programming access, 80+ commercial free Dash radio stations, members-only access to Snoop, Dash, and Death Row events, and more.
eBay screenshotThe 51-year-old currently has his signed “Gin & Juice” jersey and Death Row Chain on display at Miami Art Basel‘s Scope Gallery (seen below).', 'Dear Tax Guy,I am retired with Social Security and a state pension.
Over the last 30 years I’ve accumulated a lot of “junk” from eBay EBAY.
Now, I’m also trying to clean out my house, and sell it at cost or a small profit.
With eBay now sending out 1099s, I believe I have to pay taxes on the profits.', 'Momentum is building in Congress to increase the business transaction threshold as lawmakers from both parties and e-commerce platforms clamor for changes to new tax reporting requirements.
While members from both parties and both chambers are eager to raise the threshold, it’s unclear if there’s agreement on the $5,000 threshold, full repeal, or something in between.
He also didn’t want to speculate on whether there’s enough backing for the $5,000 threshold.
It’s incredibly confusing.”Gig Economy IssuesSome say the new requirement helps fix tax reporting issues that arise out of the gig economy.
Caroline Bruckner, managing director of American University’s Kogod Tax Policy Center, emphasized that the new reporting rule doesn’t impose new taxes.', 'Sellers are buzzing as they see signs eBay will finally make it possible to access orders they made that are older than 90 days.
"We can now select a "custom date range" for displaying order history and access data for past 2 years through the seller hub orders page.
Glorious!," the seller wrote, including a screenshot showing a pull-down menu "Period" with options beyond the default "Last 90 days" option.
You can now view orders for the past 2 years versus just the past 90 days, giving you access to additional data to complete important tasks."
When eBay does roll out a significant new feature, it generally rolls it out to sellers in stages.', 'Luke Combs dropped his 2022 Croc collaboration today but with only a limited supply, lucky winners have hiked up the price on eBay.
Country superstar Luke Combs has joined forces with the shoe brand for the fifth time since 2019’s version of the Classic Clog.
As with every limited release, many walked away empty-handed, making it the perfect opportunity to resell the exclusive shoes on eBay.
Photo by David Becker/Getty Images for iHeartRadioIntroducing Luke Combs’ fishing-themed Crocs 2022The CMA Entertainer Of The Year dropped news of his latest fashion venture on November 21, praising them as “straight gas” – that’s amazing, right?
One user, however, managed to win the shoes twice, despite rules limiting stock to one per person:Luke Combs’ Crocs resell for over $200Despite not yet receiving the Crocs yet, lucky winners have jumped straight onto resell sites to earn some serious profit.']

title: ["eBay Blames Random Audits for Freezing Seller's Funds - EcommerceBytes"]
summary:
["Dear Ina,eBay audits sellers, freezes assets.
Last week my eBay seller account had its available funds frozen.
The rep claimed that every account would be audited per year and all assets frozen until they finish.
Over the past week I've spoken to a dozen eBay reps and each one had a different story as to why they refuse to release my funds.
I've never heard of eBay doing sitewide audits on sellers or freezing assets on sellers while they do so."]

We’re making shipping easier with free Priority Mail and Priority Mail Express packaging supplies to ship your gifts this holiday season.”To the right of the message, the USPS showed an image of some Priority Mail packaging with a Christmas tree ornament and candy cane on a red background.

title: ['Used market "remarkably stable" in November, says eBay - Motor Trader', 'Executives from eBay and Golden State Foods Join GS1 US Board ... - PR Newswire', 'eBay Partners with Used-Clothing Reseller in UK - EcommerceBytes', '2022 Batman Gift Guide - Day 11: eBay Finds - Batman-News', 'Disheartened Seller Gives Up Hope for Sales on eBay - EcommerceBytes', 'eBay - The Small Business Incubator To Start Selling Online - eSeller365']

['Car supermarkets and franchised dealers saw the biggest rises, up 2% (to £18,204) and 1.5% (to £23,032) respectively.
Days to sell increased MoM by just one day to 39 days, compared to 37 days in the previous November.
The fastest sales were achieved by car supermarkets at 29 days and franchised dealers at 32 days, with independents averaging 48 days.
“Despite turbulence in the wider economy, with rising inflation, energy costs and the prospect of a looming recession, the used car market remained remarkably stable in November,” said Lucy Tugby, marketing director of eBay Motors Group.
“We believe the easing of consumer demand has more to do with seasonal trends than the impact of the cost of living crisis as days to sell remained stable.', "Prior to eBay, Gaffney was the vice president of engineering and research at Yahoo!
At Golden State Foods, Dick oversees all global food manufacturing and logistics operations for the $6 billion supplier to the foodservice and retail industries.
Originally from Belfast, Northern Ireland, Dick earned a bachelor's degree in business administration and modern languages from Queens University Belfast.
The GS1 US Board of Governors comprises executives from leading organizations including: Amazon; The Coca-Cola Company; Dot Foods, Inc.; eBay, Inc.; Golden State Foods; Google; The J.M.
About GS1 USGS1 US®, a member of GS1 global, is a not-for-profit information standards organization that facilitates industry collaboration to help improve supply chain visibility and efficiency through the use of GS1 Standards, the most widely used supply chain standards system in the world.", 'eBay welcomed a large used-clothing seller in the UK called Advanced Clothing Solutions (ACS), a company that “enables brands and retailers to introduce a rental or resale model alongside the existing e-commerce model.”eBay UK said the partnership with ACS, which operates a store on eBay, would help more brands to launch resale offerings on eBay.
The first retail partner to launch on ACS’ eBay Shop is Monsoon.
“ACS cleans, sanitises and repairs second hand items, making them resale ready, as well as arranging the logistics of item listing and delivery,” eBay said.
Brands that operate outlets on eBay UK may be wondering how partnerships with ACS might impact their sales.
eBay said 87% of UK adults surveyed have bought an item second hand in the past twelve months, and 63% have sold a secondhand item.', 'James Gunn turns in first draft of Superman: Legacy script', "Dear Ina,eBay is broken and no sales or views means eBay is dead.
It's not just one or 2 sellers this time, the platform has no views even with paid promotions.
Black Friday - no views or sales, and then Cyber Monday hit no views or sales.
I signed up for Poshmark and made a few sales with some shoes.
Word got out eBay reset and destroyed the platform and has not fixed the issues.", 'eBay – The Side Hustle, The Small Business OpportunityMillions of micro and small businesses thrive on eBay.
Some professional sellers launched on eBay with a business plan, while others accidentally became a business after selling personal items.
71% of eBay sellers said that eBay helped them start their business, and 79% said the marketplace helped them grow their business.
No online marketplace is perfect, but eBay has offered entrepreneurs for over 25 years the ability to start an online business as a side hustle.
eBay’s inaugural Small Business Report showcases data that should be encouraging to those that have been thinking about selling on eBay.']

['There has been one item that has been very popular amongst shoppers this year which is now courting controversy.
M&S ’s £9 Starry Night Shortbread Selection Tin is a big hit with shoppers, who seemingly can't get enough of the 'stunning' product.
The tin has won a lot of fans for its use of light to project Christmas images onto walls and play festive music.
Give your head a wobble given these current times if the supply of "starry night biscuits" are one of your main concerns then I am envious of you.
M&S Spokesperson said: ‘Our Starry Night Shortbread Selection Tin is still available in selected stores up and down the country, keep your eyes peeled for them!', "Shares of eBay Inc. EBAY slipped 1.34% to $43.35 Tuesday, on what proved to be an all-around rough trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index SPX falling 1.44% to 3,941.26 and Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA falling 1.03% to 33,596.34.
This was the stock's second consecutive day of losses.
eBay Inc. closed $24.36 below its 52-week high ($67.71), which the company reached on December 8th.", 'ACS partners with the e-commerce company eBay to reduce waste in the fashion industry.
Advanced Clothing Solutions (ACS) cleans, sanitises and repairs second-hand items, making them resale ready, as well as arranging the logistics of item listing and delivery.
The first retail partner to launch on ACS’ eBay Shop is Monsoon, with other high-street names set to follow.
However, the research found barriers exist when it comes to second-hand items becoming mainstream.
eBay is famous for its vast offering of preloved clothing, and this scalable resale partnership with ACS will enable them to develop this further.', 'eBay has launched a new UK partnership with clothing resale, sanitization and repair platform ACS to expand the online marketplace’s secondhand offering and help reduce waste in the fashion industry.
The partnership aims to help more brands create and scale resale offerings while adding more secondhand options to eBay UK’s platform.
eBay will help connect millions of global shoppers to this stock, including eBay UK’s 20 million customers.
The first retailer to launch on ACS’ eBay Shop will be Monsoon, with other companies set to follow.
The ACS partnership will help eBay UK overcome some of the top barriers to buying resale, which included concerns about hygiene (51%), safety of secondhand products (35%) and quality issues (28%).']

title: ['eBay Sellers Surprised by International Orders - EcommerceBytes', "eBay and Nike Reissue the Iconic 'eBay Dunk' - eBay Inc.", 'Dangerous fake abortion pills sold over eBay following Roe reversal ... - Washington Examiner', "AnZ Comic's Ebay Pulse 12/7 2022 - CBSI Comics"]

["EIS international shipping program , even some who had their settings set to ship domestically only and had not signed up for the Global Shipping Program (GSP) it's replacing.
eBay is enrolling sellers into its neweven some who had their settings set to ship domestically only and had not signed up for the Global Shipping Program (GSP) it's replacing.
The new eBay EIS program landing page states that all new and current eligible Global Shipping Program listings would automatically default to eBay International Shipping, and sellers would need to manually update listings that offer eBay international standard delivery and USPS International listings.
When we enroll sellers into eBay International Shipping GSP as well as listings that do not have business policies are automatically migrated.
Only listings with international shipping business policies are not auto migrated.", 'Now, eBay and Nike SB are reissuing the “eBay Dunk,” timed to the iconic silhouette’s 20th anniversary.
2022 Nike SB eBay Dunk: The general release design pays homage to the cut up samples of the original pair.
"The Nike SB Dunk changed the game for sneakerheads, and while eBay has always been the place for hard-to-find Nike SB Dunk shoes from any era, it’s incredible that this one storied style is making a comeback.”The Skate ‘Em Out StoreTo celebrate the launch of the 2022 Nike SB eBay Dunk, the two brands will open the Skate ‘Em Out Store in Portland, Oregon.
Demonstrating a long-standing commitment to the skate and sneaker communities, the store gives enthusiasts access to coveted Nike SB Dunk shoes – like the Nike SB Dunk Low Pro x Grateful Dead “Opti Yellow,” Nike SB Dunk High “De La Soul” and Nike SB Dunk Low “Sour Apple” – at the original 2002 MSRP of $65 a pair.
To get this price, shoppers just have to lace up their Nike SB Dunk shoes and skate out of the store.', 'Fake, cheap abortion pills being sold on eBay are reportedly dangerous and predatory toward pregnant women looking for abortion access.
The pills, sold and shipped from India, are billed as "pregnancy kits" and should not be purchased by pregnant women, according to doctors in a report from the Daily Mail.
"Some of the fake pills may not have safe ingredients in them."
The "pregnancy kits" found on eBay can be as cheap as $15 to $20.
The increased interest in abortion pills comes months after the Supreme Court overturned Roe v. Wade in the decision Dobbs v. Jackson Women's Health Organization .', 'Gargoyles #1We sold 36 copies of Cover A.

title: ['Refurbished Peloton Bikes available on eBay in the United Kingdom ... - Pelo Buddy', "Let's see what's inside this scary eBay Chinese factory test equipment - Boing Boing", 'eBay UK Reassures Sellers Again As Royal Mail Postal Worker ... - eSeller365', 'eBay Canada Launches Address Validation to Attack Delivery Delays - eSeller365', 'Man jailed for role in dangerous Oldham eBay crime group - The Oldham Times', "33-year-old jewelry designer ditched Amazon and Walmart, now brings in $4.8 mil/year: Big companies 'make such stupid mistakes' - CNBC", "Urgent recall for popular travel cot sold on eBay and Catch due to 'risk of injury' - 9Honey"]

['Peloton is expanding their relationship with eBay to offer refurbished bikes to customers in the United Kingdom.
Peloton announced the news in a press release:Today, Peloton announced that it has expanded its partnership with eBay.
Customers can buy a refurbished original Peloton Bike in mainland UK as well as Northern Ireland for £995, which includes delivery and set-up.
You can view the Peloton UK eBay page and the complete press release here.
Sign up for our newsletter and get all the latest Peloton updates & Peloton rumors sent directly to your inbox.', 'Big Clive bought a lamp tester on eBay and found it to be scarily dangerous.
"It makes me wonder how many innocent Chinese factory workers have passed pant-filling amounts of electrical current," he says, "or simply had the probes explode on contact with either faulty equipment or random metalwork in the vicinity.
Not helped by the unpolarised power connector."
Thumbnail image: Big Clive/YouTube', 'eBay UK has reconfirmed its commitment to protecting a seller’s reputation as a result of the Royal Mail postal worker strike as the situation intensifies during the holiday peak shipping season.
Don’t MissBackground: More than 115,000 Royal Mail postal workers have been striking several days each month since August, demanding higher wages, better benefits, and job security.
Royal Mail just a few days ago, even revised its last posting dates for packages and mail to arrive before December 25.
eBay UK Initial Response: Since the strike actions began in August, eBay UK said it is protecting seller reputations due to late deliveries on orders shipped with Royal Mail.
eBay sellers voiced their concerns about the ongoing situation, and the company even offered up advice for sellers in October, before the holiday season started.', 'eBay Canada launched a new address verification feature that should improve on-time deliveries and reduces user frustrations due to address errors.
Don’t MissWhat you need to know: Incorrect delivery addresses can lead to seller and buyer frustrations.
eBay Canada to Check Addresses Against Postal RecordsThe solution: eBay Canada will now automatically scan all addresses for potential errors and typos, checking them against postal records.
When a user accidentally enters an incorrect address in their account settings or during the checkout process, eBay will provide an automated notification with a suggested address.
Final thoughts: This new verification service is live now on eBay Canada, and the company explains here how to check and update the shipping address on the platform.', "Imran Ali, from Oldham, was sentenced at Minshull Street Crown Court for his role in the group's illegal activities.
Between September 2019 and February 2020, the gang targeted and terrorised at least 18 people who believed they were viewing a vehicle for sale on eBay.
Of the 28 incidents, there were nine robberies, seven attempt robberies, one report of a disturbance and 11 reports of suspicious circumstances.
Mohammed Farid, 49, of Lorne Street, Oldham, was sentenced to 20 years in jail for conspiracy to commit robbery.
Faisal Farid, 27, of Osborne Street, Oldham, was jailed for 12 years for conspiracy to commit robbery and Adam Marco, 22, of Kent Street, Oldham, was jailed for six years for the same crime.", 'Automic Gold's growing popularity is backed by an unconventional strategy: ditching those major platforms and selling only on its own website.
Al Sandimirova officially founded Automic Gold, an size- and LGBTQ-inclusive jewelry company in 2016.
In 2021, its first full year exclusively selling jewelry from its online storefront, it brought in $4.8 million.
"Regular companies assume it's harder to target the LGBT community," Sandimirova says.
Searching for outletsSandimirova named Automic Gold — spelled to include "AU," the chemical abbreviation for gold, and pronounced like "atomic" — with "autonomy," independence and freedom in mind.', "A﻿ popular travel cot has been recalled over safety concerns after it was found it did not comply with mandatory safety requirements.

title: ["eBay's Inaugural DE&I Conference: The Be for Everyone Experience - eBay Inc.", 'Assholes Are Already Selling the Eagles Christmas Special Album on eBay - Crossing Broad']
summary:
['On October 18 and 19, eBay’s Diversity, Equity and Inclusion team hosted the company’s first-ever Be for Everyone Experience — a two half-day virtual summit featuring interactive learning sessions with global thought leaders and experts on topics such as the business case for DE&I, understanding burnout and strengthening advocacy in the workplace.
“We set out to create a unique interactive experience that will inform, inspire and connect our entire eBay employee community,” said Josefina Aguayo, director of Diversity, Equity and Inclusion.
“You’re trying to define a culture and create a common experience for people so they become their own community,” said Trevor.
For example, Dr. Alisha Moreland-Capuia taught attendees how to create wellness and belonging at work by examining the relationship between fear, stress, trauma and resilience.
“Let’s get organized and mobilized and invest in people and places that are making a difference.”At eBay, diversity, equity and inclusion is the foundation on which our culture was built.', 'The pre-sale for A Philly Christmas Special album was today and it sold out in three minutes.
Awesome gesture that’s gonna go a long way:A Philly Special Christmas pic.twitter.com/CSVtQxbEtO — Connor Barwin (@ConnorBarwin98) December 9, 2022Of course though pieces of shit have to ruin it.
Details in the tweet below:Official “A Philly Christmas Special” auction thread.
If someone held a gun to Barwin’s head and asked him to thread a tweet, next year’s Christmas album would need a new producer:A Philly Special Christmas thread: Thank you for all of your support!
(1/7) — Connor Barwin (@ConnorBarwin98) December 9, 2022Because of your amazing passion, over $100,000 is being donated to the Children’s Crisis Treatment Center!']

title: ['He bought a random hat online and posted about it. Then strangers brought him to Arizona to watch Snowflake play for the title - 12news.com KPNX', 'Someone tried auctioning off an EVGA RTX 4090 prototype on eBay - TechSpot']
summary:
["This is one of the stories that people will tell their grandkids about – and they might not believe you.
He’s known to buy hats online occasionally, and a blue Snowflake football hat caught his eye.
After researching the name on the hat and seeing the town’s football team had a playoff game soon, he posted about it on their Facebook page.
Arizona sportsThe city of Phoenix is home to five major professional sports league teams; The NFL's Arizona Cardinals, NBA's Phoenix Suns, WNBA’s Phoenix Mercury, MLB's Arizona Diamondbacks and NHL's Arizona Coyotes.
The Indoor Football League’s Arizona Rattlers also play at the Footprint.", "An account claiming to represent EVGA put a preproduction RTX 4090 prototype up for auction on eBay yesterday, with the proceeds going to charity.
EVGA met with Gamers Nexus and JayzTwoCents quite a while ago to tell them that they were terminating their partnership with Nvidia.
Shortly after, the GPU was listed for auction on eBay with the proceeds also going to St. Jude.
The eBay listing was fairly light on details.
EVGA hadn't advertised the auction anywhere, and it didn't come from the eBay account that the company had used before."]

Saudi Arabia E-Commerce Market Analysis5.1 E-Commerce Market5.2 E-Commerce Penetration6.
